  khoros ekhei egkataleiphthei kai uparkhei anagke suntereses kai kathariotetas 
 mia apo ta idia den allazei o basikos kormos tes kuberneses ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous mia apo ta idia den allazei o basikos kormos tes kuberneses mia apo ta idia sto neo kubernetiko skhema pou epelexe o k karamanles gia te nea tetraetia

 blepete thorubethekan apo te sunergasia stis kinetopoieseis me te dexia   to theoreio tes boules parakolouthousan khthes te suzetese gia to nomoskhedio peri phorologias oinopneumatodon kazanaredes tou nomou mas 
 ste sunekheia me tis odegies tou demarkhou k an

  paiktes ekhei perasei apo tis gkremio porto 
 ostoso e zetese mekhri stigmes einai arketa periorismene kathos polloi ekhoun apothemata petrelaiou aphou to kausimo otan eikhe aposurthei apo ten agora kata ton persino maio aggize molis ta  lepta to litro 
 giati na men ekhoun oi leproi duo mono spithames ge na kalliergoun oson ta daktula mporoun na sphixoun akome ten tsapa ena khoraphaki ena mpostani ena perboli 
 einai kharakteristiko oti an kai den ekhoun monime stege gia tis sunanteseis kai tis drasteriotetes tous briskontai metaxu tous se diaphora semeia tou hrakleiou se kaphe estiatoria e kai sta grapheia orismenon melon 
  upothese pairnei mpala pollous galazious dioiketes uperano upopsias 
  nomothesia ekhei megala kena kai strebloseis kai den uparkhei ena axiopisto sustema elegkhou 
 mporei na to skephtontai kapoioi gia te genike dieuthunse antagonismou 
  eliopita tairiazei polu me ouzo e rake kai sunodeuetai me ena phresko turi opos to katiki e ta malaka phreska kukladitika turia 
 upegrapse ste nioukastl o ntempa mpa  gouest kham epese omos o ntempa mpa den ten akolouthese 
 alexiou ostis mellon na egkatastathe os elegktes tou phorologikou grapheiou uperxen autoptes martus ton apaision ekeinon skenon 
 kathemerina epibebaionei o sumbouleutikos stathmos tou kethea ten polu semantike parousia tou sto nesi me entone drasterioteta konta stous neous me ekdeloseis kai enemerotikes ekstrateies 
 dustukhos mas leipei to poiotiko tragoudi apo to radiophono to opoio amphoteroi xeroun na uperetoun sosta 
 para tis kata kairous desmeuseis tou upourgeiou den oloklerotheke e katargese tou periphemou  tou paralogou periorismou delade pou epebale e proegoumene kubernese gia te dunatoteta apaskholeses tou prosopikou se sugkhrematodotoumena erga 
 einai idioktetes ton pio diasemon ellenikon estiatorion metaxu ton opoion e sponde kai e khutra 
   upourgos ugeias andreas loberdos kai o demarkhos athenaion giorgos kamines parakhoroun sunenteuxe tupou gia to programma  prosumptomatikoi elegkhoi gia ton karkino trakhelou tes metras 
 apo auto to dedomeno exartatai alloste mia seira allon pragmaton pou ekhoun na kanoun me te metepeita poreia tou sto khoro 
  ex oson gnorizo o gkontas basizetai stis diabebaioseis tou khristophorou papadopoulou anadokho tou ergou oti tha ta katapherei 
 pera apo ta opoia aitemata ton taxitzedon to megalo aitema erkhetai apo to koino kai tous touristes pou episkeptontai te khora kathe khrono 
 to upsos tou neou paketou sterixes endekhetai na anelthei sta  dis 
  kubernese koniortopoiei akoma kai desmeuseis pou aporreoun apo tous nomous pou aute psephise gia aporrophese ton dioristeon ekpaideutikon apo  kai prouperesia

 thelukos kephalos o oxurrugkhos tes elladas 
 sten anakoinose tous oi philoi tou aiolikou upogrammizoun oti e omada sterizetai phetos se anthropous apo to nesi kai axizoun ten uposterixe se aute ten krisime kampe tou protathlematos 
 anthropoi pou etrexan stous dromous gia na panegurisoun gia auto to katorthoma adola khoris na upopteuontai to pou tha phthasei 
 oi titloi programmatizontai kai oi diakriseis prokathorizontai basei paraskeniakou khronodiagrammatos kai epikuronontai me tis eulogies kai tis kathoristikes parembaseis mias diaitesias anikanes kai upotagmenes sto bathurizo athletiko parakratos 
 to epikheirema uper autes tes apopses  khronos den eparkei gia prokrimatikes 
 axiosemeioto oti to programma ulopoietheke khoris khrematodotese me idious porous tou  
 gi autous bebaia oi opoioi ede ekhoun paei stous topous katoikias tous tha uparxei merimna oste na paralaboun ekei osa eikhan aphesei mesa sto ploio 
  olumpiakos pere to ekto sunekhomeno kupello tou kai opos eipe kai o photes mplanes ste sunenteuxe tou ston  gia ton olumpiako den metraei e nike para mono e isopalia 
 gia nea paidia einai polu oraio alla den ekho dei kupseliotes na einai etsi pos na to kanoume niketas kaklamanes meta tis antidraseis gia to parko tes odou kuprou pou pege na to kanei gkaraz 
 omos o elegkhos pote den epitugkhanetai apoluta 
 prokeitai gia ton idio mekhanismo pou eikhe thesei palaiotera se epharmoge kai e irlandia

 upenthumizetai oti ekhoun ede anakoinosei pos tha giortasoun ten genoktonia tous sten epeiro tora pou katargetheke e biza gia tous albanous pou erkhontai sten ellada 
 se katsarola kai metria photia zestanete ten krema te zakhare ta amugdala kai to upoloipo xusma 
 prospatho eipe na mazepso ten yperesia energontas mesa sta plaisia tou nomou kai olos autos o thorubos ekhei skopo na demiourgesei entuposeis sten koinonia 
 ten topothetoume mesa se ena tapsi 
 anebeka sten athena kai pega sto spiti tou ethopoiou opou e proedros tou enthousiasteke me ten idea 
 blepete e mania ton metagraphon den emeine sto khoro tou podosphairou alla phainetai oti epektatheke e emeis eimaste oi protoporoi ten epekteiname kai sto khoro tes politikes 
 apo to  douleuei san kathegetria phonetikes kai orthophonias ste rosike akademia theatrikes tekhnes

 pera apo tis atomikes mpanieres loutron leitourgei mia omadike dexamene pragmatika uperokhe 
  bitroubios ethete treis orous gia to epitukhes arkhitektonema te khresimoteta ten eustatheia kai to kallos

 malista kai o kalos kairos boethese polu sto na bgoun oi katanalotes kai na kanoun tis khristougenniatikes agores tous apo ta katastemata tes ksanthes

 ta deltia tha dianemethoun apo ta tmemata parokhon tes kurias asphalises pou anekei o kathe asphalismenos

 kai malista se ola ta mesa enemeroses tes khiou stelnontas mas tis eukhes tou

 den xero gia paradeigma an uparkhei problema ugeias me ton ntiara

 pantoula exetazetai e turia gia ten topothetese asthenophorou   oikismos tes turias exetazetai apo to upourgeio os katallele these gia ten topothetese asthenophorou tou  gia ten kalutere exuperetese ton katoikon tes periokhes

 trite  augoustou   emboliasmos kata tou katarroikou ton emboliasmo ton probaton gia ten antimetopise tou katarroikou puretou zeta o bouleutes spuros galenos me erotese pou katethese ston upourgo agrotikes anaptuxes kosta skandalide

  maria maite peroni e maritsou opos prosphoneitai sten prototupe ekdose tes seiras pantreuetai ton antra tes kardias tes khouan 
 me ten entole aute epibebaionetai e apodokhe ton protaseon kai ton desmeuseon mas gia ten exodo tes kalumnou apo ten krise 
 amesos ekhete prosbase me ta podia se penteexi ammouderes paralies oles organomenes me xaplostres kai ompreles gia bouties me thea sten aigina 
  ta teleutaia pente khronia te dieuthunse tou oikismou ekhei analabei e murto 
 tha ten phtiaxoun kai apo ta duo 
 se mia epokhe pou e periokhe o topos ekhei anagke apo orama kai okhi apo aple diakheirise 
  taktike  epeide akribos e prokatarktike pistopoiese ta gegonota plen omos apo tote den ekhei kinethei apolutos tipote 
 pos mas eikhe diaphugei apo ton tzogo threphetai o sugkhronos politismos 
 upobole dikaiologetikon mekhri semera deutera  septembriou ste grammateia tou nosokomeiou tel 
  gallos epithetikos upegrapse sumbolaio sunergasias eos to telos tes sezon me ten mpani gias apo to ampou ntampi opos anakoinose o sullogos 
 khtismene amphitheatrika me dioropha kai trioropha spitia me romantika dromakia kato apo ta ereipia tou benetsianikou kastrou 
 traumatisteke sobara se trokhaio ten proegoumene paraskeues sto  khiliometro tes eparkhiakes odou metamorphoses  aspraggelon ioanninon ikh autokineto exetrape tes poreias tou me apotelesma na traumatistei sobara o odegos tou 
 oi nees etaireies tha leitourgesoun os kentrikoi phoreis gia ten anaptuxe ton emporikon drasterioteton tes solenourgeia korinthou sto diethne khoro 
 epanalambanete te diadikasia se akoma mia strose ton idion ulikon 
 tetarte  augoustou   klope semeiotheke ten perasmene pempte se spiti  antra sten periokhe tou kato khalika ste mutilene 
  proedros tes omospondias tzounto tes austrias khans pol koutsera eikhe mono kala logia na pei gia ten  kheil  klaountia etan enas anthropos khamogelastos kharoumenos 
  proseleuse ostoso tou kosmou to proi tou sabbatou etan apogoeteutike 
 oi polites tes thessalonikes exetasan ten kholesterine kai ten arteriake tous piese kai parakolouthesan omilies gia ten ugeia tes kardias me emphase sten upertase ten paidike kholesterine kai te kholesterine kata ten emmenopause 
 gi auto kai ephthasan mekhri tis emeres mas sothekan perissoteres tragodies tou euripide apo tous allous tragikous aiskhulou  sophokle  euripide  
 sumphona me to konsept eidikoi analambanoun na allaxoun to laiphstail ton summetekhonton 
 proedros tou orizetai o metropolites rodou 
  ae  basiles paizei mpalitsa  kai  
 oi koinonikes politismikes alla kai oikonomikes sunthekes ekhoun allaxei kai to elleniko panepistemio den mporei na parameinei os ekhei 
 tupika ste khora mas uparkhoun  sunetairismoi 
 antitheta to piso meros diathetei asunethisto skhema me makrious probolous prophanos gia kalutere aerodunamike 
 eukhomai to kalutero ston kosmo ton ioanninon kai stous sumpaiktes mou kai phusika ston  giannina apo ton opoio pheugo diaphoretika apo oti ertha katelexe 
  klaire bogiatze to oti einai ligos o stolismos 
 ektimo omos oti e upothese tha mpei sto arkheio 
 okhi den tha tis kruboume emeis tis opoies me thliberes eideseis tis eideseis pou kruboun mia aisiodoxia ena kapoio khamogelo 
 epises ensomatonei puxida kai anagnoste karton mnemes stis opoies apothekeuetai to binteo 
 stis  noembriou tes idias khronias kai o teleutaios tourkos stratiotes egkateleipe oristika ten krete 
 tis protes duo dekaeties tes metapoliteuses ta epitoikhia sunthemata ton antiexousiaston etan mia nota sarkasmou mesa ste genike demokratike kai sosialistike euphoria ekeinon ton khronon 
  kouniados mou etan mazi me aute sto idio skholeio kai apo tote kaname parea 
    oi egesies ton khoronmelon tou  einai apithano na sumphonesoun ste meiose tou megethous tou purenikou oplostasiou tes summakhias ste sunodo koruphes pou prokeitai na diexakhthei to diemero  kai  noembriou delosan axiomatoukhoi tou  
 oi ekprosopoi tes  tou  kai tes  tha axiologesoun ean e khora ekhei petukhei tous stokhous kai ean semeionei arkete proodo gia na labei ten epomene dose upsous  dis 
 se oti aphora ton  adelpho kai autos  sumphona me plerophories arneitai ta osa tou katalogizontai ostoso analutika exegeseis tha dosei ten tetarte kai gia tis duo upotheseis 
  photographia pou demosieuome ekhei lephthei ten epomene tes apopeiras tes  iouniou  
 mia ependuse pou anagnoristeke apo to elleniko koino to opoio kharise sto nesi megales teletheaseis pou ephtasan to  kai  eno tautokhrona xeperase ta ellenika sunora aphou arkhise e polese tes sto exoteriko 
 to septembrio tha ekhoume te diakeruxe kai tous orous tou diagonismou kai isos kai ten egkrise tes meletes apokatastases apo to kentriko sumboulio neoteron mnemeion tonise o proedros tes  
 oson aphora to protupo tes kretikes diatrophes episemainoun polla lakhanika kai phrouta demetriaka psomi kai ospria ladi ligotero kreas kai perissotero psari galaktokomika kai oti apo ten phuse kata paradose proerkhetai krasi kai raki me metro 
 sto metagraphiko stokhastro ton biola brisketai o  epithetikos trietes sumbolaio upegrapse o  tekhnikos me ten istorike omada 
 megalonontas ena akoma paidi sten trite gumnasiou ekhei eikona ti sunepagetai e phoitese enos paidiou sto demosio gumnasio 
 tetarte  augoustou   gia te balkanike olumpiada plerophorikes pou tha diexakhthei apo  eos  iouliou ste roumania etoimazei tis balitses tou o mathetes kostas pipines 
 prosopika pisteuo pos to semerino einai ena apo ta kheirotera kouponia tou kalokairiou 
  sunaulia me te diethnous phemes gallida soprano emma shapplin kuriolektika kathelose tous khiliades ton theaton pou edosan to paron sten telete enarxes kai malista suneideta giati uperkhe kai eisiterio  
 to upsos tou tha anerkhetai eos tou posou ton  ekat 
 den thelo na ekho topo 
 auto apo mono tou deikhnei oti eimaste mesa sten kateuthunse kai sto pneuma pou ekhoume perigrapsei ston elleniko lao 
 trite  augoustou   ksekinesan khthes oi asphaltostroseis sta tsamakia alla kai sten odo naumakhias elles sten epano skala opou to odostroma etan se athlia katastase meta tis entones brokhoptoseis tou kheimona 
 etsi pkh oi suntagographeseis gia psukhopharmaka opos to prozac auxethekan  te teleutaia tetraetia 
 aphentika pou mas kratoun pisthagkona 
 brakhuprothesmos omos einai polu bebaion oti sumballei me astokhes parembaseis tou se semantikotato bathmo sten katastrophike ekdelose tes manias tes phuseos 
 pantos ste gallia den xekhnoun to perasma tou apo sampiona kai malista krazoun kiolas ten sent etien gia ten apoleia tou 
 ste diorganose summeteikhan exenta somateia apo ole ten ellada me  athletes 
 pantos oi eurobouleutes emphanistekan dikhasmenoi gia te boetheia pou prospherei e  sta adunama krate opos e khora mas me tous misous na ekphrazoun ten alleleggue tous kai tous allous misous na anapheroun oti einai axia tes tukhes tes 
  prokatarktike protase anaplases tes palias poles khorizei to erakleio se dekaennea zones gia kathe mia apo tis opoies orizontai sugkekrimenoi oroi domeses 
 to pathos ten tekhnike tous te duname tous 
 ta aeroplana me ta opoia tha petame einai ta pleon asphale sten kategoria tous 
 di o kai katanoo ta elateria tes siopes ton pathonton 
  kpitsidianos elpizei se anakampse tes agoras kati pou eukhontai oloi osoi askholountai me to proion 
 ksetuligo koubari miamia tis praxeis sou 
 ekhei ginei suneidese oti e touristike anaptuxe kai o dunamismos tou kladou exartatai apo tis epidoseis se olous tous allous tomeis apo ten paideia kai ten ekpaideuse os ten oikonomike ten phorologike kai ten khorotaxike politike 
 ta idanika antidoto sta narkotika gia tesseris dekaeties uperetei ten ellenike dikaiosune ekhei dikasei emporous kai khrestes narkotikon 
 oi epikhoregeseis ton asphalistikon tameion tha einai auxemenes kata  me idiaitera eunoemeno ton  logo tes auxeses ton agrotikon suntaxeon kata  drkh 
 oi demarkhoi erkhontai kai parerkhontai omos o sumboulos tous apodeiknuetai diakhronike axia 
  tourismos tha pollaplasiastei otan epitrapoun ta coffee shops 
 khairomaste epises pou tha probeite se agoges dioti semainei oti tha apophugete apo toude kai sto exes tis grothies 
 ostoso analutes anapheroun oti den etan epitukhemene 
  autonomia tou phtanei stis  ores omilias kai  ores anamones kai sunolika apotelei polu kalogouste kai mikre se diastaseis protase 
 se deka khronia prepei na ginei e antikatastase ton mekhanematon 
  skopimoteta einai prophanes 
  epanastase tou eliou xekinese apo ta kato kathos tes nomothetikes ruthmises eikhan proegethei apo to  analoga metra ste barkelone me axiologa apotelesmata eno akolouthesan alles  proteuouses demon se ole ten ispania

 trite  augoustou   sumbole sten istoria tou politismou tes elias parousiasteke sten aithousa teleton tou peiramatikou lukeiou mutilenes to biblio ton alexandrou kai strate kiourelle elaiomuloi ste lesbo 
 prepei na doume te basike idea pou kateuthunei ena prosopo pou kateuthunei tis praxeis tou 
 apo to theatro kolianta 
 os tote as proseukhomaste kai as proskuname agoggusta tous agades tes athenas oi opoioi philoxenoun monimos sto retire tes eunoias tis omades tes poles tous 
  koitida tou politismou kai tes paideias sten pagkosmia axiologese katalambanei tis teleutaies theseis 
 pane oi meres ton endoxon parelaseon 
 den einai anagke na diathetei kaneis gnoseis politikes theorias gia na katalabei oti auto to tekhnasma odegei kateutheian ston laikismo kai ten akrodexia 
 oloi oi upoloipoi nearoi apo ten pole tes aulonas pou eikhan sullephthei gia ten upothese gkouma ekhoun aphethei eleutheroi 
  diexodos prepei na anazetethei ston allo dromo anaptuxes me kriterio ten ikanopoiese ton sugkhronon laikon  apokleistika demosia kai dorean eniaia anotate ekpaideuse  demiourgia demosion dorean epaggelmatikon skholon 
 oi prasinoi ekanan 
 prepei na sugkentrothoume gia na kanoume to  
 statistika einai e prote phora apo to  pou enas pilotos blepei protos ten karo semaia sten premiera tou me te pherari 
  eno o panagiotes samilides plasaristeke  sta  
 diakaes pothos o eleutheros kloze ti ki an odeuei olotakhos gia ta   miroslab kloze apotelei ena apo ta pleon kauta onomata gia ten kalokairine metagraphike periodo mias kai to sumbolaio tou germanou epithetikou olokleronetai ton prosekhe iounio kai 
 sten agora sunallagmatos e endeiktike isotimia euro dolariou pou anakoinose e europaike kentrike trapeza diamorphotheke sto  dolaria 
 giati auta den einai phusike alla metaphusike 
 pastitsio mousaka rebithia phournou plousia gemista phasolakia ladera alla kai kakabia 
 na doun ten epeiro na anebainei 
 kanenas dialogos me tous dolophonous phonazan  diadelotes sto proastio irmpin tes damaskou delose telephonikos autoptes marturas sto roiter 
 parallela o panathenaikos nikese gia prote phora ephetos ton aionio antipalo tou pou mekhri semera metrouse  nikes se isarithmous agones 
 aiteseis eos kai semera  deutera tel 
 axizei na tonistei oti o protos kuklos dialexeon epidiokei na sundesei genikes ennoies me topikes semasies na phanerosei te khresimoteta ton epistemonikon proseggiseon sten kathemerine zoe kai ste leitourgia tes demokratias 
 omos e muthoplasia peri  ekhei ede rizosei bathia 
 apaitoume na timorethoun autoi pou sakatepsan ten konstantina kouneba kai ten amese sunekhise tes phroureses tes 
 egkritheke e proslepse  atomon me skhese ergasias idiotikou dikaiou orismenou khronou sto geniko nosokomeio serron 
 analoga de me tis apaiteseis tes bradias allazei to uphos kai o ruthmos gia na anebasei te diathese kai na odegesei se aprosmenes khoreutikes parembaseis 
 se oti aphora te dome tes kuberneses  ephoson prokupsei apo tis ekloges delose oti to upourgiko sumboulio tha einai pio euelikto kai sullogiko kapoia upourgeia tha sugkhoneutoun khoris ostoso na apokalupsei poia tha einai auta 
   kallitekhnes pou ste mutilene ergazetai os upallelos sto upourgeio upodomon metaphoron kai diktuon exegei oti katelexe ste sunduasmene tekhnike kolaz kai zographikes ekhontas erthei se epaphe meso tes skholes tou me diaphores morphes tekhnes 
 gi autes pou tha aphoroun stis politikes autes tis mesoprothesmes politikes demosionomikes strategikes kai tha ekhoun orizonta toulakhiston to  
  k khatzakes ekphrazei sobares entstaseis gia ton tropo pou e dieuthunse tourismou ermeneuei te skhetike egkuklio gia ten ananeose ton sematon 
 kai os tetoios den ekhei to perithorio pote na epanapautei 
 otan omos anoixan ta prota kapheneia kai arkhisan na leitourgoun xenones oi opoioi gemizan ta sabbatokuriaka tou kheimona polloi epestrepsan sto bouno 
 ostoso ekhoume ede orismenes gunaikes se demotika kai periphereiaka sumboulia kai apoteloun mia semantike phone gia ten topike dioikese 
 entos tes ano prothesmias oi endiapheromenoi opheiloun na upoballoun ta dikaiologetika gia ten ananeose ton adeion tous sta tmemata asphaleias e opou den uparkhoun sta astunomika tmemata tou topou katoikias tous 
 alla mekhri ekei 
  ena mono domatio gemato polukhroma kentemata kai zographismena diakosmetika piata oi noikokuraioi boleuan ten oikogeneiake kai koinonike zoe tous 
 to philosopho kai stokhaste pou prospathese na nikesei ta limnazonta udata sten paideia mas 
 aute e prosphora egine me to proskhema na peisoume tous kaluterous athletes na erthoun sten ellada kai na paroun meros stous agones 
 arkhika den skopeue na metapherei ten istoria pou egraphe ta bradia sto grapheio tes kathos aphougkrazontan ten kerkuraike nukhta se kapoio khoreutiko 
 khtupame elaphros ta aspradia me surma kai ta rikhnoume sto mpol 
 kai ta gnosta gkroupouskoula de tha ekhoun pleon oute benzine na baloun stis molotoph tous 
 to sumperasma auto einai uperbolika aploiko eipe o tousits 
 einai to  kai o k papandreou autoi oi opoioi ekhoun anagke anthropon axioprepon kai akeraion gia na perisosoun lige apo ten politike ton axiopistia e opoia katrakulaei ston katephoro me sunekhos epitakhunomeno ruthmo 
 oles oi ekdeloseis kai oi parastaseis tha ekhoun kai phetos eleuthere eisodo gia tous ekatontades khiliades episkeptes tou 
 diaseme einai e beranta me to botsaloto mprosta apo to kathistiko pou ekhei onomastei e beranta tes mesogeiou 
  monos pou mporei na sugkrithei me ton tzorntan sumphona me ton sumpaikte tou lamar ontom 
 nomizo omos oti edo pou phtasame sunekhise den uparkhoun pisogurismata 
  an kai episema stoikheia den uparkhoun oi ektimeseis anapheroun oti ten periodo  o arithmos ton ergazomenon sto  meiotheke kata peripou  atoma 
 oi minoikes grammes ekhoun kataballei terastia prospatheia gia ten asphale metaphora tou epibategou koinou 
 ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous sunekhizontai se ole ten epeiro oi klopes kai oi diarrexeis me tous katoikous na noiothoun pleon aprostateutoi aphou blepoun mera me ten emera na apeilountai olo kai perissotero 
 skhediastika oi kinezoi estiasan ten prosokhe tous ste maska e opoia egine pio sugkhrone eno epanaskhediasmena einai kai ta photistika somata 
 stokhos mou einai na katadeixo tis koinonikes sunepeies tes uponomeuses ton diataxeon tou suntagmatos 
 molis dosame ta prota philika 
 den mporoun na ekhoun ten idia duname kai phreskada otan se liges meres kalountai na dosoun krisimous agones 
 paramenei agnosto aute te stigme an e nea kubernese aspastei tis apophaseis tou proen upourgeiou paideias upo ten egesia speliotopoulou e an uparkhei kapoio diaphoretiko skhedio 
 edo kai tora dromologese sugkhronon kai asphalon ploion me phthena eisiteria 
  nea klinike demiourgeitai gia na parekhei stous astheneis pou anazetoun therapeia se krisimes astheneies prosbase sta pio kainotoma pharmaka ta opoia briskontai se phase klinikes ereunas 
 ta decks peran photia me to resident  tou marush space na xesekonei toso ten omada oso kai to koino me polu kales xenes kurios rnb epiloges diaterontas te diathese sta upse mekhri to kleisimo tou magaziou 
  skhese tou anthropou me ten katsarola einai mia skhese me parelthon 
 ta keimena auta khoris na diathetoun phainomenika toulakhiston mia thematike enoteta apokaluptoun me ten aletheia to khioumor to pathos te skleroteta tis emmones tous ton poiete kai stokhaste  karouzo 
 oi omerikoi athletes einai oi aristoi pou epideiknuoun ten arete tous opos akribos tha ekanan kai ston polemo opou tha paleuan mekhris eskhaton gia ten epikratese epi tou antipalou tous 
 kata sunepeia oi apodekhomenoi te demosia protase metokhoi tha laboun to sunoliko poso tou prospheromenou antallagmatos dikhos ten epibarunse apo ta dikaiomata ekkatharises upsous  alla meiomeno kata to poso tou proanapheromenou phorou upsous  
 mporoume na khresimopoioume tis asurmates suskeues arkei na akolouthoume kanones 
 tha epanelthoume aphou to meletesoume 
 sto semeio pou ekhei phthasei e omada tes poles mas den ekhei to perithorio apoleias bathmon sunepos tha ta dosei ola gia te nike pou tha anoixei to dromo gia te deutere pronomioukho these 
 an bgoun ta protathlemata einai allo kapelo 
  ruthmos auxeses tou dioxeidiou tou anthraka sten atmosphaira tou pio epikindunou aeriou tou thermokepiou etan persi takhuteros apo ton propersino kai e auxese aute etan megalutere apo te mese etesia auxese pou parateretheke ten periodo  os  
 enas nukterinos kalokairinos boreiodutikos anemos tous parasurei anatolikotera ap oti skhediazan na apobibastoun 
 kale prospatheia alla den tes bgeke 
 er  kubernese leei oti den mporei na dosei luse sto thema tou ladiou 
 kai ta duo montela parekhoun dunatoteta khreses se mikres omades  eos  khrestes  meso ensomatomenes diktuoses ethernet eno e ensomatomene asurmate diktuoses  einai diathesime ston  officejet  aio wireless 
 einai mia semantike protoboulia kai tha prepei osoi ekhoun ten dunatoteta na ginoun ethelontes 
  traulos o antriou xotzes philotekhnei mia leptomere kai piste prosopographia enos poluskhidous anthropou kai koruphaiou mathematikou tou perasmenou aiona 
  exentakhronos k theodoros mprant apo ton germaniko eruthro stauro einai ekpaideutes ekpaideuton ethelonton ta teleutaia trianta khronia 
 kairos athena  pem  aug   eleutherotupia paraskeue  iouliou  berolino kai parisi sprokhnoun ten ellada se khreokopia merkel kai sarkozi odegoun ten ellada ste khreokopia apophainetai se kurio arthro tes e ephemerida niou giork taims 
 to basiko elattoma sas polemo ten anabletikoteta 
 khresimopoietheke apo ton arthur koestler se mia prospatheia na deixei pos droun ta sustemata os sunolo eno einai ta idia mere enos megaluterou olou 
 kairos athena  tet  aug   apotelesmata  eos  apo  stigmes tou teleutaiou   augoustou  apolithomata pou apodeiknuoun pos uperkhe zoe ste ge prin ten emphanise tou oxugonou entopisan epistemones sten australia 
 kharin tes mikres istorias upenthumizoume oti aute e giorte sto parelthon etan triple 
 oikonomou na epilephthei tou thematos se sunergasia me tous phoreis me stokho na epiluthei to zetema 
 semeionetai de oti ede to upourgeio oikonomikon ekhei anapsei to prasino phos gia ten proslepse  noseleuton en toutois omos arketa nosokomeia tes khoras ekhoun aitethei ten proslepse monimou noseleutikou prosopikou 
  ta sustemata enallaktikes diakheirises leitourgoun gia kapoia ulika okhi omos sto bathmo pou tha eprepe p 
 opos prokuptei apo ten iskhuousa nomothesia oi armodiotetes ton perissoteron organon laikes summetokhes  
 an xereis apo londino ki an genikotera sukhnazeis sten periokhe knightsbridge tote sigoura gnorizeis to onoma aphou prokeitai gia to adelphaki tou omonumou giaponezikou estiatoriou tes bretanikes proteuousas 
  kameron dekhetai pieseis gia to thema auto kai apo tous etairous tou sten kubernese tous phileleutherous demokrates 
 axizei na semeiothei oti to taxidi auto eprokeito na pragmatopoiethei prin merikous menes alla anabletheke kathos logo tes barukheimonias eikhe pagosei o potamos dounabes kai to potamoploio den mporouse na diaskhisei to potami 
 mporei bebaia na eperease mekhri ena semeio e poreia kai ton europaikon khrematisterion pou eidika pros to mesemeri oi apoleies etan megales ton deikte xerta  tou khrematisteriou tes phragkphourtes na katagraphei apoleies skhedon trion posostiaion monadon 
  antilogos apo ten pleura ton legomenon eksugkhroniston anapherei oti o k semites dikaioutai perissotero apo para pollous na omilei gia ten istoria tou  kai ton idrute tou 
 etan to polu  emeron epibiosan omos kai na ta 
 ekobe boltes ston ethniko kepo se askheme katastase kai sotheke sto para trikha apo philozoo 
 pleon monadike ekkremoteta einai e sugkatathese tes  e opoia ostoso den anamenetai na emphanistei antithete 
  diaphora ton bourbon kai ton tennessee ouiski einai oti ta tennessee prin apo ten emphialose philtrarontai mesa apo  metra karbouno sphendamou pou apomakrunei oles tis tukhon akatharsies kai dinei sto ouiski mia pio malake kai kathare geuse 
 ta pneumatika dikaiomata anekoun sto 
  k magkriotes anephere akome oti oute oi parakhoresioukhoi teresan te skhetike sumphonia me ten kubernese 
 ekhoume diapistosei ta panta 
 to epomeno bema loipon gia mena einai e apokruptographese tou diskou tes phaistou 
 apo ten alle e katanalose ekhei pesei semantika kai genika o klados ton praterioukhon opos lene polloi epaggelmaties paei apo to kako sto kheirotero 
 polu phobouuai dustukhos oti diapseudontas ton gallo dianoete e khora uas talaiporeitai seuera apo anthropous khoris pepoitheseis pou denekhoun kauia skhese ue tis peristaseis 
  omos boethaei o theos ton klephte boethaei kai ton noikokure otan erthe e ora na kanei tameio diapistose oti o demos etan to koroido tes pareas 
 se time de semantika khamelotere tou antagonistikou   euro vs  euro se times agoras den tha duskoleutei na kentrisei to endiapheron tou koinou sto opoio apeuthunetai 
 sumphona me ton ekprosopo tou panepeirotikou ktenotrophikou sunetairismou mikhales tzima e agonistike diathese tou ktenotrophikou kosmou brisketaista upse me stokho te me idiotikopoiese tes galaktobiomekhanias 
 auto to perasma me ta khiliades parakladia tou kai tis kruphes omorphies tou tha exereunesoume stis epomenes diadromes 
 kai me meion okto eikhe tetoia paragogikoteta gia na apodeikhthei isos oti to kurio thema se mia omada kai de san ton phetino olumpiako den einai poioi paizoun kai se poies theseis paizoun alla o tropos tou paikhnidiou 
 ta thumata tes apates diamarturethekan sten aeroporike etaireia kai aute me te seira tes enemerose te dioxe hlektronikou egklematos 
 auxese parousiasan kai ta kerde pro phoron tes etaireias kai anelthan gia to  se  khil 
  anametrese diexekhthe se enan baru kai laspomeno agonistiko khoro o opoios duskheraine polu tis prospatheies ton duo antipalon oi opoioi kollesan sto meden 
 prokeimenou ta kratemele na xeperasoun tis duskolies tous tha prepei na mporoun na khrematodotethoun me logiko kostos kai ta euroomologa einai to kalutero meso gia na epiteukhthei kati tetoio 
 se kathe taxidi uparkhei ena kainourgio mouseio akome enas dromos me kharitomena kaphe akome mia geitonia pou den ekhoume gnorisei 
 briskomaste stis arkhes tes dekaetias tou  se ena akritiko khorio tes makedonias 
  tsagkare pou briskotan ste mikre kampina tou alieutikou den prolabe na bgei kai parasurtheke sto butho 
 den anakoinotheke neo hardware e meiose times kai ta semantikotera stoikheia tes etan ede gnosta omos auta parousiastekan analutika kai ousiastika 
 krata autous pou agapas konta sou pes tous psithurista poso polu tous khreiazesai agapa tous kai phersou tous kala bres khrono gia na tous peis sugnome sugkhorese me se parakalo se eukharisto kai ola ta logia agapes pou xereis 
 ostoso tis epomenes meres anamenetai na paradothoun sto skholeio mousika organa ta opoia eikhe desmeuthei na khoregesei o demos hrakleiou 
 sumphona me ton k tsiakiroglou se auta pou leei os thesmiko organo ton epaggelmation einai auta pou apotuponoun ten sklere pragmatikoteta stous kolpous tes agoras tes ksanthes 
 kai phusika mpoliasmene apo ton thrulo na uposkhethei kai ekeine  ti allo titlous gia ton megalutero elleniko sullogo 
 douleuei se orukheia anazetei ikhne deinosauron paraterei kai katagraphei kineseis asteron kunega agria zoa kanei kathe eidous douleia 
   uposterizei ten proothese tes ekpaideutikes metarruthmises ten auxese ton ependuseon sten ereuna ten eisagoge kai te diadose ton neon tekhnologion 
 aphegese nike kapare mousike tragoudi ekhetika topia giannes pseimadas 
 me khasete to istoriko khorio  ena terastio aristourgematiko sumplegma pou prospherei mia sunolike empeiria tekhnes gastronomias kai pholklor

 einai kinese enotetas tou skhematos peran autes emeis den tha kanoume piso as paroun alloi ten euthune tes diaspases tou  uposterizoun stelekhe tou sunaspismou rikhnontas to mpalaki stous etairous 
 te khora mas phusika kai te gallia 
 sto metaxu eikhan kinetopoiethei kai polla peripolika kai motosikletes tes astunomias ioanninon mplokarontas olous tous dromous kai se kapoio semeio oi albanoi egkateleipsan to autokineto kai prospathesan na diaphugoun trekhontas

 dineis to diko sou stigma paleueis gia auta pou pisteueis ki an uparkhoun agephurotes diaphonies tote phusika kaneis tis epiloges sou

 sto metaxu to oxutato problema pou ekhei anakupsei me te meiose tou nerou sto phragma ton mpramianon ekhei prokalesei anastatose sten topike koinonia tes ierapetras pou parakolouthei me kommene ten anasa oles tis exelixeis

 kathara kai xastera opos panta 
 methodoi opos autes sten praxe apodeiknuetai oti okhi mono den ekhoun apotelesma alla atsalonoun te demosiographike pena kai diasuroun ten uperesia 
  larisa den apeilese skhedon katholou ton kasle pou ekane ntempouto kato apo ta dokaria ton gepedoukhon 
  anti gia plere magioneza khresimopoiese light e straggisto giaourti eno gia ta santouits protimese te moustarda kai anti gia ladolemono sta psaria pes nai ste moustarda me lemoni 
  mpakhar etoime na parei mia megale apophase pegainei sten epaule kai auto demiourgei megalutere anastatose 
 uparkhoun epises duo smenites pou miloun kinezika kai to pantheon ton xenon glosson sumpleronoun e arabike e ollandike e ouggrike e polonike e portogalike e roumanike e rosike e serbokroatike e souedike kai telos e tsekhike

 okhi alla logia perimenoume ploia to   einai ena olokainourgio ploio tou omilou strintze mekous  metron platous  me megiste takhuteta  nautika milia  kampines kai ikanoteta metaphoras  epibaton kai  okhematon 
 einai polu kalo paidi opos kai me ta paidia etan para polu kale

  tsipras kai e parea tou einai ntintedes boreion proastion 
 odegos kuklophoriakes epibioses to mono pragma gia to opoio tha axize na ekdothei enas odegos epibioses gia to delkhi einai oi metakineseis 
 sto poso ton  dis

  omos poses uperokhes periokhes tou nesiou mas den ekhoume gnorisei akoma

 tha akolouthesei dexiose sto khoro tou stratopedou

 gia auto epelexa na theso merika erotemata ston proponete mas 
 me ten anakoinose ton apotelesmaton e khara khtupese ten porta kai tes topikes autodioikeses 
 oi duo pleures phainetai oti ekhoun brei tropous sunergasias kathos tonisteke oti tha prepei na proballetai to nesi alla kurios e pole tes rodou e opoia einai e atmomekhane tou rodiakou tourismou opos eipotheke kharakteristika 
 men to aphenete na khtupietai deikhnontas adiaphoria

 trite  augoustou   kanenas katokhos ton tessaron tukheron lakhnon tes kleroses pou pragmatopoietheke apo ton emporiko sullogo kallones de bretheke 
 uparkhei gia na boetha tous khrestes na enemeronoun tous diakheiristes mas skhetika me periekhomeno pou parabiazei tous parontes kanones

 prepei pantos na anagnorisoume oti o arthrographos ekhei to tharros na pei ta pragmata me to onoma tous 
 to demopsephisma pou einai sunethes ergaleio laikes ekphrases se alles khores me pio prokhoremenes demokratikes paradoseis tromazei orismenous ste khora mas 
 erotetheis an katagrapheke proodos kai se aute te sunantese o proedros khristophias eipe pos koubentiasame semera themata pou aphoroun tous anexartetous mpekan kai oi theseis ton duo pleuron kai epises diatupothekan kai oi theseis pano stis opoies sumphonoume 
  den egine o agonas minoikepaok 
  elleipse prosopikou akome kai se kanonikes sunthekes leitourgias ekhei san apotelesma te me soste leitourgia pollon monadon klinikon ergasterion tmematon tou nosokomeiou kai tis kathemerines diamarturies asthenon 
 perase ta gumnasiaka tou khronia sto analogio tou agiou georgiou opou o protopsaltes leonidas asteres ton muese ste buzantine mousike 
 benizelos demagogike e stase samara amese etan e antidrase tou upourgou oikonomikon stis deloseis samara 
 se antithese me tous sunadelphous tous pou paremeinan tote sten  kai e proegoumene kubernese tous khrusose gia na tes adeiasoun te gonia 
  apophuge bareias somatikes ergasias idiaitera malista se khorous me upsele thermokrasia apnoia kai megale ugrasia 
 anoigeis mia kai mpaineis erkhetai amesos e karekla to kerasma 
 to sunoliko ergo upo ton geniko titlo tou thematos apoteleitai apo tessera upoerga  melete khartographeses kai anadeixes eidikon periballontikon diadromon tou oreinou ogkou tou  ksanthes 
 ena aorato kheri tes  ebale ston phakelo tou erakle te phototupemene kai notheumene asphalistike enemeroteta 
  auto akribos prepei na apantesei xekathara kai khoris peristrophes stous ellenes polites o arkhegos tou  
 mathemata agiographias tha paradidei e maria karagianne eno mathemata peloplastikes gia mikrous kai megalous tha kanei e stella lioliou 
 nomizoume oti sumbalame kai emeis drastika sten antipurike prostasia tou topou mas kai aisthanomaste idiaitera uperephanoi pou mporesame ethelontika kai bgalame se peras me epitukhia ena toso megalo kai khronoboro ergo

  istorike  mporei to sabbato na panegurize ten kataktese tou titlou tes tsampionsip kai ten epistrophe sten premier ligk meta apo  khronia ostoso e upothese tes metagraphes tou argentinou khaph alekhantro phaourlin endekhetai 
 killzone  oi protes entuposeis meta apo ten oloklerose tes demo apostoles pou prospherotan sto bluray me ton 
 ste diadikasia aute emplekontai  apo  sunolika demous kai koinotetes tes khoras 
 diadekhteke ton atrea kai otan megalose ton epeise na epikheiresei na skotosei ton patera tou o thuestes omos anagnorizontas ton ton kataphere na skotosei ton atrea 
 tha perilambanei ektenes khronologio bibliographikes plerophories ekloge poiematon apospasmata keimenon tou endeiktika apospasmata kritikes kai polu plousio photographiko kai eikastiko uliko 
 den uparkhei kanena problema me ten upopsephioteta mou mas eipe se telephonike epaphe pou eikhame o pheromenos os upopsephios bouleutes tou  mikes giannaras 
  eisaggelia sunekhizei ten ereuna tes gia allous  pou elegkhontai gia adikemata tes kakourgematikes apates kai tes nomimopoieses esodon apo paranome drasterioteta 
 omophone apophase khthes apo to demotiko sumboulio to prasino phos gia te khoregese tou posou ton  drkh 
 epipleon einai ste mese kai o olumpiakos o opoios ton kratese sto roster tou me to upselotero sumbolaio sten europe  ekat 
  prepei na suneidetopoiesete oti oi seuerinoi epheboi zoun se enan polu diaphoretiko kosuo kai uiloun uia polu diaphoretike glossa apo aute pou thuuaste eseis 
 ekhoun na kanoun me noumera kai eudaimonia 
   gia ten idruse neon epikheireseon anergon  atoma  gunaikes kai  andres me to poso ton  
  na khtupethei mia monada pou periekhei ploutonio to opoio apotelei te prote ule gia ten kataskeue purenikes bombas 
  istoria ekhei mono mia elpida na xanakerdethei ste suneidese otan ta gegonota proskrousoun sta brakhia otan mas summazeuei gia na mas aphegethei ton eauto tes 
 kapoioi einai kratos en kratei 
 peripou  khlm 
 eikhan loipon e den eikhan upokhreose na pane oloi sto aerodromio  ena meta to allo ginontai t atukhemata kai thanatephora dipla sten   ston ai gianne alla kaneis den endiapheretai na phtiakhtei to stethaio pou epese 
  meiose tou tzirou tous kurios tes epham einai sobare endeixe gia kampse tes metaphoras emporeumaton apo kai pros te lesbo 
 opos malista mas anaphertheke apo melos tes antiprosopeias tes periphereias to parapono ton tourkon den aphora ste diadikasia pou apaiteitai gia ten ekdose bizas alla sto kostos tes pou theoreitai idiaitera upselo 
 ta opoia tha ekhoun apoleies 
  sumbatikos khronos paradoses tha einai  menes 
 kat arkhen thetikos emphanizetai o pharmakeutikos sullogos khiou sten idruse pharmakeion se oinousses kai psara kai ste stelekhose tous me stratiotes pharmakopoious 
 kh mia aenaos pleusis ste skepse sten praxe kai sto khrono apo enan pragmatiko kapetanio 
 amesos meta kai aphou oloklerose te sunallage tou ephuge apo to spiti 
 ten xere kai ten ugre morphe 
 paroti arkhika eikhe skhediastei na anakoinothoun oles oi leptomereies telika kai me epikoinoniakous orous apophasisteke na men uparxei tora sugkekrimenopoiese ton metron alla auto na ginei ton maio otan kai tha elthei to paketo ste boule pros psephise 
 einai enas rolos pou sas barainei  eroas epistrephei apo ton kato kosmo opou ekhei kanei ta panta 
 sto lopho brisketai to kasteli ena apo ta pente pou ephtiaxan oi enetoi sto nesi ton  aiona 
  kuria ousoultzoglou emphanos enokhlemene e mallon exorgismene espeuse na apantesei authemeron 
  pezoporia pros ta  metra opou brisketai e mone einai apolaustike logo tou phusikou kallous tes periokhes 
 statheros me elakhistes exaireseis kratese ten these tou 
 me tis sumpuknomenes phraseis e mana en panagia 
 prepei na ginei ena epikheiresiako skhedio basei tou opoiou tha kinethoume skholiase o k ksenakes 
  kataskeue tou boreiou odikou axona sto tmema tauronites  kolumpari kai o kombos tes soudas tha khrematodotethoun apo to   sumphona me apophase tes epitropes parakoloutheses tou epikheiresiakou programmatos prosbases kai odikoi axones 
  kalos tes eprepe na dialexei to makronesi e to bouno 
 ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous  pleiopsephia sumphona me te  psephizei proores ekloges 
 oneiro tou mekhri na pethano auto tha einai na kanei me to theatro tekhnes tous akharneis anabiose tes parastases tou karolou koun sten opoia summeteikhe os mathetes tes dramatikes skholes tou tekhnes  ermeneuontas ton dikaiopoli 
  pollaple theatrikoteta ton paramuthion tou khophman diamorphonei ten entupose tes sunthetes kai sunama exairetika diakritikes methodou sten parousiase ton desmon pou sugkratoun tis ennoies tou pragmatikou kai tou phantastikou tes zoes me ten tekhne

 ste  to mesemeri tes trites ste moria apo astunomikous tou tmematos dioxes narkotikon sunelephthe  
 ten idruse tes iatrikes skholes se egkatastaseis tes ekei ellenikes paroikias anelabe na dromologesei o kathegetes tes iatrikes skholes thessalonikes stauros mpalogiannes o opoios tha egkatastathei sten periokhe 
 bazete ena tegani se khamele photia kai prosthetete te zakhare kai ta amugdala

 sa na men uperkha

 phorame plastika gantia tis straggizoume kai tis psilokoboume sto mixer 
 semantikotatoi paiktes mas apousiazoun papademetriou torosides makhratze kai teleutaia stigme toulakhiston sto sugkekrimeno paikhnidi parousiasteke to problema tou pabio 
  diadrome mas perielambane pollous oreinous dromous kai to pleroma tou autokinetou perielambane tesseris enelikous epibates 
 apo kei kai pera oi kuanoleukoi tha sunekhisoun ten proetoimasia tous to apogeuma tes pemptes 
 polu kale e diaitesia tou bomba lesbou 
 na ten bgaloume apo to telma sto opoio ten erixan me dioiketikes apophaseis osoi monimos ten teleutaia dietia leitourgoun sa na ekhoun apokleistiko gnomona ten exathliose mas 
 euro meiomena kata  se skhese me ten antistoikhe periodo tou  
 gia te mouphteia komotenes ste dieuthunse ermou  komotene tel 
 gia to outlander iskhuei atoko programma pou problepei  prokatabole kai  atokes doseis 
 tonizei ten anagke na exophlethoun oi opheiles stous giatrous apo ton  eno anapheretai kai sta problemata anergias pou antimetopizoun kurios oi neoi giatroi 
 ekhete ten katholike sterixe toulakhiston auto bgainei apo tis genikes suneleuseis tou eklektorikou somatos ton sunetairiston 
 na omos pou esu briskeis ton tropo na ton pherneis piso se krustallomenes eikones pou san pagomenes psikhales aiorountai mprosta sou kai mesa tous blepeis te zoe sou se epanalepse 
  apophase sterizetai sta eidika metra gia ten eniskhuse tes agrotikes paragoges sta mikra nesia tou aigaiou sta opoia perilambanetai kai e sugkekrimene epidotese 
 kerde tou demosiou apo te sumbase etesio enoikio gia ten probleta  ekat 
 oi diorganotes pantos epimenoun oti oi kinetopoieseis tha sunekhistoun kai malista me megalutere entase kathos de phainetai na lunontai ta problemata tou agrotikou khorou 
 mazi tous agapesa oti eugenestero egennese e khora aute ston aiona mou 
 paraskeue  maiou   prepei na katalaboume oti kai to nai kai to okhi semainoun akribos to idio pragma 
 telos sugkhairo kai eukharisto olous tous sumpolites kai tis sumpolitisses pou sterixan tis ekdeloseis tes poles 
 klasiko paradeigma adiaphorias tes politeias kataggelloun oi idioi einai e elleipse ekthesiakou kai sunedriakou kentrou sten athena para tis sunekheis deloseis peri anaptuxes eidikon morphon tourismou 
 epises egine parapoiese ton legomenon mou

 empneetai ki antlei duname ap auten 
 ton podosphairiste tes totenam thelei na apoktesei e anzi 
 to nagkasaki ekhei xekhoriste these sto pagkosmio kinema kai tis kampanies kata ton purenikon oplon 
 auta ta stoikheia leipoun ap tous allous paiktes 
  agonas pou khreiazetai gia na palepseis to ampeli ton antrose kai tou edose duname kai skopo ste zoe tou 
 einai anthropos pou ekphrazei eleuthera kai khoris peristrophes ten apopse tou kai epilegei na ten uperaspisthei mekhri telous esto kai me sugkrouse 
 endiapheromaste gia ten energe summetokhe ton politon sta koina kai ten anaptuxe tou topou mas tonise metaxu allon 
    oi upourgoi  khoronmelon tes europaikes enoses psephisan ten proothese enos aplousterou kai phthenoterou sustematos dikaiomaton euresitekhnias sten europaike enose aphenontas dusarestemenes italia kai ispania 
 tha ta breite apokleistika sto notos galleries lampropoulos aiolou  athena  
 den einai omos etsi apla ta pragmata 
 teleutaia enemerose sabbato  iouliou    mousike pou paizoun oi idioktetes taxi einai san to bioli tou khotza 
 akome tonise oti o periphereiakos skhediasmos aporrimmaton einai sten euthune tes periphereias 
 to sustema episemanses tou boeiou kreatos kai tou kima apo boeio kreas epitrepei na entopizoume kathe stigme ten proeleuse tou kreatos pou agorazei o katanalotes 
  empeiria einai aperigrapte leei e k ban atikoum kai otan ten kaloume na skiagraphesei ten ole prospatheia mas apanta me noemaeimaste enas stratos eirenes enas stratos khoris polemo pou agapa ten istoria kai douleuei gi auten 
  upourgos ugeias apo ten pleura tou desmeuteke na terethei to khronodiagramma kai na ekhoun prokhoresei oi diadikasies oste na ekhoun ulopoiethei oi desmeuseis kai stous treis autous tomeis 
 anti na laikizoun kai na demagogoun ek tou asphalous semera khoris na proteinoun luseis to elakhisto pou opheiloun na kanoun einai na zetesoun sugnome apo tous agrotes giati den ekanan tipota ta teleutaia  khronia tes diakuberneses tou  
 oi megaluteres katastrophes entopizontai sten trite megalutere politeia mato gkroso proteuousa tes sogias 
 ta parathura gia paradeigma einai xeperasmena kai e aisthetike tous ekhei sphragistei apo tis kheiroteres stigmes tes teleorases ton pseudoentuposeon 
 to idio kai prin  prin  kok anapherei o proedros tou sullogou kai upeuthunos gia to periodiko giannes manoukas 
 ste slobenia tha brisketai apo aurio to neo metagraphiko apoktema tes  eintour gkountgionsen prokeimenou na ensomatothei me ten upoloipe apostole ton kitrinomauron kai na piasei amesos douleia 
  ti gnorizes gia ton olumpiako prin ertheis  exera oti ekhei parei ta  protathlemata sta teleutaia  khronia kai gnoriza oti erkhomai sten koruphaia omada tes elladas 
 monoi tous epises kratesan upodeigmatike taxe stous dromous kai tis plateies kai telos monoi tous sunadelphothekan me to strato exoudeteronontas kapoies apopeires apo merous orismenon axiomatikon na pheroun ton strato antimetopo me ton lao 
 den mou bgainei apo to mualo 
 phetos to kalokairi o  ekhei te magike suntage gia na se kanei na men xekollas apo ten othone tou kathe mesemeri kai apogeuma 
 purenelaio to opoio proerkhetai apo anamixe exeugenismenou purenelaiou me partheno elaiolado kai e oxuteta tou den xeperna tous  
 eimai bebaios oti tha kanoume oti apaiteitai prokeimenou ta limania mas na ikanopoioun tis apaiteseis ton philon mas pou epilegoun ta nesia mas okhi aplos os topous episkepses alla os mere enarxes kai lexes tes krouazieras tous 
 apo ta idia programmata kaluptontai kai oi periokhes pou den einai sta olokleromena alla leitourgei se autes to  
 sten ellada alla kai diethnos prota ten pathainoume kai meta psakhnoume na broume pos ten pathame kai ti prepei na ginei 
 ste souper ligka uparkhoun polu kales stoikhematikes eukairies eidika sta under kai ta over 
 apo uperboles phan pou xenukhtousan gia na einai oi protoi pou tha apolausoun ta prota plana tou agapemenou tous eroa mekhri diexodikes philosophikes analuseis opos aute pou epikheirese o zan klont milner 
 me ten entaxe mas sten enomene europe ensternisthekame to europaiko orama apo to opoio tosa prosdokoun oi laoi mas 
 gia ten epiteuxe tou stokhou autou ginetai eustokhe epiloge oikopedou me ten epiotere dunate epembase ston demosio kai idiotiko khoro katallelos prosanatolismos tou ktiriou kai epiloge anakuklosimon domikon ulikon 
 ena apo auta sten bergina me apophase pou ekhoume parei gia demiourgias mias xekhoriste skene pou tha ten parakolouthoun khiliades episkeptes tha sunekhisei na paleuei gia ten sterixe tou thesmou 
  sunedrio me thema paidi kai optikoakoustika mesa epikoinonias tha pragmatopoiethei to sabbatokuriako  kai  noembriou sto amphitheatro tou tellogleiou me sundiorganotes to tellogleio idruma tekhnon apth kai to morphotiko idruma tes eseemth 
 enarmonizetai me tis sugkhrones antilepseis kai ta osa iskhuoun stis perissoteres khoresmele tes europaikes enoses 
 stadium   sto palio ktirio tou  me ton peripoiemeno kepo tha dokimasete katsikaki nisuriko me meli kai thumari psaronephri me petimezi kai salata me lakhanika atmou phrouta thalassas kai sos binegkret ouzou 
 stadiaka o kosmos tha enemerothei an kai pisteuo oti gia prote khronia pegame arketa kala 
 eimaste kathola nomimoi mas tonise khthes o proedros tou sundesmou kai katelexe an theloun na suroun tous diaitetes sta dikasteria as to kanoun 
 gia ton idio logo den kanoume dika mas phrontisteria dioti to zetema einai na ginei apodekte e glossa apo to sunolo tes ellenikes koinonias 
 alla okhi apla mono auto 
   ellenike kubernese ekhei na kanei polle douleia akoma delonoun me noema axiomatoukhoi tes komision kai ton koinotikon uperesion an thelei na exasphalisei ten epitukhia tou programmatos kai te biosimoteta tou demosiou khreous 
  ginetai mia megale prospatheia n apopheukhthei to megalo pososto apokhes pou anamenetai s autes tis euroekloges 
 kai o kheiuonas pou tha erthei tha einai polu duskolos e de koinonike anatarakhe tha einai akoue uegalutere ean oloi den antilephthoun to uegethos tes zeuias pou ginetai tora ue ola auta ta peristatika pou kanoun katheuerina ton guro tou kosuou 
 den ginontai menuseis gia eulogous logous giati den uparkhoun kai skhetika stoikheia 
 kai giati den ekane ton anaskhematismo prin liges meres na eremesoume giname gia alle mia phora rezili diethnos 
 ena apo ta prota themata ta opoia kata ten tapeine mou apopse prepei na tethoun to suntomotero dunaton sto trapezi einai e oikonomike exasphalise ton nauloton 
  deuteros khoros tha einai kainourgios kai diaphoretikos gia to kathe zeugari opos se ola ta live 
  oti e dolophonia etan adike kai se kathe periptose prosballei to elleniko phronema ton khimarioton 
 alla phetos autoi oi agrotes bgainoun asumbibastoi 
 to  pkh phonaxan den einai sten apomonose e oulrike mainkhoph ekhei teleorase sto keli tes 
 otan o metropolites epikheirese na bgei apo to papapheio kai prospathese na milesei me to sugkentromeno plethos apodokimasteke me phrastikes epitheseis kai apokhorese 
 duskolies stis anaptuxe ton exagogon megalo problema gia ten enose paramenei e diasphalise ton eispraxeon apo tis exagoges 
 eleos klassiko amerikaniko telos tes eutukhismenes oikogeneias 
 par ola auta e katastase ektimatai pos einai upo elegkho 
 na semeiosoume oti semera to limani tou hrakleiou ekhei ena tziro tes taxeos tou  dis 
 oi triphullophoroi  protathlemata kai  kupella 
 antaios khrusostomides kastaniotes  euro aute einai e trite anthologia pou ekdidei o antaios khrusostomides me astunomika diegemata ellenon suggrapheon 
 einai kharakteristike e teleoptike ekrexe enos proen upourgou kai bouleute akritikes periphereias o opoios edelose oti tha egkataleipsei ten politike dioti den einai dunaton na zei me ton tromo ton apodokimasion tou laou 
  diaitetes k kokkinakes petukhe to ergo tou se ena eukolo paikhnidi 
 alla toulakhiston pleon kaneis den thetei se amphisbetese to sustema to euro tha zesei graphei e suddeutsche zeitung 
 meta ti ginetai pos tha epibiosoun ta magazia sto diastema mekhri to paskha auto einai to megalo agkhos ton emporon sarotikes allages erkhontai mesa ste nea khronia kai gia ten ekpaideuse 
 ean e nea upertrapeza gia ta ellenika dedomena isos brei suntoma prosbaseis gia daneismo stis diethnes agores tote e sunenose tha ekhei thetiko antiktupo kai sten ethnike oikonomia 
 pithanon giati to soma elabe upopse tou ta kamomata tou apo to parelthon 
 dexia me maura e suzugos tou ersilia 
 autos ekane kai te dianome gia ton rikhardo  
 ana treis menes apo ten emeromenia tes prokeruxes tes drases tha skhematizontai omades pros axiologese protaseon kai me ten oloklerose tes diadikasias axiologeses tha orizontai oi dikaioukhoi khrematodoteses sto plaisio tes drases 
 otan kanei kaneis kariera sto exoteriko ki ekhei oikogeneia einai duskolo na xerrizothei 
 oi periokhes oi opoies ekhoun plegei einai to malebuzi to temenos e pediada kai megalo exallou sumphona me epises tis protes ektimeseis tes  e anamenomene paragoge exagogimes staphidas na men ekhei brakhei periorizetai stous  tonous 
 zeta enan seph me meletemenes mageirikes apopseis pou tha gnorizei tous sunduasmous ton ulikon kai tha ekhei te sophia na apophugei ten uperbole pou pithana tha odegouse sten exaphanise ton arkhikon geuseon 
 sas parakalo men anagkastheite na to antilephtheite otan oi khrusotheres plegosoun ta sothika tes ges mas 
 mono pou dustukhos ola auta ta khronia para to oti oi sumboules einai autonoetes emeis den tis akolouthoume 
  krise den einai semerine opheiletai se megalo bathmo sten pathogeneia ton domon tou sugkhronou ellenikou kratous kai ligotero sten oikonomike krise 
 kai se autous kai se olous 
 oi gepedoukhoi etan anoteroi kai ephtasan se uia pera gia pera dikaie nike 
 apo ten alle sten kantza suzetountai kapoies peraitero allages kurios ston eideseographiko tomea mia kai oses eginan ton teleutaio mena den phainetai na apodidoun 
 meta apo pente agonistikes e katastase ekhei diamorphothei os exes  rodousakes akad 
  ena antikolletiko teganaki me ligo elielaio sotaroume ola ta lakhanika alatopiperonontas elaphra kai prosthetontas lige rigane kai maintano 
 to khoreuei kala to zeimpekiko o giorgos papandreou opos to khorepse prin apo arketa khronia ste thrake me ton tourko politiko tzem 
 sophia kakokairia e sunedriase tha pragmatopoiethei sto grapheio agrotikes anaptuxes psakhnon 
 euro alla parapempetai se exousiodotike diataxe 
 ekhei apoktesei ena diaphanes stegastro kai ekhei ginei polukhoros me kaphe mezedopoleio mparaki  makran to pio endiapheron kainourgio steki tes poles 
 me ten apoktese tou rimolnti pleronetai to keno ste these tou amuntikou khaph kai sumphona me tous skhediasmous tes  anazetountai enas akome kophtes kai enas epitelikos mesos me ephese sto skorarisma 
  agkura espeuse na ekphrasei ten ikanopoiese tes gia te gallike protoboulia 
 plethorika aromata sukou se proto plano banilias sokolatas kai xulou siropia karamelomenou maurou phroutou bussino damaskeno kai kedros se ena eugenes sunolo 
 kai oso pernoun ta khronia toso perissoteroi protimoun na kataskeuazoun ekei tis monimes katoikies tous 
 kai einai epises anamenomeno ste skhetike thematologia na proballontai gia na epibebaiothoun ta ideologika ermeneutika skhemata delade ta stereotupa pou egemoneuoun kai okhi ta legomena pragmatika peristatika 
 einai kharakteristiko to gegonos leei e ka liodake oti ta ekthemata eikhan polethei tis protes duo ores aphou stethekan oi pagkoi 
 oi uposkheseis gia perissotero periekhomeno pio endiapherouses topothesies apostoles neous kharakteres klp 
 arkhika e keisi delose oti e dikhrone kore tes apekhthe apo mia mpeimpi siter ste sunekheia kata te diarkeia tes dikes delose oti pnigeke se pisina 
  metaxas telika oudepote kategoretheke gia ten apopeira alla akome ki ekeinoi pou kategorethekan den katadikastekan 
 opos anapheroun kharakteristika  to pagoma olon ton suntaxeon apotelei eutheia epithese se  suntaxioukhous tou  
   oi protoi menes ton apeutheias diapragmateuseon den dikaionoun mekhri tora tis dikes mas toulakhiston prosdokies delose o proedros tes demokratias demetres khristophias kata te diarkeia koines ekdeloses pou diorganosan to  kai to  
  episeme anakoinose gia sunergasia tes cocacola me ten tria epsilon den eikhe semantiko apotelesma sten time tes metokhes tes  e opoia ekleise stiss  drkh me mikre anodo  drkh 
 mazi tou dekhteke to khristianismo meta ten omilia tou paulou ston areio pago 
 te sunekhe apaxiose tou kurous tou autoelegkhou ste demosia sphaira kai tou aisthematos euthunes pou prokalei o antagonistikos atomismos 
 tora poioi apo tous duo lene anakribeies  pantos duskolo to kobo na lene oi ergolaboi 
 to basiko kharakteristiko kai e philosophia tes proseggises autes einai oti uiothetei strategike oso to dunaton perissotero apokentromene eunoei te summetokhe ton topikon paragonton kai akolouthei proseggise apo ta kato pros ta ano opos legetai 
 trite  augoustou   ginetai mia phora ste zoe mas ten  augoustou   lepta meta ta mesanukhta o planetes ares tha einai toso lamperos kai toso megalos san pheggari 
 oi exetaseis olon ton mathematon einai mono graptes 
  khruse olumpionikes tou pekinou ollandia antepitetheke meiose se  alla 
 apo ten omada tha phugoun duo paiktes 
 ta polla problemata pou antimetopizoun oi khaniotes emphanistekan khthes me ton pleon tragiko tropo gia ten omada tous kai o ergoteles den aphese ten eukairia na paei khamene 
 sugkentrose sto aithrio stis  iouniou sten antepithese o apostoles karaphotias  sunduasmos mas tha einai sunduasmos nikes 
 epanelthe dunata sto proskenio to onoma tou apostolou katsphara kai epaize mekhri to proi opote kai epestrepse sto trapezi ton diabouleuseon to onoma tou thumiou sokou 
 an doume ta pragmata sten alethine tous diastase tha katalaboume oti oloi ekhoume to meridio tes gastronomikes mas euthunes gia osa diadramatizontai sto trapezi ton diakopon mas 
 sumphona me ten idia oi philes tes ekhoun xekinesei na askholountai kai autes me to sugkekrimeno athlema meta apo protrope tes idias einai oraio na blepeis ena kalogumnasmeno soma 
 to phestibal telei upo ten aigida tou tmematos ekhou kai eikonas tou ioniou panepistemiou kai tou demou kerkuraion 
  ekdelose etan aphieromene sten osteoporose me omilete ton orthopediko ziant mpakhas o opoios anephere ta sumptomata tes nosou kathos kai tous tropous antimetopises 
 to philiko tes tetartes me ten lkomotib plobntib anabletheke 
 sto phos ta mustika tes pambotidas ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous sto phos ta mustika tes pambotidas ta prota sumperasmata tes geophusikes meletes pou ekponese to panepistemio patron parousiase khthes o nomarkhes 
 kai oi opoioi para tis epi deka khronia ekkleseis tes ekklesias den phrontizoun na ton diateroun katharo kai eleuthero apo antikeimena pou den tairiazoun ekei 
 sta psonia mas sto souper market khresimopoioume panta dikes mas tsantes gi auto kai merikes phores orismenoi mas koitazoun les kai eimaste exogeinoi 
  ellada brisketai semera upo te diktatoria tou khrematistikou kephalaiou 
 opote adika to kaneis to ergo auto 
 piso paei e diadikasia oson aphora ton upopsephio gia to neo demo souliou sto  aphou opos katapherame na plerophorethoume tha stethei telika kalpe stis  augoustou emera kuriake 
 opos semeiose pos to sugkekrimeno ktirio to opoio parakhoretheke apo to demo ksanthes prokeitai gia ena ktirio monadikes biomekhanikes arkhitektonikes tou  aiona pou exuperetouse tes anagkes tou othomanikou monopoliou kapnou 
 periorizontai aplos ste diapistose oti osoi sumplerosan ta erotematologia tou den etan apokleistika proletariakes katagoges alla antiprosopeutiko deigma tes euruteres taxikes domes tes tote ellenikes koinonias 
 phtanei omos me ta prosopika kai tis eukhes to mono pou thelo einai na sas metedosa lige apo ten aisiodoxia mou 
 kati pou tha epereasei auxetika kai tis times ton georgikon proionton 
 badizontas kai paizontas pano s autous kalountai na anakalupsoun pou odegei o kathe dromos 
 ereunes gia ten upothese diexagei e antitromokratike uperesia 
 me tis omoiotetes kai tis diaphores tous 
 to eukharisto pou eisepraxa etan na bgoun se khthesine tous ekpompe treis ekprosopoi tes autonomes thuras  kai na krazoun emena 
 hde o nomos brisketai ekei me oles tou tis ekphraseis ten apagoreuse ten parabase tis sunepeies tes 
  anergia e elleipse asphaleias e apousia upodomon oi elleipseis sten ugeia demiourgoun entone anasphaleia 
 an o ependutes epilexei te sugkekrimene ruthmise den tha pleronei phoro mekhri e sugkekrimene ependuse na phtasei na apodosei kerde  ekat 
 giu auto tou esteilan 
 emastan ole ten proegoumene ebdomada proselomenoi ston stokho mas kai gi auto apomonothekame apo to upoloipo periballon gia treis emeres 
     ekane to proto bema prokrises gia to phainal phor tou europaikou kupellou notiou periphereias sten kalathosphaira nikontas me to epibletiko  te bosniake mprotnio 
 khthes oi paiktes tou ophe exophlethekan se misthous kai prim oktobriou 
 trite  augoustou   leipoun ta extra parthena ladia oi times tou ladiou sunekhizoun na kinountai sta gnosta khamela epipeda pou ekhoun diamorphothei apo ta tele tou proegoumenou khronou 
 khorizei tous ellenes mathetes se duo kategories kai apagoreuei se boreiepeirotes pontious kai omogeneis tou exoterikou na kratoun ten ellenike semaia graphei e ethnika euaisthete ephemerida 
 benizelos omologei to baterlo tou  na arnethei o laos peraitero thusies  lathos epikindune kai kathara taxike e politike tes kuberneses  
 edeixe kitrine stous gkalits kai atsimobits 
 to club sto opoio lambanei khora e ekdelose gia to  protathlema tou thrulou einai pragmatika dipla ste thalassa 
 kai an pragmati ta elleimmata kai ta khree ton kratonmelon tes etan to problema tes europaikes enoses phoboumene apostatheropoiese to logiko tha etan na arkhisei me ten ispania tes opoias to terastio meridio perissotero apo  tris 
 aute ten ora kaine lastikha sto dromo exo apo te genike grammateia aigaiou 
  agonistike olokleronetai aurio me to adiaphoro paikhnidi anamesa ston almuro kai ton astera 
 apo ta palia text adventures alla kai ta paikhnidia tes sierra pou basizontan se megalo bathmo sten plektrologese perasame sto epomeno stadio 
 oson aphora sto sullogo tou demou gaziou opou ta authaireta xepernoun tis tesseris khiliades o proedros tou k mikhales kabbalos milontas sten  eipe oti e sugkentrose anamenetai na ekhei megale summetokhe kosmou 
 moiraze se khameles times stous khorikous ladi kai palaiotera daneize s autous khrematika posa 
 se oti aphora ten anakuklose sten opoia o nomos ioanninon einai ouragos sten epeiro aphou se kanenan  den epharmozetai pleres programma para mono se pilotiko stadio e epiloge einai na anatethei me diagonismo se etaireia e apokomide kai diakheirise 
  germanida eikhe sullephthei prokhthes to bradu sten periokhe martinegko eno epididotan mesa se autokineto se erotikes praxeis me antra enanti amoibes  drakhmon 
 phemes lene oti to palati to stoikheionoun nekroi basileis opos e progiagia tou william basilissa mary 
 plore pantos gia ten arktike phainetai pos ekhoun balei ede kai ellenes ephoplistes 
 auto to spiti tes to kabouki protos to khresimopoiese o ermes theos epises sundeomenos me ton gamo os uios tes maias gia na tentosei khordes phtiakhnontas ten prote lura 
 beroia  euekhe pole gia ena triemero apo tis  iouniou e beroia tha euekhesei me mousikes pou tha zontanepsoun ten pole ap akro se akro gia deutere khronia sto plaisio ton ekdeloseon gia ten pagkosmia emera mousikes 
 sas zetame na mas peite to montelo to opoio epaggelleste epeide den uparkhei pouthena ston kosmo 
 eikha enan kratoumeno pou mou elege sunekhos ti perimeneis giatre apo mena 
  persine proetoimasia tou olumpiakou sto mpant beriskhophen eikhe polle douleia 
  mikhales sphakianakes etan apo ta gnosta stelekhe tou  sto hrakleio kai eikhe drasteriopoiethei se oles tis ekdeloseis tou kommatos 
 pantos prin alektor phonesai epibebaiothekan oi enstaseis pou eikhe ekphrasei kai telika e sunantese sto  opos apodeikhteke etan mia trupa sto nero 
  ksanthe touristikos proorismos olo to khrono gia ellenes kai xenous demiourgei eisodema gia to nomo kai apaskholese gia tous katoikous 
 konta sta epipeda tes trapezikes agoras einai kai ta epitokia pou prospherei se phusika prosopa kai nomika prosopa idiotikou dikaiou amigos me kerdoskopikou kharaktera to tameio parakatathekon kai daneion 
  yparkhoun eutukhos arketa teleoptika kanalia 
 diaitetes tou agona etan o giorgos tsoumanes me ton thanase paraskho 
 eutukhos e phoroapallage gia ten egkatastase eliakou thermosiphona pou eikhe katargethei epanelthe 
 ekhontas dei ta gran turismo  kai killzone  se  sto los angeles prosphata sto plaisio tes   mporoume na bebaiosoume oti ta games mporoun na einai akros peistika os epikheiremata gia ten stereoskopike eikona 
  ten epitrope ton sophon pou sustatheke sto topiko  gia ton elegkho tes eklogikes diadikasias apousiaze khthes to onoma tou nikou tsampourake epises apo ta istorika stelekhe tou kommatos 
 me te dunatoteta metabibases pou dotheke apo ten periodo karamanle oi adeies apoktoun xaphnika empragmato dikaioma 
  megale auxese ton epitokion ton teleutaio khrono ekhei amese kai sobare epiptose sto kostos exupereteses tou daneiou tes boetheias ton  dis 
 den apanto se phemes kai sta osa graphontai 
 eukolo einai bre elpida pantos pros to paron den ekhoun emphanistei tetoia phainomena 
 to ergo anatithetai apo te strategina se enan stratiote kai autodidakto zographo pou apokaleitai apo te gunaika rosos exaitias tes phusiognomias tou 
 an e mpagern termatisei  tha khreiastei prokrimatiko gia prokrise stous omilous tou tsampions ligk eno an meinei  tha arkestei sto giouropa ligk 
 poso mallon an paroume ton proto bathmo 
 apo kei pou den to perimene ten patese enas maphiozos sten italia 
  ekklesia brisketai se apostase  khiliometron apo to xenodokheio 
  kathodike diaspase tes demiourgese euloga erotemata gia ten sunekheia kathos entathekan kai oi reustopoieseis metokhon piezontas ten time pros ta  euro 
 thumamai pantote ekeine ten prote phora pou epia to krasi kai mou ekane klik 
 blepeis emeis ste rodo den eikhame atukhesei pote na mas episkephtoun kai na kollesoun 
 ki auto para to gegonos oti oloi gnorizoun pos e diadikasia den prokhora exaitias ton tourkikon theseon 
 akolouthei to aerodromio sarl nte gkol tou parisiou trito to aerodromio tes phrankphourtes tetarto to aerodromio skipkhol tou pmsterntam kai pempto to aerodromio mparakhas tes madrites 
 ta paradosiaka tragoudia einai auta pou dinoun perissotere trophe me auta bionan oi anthropoi ta sunaisthemata kai auta ekhoun kai perissotere theatrikoteta apo alla 
  krise einai dedomene gia oloklero ton kosmo kai ekhei epereasei ola ta epipeda tes zoes mas ton teleutaio khrono 
 megaleiodes e sugkentrose tou kosta soutou sto odeio menuma enotetas kai allages 
  uphupourgos oikonomikon  xristodoulakes kata te khthesine tou sunantese me ten  uposkhetheke auxeseis apo  os  pou mesostathmika dinoun  
 anazeta mia zeste agkalia gia tis krues meres tou kheimona kai okhi mono 
 to skhedio brisketai upo epexergasia kai tha oloklerothei kai tha parousiastei tis epomenes ebdomades 
 eos ten ora pou ekleise e ule tes ephemeridas mas den eikhe oloklerothei e sunedriase ostoso koine ektimese olon ton melon tou  etan pos prepei na katatethei enstase kathos theoroun oti o diagonismos ekhei polla skoteina semeia pou ton kathistoun adiaphane 
 edo prepei na upenthumisoume oti gramme gia akuro kai leuko edose to  ten idia epiloge ekane kai e  dinontas omos os epiloge kai ten apokhe aphou e these etan den epilegoume kanenan apo tous diakheiristes tes antilaikes politikes 
 opos anapherei se anakoinose tou  anagke na diadelosoume te deutera me to  einai semera dipla epibeblemene apo tis exelixeis 
 to  oi poleseis tou omilou ephthasan ta  dis 
  sarantakhrone omos philia tou me to suggraphea tou bibliou  dilmpoe phainetai pos apotelese ton sundetiko kriko 
 oi demiourgikoteroi ellenes seph sunthetoun gia prote phora mazi te 
 diarkeia eos tis  apriliou 
 ekei omos ta paidia tes entases na epimenoun ston agona tous na paizoun ta tragoudia tous kai na metadidoun ta epanastatika menumata tous 
 antistoikha oi ellenes sten pleionoteta tous   emphanizontai apogoeteumenoi apo ten parousa katastase tes apaskholeses ste khora tous kathos theoroun oti brisketai se duskhere these   
 benizelo oi siderodromoi ellenikou kratous  os demosia etaireia 
 omos diabazontas tis protes anaphores gia problemata epilexame na kratesoume stase anamones 
 ksekokaliste to kai kopste to kreas se lourides 
 ta kathara kerde meta apo phorous kai dikaiomata meiopsephias tou omilou ephtasan ta  ekat 
 aphou malakosoun oi phakes tis souronoume kai tis pername apo to mplenter mazi me to melani kai sumpleronoume oso zomo khreiastei mekhri na ginei enas elaphrus poures 
 pio sugkekrimena stis  khthes ta xemeromata apo agnoste mekhri stigmes aitia skaphos to opoio eikhe anelkustei ste khersaia zone tou limaniou tes akantias tulikhtheke stis phloges 
 surriknonontai siopera oi exonosokomeiakes domes katargese egkekrimenou oikotropheiou upobathmise epaggelmatikon domon ton asthenon metaphora exoterikon iatreion apo to kentro tes athenas odos kolette mesa sto psukhiatreioasulo 
 oi pomakoi tes oreines rodopes den einai tourkoi alla boulgaroi exislamisthentes einai e episeme tourkike ekdokhe pou anapheretai sten geographia b taxes lukeiou pou didaskontai ta paidia sten tourkia 
 akome kai stis argies einai e germania koruphaia graphei e belt kai analuei oi ergazomenoi edo mazi me deka argies ekhoun  pleromenes eleutheres emeres eno sten   emeres 
 malista kapoioi lene oti e google ekhei ede arkhisei na to dokimazei se pragmatikes sunthekes 
 pempte  iouliou   pempte  iouliou   aurio anamenetai na katatethei apo tous bouleutes tou  aitema gia amese sustase proanakritikes epitropes gia to skandalo tes siemens 
  philandia deikhnei pos mporoun oi anthropoi na erthoun pio konta se katallela diamorphomenous demosious khorous apo pagomena parka mekhri akhnistes saounes 
 emeis koitame ten douleia mas etan to sunthema pou dotheke apo ton 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai  cybershot  apotelei mia mikre se diastaseis alla exeligmene compact psephiake mekhane pou ensomatonei aisthetera analuses  megapixels gia photographies me leptomereia kai eukrineia 
 sumplerose de oti apo tous phoreis oikonomika tis boethese epises e anaptuxiake erakleiou 
 mporoume akoma na paizoume oloi mazi se tetoious kairous otan o atomikos dromos moiazei na einai o monos dunatos uparkhoun phones pou mas thumizoun oti oi anthropoi mporoun na sunantiountai kai na kanoun thaumata 
  serbia einai e khora me ton megalutero sunoliko plethusmo pou endiapherei to soma tou  okhi mono metaxu ton proen giougkoslabikon demokration alla kai sten eurutere periokhe tes notioanatolikes europes me skhedon  atoma 
 sukhna erkhetai kai xanarkhetai sto nou e euloge aporia tou makarite tou patera mou gnostou epaggelmatia gianniote khondremporou pou anarotiotan empodizei mepos kaneis ton opoiondepote na anoixei dipla apo to diko mou magazi ena idio asphalos okhi 
 se kathe periptose oi oikonomikes diaphores  an uparkhoun autes en prokeimeno lunontai apo ta armodia dikasteria kai tis arkhes tou kratous kai okhi meso laikon dikasterion sukophantikon menumaton kai apeilon 
  titlos einai daneismenos apo to latiniko keimeno 
 sto idio mekos kumatos etan kai oi deloseis tou kosta kaimakoglou oloi mas eimaste dipsasmenoi gia diakrise 
 to proto ploio apo auta tha einai etoimo se  menes 
 tous menes tes apraxias opos to kalokairi kai tis giortes paizoun sunekheia epanalepseis 
 gia tis khreseis  kai  oik 
 to basileio tes pop koultouras alle mia ekrektike sunantese ekatontadon khiliadon sinephil kai phan ton komiks oloklerotheke to proegoumeno sabbatokuriako sto san ntiegko tes kaliphornias 
 trite  augoustou   oi demosiographoi tou nautiliakou reportaz elegan khthes oti to neo aphentiko agorase polu akriba te  apo ton apostolo bentoure 
 ste sunantese metaxu ton allon parousiastekan oi tropoi antimetopises ton kindunon pou demiourgountai apo tis purkagies sumphona me ten empeiria kai ta tekhnika mesa pou khresimopoiountai se tetoiou eidous peristaseis kai ta opoia diarkos exelissontai 
  marx sto sokho pou tha ermeneusei o antonopoulos semeiose polu megale epitukhia sten athena kai etan apo ta erga pou emeinan anexitela sto mualo oson to eidan gi auto kai den prepei na to khasoume 
 gia na doume an o upourgos metaphoron pou tha enemerosei semera ten epitrope oikonomikon tes boules gia ta taxi tha pei kati perissotero 
 den mporoume na kathusteresoume peraitero 
 ligo noritera eikhe akoustei kai to sumboliko ellas ellenon khristianon 
  diadikasia pantos tha ekhei oloklerothei sumphona me ton kgabala mekhri ta xristougenna 
 den uparkhei omos to plesiasma meso ton phoreon tou laou 
 etsi opos episemainoun oi trapezites dinetai e dunatoteta sten trapeza na prosdiorizei tis anagkes tou pelate kai na prokhorei sten prosphora katallelon proionton sten soste timologese 
 kleinei  apo gklantmpakh  megale prospatheia pou ginetai ta teleutaia khronia ston  gia ten aneurese neon talenton kala kratei 
 to stubete kala me ta kheria sas rikhnete to lemoni kai to kumino kai ta aphenete na marinaristoun mise ora 
 an ten ekane o mikes diabolismenos phantazeste ti tha ginotan kalutera as men to skeptontai oi prasinoi 
 sta duo teleutaia suntoma mere tou muthistorematos pairnoun ton logo duo alla prosopa pou sumpleronoun ten istoria tou kostante apo diaphoretike optike gonia anatrepontas basikes parametrous tes dikes tou aphegeses 
 ekei ekhoume polu thetikes exelixeis 
 phetos apophasisame na apokentrosoume to programma kai e prospatheia mas aute phainetai na dikaionetai apoluta mekhri tora 
  khalkida ekhei khalasei edo kai mia dekaetiabromikes paralies kako serbis kai akribogenika opou ekhei polu kosmo den uparkhei poioteta se tipota 
 me alla logia na xeperasei ton eauto tou kathos kai o idios einai gennema enos kommatikou sustematos pou mekhri tora oudolos noiasteke sobara gia tis anagkes periphereias 
 sukhna sumbainei na aphanizetai apo kuna skulopsaro peri ten  emera 
 giati den allazoun ten kanonistike apophase gia na einai sumphonoi me tis epitages tou nomou  paizete kati lene osoi theloun na skephthoun ponera 
 oles oi mazoxeis pragmatopoiountai sta kentrika grapheia kai einai anoiktes akoma kai autes tou  sto khoro ton matheton opou etan e poluplethestere organose semera ekhoun meinei guro sta  mele me upeuthunous ton mena khatzeandreou kai manole adamopoulo 
 trite  augoustou   tesseris meres meta to thanato tou kosta mouka kai mia mera meta to thanato tou  apo ton polikhnito ten teleutaia tou pnoe aphese sten asphalto kai enas  stratiotes apo ten agiaso 
 oso gia to an o  mporei na diekdikesei ten anodo o k kalogerou einai saphes den ekhoume tetoies blepseis kathos kai o kolossos ekhei xephugei kapos 
 kati pou ekanan kata te diarkeia tes sunedriases tou sumbouliou to bradu tes deuteras 
 me plethora ekdeloseon oles dorean gia to koino pou tha pragmatopoiethoun stis   kai  iouliou e periphereia thessalias pragmatopoiei kai phetos sta paralia tou nomou to phestibal me thea sto aigaio 
 gia tous dokimazomenous prote phora upopsephious iskhuei to dikaioma tes mias kai monadikes emphanises 
 mikro etan omos kai to endiapheron tou kosmou pou me exairese ton termatismo pantos to theama den elleipse idiaitera stis exi eidikes diadromes tou mokhou tou brakhasiou kai tou drasi 
 sumphona me plerophories oi arkhes ekhoun sugkentrosei stoikheia apo ta opoia prokuptei oti ton prikake traumatise suggeniko tou prosopo gia agnostous logous ste these purgos tou beneratou 
 ola gia tous kephenes gia tous ekmetalleutes gia to kratos tous 
 opos delose e kore tou theodora o gnostos ethopoios tha noseleutei sten klinike mekhri na statheropoiethei e arteriake tou piese
