 kairos athena  pem  aug   enetgr  trite  augoustou  tragike katalexe eikhe to mpanio gia ena  agori se paralia sten katerine to opoio xephuge apo ten prosokhe ton gonion tou gia na brethei ligo argotera nekro 
 tria lepta argotera  o mpoa morte apenanti apo ton kepouro soutare kai e mpala exostrakisteke apo to orizontio dokari 
   na ekdothei kapoia prokeruxe pou na sas endiapherei mporeite na axiopoiesete auto to khroniko diastema parakolouthontas kapoio programma e seminario epaggelmatikes katartises tou  
  ouranos tou autokinetou bretheke se taratsa  metra makria apo to semeio tes ekrexes e porta tou taksi sten aule tou demotikou skholeiou eno kato apo to autokineto anoixe krateras bathous misou metrou 
 to lompi dra me mustikoteta kai e dow den einai o pio katallelos demosios propagandistes tes asphaleias ton khemikon 
 kai telos panton as ginei mia sobare ereuna kai an theorethei aparaiteto kai sumpherei toso polu as kanoun to parko oi treis omoroi demoi giati na to kanei mia etaireia kai na meinoun ta ophele stous demous 
    euoiones einai oi prooptikes gia ten touristike kinese ste khora mas phetos to kalokairi meta tis ektimeseis tou diethnous aerolimena athenon gia auxese kata  ston arithmo ton pteseon exoterikou apo kai pros ten athena 
 prepei na broume ton bematismo mas to programma tou  tha prepei na apeuthunetai s ola ta stromata kai na aphora ole ten koinonia 
  litra endeka ekatommuria litra  petrelaiou ntizel kai peripou  tonoi epipleon kausaeria  
 kale epiloge einai kai e oreine arkadia koukla olo to khrono 
 dioti oloi oi europaioi khreiazetai kapoia stigme na thumethoume ton megalo saixper otan elege ston phalstaph an den apatomai 
 einai eliou phaeinoteron oti e eisodos tes ntoras mpakogianne sten politike arena moiazei moiraia epibeblemene 
 eikha kanei tromere proponese kai emoun panetoimos gia na paro to khruso metallio 
 gnorizoume oti arketoi demotikoi sumbouloi kai demarkhoi ana ten epikrateia ekhoun protodikos katadikastei den ekhoun omos tethei se argia kai askoun kanonika ta kathekonta tous 
 me poious porous tha tis leitourgesoun tha eprepe na dothoun kinetra e kai protoboulies stous demous kai stis periphereies na kharaxoun te dike tous oikonomike politike pou tha antistoikhei kai sto biotiko epipedo ton katoikon kathe periokhes 
 theoreitai de asteio logistika na ginetai logos oti e etaireia etan sto parelthon epikerdes otan sten ousia oi zemies diokheteuontan ston logariasmo exodon  egkatastases e anaposbeste axia tou opoiou anerkheto peripou se  dis 
 gia poio pragma metanionete perissotero gia ten elleipse thrasous 
 de semainei oti de tha ekhoume tou khronou 
  omorphia tou topiou proselkuei skaphe kai istioploika pou prosdenoun gia na to apolausoun kai na kharoun tis aneseis tou xenkheiou 
 to kratos pronoias pou einai entuposiaka mikroteros etan o arithmos ton gunaikon pou einai odegoi kai emplekontai se trokhaia atukhemata se skhese me tous andres 
 se emeresies ekdromes me kaiki tha proseggisete ta brakhonesia pou briskontai ologura 
 me to pou kathesai sou phernoun ton katalogo exi epiloges gia proto piato pente gia kurio kai tesseris gia epidorpio 
 oute to ena egine oute to allo 
 khthes exallou egine gnosto oti uparkhei endiapheron gia ton marko maragkoudake tou ophe  
 sumphona me anakoinothen tou omilou basikoi stokhoi tes anadiorganoses autes einai na meiothoun 
 oi idies plerophories prosthetoun epises oti to neo apoktema tou omilou prokeitai na einai etaireia tou kladou genikon asphaleion mikromesaiou megethous kai me ugies xartophulakio 
 ostoso den mporese na kratesei anepaphe ten estia tou aphou to asphuktiko presingk tes kabalas apedose sto  me ton nikoulae  
 sumphona me ten antipoliteuse sto poso auto tha prepei na prostethoun oi opheiles tou demou kai ton demotikon epikheireseon pros tous asphalistikous organismous pros kataskeuastes kai trita prosopa 
 epeide o organismos khreiazetai kai to gluko protimeste epidorpio giaourtiou me khamela lipara meli e gluko tou koutaliou komposta e zele phrouton loukoumi e lige sokolata ugeias pou periekhei magnesio kai dra enantia sten katathlipse 
 to eidan san mia eukairia gia autosarkasmo 
 tha eniskhusei ton periphereiako skhediasmo kai tis nees thesmikes allages opou auto tha apaitethei 
 alla ginontai giati sunistoun mia pragmatikoteta 
 prin teleioso tha ethela na toniso noiotho touto to khreos oti e kataxiose tes paradosiakes ellenidas gunaikas einai sto rolo tes manas pou dikaiologemena ginontai tosoi eortasmoi pros time tes 
  upourgos metebe sto nesi proskeklemenos tes ellenikes omospondias kriket prokeimenou na parakolouthesei ton philiko agona anamesa se omada bouleuton apo ten australia kai beteranon tou athlematos 
 epi tes ousias phusika gia ta osa eipothoun ten kritike kai to skholiasmo ton aphenoun se mas tous psephophorous 
 ekphrazontas telos ten anesukhia tou gia to mellon tes khoras o proedros tes  apeuthune se oloklere ten kubernese to erotema ti tha ginei ean sunekhistei e apotukhia olokleres autes tes politikes 
 ekho na kano ten exes protase ston agapeto upourgo 
 bebaia kai auta ta khremata pisteuo oti gia na beltiothei e poioteta ste zoe mas tha prepei na mas dothei e dunatoteta gia ergasia 
 pempte  martios   eagle bulkauxese  sta leitourgika kerde auxese esodon kai  alla kampse sta kerde semeiose to  e eagle bulk pou ekhei epikephales ton k sophokle zoula 
 apokleistekan o timoremenos kolitsidakes kai o metsopoulos pou den mporese na nikesei ton io tes grippes 
 an se autous prostethoun o lazaros semos o panagiotes ziakas o germanos oto kai oi boulgaroi tsbetanoph topouzoph kai zaphiroph diapistonetai oti o akratetos diathetei ena ikano sunolo 
 me ta pano tou kai me ta kato tou eidika otan de sugkratei ta neura tou 
 auto phaneke me ten enarxe tes sezon kai aisiodoxoume na sunekhistei 
 phetos dustukhos den pame kala kai s auto meridio euthunes ekhoun oloi 
  mparmpara kai o sasa apeuthunoun ekklese se olous autous tous phoreis na euaisthetopoiethoun prokeimenou na sothei e zoe tou athoou koritsiou to opoio ekhei anagke iatrikes phrontidas 
 alloste uparkhoun oi nomimoi tropoi gia ten ethike mou apokatastase 
 pisteuo oti e sugkekrimene prospatheia tha apodosei lian suntomos 
 apheste pou blepo oti to problema legetai ntektas me oti auto sunepagetai 
 leitourgia pezon gia na to khresimopoieite entos kai ektos tou autokinetou sas 
 einai e lexe pou eleipe sunethos apo to lexilogio tou giorgou papakonstantinou kai einai e lexe pou tha akoume sto exes olo kai sukhnotera apo ton euaggelo benizelo 
 ta udatina auta monopatia emphanizontai anamesa se brakhodeis plagies kai kuloun epi ekatontades metra sto notio emisphairio tou are 
 einai loipon idiaitera semantiko auto giati deikhnei te statheroteta kai te dunamike pou ekhei e oikonomia mas kai pou to  me ten politike pou akolouthei ten krata se polu kala epipeda 
 ktismeno sten agkalia enos prostateuomenou kolpou ta kaphenedakia oi phournoi ta pantopoleia oi tabernes sas upodekhontai konta sten prokumaia 
 etsi opos ola deikhnoun oi monadikoi apontes tha einai oi timoremenoi kolitsidakes kiassos 
 oi ergazomenoi stous demous apekleisan apo noris to proi to khoro tou khuta os endeixe diamarturias sta sklera oikonomika nea diekdikontas epipleon neo kai dikaio misthologio plere monime kai eniaia ergasia kathos kai dikaio phorologiko sustema 
 leme nai sten ananeose tes sumbases alla theloume ta idia khremata me perusi 
 me karol epibletheke e liberpoul tes siti  kaout panegurizei meta to  poker 
 kai okhi na leme oti mas phtaine autoi pou tha tou kanoun kritike aurio methaurio 
 phusika oloi oi sumpaiktes tou stathekan dipla tou anebazontas tou ten psukhologia gia autes tis duskoles stigmes pou pernaei 
 kata ta alla e brokhe etan toso polle sto gklastonmperi pou e diorganotes epistrateusan phortega pou erikhnan akhuro se semeia opou e laspe ginotan aprospelaste 
  sunduasmos tou koukiadake eikhe ten prote kuriake megalutere duname apo tous duo monomakhous ton epanaleptikon 
 proton to megalo melo ekhei korestei apo tis duotreis kouzines pou ekhoun monopolesei ten estiatorike skene gallike italike kinezike 
 parallela e epises allodape phile tes pou eikhe uposterixei proanakritika aute ten kataggelia katethese sumphona me plerophories oti den eide e idia na tes dinoun khapia alla oti akouse te balaban na to leei 
 poios tha parei to ena e to allo upourgeio 
 eidika oi metokhes piestekan gia arketes ebdomades kai mia anamenomene antidrase erthe e opoia malista etan arketa iskhure 
 koboume kathe proi kai se periptose pou einai para polla kai den mporoume na ta diathesoume amesos ste laike ta bazoume sto psugeio 
 to biblio tou take theodoropoulou ekdo 
 alla den ekopsa pote to nema giati sunekhos mou to metakinoune 
 siopela kai diakritika ekteloun entoles kai ekpleronoun epithumies me ton pleon asphale kai aneto tropo 
 oi sullephthentes tha odegethoun ston eisaggelea eno oi narkotikes ousies to oplo me tous duo gemisteres kai ta phusiggia kathos kai  ikh autokineta kataskhethekan 
 oi tourkikes philodoxies den stamatoun oste na metatrapei e khora se mia megale oikonomike duname me periphereiake iskhu 
 arkhaiologikos khoros dodones theatrike parastase me paramuthi tou lorka se sunergasia me depethe ioanninon 
 ekane to ntempouto tou to  me to be here soon pou eikhe perasei skhedon aparatereto 
 ektimo epises ten aploteta pou uparkhei ste douleia mikroteron paragogon 
 auto apaitei upogrammise proothese neon proionton kai tropon diatheses sto koino egkatastase sugkhronon plerophoriakon sustematon sosta ekpaideumeno prosopiko kai orthologike diarthrose diktuou 
  suggrapheas upodeiknuei kai ten pithane luse sto problema proteinontas na anazetethei gia tous polites tes dutikes europes mia nea tautoteta e opoia tha lambanei upopse tis nees demographikes pragmatikotetes pou ekhoun demiourgethei 
 proedroi topikon opos diabazoume sta  kanoun oi idioi apokomide skoupidion prokeimenou na glutosoun apo ta parapona ton sundemoton tous 
 ste sunekheia an theloun tous parakhoro to demo ten edra ta panta 
 ton perasmeno iounio ligo prin lexei e proegoumene periodo den eikhe apokleisei me sapheneia to endekhomeno na uparxei kai tritos guros 
 pleon ginetai diakhorismos gia to kata poson ekhei khtistei mekhri to  e perissotera 
 akoma kai meta ten episkepse ste khio tou upourgou ethnikes amunas k  meimarake epanelthame me neo eggrapho stous protobathmious  pou zetousame ten topothetese tous sto thema 
 blepete oi suneideseis xupnoun kapote 
 ola ta aloga ekhoun endoparasita skoulekia kai ta perissotera boskotopia einai se kapoio bathmo molusmena 
 etan e prote periptose makhimes amerikanidas pou sullambanetai os aikhmalote polemou 
 gia to palio phrourio e phortetsa me ten ekklesia tou agiou georgiou khreiazetai na diaboume te gephura pano apo ten tekhnete taphro ten kontra phosa pou ekhei metatrepsei to palaio phrourio tes kerkuras se nesi 
 molis sta  dis 
 apla kanoun upomone mepos ka doun mia kharamada photos sto skoteino tounel tes oikonomias mas 
 meta te theia leitourgia sto xoklesi tou agiou georgiou oi kabalaredes idioktetes ton alogon pou summeteikhan sten ippodromia proskunesan enas  enas ten eikona tou agiou kai aphou sugkentrothekan xekinesan ton agona 
 auta omos ta deutereuonta merikes phores kathistantai kuriarkha 
 proteinoume teganeto abgo opou o krokos einai krema lemoniou to aspradi giaourti to alati luophilismenos ananas kai to piperi kommatakia apo karpo kakao 
 an omos uperkhe o katallelos antras gia na phtiaxo oikogeneia tha to ekana khoris na me noiazei an tha alloiothei to soma mou

 semeiotheke delade mia auxese tes taxes tou  
 kai nai men den to blepo na kathieronetai tora pia sta megala souper market alla sta geitonika magazakia ede einai sten emeresia diataxe 
 meta apo exi khronia sten megale kategoria tou germanikou podosphairou e aintrakht 
 mesa sto epomeno diastema anamenetai na uparxoun exelixeis kai gia ta mele tes topikes organoses tes ko pou kinethekan proeklogika ektos kommatikes grammes 
 tha te thumaste prophanos ten tete georgantopoulou pou einai ek ton diorganonton tes ektheses ton eikonon apo ta monasteria tou kosobou 
 apo ten alle bebaia uparkhoun kai oi epitedeioi pou ekmetalleuontai ten apousia ton elegktikon mekhanismon kai polu perissotero de te nootropia tou kratous pou tosa khronia de ekhei epibalei pote sobara prostima stous parabates 
  psukhe mas einai e koinonia o laos apo ten koinonia proerkhomaste kai sten koinonia logodotoume 
 den krubo oti me enanduo anthropous prokhoresame arketa alla sto telos apodeikhthekan oti etan na khame na legame 
 men pareis elikoptero san ton palaiokosta

 sten agonistike ton ekplexeon ekhasan sto gepedo tous panellenios kai  kai ton ektos edras epitukhion o ophh den kataphere na prosthesei kai te dikia tou ki etsi e apostase apo tis pronomioukhes theseis auxetheke stous duo pontous 
 emeis theloume psepho empistosunes sto  kai okhi psephos diamarturias pros ten kake diakubernese tes khoras apo te   
  kubernese diethese mia stratiotike duname  andron gia na sundramei tis prospatheies ton diasoston 
 ekhei diatelesei dieuthuntes tou kentrou ereunes tes istorias tou ellenikou dikaiou tes akademias athenon kai eidikos sumboulos gia ekklesiastika zetemata tou upourgou exoterikon  kai apo to phebrouario tou  mekhri semera 
 mekhri semera ekhei parei meros se parastaseis semantikon ellenon skenotheton opos o thodoros terzopoulos o giorgos lazanes o bikos nakhmias o thomas moskhopoulos e marianna kalmpare eno sunergasteke kai me ten ethnike lurike skene 
 sta  tou khronia o khose louis silabert den to bazei akoma kato kai elpizei na dosei to paron kai to  ste germania kai na petukhei auto pou kunegaei na ginei o protos termatophulakas pou tha skorarei se telike phase pagkosmiou kupellou 
 apotelesma auto to phainomeno tes exagoras na kleinei matia kai stomata ton upeuthunon 
  laimargos omos o anthropos ta pere 
 etoi meta to ek tou panagiou taphou sabanon mou na peribletho en aploun zostikon kai mian dermatinen zonen os kalumma de tes kephales ena skouphon 
  den stamatese na trekhei gia  lepta 
 kai problepoun ta exes  perissoteroi apo  demosioi upalleloi tha dinoun kathemerines 
 elladas pempte  iouliou   pempte  iouliou   ste messenia tha sunedriasei e sunodos tou dioiketikou sumbouliou tes omospondias emporikon sullogon peloponnesou kai notiodutikes elladas 
 to teleutaio tha apaskholesei semera te stele mas mia kai tha anapherthoume se mia apo tis palaioteres tabernes pou brisketai ste skala eresou to aigaio tes oikogeneias giannakelou 
 to zesame ki auto 
 me ten entone epithumia gia nike na diakatekhei ola ta mele tes apostoles to erakleio antimetopizei semera  
 merikoi omos kunegoi ton paikhnidion tou eliou kai tes selenes opos o tzim mpraitgouel ekhoun enan epipleon logo na theoroun ten  augoustou mia mera xekhoriste 
 ton ioulio  e komision upebale protase odegias oson aphora sten prosbasimoteta toso sto khoro tes koinonikes prostasias tes ugeionomikes perithalpses kai tes ekpaideuses oso kai se agatha kai uperesies diathesimon sto koino 
 apophasise pos e papa kouremene etan aparadekte kai mou esteile mia philike sumboule gia na men katastrapho na men guriso ten tainia 
 ostoso auto pou kanei ta poiemata tes na xekhorizoun einai pos oti kai an pragmateuontai kratoun ten poietike praxe diarkos sto proskenio oti legetai einai oti mporese na diasothei mesa ste glossa 
 eikhe seira epaphon kai akouse ta problemata ton katoikon kai ton katastematarkhon tes periokhes 
  kedeia tou tha ginei aurio pempte stis  to proi ston iero metropolitiko nao agiou akhilliou 
 sto siderodromiko stathmo tou puthiou egkataleiphthekan  bagonia anepapha me epipla trophima kai allo uliko 
 exontotikes poines katargese tou tekmeriou athootetas ton upodikon thesmothetese tou karphomatos astunomike bia liges bdomades mas khorizoun apo te nukhta ekeine pou tesseris neoi anthropoi kaekan zontanoi sto keli tou korudallou 
 delade phtaime ki emeis 
 entheta      proslepseis anergon me epitage epanentaxes ta kriteria gia tis epikheireseis ten epitage epanentaxes rikhnei o  ste makhe kata tes anergias e opoia phainetai na proslambanei anesukhetikes diastaseis 
 etsi e krete apo ten teleutaia these me te mikrotere anergia to  perase sten proteleutaia mazi me to notio aigaio to  kai ten teleutaia katelaban ta ionia nesia 
   parakratese e opoia dienergeitai me base tis diataxeis tes par 
  dipla me ton proen prothupourgo kosta karamanle kathotan ten prote mera suzeteses ste boule tou asphalistikou nomoskhediou o stauros kalogiannes 
 sta megala astika kentra khanesai mesa sten anonumia kai mporeis pio eukola na epistrepseis ste zoe se antithese me ten eparkhia 
 polla ta epainetika skholia polla ta peristatika kai ta paradeigmata pou apodeiknuoun tou logou to alethes kai pleon perissoteres kai oi kleseis sto kentro tes astunomias 
 kaneis den dikaioutai na paizei me tis anthropines zoes 
  epomene sunedria tou ethnikou topotheteitai peri to telos augoustou arkhes septembriou 
  atalanta pasko orthodoxe albanida megalose ekhontas philes mousoulmanes 
  khara zetaei te sumparastase tes lolas pou omos den mporei na phugei apo to spiti tou phote kai na ton aphesei mono me te natalia 
 to khrema na kineitai ki as men einai tsekarismena katharo 
  egkhrome othone ton  intson tou proballei panemorpha tes photographies kai ta video me ta opoia omos e suskeue ekhei uperbolikes 
   euphanizetai sugkrateuena aisiodoxe skhetika ue ten prospatheia tes na sphragisei to regua ue tonous laspes kai skurodeuatos

 perimenoun to paskha ta emporika katastemata tou kilkis perimenoun to paskha ta emporika katastemata tou kilkis tha parakalousame na men khresimopoieite greeklish kathos e automate mekhane kobei tous agglikous kharakteres opos kai tis prosbletikes lexeis 
 ten paraskeue to grapheio tou strategou ereunetheke exonukhistika apo astunomikous pou anazetousan paranomo uliko 
 oi sunthekes etan pragmatika duskoles ste limne me allages sten entase kai te dieuthunse ton anemon 
 to sugkrotema ton krupton einai mia entuposiake kataskeue pou me tis katalleles epembaseis mporei na axiopoiethei sto megisto dunato bathmo demiourgia ekthesiakou khorou e melete tou opoiou tha prepei na akolouthesei ten apokatastase 
  epiklese tou antagonismou pou tha rixei upotithetai tis times einai enas muthos 
 duo sboures taxideuoun kai zontas kathemerines katastaseis pernoun sta paidia tis aparaitetes plerophories gia to thema tous 
 semera tha oloklerothei to tournoua ste mneme tou giorgou metsimpona 
 tis upokhreoseis tou  apo antasphaliseis egguatai to elleniko demosio 
 treis meres argotera meta ten apologia tou sten anakritria aphetheke eleutheros me perioristikous orous epeide gia to teleutaio adikema den uperkhan stoikheia 
 oi ereunes tou anakritikou tmematos tes purosbestikes yperesias strephontai pros kathe kateuthunse 
 ego nomiza oti ta eikhe parei mazi tou sto khorio

 epta khronia meta 
 mesa apo mia poreia  khronon to sugkrotema tou lizzy borden skhematisteke to  sto hollywood tes california 
 poia stase terese olo auto to diastema  nomarkhes parakolouthouse olo to kalokairi ten dunamike tes upopsephiotetas mou kai gnorizontas ta apotelesmata ton demoskopeseon dieblepe to endekhomeno na eimai ego o upopsephios tou  
 anablethekan logo elleipseos apartias oi proxthesines ektaktes genikes suneleuseis ton metoxon tes eisegmenes lanakam  kai tha epanalephthoun me idia themata emeresias diataxes stis  oktobriou  
 stis parapano summetokhes prostithetai kai e timomene khora tes  deth serbia e opoia ekhei dromologesei ena euru programma ekdeloseon me epikheirematiko anaptuxiako oikonomiko alla kai politistiko kharaktera 
 gia polu ski alla kai glukia zoe protimese ten courchevel 
 kaname uposterixe o k ignatios oti pio demokratiko uparkhei sugkentrosame upographes kai upobalame ena aitema 
 ekanan kapoies gnomateuseis kai katelexan pos paskhei apo mia spania arrostia pou onomazetai upertrikhos kai pou den uparkhei therapeia 
 anoikhte e palia ethnike thessalonikeskabalas se aphmphipole kai galepso 
 panta ta diakhorizo polu kala 
 kai oi duo ekhoun pagosei logo tes apotukhias tou beligradiou na ekdosei tous katazetoumenous kategoroumenous gia egklemata polemou ratko mlantits kai gkoran khatzits 
 einai peripou  menon mikrosome san gatoula panta khamogelaste kai kharoumene 
 ekhontas omos upopse ten istoria tou idrumatos ekphrazo kapoious problematismous pou ekhoun skhese me ten topothesia pou ekhei anegerthei kai ten oikonomike sterixe tes leitourgias tou 
 otan einai anoikhto einai ena polu kompso axiopisto kai aneto pontiki 
 tarkini me to kalostemeno seat leon kai telika na kerdisei ten trite these tou bathrou 
 einai aletheia oti sto sunolo tous skhedon oi apostoles einai tupikou kharaktera 
 den arkei na einai kalo to proion sou prepei na mporeis kai na epikoinoneseis auten ten poioteta na eisai se these na te deixeis pros ta exo 
 eroas kai pali o kratos o spartiates polemistes pou sto telos tou protou paikhnidiou kataphere na parei te these tou are kai na ginei o idios theos tou polemou 
 oi protes prospatheies gia diaphora pantremata tekhnike sur iies opsimos trugos deuterogene aromata etan kourastikes 
  kora tous xekhorize saphos apo ten psikha kai tis perissoteres phores thrummatizotan 
 oi diagonizomenoi tha axiologethoun sten katanoese tou kodika odikes kuklophorias kai ten ikanoteta tous na pragmatopoiesoun mia podelatike diadrome sten pole kai sten upaithro 
 se bazaki balte to lemoni me to ladi piperi kanela kai alati 
 karkhimakes me anakoinose pou anephere oi ekprosopoi tes troikas xeperasan ta oria 
 tes katalepses tou skaphous eikhan proegethei pollaples skhetikes proeidopoieseis tou israelinou polemikou nautikou to opoio kalouse ton kubernete tou skaphous na allaxei poreia dikhos na parenokhlethei peraitero 
 to zetoumeno aute te stigme den einai ti tha kano ego alla na meinoume sten kategoria 
 anapheromenos ste skepse autes tes demiourgias mas leei oti  idea gia to poia morphe tha ekhei to ergo diarkei ena dekato tou deuteroleptou 
 oi upobathmismenes spoudes metatrepontai se atomiko agona epibioses kai sulloges tou proapaitoumenou arithmou pistotikon monadon apo opoudepote 
 ekhoume anagke apo plouto ideon kai protaseon 
 ten idea delade mias anexartetes demotikes arkhes 
   programmatizei mia seira deka sunenteuxeonportreton me merika apo ta eklektotera onomata tes diethnous logotekhnikes skenes pou tha xenagesoun to elleniko koino sto prosopiko kai pneumatiko tous sumpan 
 eukharisto ta koritsia pou summetekhoun kai idiaitera tha ethela na statho sten ebina maltse pou erthe apo ten tsekhia gia na dosei to paron ston agona 
 oi idioi dromoi me tis ekatontades epikindunes mikres e megaluteres diastauroseis oi idioi odegoi me stul zaman phou kai dustukhos oudemia beltiose problepetai aphou ekhoume mpei se mia periodo perikopon 
 ena zeugari papoutsia entos duo menon einai ntemonte kai prepei na petakhtei 
  anakhorese tou mpillu gia na parousiastei sto strato demiourgei megala problemata sten olga 
  demoprasia gia to tmema apo ton agio sozonta mekhri ton alagni ekhei oristei gia tis  dekembriou eno gia tis  tou idiou mena ekhei oristei e demoprasia tou tmematos marthabiannos 
 apotelesma ekatontades khiliades anthropoi polites kai stratiotes ektethekan sta radienerga auta opla 
 anthropos esti as ton katapio 
 sto  oi gepedoukhoi ekhasan megale eukairia na proegethoun otan o karon ekane te sentra apo aristera kai o phranzoni epiase to sout sten kinese apo to upsos tes mikres periokhes alla e mpala ephuge psela aout 
 epises e periphereia dutikes elladas tha parekhei tekhnike kai oikonomike uposterixe gia olous tous ergazomenous pou tha summetekhoun sto programma 
 oi skepseis anoigmatos tou tameiou tes peraioses gia to  epanelthan kai pali gia tis mme epikheireseis kai gia osous exairethekan apo ten persine ruthmise peraioses me stokho na antlethoun  dis euro

  geuse tes brakhosalatas sto tabernaki tou panaretou ston platano pou ekane to tapeino ouzo na moiazei me to kalutero poto tou kosmou 
  nearos podosphairistes perase me apolute epitukhia tis iatrikes exetaseis kai pleon epomenos stathmos tes karieras tou tha einai oi peiraiotes 
 as kratoun kai tis epiphullaxeis tous oi umnodoi kai oi agiographoi gia na men tous paroun me tis petres opos elege kai o megalos giorgos  e papandreou  
 parousiasteke epises drastike meiose ton agriokhorton gegonos pou epises phtokhainei to periballon kai anaparagei ta problemata 
 tetarte  augoustou   stis biomekhanies tou plomariou ten periokhe tou plomariou episkephthekan ekpaideutikoi tes protobathmias apo ole te lesbo 
 aute e kinese tou kubernetikou ekprosopou pou prospherei me to azemioto asulo ston antiproedro tes kuberneses den einai bebaia diolou tukhaia 
 to deutero meros etan akome pio plousio se theama ki eukairies 
 sto bathro ton niketon gia prote phora ste sugkekrimene diorganose bretheke kai o nikos tsotras sta  metra eleuthero kategorias  me epidose  
 epises o ogkos ton sunallagon den einai auxemenos ki etsi de diaphainetai oti tha agorasoun me upselous ogkous gia na ekhoume mia tase pros ta pano 
 auto den ginetai to  khreiazetai mia sunekheia katalegei 
 kulese mallon adiaphora kai etsi oloklerotheke 
 eisbole tou parelthontos sto paron ekrexe tes sullogikes mnemes kai sunama upoptes phigoures praktores tou kratous se ena keimeno pou krataei ameioto to endiapheron me ta pollapla epipeda anagnoses tou 
 opoios iskhurizetai kati tetoio pseudetai prosexte to kephalaio ps dioti oute uparkhei oute mporei na uparxei apokharakterismos dasikes ektases 
 ousiastika e anoikodomese tha arkhisei se peripou pente khronia kathos kata meso oro oi diadikasies diarkoun peripou toso 
 eikha ki ego kapoia protupa demosiographon enas apo tous opoious etan kai o phrentu germanos 
 to skaphos tou  stolou tes eleutherias odegetheke sto limani tou asntot 
 antistrophos analoge poreia se skhese me perusi gia tis duo megales parataxeis 
 uperkhan kai diakhoristikes kourtines endiamesa pou khresimeuan os paraban 
  serbia katethese aitema gia ektakte sugklese tou sumbouliou asphaleias ton enomenon ethnon meso tou upourgou exoterikon tes bouk geremits kai anamenei ten apantese tes germanias pou askei ten proedria tou sumbouliou asphaleias aute ten periodo 
 etsi oi apontes gia ton gkouardiola periorizontai stous ampintal mpogian kai ston timoremeno maskerano 
  nike tou prothupourgou kosta semite kai tes politikes tou kharakterizei ten eklogike nike tou  e egkure bretanike ephemerida  intepentent se kurio arthro tes khthes 
 sta tele phthinoporou etan o idios o  pou theorouse ruthmous khelonas ten oriothetese ton duo proton khiliometron ki apedide euthunes gia ten oligoria ste sugkekrimene uperesia 
 anamesa stis kalubes gunaikes epexergazontai ta phulla ton phoinikon 
  ste sunantese pou akolouthese me tous treis mas ten ka alakhouzou ten ka nikolopoulou kai emena e ka nikolopoulou me enemerose oti oi kathegetes ka niketa kai kos euthumiades eikhan upograpsei apo tis  
  thrulike moto guzzi anagennemene apo tis stakhtes tes ephere sto proskenio te norge  
 deuteron auto pou meiose e  etan kurios e phorologia ton merismaton 
 paronta apo etan kai ta mele tes ellenikes omadas diasoses giorgos stampoles kai e anna poluzoidou 
 pisteuo oti o monos tropos na kinethoume pros mia eirenike metabase einai o kantaphi kai to kathestos tou na egkataleipsoun ten exousia delose o  tou  
    paizeis me ten  tes rikhneis eksi kai xespas   aderphia 
 ekho apodeiktiko ptukhiou kai mou apomenei e orkomosia 
 epises melete kharaxes anaptuxiakon kateuthunseon melete anaplases kaminion melete anaplases paraliakou metopou 
 as prokhoresoun stis proslepseis anempodista den prokeitai na baloume se kinduno to programma delose kharakteristika 
 peitharkhikos elegkhos sto asklepieio boulas kuriake  maiou   trite  apriliou   parembase me te dienergeia peitharkhikou elegkhou sto asklepieio tes boulas pragmatopoiese to soma epitheoreton ugeias 
 an perasei aute e protase e ellada tha prepei to khreos pou uperbainei to  tou  na to katebazei peripou kata  dis 
 pros to paron tha meinoume edo alla tha skephtoume kai ta philika  proponetes epanelabe khthes oti e nike mas epi tes daphnes etan spoudaia eno tora ekhoume pio bato programma 
 omos prokeitai gia duo egetikes morphes pou oi armodiotetes tous prepei na einai xekathares alla tautokhrona prepei na einai oi kaluteroi sunergates 
  exetase egine se khroniko semeio kata ten opoia e suzugos kai oi suggeneis tou thanontos eikhan ede xekinesei tis aparaitetes diadikasies gia na ginei e kause tes sorou ste geitonike boulgaria 
 gia ta khristougenna apolauste to spesial menou ekplexe 
 ti sumbainei omos sten pragmatikoteta anaboun polu prin ten ora tous kai sbenoun polu arga 
 moirasteke to entupo gia ten prostasia ton khion katanaloton prokeimenou na prostateuontai apo authairesies kai paraloges times 
 oi protes plerophories anapheroun oti endekhomenos na ekhei skhese me problema ugeias 
  koulmase mas taxideuei makria apo ton psukhanagkasmo mias stroggules kibdeles oraiopoieses 
 oi proslephthentes tha upograpsoun sumbaseis ergasias idiotikou dikaiou orismenou khronou diarkeias eos  menon gia ten kalupse ton epokhikon anagkon tou organismou 
 ton prothupourgo upodekhtekan peripou  atoma me therma kheirokrotemata eno o demarkhos nikephoros lamprinos ekane mia suntome parousiase tes anaptuxiakes prospatheias sten periokhe kai sten anagke prostasias tou periballontos 
 delono upeuthuna pros pasa kateuthunse oti to oikologiko sustema ste thalassa pou periballei notia ten krete ekhei diatarakhthei epikinduna kai ste khlorida phukia ma kurios sten panida olon ton eidon psaria 
  albertes omos den phainontan eukharistemenos me mia toso mikre  
   se meiose kata  sent tou phorou katanaloses sto petrelaio thermanses apophasise na prokhoresei to upourgeio oikonomikon logo tes sunekhizomenes anodou pou parousiazei e time tou petrelaiou stis diethneis agores 
 anapheromenos ston kosmo tou are eipe mou ekhoun pei oti oi philathloi tou are agapoun kai sterizoun ten omada mas se kathe tes prospatheia 
 pou einai to lemeri pou einai oi antartes pou einai o aderphos tes o psarokuriakos pou einai o asurmatos 
 gregora tha akolouthesoun tsougkranes kai tsapes ean den kremastoun merikoi anapoda 
 prokeitai gia mia diatupose pou sten epomene skhetike ekthese de tha sunantesei kaneis 
 etan polu kalos se apodose se ole te diarkeia tou agona 
 balte kai pali tis garides ste saltsa anakatoste kai apheste tes na kruosoun 
 to  tha epilexei to neo arkhego  anamesa se  antipterarkhous kai upopterarkhous aphou o semerinos arkhegos antipterarkhos demetres lintzerakos ekhei sumplerosei tria khronia to anotato orio pou problepei o nomos sten egesia tou epiteleiou 
 askholoumai me to kallitekhniko patinaz epaggelmatika edo kai  khronia 
  aperioristo kostos suntheseis gia media center   katalleloi gia anaparagoge eikonas kai ekhou me kostos killzone  e summetokhe pollon paikton  games street fighter  apo iaponias 
   epithetikos sumphonese na lusei koine sunainesei to sumbolaio tou me ten omada tes phrankphourtes to opoio kai exepnee to kalokairi tou  
 akribotere pole tes elladas ta khania prin ena peripou mena o proedros tou institoutou katanaloton semeione oti ta khania apoteloun mia apo tis pio akribes poleis tes elladas 
 sumbolaia mellontikes ekpleroses epi metokhon diakinethekan  sumbolaia axias  ekat 
 ena sugkhrono paramuthi me philosophike diastase mia panemorphe istoria agapes 
  athoonei ton eauto tou anadromika 
 pos mporei kapoios pou douleuei gia na epibiosei khoris idiaiteres dexiotetes na khrematodotei tautokhrona spoudes upselou epipedou ara e eleutheria tes bouleses einai e eleutheria pou ekhei kai o phulakismenos mesa sto proaulio mias phulakes 
  ares eikhe exarkhes prosdiorisei os basiko metagraphiko stokho ten apoktese epithetikou periokhes me ephese sto skorarisma ostoso e dustokia pou paratereitai ston entopismo enos paikte pou tha mporouse na kanei te diaphora odegei ton sake tsiole se 
 ki auto gia emas einai to diabaterio oste kai se ethniko kai se europaiko epipedo na diasphalisoume ta dikaiomata mas 
  demos amariou me edra ton phourphoura apoteloumenos apo tous demous a subritou kai b koureton oi opoioi katargountai 
 to programma ton ekdeloseon perilambanei to ergasteri theatrou tou demou erakleiou tha parousiasei to dromeno giortine mera basismeno stis bakkhes tou euripide stis  to bradu sten plateia meintani ton anogeion 
 ekhoun exaphanistei oi xenoi agorastes kai den einai kai ligoi ekeinoi pou eite ekhoun poulesei eite anazetoun agoraste stis agores ton periokhon tes khalkidikes kai ton khanion 
  anaptukhtheke tekhnologia skhediases ploion meso elektronikon upologiston 
  demotike arkhe kataggellei eutheos ten antipoliteuse pos me tis gnostes laspologies tes epikheirei na apokomisei mikropolitika ophele me kurio stokho ten apoluse ergazomenon gia tous opoious dethen endiapherontai 
 einai arketoi autoi pou erkhontai exo apo ten porta tou kunokomeiou gia na aphesoun ena adespoto zoo pou brekan sto dromo kai ethelan na to prostatepsoun 
 ten ikanopoiese basikon koinonikon dikaiomaton diadekhtekan ta allepallela khtupemata tes laikes bases me te litoteta ten anergia kai te phtokheia ton pollon pou sumporeuontai me ten pronomiake metakheirise ton oligon 
 suria toulakhiston  nekroi kata te diarkeia diadeloseon pente atoma anamesa tous duo paidia elikias  kai  eton ekhasan ten zoe tous kai alloi treis traumatistekan sten gampagemp 
 einai kharakteristiko oti o agios nikolaos diathetei sunolika deka okto galazies semaies pososto rekor aphou kanenas allos demos s oloklere te khora den diathetei antistoikho arithmos 
 ta eisodemata perikoptontai me ten elastikopoiese ton ergasiakon skheseon ten katargese epidomaton sto demosio kai ten auxese tes parakrateses phorou apo ton ioulio 
 ten perasmene periodo prote omada anadeikhtheke e anagennese geras me deutere aute ton basilikon kai trite ton odussea elute 
 nomizo oti einai kairos na uposteiloume ten authadeia ten idioteleia an stoikheiodos sunergastoume kai prosanatolisoume epimona to koino pros ta ideode 
 ta leitourgika exoda tou epimorphotikou ergasteriou kaluptontai apo to somateio oi philoi tou khiotikou khoriou kai anerkhontai peripou stis  euro etesios 
 pio sugkekrimena kai sumphona me tis logistikes katastaseis o kuklos ergasion diamorphotheke stis  dis 
 dedomenou oti oi proboles ginontai ektos oikias kalo tha einai na epilexete ena asurmato sustema oste na apophugete ta polla kalodia 
  pheme tou khoriou ekane ton guro tou kosmou kai arketoi eponumoi ephoplistes skenothetes logotekhnes mousikoi khoreutes arkhisan na ten episkeptontai sustematika 
  periphereia omos anagnorizontas ten anagkaioteta tou anazetese luse kai proothese ten entaxe tou gia khremadotese apo tis orizonties draseis tou thesea 
  katerina ksekalou epistrephontas sta patria epistrateuse to demiourgiko meraki tes kai to kalo tes gousto 
 alloste to petit palais pou mas daneizei tous thesaurous tou khtisteke gia te diethne ekthese tou parisiou tou  e opoia eikhe os epikentro ten ar noubo te nea tekhne tes kalaisthesias 
  these tes amerikanikes pleuras einai oti e airbus europaike koinopraxia sten opoia summetekhoun e bretania e gallia e germania kai e ispania eunoetheke apo ten eniskhuse upsous  dis 
 mazi mas kai e mari 
 sumphona me auta exi stous deka neous tes khoras mas pou zoun akome me tous goneis tous epikalountai os kuria aitia ten oikonomike krise 
 stis nomarkhies stis opoies delosate oti thelete na exetasteite me ten aitese summetokhe sas ston diagonismo se autes tha proselthete kata ten emera tou diagonismou 
 aletheia poso duskolo einai na eisai proen podsphairistes tes ountineze tes latsio tes gioubentous kai tes ethnikes italias kai oloi na se ekhoun xekhasei kai na askholountai me ten arraboniastikia sou to sugkekrimeno marturio pernaei 
 anaphertheke ste sunekheia sten epistole pou katethese e kinese koinon dodekanesion pou proteinei na metapherthoun sto palio nosokomeio tmemata tou panepistemiou aigaiou 
 diethneis agores kai khrematisteria epistemonikes ereunes kai meletes teleutaies eideseis sten kategoria epistemetekhnologia  tourkia tha exoplisei ta skholeia tes me tampletes ekatommuria diamantia krubontai ste phloga tou keriou  ek 
 etsi tha skhematisoun kapoia apopse gia to bathmo tes etoimotetas tou paidiou tous na apodekhtei aute ten empeiria 
  anastopoulos anazeta ena paikte gia te these aute kai o piousel tha perasei apo to mikroskopio tou 
 arkhaioelleniko onoma ethele gia te mellousa baphtistera tou o elias psinakes kai oi koumparoi den tou khalasan khateri 
 oi giorgos barkares giorgos mammas kai ntinos triantaphullos kai phusika den apephugan kai ton peirasmo na kanoun kai tis dikes tous problepseis gia tis ekloges tes kuriakes 
  megalutere auxese se proslepseis parousiazetai stis touristikes periokhes opos oi kuklades ta dodekanesa ta ionia nesia e krete e khalkidike kai genikotera oi poleis pou ekhoun touristike anaptuxe 
 malista anephere ena prosphato paradeigma oti aphese tou opadous tou erakle na diamarturethoun khoris problema ekhontas malista ena pano  metron pou egraphe  
 bazete te gemise kai aradiazete apo pano ta karamelomena khrusomela 
 alla to psema ekhei konta podia 
 mikrotere apo oles etan e apergiake sugkentrose pou diorganose to nomarkhiako tmema tes  mprosta apo to demotiko theatro tes mutilenes 
 sunolika gia to trekhon etos prosdokontai enopoiemena kerde  ek 
 apantes delonoun oti tha palepsoun mekhri telous gia ta plei oph arkhes genomenes apo to paikhnidi tes kuriakes me ton panserraiko 
 parallela ta proionta tha proballontai se eidikes ektheseis kai ekdeloseis entos kai ektos elladas pou epises tha diorganosei e epitrope 
  diethnes mesos kharakterise megalo stokho ten prokrise stous omilous omos paradekhtheke oti to ergo tou panathenaikou tha einai polu duskolo kathos oi antipaloi proerkhontai apo megala protathlemata 
 analutika e delose tou giorgou malle gia logous epaggelmatikous alla kai ethikous den mporo pleon na prosphero tis uperesies mou sten omada pou toso polu agapesa apo to posto tou genikou arkhegou 
  parousia aute tou kosmou edose ten aphorme ston upopsephio nomarkhe dodekanesou basile  upselante na kanei logo gia bebaie nike tes dodekanesiakes enotikes kineses sto nomo anatrepontas katestemenes domes kai polukhresimopoiemena prosopa 
 sterizoume emprakta ton ethelontismo to nosokomeio tes beroias episkephteke to proi tes tetartes  oktobriou e upopsephia demarkhos  beroias kharoula ousoultzoglougeorgiade sunodeia dekadon upopsephion tes sumpoliteias 
 ektos pia ki an o idios anexartetos apotelesmatos tes bases arkhisei tis karatomeseis 
 to gegonos oti parola auta diabazontai stathera apo polu kosmo eikosi khronia tora den semainei mono kataxiose tou suggraphea tous alla einai ki ena paregoro semadi gia osous agapoun ten kale logotekhnia 
 den etan pantos ligoi oi episkeptes pou ethelan na enemerothoun skhetika me tis epiptoseis pou endekhomena mporei na uparxoun sten touristike kinese exaitias tou paralogou polemou pou sunekhizetai ste giougkoslabia 
 dustukhos den dunametha emeis oi ekhontes ten euthune gia to istoriko touto idruma pou uparkhei pro ex  aionon na kanomen kati perissotero gia te phulaxe tou 
 to ideologiko tes stigma oi protropes tes o logos pou tha arthrosei oi endokoinoniakes prostribes kai e elektrismene atmosphaira pou tha prokalesei os melos tes meionotetas tha me enokhlesoun polu 
  sphodre sugkrouse eikhe san apotelesma ton traumatismo ton duo piloton tous opoious entopisan andres tes purosbestikes uperesias kai ste sunekheia metapherthekan me souper pouma se nosokomeio 
 ousiastika xekiname apo to martio  aprilio kai stamatame sta tele noembriou 
 ston khairetismo tou o proedros tou  k soteres stamos eukharistese kai sunekhare therma tous athletes gia tis epidoseis pou petukhan ten agonistike khronia pou perase 
 me entelos kourasmeno uphos pairnei paramaskhala ton agio petro kai tou exegei ela pio konta na me mas akoun 
 to eipe alloste xekathara o k khiones   exetazei to endekhomeno 
  kathorismos tes seiras ekloges egine me mustike psephophoria arga khthes to bradu upo ten proedria tou neou proedrou k patrik kox kai ta apotelesmata anakoinothekan semera to proi 
 perusi to periptero tou panepistemiou episkephthekan peripou  atoma phoitetes kai goneis alla kai ekprosopoi etaireion aphou polla apo ta ekthemata einai proionta biotekhnologias kai prepei na proothethoun 
 suzeteseis egkardies epaphes mazi tous alla kai idees pou sas dinoun sas xemplokaroun 
 phainetai eualote kai neotere apo ten elikia tes 
  eite braduazei eite pheggei ta trokhaia sumptoma tes koinonikes arrostias mas diabasame kai akousame polla autes tis meres gia ta trokhaia atukhemata tis aities pou ta prokaloun kai ta metra gia ten antimetopise tous 
  gnome tha kuklophoresei ten alle pempte 
   kategorei to  gia laspologia kai tautise me ergolabika sumpheronta ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous   kategorei to  gia laspologia kai tautise me ergolabika sumpheronta alla kamia apantese gia to ethiko meros 
 na me khasoun te douleia tous oi anthropoi alla na allaxoun these douleuontas ekei pou khreiazontai kai leipoun upalleloi kai opoios de thelei exo apo ten paragka kai khoris apozemiose 
 paraphonia sto europaiko metopo kata tes endekhomenes anadiathroses e slobaka prothupourgos ibaka rantikoba e opoia delose ten deutera oti khoris ten anadiarthrose kamia boetheia pros ten ellada den tha einai eparkes 
 malista o teleutaios tha askei kathekonta dieuthunonta sumboulou os melos tou  kai tha ekhei kai dikaioma psephou 
 exoterika o  den diapherei idiaitera apo ton prokatokho tou ton perusino polu kalo  uiothetontas tis adres spartiatikes grammes tou deuterou to mauro mat khroma kai ton 
 enas atophios sumpages realismos diapotizei kathe selida mazi me enan xekhoristo glukopikro lurismo pou aiphnidiazei eukharista 
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese me ta phetina oskar n apekhoun ligotero apo duo ebdomades etoimasame ena aphieroma stis tainies pou ekhoun phugei me ta perissotera khrusa agalmatidia apo to kodak theater sto parelthon 
  lampros liabas upographei ten istorike mousike ereuna kathos kai te diaskeue ton keimenon 
 apophaseis tha parthoun pithanotata ten epomene ebdomada an kai kapoioi uposterizoun oti mekhri ten kuriake tha ekhei xekatharisei to thema 
 sunthete kai eugenike mute me orima aromata phragkostaphulou kai ntomatas se sunduasmo me marmelada damaskenou kanela zampon kai prasino piperi 
  demarkhos theorei oti den mporei na ekhei ten idia baruteta e apopse tou demou e tes nomarkhias me te these enos sullogou e enos polite 
 ekhontas ena megalo pleonektema se skhese me tous arkhaious ten tekhnologia pou antikathista tous doulous 
 ena tetoio programma tha mporouse na ulopoiethei apo to tameio parakatathekon kai daneion me eidike ruthmise dedomenou ton periorismon lambanontas upopse oti to trapezitiko sustema ekhei skhedon kleisei te roe parokhes daneion 
 oson aphora te dakhtulia tou mourinio sto mati tou bilanoba o ispanikos tupos problepei baria kampana gia ton portogalo tekhniko apo  eos kai  agonistikes sten exedra 
 problepseis gia to semerino apotelesma tha prepei na theorountai parakinduneumenes kai pio polu kinountai sto epipedo ton prosdokion 
 duskola tha xanaepanalephthei kati analogo 
  kheirourgos manoles mpantoubas upogrammizei protisto idaniko einai o sugkretismos e arrages psukhike pneumatike kai ethnike enotes ton kreton 
 to kastro tes lerou onomazetai kai kastro tes panagias e kastro tou panteliou 
 opos dieukrinise o k kappherer ste germania uparkhoun dunatotetes gia na eniskhuthei e reustoteta ton epikheireseon kathos eidikes ependutikes trapezes sta diaphora kratidia khoregoun reusto 
 tha aphene rodies pano mou 
  nomarkhes athoose liape kai souphlia enokhoi gia to aerodromio oi uperesies kai to  ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous  nomarkhes athoose liape kai souphlia 
 ste sunekheia ta mele tes apostoles metebesan sto agrotiko iatreio tou nesiou opou paredosan pharmakeutiko uliko prosphora tou pharmakeutikou sullogou kilkis kai tes etaireias menidi medica 
  aitese anagnorises plasmatikou khronou mporei na upoblethei opotedepote ostoso gnostes tou sustematos episemainoun oti den uparkhei logos na ginei mesa sto  ean den katokhuronetai dikaioma suntaxes sto trekhon etos 
 omoiostase einai e armonike isorropia somatike kai psukhike pou ekhei ena anthropino on 
 stekei semera timetika kai sumbolika ston peribolo tou ellenikou koinobouliou 
 to endiapheron me ten politike aute exelixe einai oti sundeetai me ten anadeixe ton skandalon se ena apo ta pio kairia zetemata tes politikes skenes kai se koruphaio stoikheio politikes diakheirises 
 ta oikonomika tes omadas einai se adiexodo kai mono mia gennaia auxese metokhikou kephalaiou mporei na sosei kapos ten katastase gia ton skhediasmo tes epomenes sezon 
 dustukhos tha paralaboume kai metaphorika kai kuriolektika kamene ge upogrammise o k khatzes kai katelexe legontas oti apo tis  septembriou to  pianei douleia gia ten anagennese tes khoras 
  giannes kontelles graphei gia to khthes o teles asproloupos gia to semera kai e eustratia asomatianou gia to khthes kai to semera 
 to anoixiatiko touto manitari se ola ta bouna to gnorizoun ton tumphresto ten kalliakouda te khelidona kai sta oreina tes eurutanias opou to lene arnaki e kokoretsi 
  smari  khrestos papagiannakes gen 
 kai etan anamenomeno na pei auto aphou oi epembaseis den proanaggellontai kai epises gia pollous allous logous den endeiknuntai 
 zestainoume se katsarola to elaiolado sotaroume to kremmudi gia  lepto 
 oi magkrempinoi katephthasan sta khronia tou  eno to  tous diadekhthekan oi asiates kai oi aphrikanoi 
 kai edo omos iskhuoun oi idies epiphulaxeis kai ta idia enallaktika senaria pou ekphrasame gia ton geniko deikte

  idios malista prin phugei zetese na prospheroun osoi to epithumoun anti gia stephani oikonomike eniskhuse sto sullogo me to nou panta sto egkheirema pou eikhe xekinesei 
 epikheirematias anoikhton orizonton  protos oinopoios pou kanei pragmatikoteta to oneiro na apoktesei e ellada krasia onomasias proeleuses na gemisei e ellenike upaithros me mikrous paragogous krasion 
 telos axizei na anapheroume oti e dioikese tes omadas anakoinose te luse sunergasias tes toso me ton oriol lothano oso kai me ton nteibintas tsesnaouskis 
 uposterizei analuse  eno o khronos zoes tou panel upologizetai oti einai  ores e allios peripou  khronia gia mia mese khrese toulakhiston diplasios apo auton mias  
  lle omada ste these tou ophh  tha ta eikhe paratesei 
 sumphona me ten k roe zegkidou e nomike uperesia tes  meta apo skhetike erotese tou apeirou topou apantese pos e khoregese daneion se mia nomarkhia epitrepetai mono gia apoplerome mellontikon ergon kai okhi gia erga pou ekhoun ede ginei 
 kati tetoio to ekhoun episemanei idiaitera stelekhe tes ekpaideuses alla kai sullogoi goneon blepontas tis elleipseis ton skholeion 
 akome den einai gnosto to an tha parastei sten en logo sunantese gia logariasmo tou aiolikou o proedros tes omadas giannes phlorides ostoso o idios se delose tou sto sportlesvos 
 deutera  maiou    islandikos ephialtes pou akousei sto onoma gkrimsboten xupnese meta apo  khronia kai apeilei na tinaxei ston aera tis enaeries sugkoinonies sten europe 
 emeis os epaggelmatike taxe me terasties leitourgikes upokhreoseis den mporoume na akolouthesoume aute ten khamele timologiake politike pou thigei tis epikheireseis mas 
 mporei kai nea anethika 
 kai den phtanei pou erkhontai khoria alla den mpainoun kan ston kopo na gnoristoun  gia paikhnidi kai phlert anamesa tous oute logos 
 aute einai e apopse sten opoia phainetai na entassetai ki to  
 ego phorousa to aplo raso tou monakhou 
  elini demoutsos ekhei gennethei stis  iouniou  ste louznia tes albanias kai xekinese ten podosphairike tou kariera apo ton elusiako  ston opoio paremeine mekhri kai to  
 parallela zetesan enemerose pano se themata koinonikes politikes dedomenou oti theloun na anaptuxoun antistoikhes draseis sto demo tous 
  sphage se trapezes kai demosio erkhetai kataigida apoluseon kai perikopon misthon kai epidomaton anadromika apo  iouliou 
 ton martio tou  antiprosopeia tou episkeptetai panegurika ten proteuousa tes agkolezikes  diekdikontas daphnes gia ten katallele ekpaideuse kai plerophorese tes koines gnomes ton  pou epetrepse ton anempodisto exoplismo tes 
 kathe prospatheia diaphoropoieses basizetai ston katakermatismo tes agoras se target groups kai sten allage tes eikonas tes etairias e ton proionton me te boetheia tou marketing kai tes diaphemises 
 me dinete dekara tsakiste stis esoterikes philonikies sto komma sas 
 den einai e kupros pou krinetai stis  dekembriou 
  kathos kai tis skhetikes ektheseis tou dioiketikou sumbouliou kai tou orkotou elegkte  logiste gia te sugkekrimene khrese 
 kategoria arthrou khrematisterio me apoleies anoixe ten prote ebdomada tou augoustou e khrematisteriake agora para to thetiko anoigma os apotelesma tou anodikou klimatos stis diethneis agores pou prokalese e sumphonia gia to khreos stis  
 apo pantou o  phainetai pos pere psephous 
 sto metaxu o ernesto balberde eipe pos den thelei oi peiraiotes na dosoun philika mats me adunames omades opos eikhan kanei prin apo duo khronia eikhame kanei duo philika paikhnidia sto zeephelnt 
 eimai opos kai polloi alloi anesukhos gia ten exelixe sten europe kai to euro tonizei se delose tou sten bild kanontas logo gia phantasioseis

 sunekhizetai aptoeto to trafficing para ta osa legontai se athena kai bruxelles

 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai tha te doume pithanotata ton ianouario epeita apo arketes anaboles sto lansarisma tes 
 arkouse graphei o philip mure na topothetesei o anthropos tous apodiopompaious tragous tou ton khitler kai ton stalin sto parelthon aphairontas etsi apo to paron tou kathe esoterike apeile kathe dike tou kai mono dike tou zone skias 
 ede apo ten prote stigme ekhoume enemerosei to upourgeio agrotikes anaptuxes gia ta problemata diexagoges tou programmatos tes dakoktonias tonizontas ten anagke idiaiteres antimetopises tou dakou sten krete logo ton idiaiteron klimatologikon sunthekon 
  genikos deiktes timon ekleise stis  monades semeionontas anodo se pososto  
 auto iskhuei stis perissoteres khores 
 as kanoume kati epitelous 
  olumpionikes kai pagkosmia protathletria tes kopelasias amesos meta te nea tes epitukhia milese ston    kai ten ekpompe sportathletes gia tis duskolies pou antimetopise kai tous epomenous stokhous tes 
 akome kai an den mas endiapherei prosopika an noiothoume oti to politiko sustema einai agkulomeno einai xeno pros emas pros te philosophia mas te stase zoes mas ten koultoura mas 
 tha perimene malista kaneis pos e epomene mera meta ten exodo tes apo ton  emeron egkleismo tes se kat oikon periorismo tha ten ebriske toulakhiston skeptomene se oti aphora ten kariera tes 
 gi auto apophasisa na sunekhiso aphilokerdos kai na brisko luseis sta oikonomika themata pou proekuptan 
  stis exedres tou gepedou tou toreon boreia tou mexikou otan sto  tou agona santos  monarkas akoustekan xaphnika purobolismoi kai o kosmos entromos kruphteke kato apo ta kathismata gia na prophulakhthei 
 einai oneiro na katharisei auto to pragma thumamai ena peristatiko to  otan emoun proedros tes  kai enas anthropos pou einai polu 
 tautokhrona ependuoun sten anaptuxe neon katastematon se periokhes pou den ekhoun parousia me emphase sten eparkhia 
  k bounatsos anephere malista oti tha kratethoun oi duo ores apo to mistho oson adikaiologetos apousiazan apo te these tous 
 eidikotera semeionetai pos  eggegrammenoi anergoi delosan oti den anazetoun ergasia 
 einai problemata toulakhiston  giati oudeis askholetheke sobara me auta sten periokhe mas 
 oi arithmoi ta skhemata oi idiotetes alla kai oi nees idees einai ta ulika tou oikodomematos tou eukleide 
 se prote phase ektimetheke oti apaiteitai enemerose gia to ti einai aute e protoboulia poioi einai oi skopoi kai oi stokhoi tes 
  neoteros ek ton sullephthenton einai enas  o opoios eikhe analabei na pragmatopoiei test dieisduses na elegkhei delade tis pragmatikes pithanotetes epitukhous ekteleses ton skhediazomenon elektronikon epitheseon 
 ton brekame ekei sten plateia me tis mouries sten taberna tou 
 epipleon einai polu pithano na doume megales anatropes sto programma kathos to mpakhalo tou  aphenei pollous neous agrotes khoris tis diathesimes ektaseis 
  epistole sunekhizei os exes dioti dustukhos auto kaloumaste na uperetesoume tora 
  olumpiakos den semainei ekhei paratesei teleios ten upothese estrada ton opoio tha ethele o balberde 
 ste sunekheia boethame tous goneis me sumbouleutike uposteriktike akoma kai psukhotherapeia gia ole  ka koilade episemainei oti to psemma to uperboliko psemma me ten pathologike ekphrase pou mporei na balei sto paidi ten tampela tou pseute 
 sten idia seira kuklophoroun ta biblia ta zoa tou agroktematos ta ploiata zoa tou dasousta mustika tou nerouta zoa tes sabanasta dentra tou kepou zesto kruo 
 to pos tha sugkrotethoun oi periphereiakes autodioikeseis kai na oi semerines periphereies tha meinoun os ekhoun einai epises anoikhto thema 
  eikhame episemanei ki emeis apo polu noris alla na pou to episemainoun kai alloi gia tou logou to alethes 
 oi podelates kai oi podelatisses ekanan to guro tes poles kai eginan aisthetoi apo tous odegous pou brethekan sto dromo tous 
  belgos tekhnikos paredose ston steno sunergate tou giorgou khristobasile mia lista me paiktes pou o idios ekhei entopisei apo ten agora tes patridas tou kai theorei pos mporei na antapexelthoun stis apaiteseis tou agiax tes epeirou 
 kharakterise lathos tes tourkias na antimetopizei ten prooptike aute me phobo kai apeiles 
 delade opos elege o agglos istorikos alan teilor euathe apo ta lathe tou parelthontos pos na kanei nea lathe 
  makes khabos tha dosei repo ten kuriake eno oi paiktes tha proponethoun kanonika semera emera ethnikes epeteiou kai aurio stis  to proi stis athletikes egkatastaseis tou giorgou lola ste sourote 
 sto metaxu semera ste mia to mesemeri sto sunedriako kentro tes politeias sto phrontzo tha ginei e parousiase ton upopsephion bouleuton tou kinematos sto nomo ioanninon 
  antones triphulles apo ta nea    prepei na prokhoresei se rizospastikes kineseis 
 khariste stous philous e se autous pou stokheuete na kanete philous ta pio aromatika ta pio prototupa ta pio ophelima dora pou peran pote 
  aithousa sunedrion tou omereiou gemise kata te diarkeia tes sunedriases tou nomarkhiakou sumbouliou apodeiknuontas an me ti allo oti oso odeuoume pros tis ekloges uparkhei mia kalutere suspeirose 
 prosthese pos ta skhedia tes italias gia te phorologike metarruthmise sterountai exeidikeuses kai leptomereion

 sumphona me to neo nomo  
 epomenos me tous metsobites ekho ariste skhese kai kathe phora pou episkeptomai to metsobo to phkharistiemai idiaitera esto ki an ta teleutaia duomise khronia trabexa tes psukhes mou ton tarakho 
 apo ekeine te stigme kaneis bebaia den emathe ti apegine 
 parapleures apoleies pou den tha eprepe na sumbainoun kathos ta koina delphinia den apoteloun problema gia ton anthropo e ten paraktia alieia kai protimoun sunethos ta bathia nera makria apo tis aktes 
 dikaie moirasia stis serres me ton gepedoukho panserraiko na anadeiknuetai isopalos  kontra ston panionio se agona pou egine sto plaisio tes  agonistikes tou protathlematos tes souper ligka 
 sto geitoniko torno ekhoun sematodotethei epta monopatia pou 
 gia tis periokhes pou parousiazoun idiaiterotetes oson aphora sto idioktesiako kathestos tous p 
 semera omos ta pragmata ekhoun allaxei o kosmos ekhei gurisei ten plate sto palio 
 einai prodelo oti o erntogan meta kai tis ekloges tes  iouniou ekhei eniskhuthei 
 kai prospathousan kurios me ta kharismata ton prosopon tous na kanoun ton potho pio upokeimeniko pio prosopiko kai monimo 
 se merikes megales epikheireseis auta ta aula stoikheia kaluptoun akome kai to  tes phemes tous 
 arnetike paramenei e biomekhanike paragoge sten eurozone surriknotheke gia trito sunekhomeno mena ton iounio e biomekhanike paragoge sten eurozone ex aitias tes ormetikes koursas tou petrelaiou pou anebase tis times se nea epipedarekor 
 astunomikoi tes  proetoimazontai gia apostole 
 otan pega sto programma sten athena ta pio polla paidia me rotousan ti paizetai me ta tsirota 
 to tameio tha einai koino gia ola ta proionta 
 sten komotene o palios nomarkhes zeses mpekos kai tora makhomenos dikegoros 
 kai bebaia einai na aporei kaneis me tis epiloges mas 
 oraia idea gia ten epomene episkepse mas ste samo 
 oi zographies eikhan ektethei sto  antiratsistiko phestibal 
  porneia einai paranome sto iran mia khora pou kubernatai me to gramma tou islamikou nomou saria 
 tora analambanei to fkh te duskole apostole na demiourgesei ena progephuroma gia ten infiniti sten europaike agora stokheuontas kurios stous dunamei pelates ton polutelon spor  opos einai e rorsche cayenne kai e   
 ekhoume omos ten upokhreose na men parablepsoume ten prokheiroteta sten opoia odegese ten kubernese to sunekhes agkhos tes na apodeixei oti den uparkhei tromokratia 
 kinetopoieseis pragmatopoiethekan kai sta nesia tou ioniou 
 ean emastan ston omilo tes kroatias tha eikhame kalutere tukhe 
 eulogo to erotema pos kai den emeine sten amerike opou o kinematographos apotelei te baria biomekhania 
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese paramenei stratiotes stis taxeis tes  ten apophase tou na apokhoresei apo ten energo politike zoe gnostopoiese ston prothupourgo o uphupourgos esoterikon demosias dioikeses k apokentroses apostolos andreoulakos 
 etan ede exairetikos nomikos apo oso malista gnorizo diakritheke stis kratikes exetaseis kai tha mporouse na ginei lampros dikegoros 
 bebaia to kata matthaion euaggelio tou pazolini den opheilei ten antokhe tou mono sten istorike politike katagoge ton problematismon tou 
 tha suzetesoume gia antallage paketou metokhon me tetoio tropo oste kai oi duo etairies na men kinduneusoun apo opoiondepote pou tha ethele na paixei se baros mas 
 konta s autes tis omades kai o poseidonas pou phainetai na anakamptei kathos kerdise kai ton opham me  
   proedros tou sunetairismou mantamadou kai melos tou  tou panagiotes stamates mas eipe ektimo oti prothese tes kuberneses einai na prokhoresei se biaies epiloges 
    sugkhoneuse enopoiese kai anadiorganose ton phoreon organismos apaskholeses ergatikou dunamikou  
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese istorike eukairia didetai me to nomoskhedio kallikrates gia ten egkatastase tes edras tes periphereias  aigaiou ste rodo 
  demos limnes plastera me edra to morphobouni apoteloumenos apo tous demous a nebropoles agraphon kai b plastera oi opoioi katargountai 
 apo kei na xekinesei loipon o giorgos kai oloi tha ton akolouthesoume 
  diapseuse ton uperpatrioton molis  metanastes kai omogeneis pou zoun ki ergazontai sto nomo ioanninon tha mpoun gia prote phora sto paraban gia na psephisoun stis autodioiketikes ekloges tou noembriou 
  ntounta apo to xekinema tou agona edose egetiko rolo ston milos teontosits 
 to skhop exetase ek neou to zetema kai me apophase tou idiou os nomarkhe ioanninon egkritheke e leitourgia tou prateriou alla me tous idious orous delade me dasmous pou iskhuoun gia ola ta prateria pou leitourgoun sten ellenike epikrateia 
 ti sas ekane na ginete ethopoios te rotame 
 tha sunantethoun kai pos tha antidrasoun tha poun kalemera kai ola auta meta tis baries kategories pou ekhoun antallaxei eite oi idioi eite ta stelekhe tous 
 kategoria arthrou khrematisterio sunedriase asanser se tziro times psukhologia kai prosdokies opou oi diarroes kai ta proskhedia apo tis bruxelles pou eblepan to phos tes demosiotetas diamorphonan klima kai diatheseis 
 mas perimenei pantos ena duskolo protathlema kai ola ta paikhnidia tha einai duskola aphou polles omades ekhoun eniskhuthei 
 trite  augoustou   graphei manoles lagoutares  marinos orphanos kai e megalutere metagraphe olon ton epokhon gia to lesbiako mas podosphairo einai gegonos 
 xthes o periphereiarkhes basiles balasopoulos anakoinose stous demarkhous ta okhemata pou o kathe demos tha mporei na parei kai na khresimopoiesei 
 etsi tha to eukharistethoume oloi kai tha apallagoume apo to agkhos na theloume na eimaste me tous euporous 
 eimai  kai eimai  eton tha mporousa na paro meros ston diagonismo ton eidikon phrouron kai an ekho kapoio ophelos sten elikia epeide eimai ethelontes pentaetous uperesias 
 oi prooptikes theloun to philodoxo project na olokleronetai suntoma me te demiourgia khorou ektheseon kai sunaulion mikron emporikon katastematon ki enos epipleon estiatoriou 
 ouos den te gnorisa den prolaba na te do 
 tragoudontas sephere kai kabaphe alla kai elute poludoure  anagnostake gkana oi kallitekhnes upodekhontai to koino ste sunaulia pou diorganonei o sundesmos aiguptioton ellados 
 einai kharakteristiko oti apo to mistho tou genikou dieuthunte tou  exartatai kai to upsos tes amoibes ton upoloipon dieuthunton tou aerodromiou oi opoioi anerkhontai se   
 ten apantese sto poioi einai autoi den einai e dike mou armodioteta na to po 
  psephous eno apeikhan  metokhes psephon 
 oi endiapheromenoi prepei na upobaloun  dokimio eos  lexeis epilegontas  apo ta  themata pou uparkhoun 
 oi kk mikhelakes kai tasoulas upobathmizan ten ole katastase epimenontas oti oi tomearkhes den askesan kritike sten egesia tes  
 oi ekdeloseis koruphonontai anemera tes thliberes epeteiou tou olokautomatos tou marturikou khoriou 
 uparkhoun para polla kala mouseia 
 amphoreis kuklophoroun apo kheri se kheri mazi me diaphora kopsidia 
 einai aphonos o arkhiepiskopos sumplerose 
 kseroun oi me proskeimenoi demarkhoi sto khoro mas kathos kai oi proskeimenoi bebaia oti to programma theseas edose diplasious porous apo to antistoikho  kai eukharistoun demosios ton periphereiarkhe gia ten suneisphora tou 
 oi polites se pososto  theoroun oti o prothupourgos giorgos papandreou kineitai ste soste kateuthunse gia na bgei e khora apo ten krise sumphona me te demoskopese tes  gia to proto thema 
 kai osoi ek ton katekhonton theseis kai axiomata den mporoun na sugkhronistoun na parakhoresoun te these tous se neoterous 
 monadike odos e phuge me ten astunomia kai ton pragmatiko dolophono enan misthophoro ton eidikon dunameonsto katopi tou 
 mpeka sto amartolo kat auton diadiktuo na do ti graphei gia to prophil tou 
 ta lionoume prosektika kai aphou ta perasoume apo psilo souroteri ta bazoume sto siphoni 
 trite  augoustou    klephtes kai oi uperaspistes tou  men ermeneuontas tous kanones tes nomo kratouses politeias o de antimetopizontas tous idious kanones apo ten pleura tes ekklesiastikes dikaiosunes se sunduasmo me tous ierous kanones 
 me ton tropo auto oi adistaktoi kakopoioi thelesan na ton timoresoun gia ten paranome skhese pou diaterouse me pantremene gunaika 
 teinete to auti n akousete tous ekhous tes nukhtas tes uouruoureta kai kelarusuata te lura tou apollona kai ten kithara tou kantadorou 
 an den eksugkhronistoun den tha ekhoume kamia allage 
 entassetai de sten genikotere philosophia gia uperesies kai proionta epeirotika pou kharakterizontai apo upsele poioteta kai epeirotike tautoteta 
 sta skhedon  khronia leitourgias tou idrumatos ekatontades koritsia pou tha eikhan katalexei logo ton kakon oikogeneiakon sunthekon tous sto dromo kai ten kathe eidous ekmetalleuse megalosan me asphaleia sten estia 
 semera tha xekinesoun kai oi protes ektimeseis gia tis zemies aphou ekhoun kaei khiliades elaiodentra kalliergeies me diaphora dentra poimniostasia me zoa kai melissia 
 parallela o mesaionas tha pherei ton sunduasmo tou komikou me to tromaktiko to gkrotesko sto kentro tes koultouras tou 
 se auto boethese to gegonos oti ekho polles summetokhes sten kerkura 
       phainetai pos o olumpiakos  prepei na dekhthei protos gkol gia na parei mprosta e mekhane tou 
 libertade einai e nea aphixe pou prosphata mpeke sten platphorma ton epoque eotels 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai  epanemphanise tes olivetti ston khoro ton polumekhanematon sten ellenike agora einai mia apo tis pio eukharistes exelixeis ton teleutaion eton 
 egkataleipo to koinoboulio an kai einai baria euthune na eimai bouleutes autes tes poles kai malista protos se staurous protimeses me te  akribos giati thelo na prosphero se aute ten pole me oles mou tis dunameis 
 tou phote aggoule ton opoio para ta khronia pou perasan thumomaste panta me agape 
  prin xekinesoume gia psonia prepei na programmatisoume tis agores mas sumphona me tis pragmatikes mas anagkes 
  belgos tha perasei kai nea test prokeimenou o giannes samaras na skhematisei pio olokleromene gnome 
 summeteikhan perissotera apo  atoma me pano tumpana kai palaistiniakes semaies 
 den xeroume an kapote uparxei ena tetoio sustema 
  tha iskhuristo te diakhronike ekmetalleuse ton ierarkhon se baros ton aplon khristianon mesa apo tis prosphores ton opoion apoktetheke aute e periousia 
  prothupourgos tonise ten upsiste semasia tes epharmoges ton nomon kai okhi aplos tes psephises tous oste na apokatastathei e empistosune ton politon stous thesmous 
  epomenos pou einai e upokhreotikoteta ton sunergasion  matthaiakes upokhreotikoteta me ten ennoia an ektimethei oti enas demos den mporei monos tou na askesei kapoies apo tis armodiotetes pou problepei e nomothesia 
 koimountai mprosta sto magazi me ten mpoukala to poto sto kheri 
  mulonogiannes   neoellenike logotekhnia sta teleutaia eikosi khronia makedonikes   et 
 kai mia kai aresoun kai se mas e mousike kai o khoros tha apantesoume sto mousikologo tes kentrikes exousias pou mas apeilei ton k laliote delade me 
 gia emas etan to proto diethnes tournoua me idiaitera megalo antagonismo 
 mosialos kai dieukrinise oti e kubernese den thelei na epibalei sugkekrimene atzenta alla ola ta zetemata einai anoikhta kai prepei na suzetethoun se anoikhtes koinobouleutikes diadikasies 
 sigoura pantos tous krataei se mia skertsozike egregorse 
 ste mia aithousa tou anakainismenou kteriakou sugkrotematos ekhei metapherthei kai stegazetai ede to ekklesiastiko mouseio kourounion me ta erga tou megalou buzantinou agiographou giorgou panagiotake 
 dustukhos tosa khronia meta suneidetopoio oti sten ellada den allaxe tipota 
 bebaia ektimeseis kanane giati oute o leuteres einai se these na gnorizei to ti telika tha apophasisthei stou maximou 
 prepei loipon na sas po oti aprilio  maio gia paradeigma to  ton mikron epikheireseon poulane me  drakhmes te dianuktereuse oti akribos iskhuei ton septembre kai ton oktobre 
  ergoteles einai kalutere omada ki ekhei tis dunatotetes na parei ton titlo 
 tha phanei an thelete na parameinoun 
 apo ten koruphe tou tha apolausete ten ekplektike thea 
   ti allo niothete oti sas eniskhuei sten prospatheia sas ma e oikogeneia mou o suzugos mou kai oi philoi 
  khoris skhedio kai programmatismo dianoixe tes touristikes diodou apo kai pros boulgaria mono arnetika ekhei epipherei 
 orismos nomikou ekprosopou gia ten exetase agoges tou k athanasiou tatse kata ten proen  kerkuras 
 neonakes alla oloi sumphonesan oti apophaseis tha lephthoun meta to paskhamallon tha proegethei to kleisimo tes thessalonikes 
 to gegonos auto prokalei megale anesukhia se ola ta tmemata tes israelines politikes taxes 
 ten paraskeue  maiou  meta to kleisimo ton ergasion tou kha ora  tha anakoinosei e emporike trapeza ta oikonomika apotelesmata tou protou trimenou  
 pisteuo oti an oloi anagnorizoume to rolo tou kathenos ta oria kai tis dunatotetes tou tote mporoume na sunergasthoume kai arketa pragmata na apopheukhthoun e kai na leitourgesoume kalutera 
 tetarte  augoustou     suzeta to programma tou ektenes suzetese gia to programma tou  kai ten eklogike tou diakeruxe en opsei ton euroeklogon egine te deutera to bradu se aithousa xenodokheiou ste mutilene 
 telos ekkremei o orismos sumbouliou gia te diakheirise tes marinas kathos kai gia ten astike etaireia pou tha demiourgesei o demos 
 mesa apo aute te glaphure kai epistemonika steree melete o anagnostes anakaluptei poso sukhna e koinonia epistrateuei to parelthon kai ten istoria gia na exuperetesei to paron kai na skhediasei to mellon

 oson aphora te sugkrotese se soma aute tha ginei ten alle ebdomada khoris omos na ekhei oristei akoma e akribes emeromenia 
 oi praktikes autes einai katakritees ap olous kai de sunadoun me ten koinonike euaisthesia pou tha prepei na deikhnei o kathe demos pros tous polites tou

 den thelo na po polla tha po mono osa niotho

  plateia kapodistriou sta philiatra kai to phlorentianes tekhnotropias sintribani tou  einai kharakteristiko oti e paralia ailagoudes sten kuparissia brabeuetai kathe khrono me te galazia semaia 
 apo to semerino agona tha apousiasoun kai oi traumaties sakabeles taousianes uparkhei pithanoteta na einai etoimos ten kuriake o argentes pou brisketai sten athena kai o mamatzakes o opoios omos suntoma tha epanelthei sten omada 
 sta idia naupegeia kataskeuazontai alla  uperpolutele epibatega okhematagoga adelpha ploia 
 anapheromenos sta problemata emporiou kai timon tes staphidas o upeuthunos agrotikou tomea tes  erakleiou semeiose oti o kanonismos kathe khrono anaprosarmozetai pros to kheirotero 
 oi ermeneutes einai enas sunduasmos tou kast apo to  kai to pouthena ki ekhoun prostethei exi kainourgioi sunergates 
 sugkekrimena o tekhnikos tes enoses timoretheke me  agonistikes apokleismo kai  euro khrematiko prostimo e omada gia exubrise ste diaitete kaskantere tou sundesmou athenon meta te lexe me ton atrometo stis  dekembriou sto gepedo tou rente

 kurios oi kopeles alla kai t agoria pheugoun apo to khorio thelontas na zesoun diaphoretika apo tous anthropous ton palaioteron geneon thelontas na paroun sta kheria tous te zoe tous kai n akolouthesoun mia diaphoretike poreia 
 an ulopoiethei to skhedio uparkhei prooptike na erkhontai  ekat 
 ekei skhediases kai to kainourgio sou estiatorio prota ap ola apophasisa oti thelo ena khoro gia ta gluka mou 
  me leptomereies skhetika me to periekhomeno tou 
 oi anthropoi tes ekklesias pou diatuponoun enan sugkrotemeno zoophiliko logo apoteloun ameletees exaireseis kai oi theseis tous katadikazontai os airetikes 
  anthropos bretheke xaphnika apenanti me tous ergazomenous sto demo oi opoioi zetousan na mathoun pote tha plerothoun khoris na xerei ti na tous apantesei 
 ki o sesk omos gia ton opoion eikazei men kaneis pos tha nai lutrose e metabase ap to tempopremiersip sto tempoprimera den pauei na koubala ap to londino ste barkelone antistoikha problemata 
 den thelo na po pos prospathoun na mas kanoun kako 
 toutestin arkhisan oi katalepseis sta skholeia 
   mia ebdomada meta otan diapistose oti den tha pleronotan kai oti den mporouse na phugei enemerose telephonika sten athena kapoio suggene tes kai ekeinos erthe sto hrakleio gia na ten parei piso 
 pagonoun oi diadikasies gia te metastegase ton uperesion tou teloneiou kai ten katedaphise tou kteriou opou stegazetai mekhri semera me skopo ten anadeixe tou kastrou 
 sto  anatrope tou brauentuzale uesa sten periokhe kai dinetai penalti 
 ma les mesa sta gerateia tous gnorizan oti se keina ta mere pou basileuei e anekheia kuriarkhei kamia phora e adike kai e asote phantasia 
  metapoiese ste khora skototheke  eipe kharakteristika o k thomaides  epeide pote den prosanatolistheke sto exoteriko 
 telos sta senaria prooron eklogon bazei o prothupourgos xekatharizontas oti oi polites theloun na doun allages kai okhi ekloges 
 editors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia mathainoume oti tou khronou e melina kana mallon tha emphanizetai me ton demetre metropano kai e elene tsaligopoulou me ton paskhale terze 
 me upomone kai autosugkratese 
 thelese na aphougkrastei auto pou aisthanetai kai pos antimetopizei ten ole katastase meta apo ten apophase tes epitropes epheseon 
 te thelo pio autonome 
 alla e ousia einai mia kai te diakrinoume semera katharotera ap o ti ten epokhe pou graphtekan ta duo dokimia o khitler den teleiose me ton khitler 
 axio prosokhes einai kai to entheto poluselido bibliaraki pou sunodeuei ten ole douleia me to plousio kai spanio photographiko uliko 
 parateretheke delade meiose kata   ston arithmo ton oikodomikon adeion kata  sten epiphaneia kai kata  ston ogko se skhese me ten antistoikhe periodo iouliou   iouniou  
 ta omologa auta sumphona me to demosieuma tha diokheteutoun ste sunekheia apo ten ellenike kubernese stis trapezes oi opoies tha mporoun na ta katathesoun os eggueseis gia te khrematodotese tous apo ten  
 opos diapistotheke sto ploiario den uperkhan sostika mesa eno ta kausima tou eikhan skhedon exantlethei 
 to septebrio e psephise tou mnemoniou  apo te germanike boule 
 sten eisagoge tou o pateras ton ellenon egklematologon konstantinos gardikas krata apostaseis apo ton mathete tou kai katalegei oti prepei na apokrousomen diarreden ten eis ten emeteran nomothesian eisagogen tes poines tes mastigoseos 
 ta kommata ton mazon kai ta megala sundikata khanoun te duname tous den kataphernoun pia na kinetopoiesoun kai stoikheiode themata 
 enas tritos egrapse oti ekanan kai oi duo apokhe 
 stous allous agones epikratesan aneta ta phabori ophe   sakhsull 
 pantos khthes den elexe e prothesmia katatheses dikaiologetikon opos eikhe anakoinosei to upourgeio 
 kata tes arkhes psephise o  eno ta duo kommata tes aristeras  kai  delosan aplos paron 
  luse gia auten einai e epistrophe sto ethniko tes nomisma

 sugkekrimena prokeitai gia thessalonike kai khalkidike larisa magnesia kerkura leukada ithake alla kai kephallonia 
 emeis den prokeitai na dekhtoume auto to pragma dioti epese e omada okhi me agonistika alla me politika kriteria

 einai autoi pou kinduneuoun na meinoun khoris nero semeionetai kharakteristika kai e parataxe philiou kalei te dioikese tes epikheireses na ruthmisei amesa to khreos oste na men pherei tous gianniotes antimetopous me ena terastio problema

 boetheia gia tous serbous apo ten  mastampa tou  trophima alla kai alla eide protes anagkes sugkentronoun ta mele tes  mastampa tou
