 mesa apo tis eisegeseis luthekan apories ki eginan nees protaseis beltioses ton sunthekon kai ton problematon pou sten praxe antimetopizontai 
 to leophoreio ektelouse to dromologio orestiada  thessalonike kai epebainan se auto  atoma 
 me te glossoplastike tou ikanoteta anakratei kai sozei apo ton aphanismo ametretes lexeis pou truga apo tous anthropous tou emiastikou tou agrotikou kai tou poimenikou khorou 
 oi uponoies autes eniskhuontai apo ten idia skhedon antimetopise pou ekhei e   giannina me alles megales omades ton superleague pou timorethekan sto idio diastema p 
 aute te stigme diamenoun ekei eikosi epta paidia apo to aphganistan kai to pakistan kai kapoia ekhoun mathei ede ellenika 
 diaphono me oti o proedros tes demokratias prepei na ekhei ousiastikes armodiotetes 
 telika monomakhei me ton akhillea kai ste phobere sugkrouse pou akolouthei e penthesileia skotonetai 
  armonia ton khromatikon suntheseon kai e sobare eikastike anazetese tou kathe kallitekhne pou lambanei meros sunuphasmene me to talento prospherei to kalutero dunato apotelesma gia to theate 
 stis  apopse tha telesthei sten ekklesia tes phaneromenes ste leukosia mnemosuno pesonton kai tha anapemphthei deese gia diakribose tes tukhes ton agnooumenon kai epistrophe ton prosphugon stis patrogonikes tous esties 
 mia khara kathetai phetos e argia kollas mia emera adeia e kai perissoteres kai kaneis mini diakopes 
 proekhei e nike 
 parallela me ten ereuna tou kai se sunergasia me ten ornithologike ginetai suntonistes europaikou programmatos lifephuse gia te diaterese kai diakheirise tes limnothalassas 
 den etan stokhos e epitropeia kai e epiterese kai meso auton e pleres exasphalise ton katakhrestikon oso kai lestrikon dikaiomaton ton daneiston mas 
 to proto dekaemero tou septembriou de beltiose ten katastase aphou oi ellenes emporoi elthan antimetopoi me adeia tameia kai auxemena leitourgika exoda 
 ten ekplexe tes agonistikes ekane o panserraikos pou epikratese me  tou panathenaikou kai edeixe pos saphestata phetos eikhe tis dunatotetes gia kati kalutero 
 perikhuste me te saltsa ta philetakia kai serbirete 
 oi agapemenoi eroes tou lake lazopoulou erkhontai apo to khthes gia na milesoun sto semera pio epikairoi apo pote 
 diakritike poluteleia kai sugkhrono lito periballon me khrese phusikon ulikon pou denoun apsoga me tis ntizainates pinelies 
 as stamatesei pia e karamela oti gia to khreos euthunetai e  eipe o k mikhelakes kai zetese dieukriniseis apo ton kubernetiko ekprosopo skhetika me ten prokhthesine delose tou oti e prospatheia pou ginetai den ekhei egguemena apotelesmata 
 ti allo na zetesei kaneis leuke aphrikane e gkorntimer megalomene konta sto giokhanesmpourgk ekhei zesei ten apoxenose ton ratsismo kai ten upobathmise tes phuses kharin tes anaptuxes kai ten proodou 
  ntmitri mentbienteph einai o protos rosos proedros pou episkeptetai episemos te damasko apo ten epokhe tes oktobrianes epanastases 
 oso gia tous upoloipous eleutherous den uparkhei pros to paron kamia exelixe 
  apergia ekhei os aikhme tou doratos te suzetese sten boule gia ten katargese tou periorismou    pou dinei te dunatoteta se epikheirematies pou den ekhoun ptukhio odontiatrikes na katekhoun ten pleiopsephia ton metokhon mias iatrikes epikheireses 
 apokhorese apo to sugkekrimeno axioma to dekembre tou  opote kai dioristeke genikos grammateas tou  
  monadon pou kratese ta duo proegoumena ptotika kumata tou  kai tou  ste semerine dome tes ptoses tou genikou deikte den semainei polla pragmata 
 sto telos tou programmatos epibrabeuetai toso e prospatheia oso kai e summetokhe olon ton paidion kai tous prospherontai anamnestika diplomata 
  sto paidiko tournoua tou  me megalo nikete ton  oloklerotheke to pagkretio paidiko tournoua anoixe  pou diorganonei o  sten kategoria gennethentes  
  etaireia antapokrinomene sto endiapheron ton katanaloton gia ugeia kai euexia meiose te mese periektikoteta ton me alkooloukhon poton tes se thermides kata  ta teleutaia exi khronia 
 opos einai ede gnosto ten perasmene ebdomada anakoinotheke oti me apophase tes diakheiristikes epitropes tes europaikes enoses oristeke to upsos tes prokataboles stis  drkh 
 exallou e k giogle gnoste kai apo tis kairies kata kairous teleoptikes tes emphaniseis ekhei stokho na pherei ton dikegoriko sullogo pio konta sten topike koinonia 
 mas kunegaei entona kai ekhei thorubesei ta megista te skepse mas alla kai te sumperiphora mas 
 mesa s auto to bromiko periballon epaizan paidia xapostainan perastikoi kai elikiomenoi tes geitonias 
 kartes ekhei sumplerosei o dionusatos kai anagkastika tha apousiasei apo ton agona auto 
 ase ta kentra ugeias astikou tupou ena ek ton opoion tha idruthei sta giannina 
 kai auto einai e latreia mas gia ton thrulo 
 apo ten prote stigme elega oti to mellon kai e praxe mporei na dosoun apantese kai okhi oi opoies na kanoume loipon tameio tora 
  anthropous to  tou plethusmou tes khoras kai metatrepoun tous agrous se aperanta nekrotapheia 
  proedros tou sundesmou geoponon kostas kagiales eipe sten  oti mia megale merida paragogon den ekhei gnose tes khreses ton phutopharmakon kai panta khresimopoiei megaluteres posotetes apo ekeines pou sunistoun oi geoponoi 
 khtes exallou e ntora mpakogianne parousiase ten protase ton europaion phileleutheron gia ten ellada kai ten eurozone 
 an eisai en meso agonon kai na khaseis mia proponese den semainei kati 
 uparkhei mou lene mia periptose na matho perissotera gia aute te makrine khora ste diarkeia ton epomenon duo menon 
  drase aute apeuthunetai se uphistamenes e neoidruomenes mikres kai polu mikres epikheireseis pou ekhoun edra ten ellada apaskholoun eos  ergazomenous kai emphanizoun etesio kuklo ergasion eos  ekat 
 den tha uparxei kanena iero abatos gia to kathestos auto katelexe o k si 
 kai xerete osoi pegame kai tis duo bradies mas kakophaneke pou khtes to bradu den eikhame na pame pouthena 
  amerike summakhei me te nazistike germania 
 ekhei brabeuthei epaneileuuena ue ton titlo upseles didaktikes epidoses apo to tueua dioikeses episteues kai tekhnologias tou oikonouikou panepisteuiou athenon 
 otan loipon klethekan na sterizoun mia omada etan duskolo na enothoun 
 otan apokatastatheke to politiko sustema e eremia tou upotithetai oti apokatastatheke alla brekan luse xaphnika ek neou prokuptei o ekbiasmos oti den tha dothei e pempte dose 
 ekeinos etan pou enemerose ton proistameno tou oti e gunaika aute ekhei pethanei edo kai pano apo  khronia 
 kai o astunomos tou muthistorematos o ransom einai enas mallon akhromos epaggelmatias 
 oi teleutaies epitukhies tou erakleiotikou sugkrotematos ekhoun eniskhusei ten aisiodoxia gia te diekdikese tes  pronomioukhou theses kati asphalos pou den epitrepei strabopatemata idiaitera stous entos edras agones 
 den mou ekheis milesei omos katholou gia tosa alla mere pou ekheis taxidepsei 
  parousia tou ste  ethnike sematodotei mia nea arkhe me stokho tes dioikeses na mpoun epitelous ugieis baseis se auton ton istoriko sullogo pou tha epispeusoun tis diadikasies epistrophes stis epaggelmatikes kategories 
 gia tis topikes koinonies alloste o makedonikos agonas tou  uperxe ki autos mia katexokhen emphulia surraxe 
 ostoso perissoteroi apo enan stous duo erotethentes pisteuoun pos niketes tha einai to  
 kai okhi mono psephizoun benizelo alla theoroun oti me ton idio arkhego proegeitai tes  kata mia monada 
  lebentia kai to philotimo einai idiotetes pou duskola mporoun na perigraphoun 
 ta exoda metakineses diamones kai diatrophes ton omadon kaluptontai apo ta idia ta somateia 
 mone tes suntrophia kai paregoria o agnostos insomnia 
 axia prosokhes kai meletes einai e ekdose apo ton sundesmo apophoiton zosimaias skholes ioanninon oi zosimades tou tomou gia epeirotes emporous euergetes alla kai axiepaine e prospatheia ton sunteleston tes ekdoses 
  europe eite tha einai demokratike koinonike kai alleleggua e den tha uparxei eipe o alexes tsipras paraphrazontas ton niko poulantza pou eikhe grapsei oti o sosialismos e tha einai demokratikos e de tha uparxei 
 makarisa polles phores ton idioktete tou kalodiateremenou neoklasikou me ten prasine prosopse mekhri na diapistoso paraterontas ena bradu te diakritike tou epigraphe oti tha mporousa na eimai ki ego ekei mesa 
   kalei tous sunadelphous na summetaskhoun sten  apergia pou keruxe e  apo tis  pm tes tetartes  iouniou  eos tis  pm tes pemptes  iouniou  
 paraskeue  iouniou   to tsimento mas ekhei pnixei kai to khroma tes elpidas to prasino einai to mono pou apomenei gia na me maurizei e psukhe mas apo tis kathemerines eikones 
 toso oi gepedoukhoi oso kai oi philoxenoumenoi eikhan parapona apo tis apophaseis tou tritsone e  gia penalti ston tsinmpampa kai o bolos gia to akurothen gkol tou oumpintes 
 kata ta loipa to kubernetiko ergo sten epeiro to blepoun mono oi tes  kai khoris na thelei kaneis na medenisei den briskei kai kati to ousiastiko na pei gia ten pentaetia aute 
 tous antone koniare proen paiktes akroteriou kai apo ten epomene saizon tou  kai manole ksulake kudon 
 mepos omos ektos apo tous epaggelmaties diaphemistades tha prepei o eisaggeleas na psaxei kai to ti ginetai stous demous dioti o nomos leei pos autoi prepei na xelonoun tis tampeles 
 isos omos kai mesa sten ebdomada na uparxoun ekplexeis kai ola auta pou leme tora gia ta plei oph na men ekhoun semasia 
  dustukhos diapistonoume oti to thema touto an kai essonos semasias tha ekhei kai sunekheia

 berinda pethane to  sto erakleio 
 paraskeue  ioulios   apantese gkerekou ston spurou gia ten prosbase sto dikastiko megaro  
 eseis mporeite na tous gnorisete sto wine bar tou arkhontikou tou alexiou bergoula opou paizoun kai tragoudoun kathe paraskeue kai sabbato bradu 
 kathegetes apth antonios papadopoulos eno akolouthesan eisegeseis apo tous georgio mantzaride om 
 sunekhizontas apo ten pule pros ta boreia mesa apo ena kataprasino topio monadikes omorphias briskoume ta prota khoria gia na phtasoume sta phemismena pertouliotika libadia 
 gi auto kai ta kunegoun kai stenoun khoro 
 oson aphora stous dikaioukhous tes lemnou e idia katastase tha anartethei kai sto tmema agrotikes anaptuxes tes murinas eno iskhuoun ola ta parapano peri prosphugon 
  dromos gia ten prote periokhe ekleise sto ena reuma kai e kuklophoria diexagontan mono apo te mia kateuthunse

 aphenete te sos na kruosei

 omophonia gia ola ektos apo to epheteio tou 
 me endiapheron anamenetai kai e these ton ergazomenon sten epikheirese sta pleista erethismata pou edose e sunenteuxe tou proedrou tou nerea 
 an sunekhisoun etsi tha apokhoresoume apo to protathlema delose o k papadakes 
  orizonties idioktesies katastema kai these stathmeuses apoteloumenes apo upogeio isogeio kai patari ktiriou meiktes khreses to opoio brisketai epi tes odou durrakhiou  sta sepolia tes athenas 
 tis exelixeis autes semeiose e dioikese tes lamda developments apeuthunomene pros tous metokhous kata ten etesia genike suneleuse 
  upotrophia dotheke phetos ston mathete basile boulgaropoulo apo to diabato emathias ena apo ta thumata tes epitheses me makhairi albanon prin apo  emeres 
 ste logike aute kalese sten ethnike omada kai nea prosopa 
 ego den emoun me kanenan kai aporousa se ti katastase eikha katantesei o ellenismos kai to elleniko kratos 
  akrobasia einai epikindune oi isorropies euthraustes kai o khronos piezei asphuktika 
 peraia neoi epibates agia triada palioura akte retzika potamos einai orismenes mono apo tis paralies pou kai galazies semaies ekhoun kai organomenes einai kai diathetoun xaplostres 
  k kapotes eisakouontas tis anagkes tes agoras demiourgese ena kolokuthi opos to oneireuontan oi emporoi se prasino khroma oute polu anoikhto oute polu skouro pou mporei na krata to louloudi gia polu kairo 
 to somatiko alla kai to psukhiko tou sthenos prepei na epistrateusei toso o mikros oso kai o adelphos tou zepi kai e metera tous khelgka sto taxidi tous apo te germania tou  pros te benezouela 
  bia phernei bia semeionei o  papandreou gia na prosthesei oti an nomizei kapoios oti e askese bias einai me to azemioto aurio tha brethei thuma tes 
 entase sten katathese  sanida sten exetastike gia siemens    entase purodotese e katathese tou proen eisaggelea tou areiou pagou giorgou sanida sten exetastike epitrope pou diereuna ten upothese siemens 
 den ekhei teleiomo e apaxiose tes etaireias sto tamplo kathos meta kai te nea diorthose stis  e khrematisteriake axia tes surriknotheke perissotero sta molis  ekatommuria euro 
 sumperilambanetai sto upo ekdose biblio giorgou kokkinou  blase agtzide  elles lemonidou  mneme kai to trauma 
 otan aporripteis etsi mia klese sten omada me to ethnosemo einai ubris 
 polla kalokairina stekia anoigoun semera sabbato kathos to kalokairi einai edo kai e thermokrasia tes diaskedases anamenetai n anebei sta upse 
 ekeino to diastema polloi neoi tragoudopoioi tragoudistes stikhourgoi uparkhoun kai prospathoun na deixoun ton eauto tous kai na ekphrastoun mesa apo te mousike 
 prin merika khronia to  an den apatomai eikhame erthei sto xenodokheio pou douleueis sto platu mou leei se kapoia phase pano sten koubenta o giorgos 
 milame gia ten plere axiopoiese tou kastrou mas 
 kaname polu kale douleia sten amuna mas 
 malista thetontas o idios to erotema giati mikrune e touristike periodos apantese legontas oti oi touristikoi organismoi allaxan to montelo tous eno anaptukhthekan kai alloi proorismoi pou peran apo mas to kommati tes pitas pou eikhame palaiotera 
 se kathe periptose tha prepei na uparxei pleres diaphaneia sto periphemo fast track 
 eikosi khronia argotera to  kuklophorese to phlatlant tou entouin ampot 
  proponetes tou  giannina milese gia agonistika themata gia ten poreia tes omadas ton ioanninon gia epiloges pou ekane sto parelthon eno den pareleipse na dosei kai tis problepseis tou gia to phetino protathlema 
 oi ekroes apo ta egkhoria metokhika amoibaia kephalia diamorphothekan sta  ekat 
 alloste den einai o almounia kai o trise pou anelaban ton oktobrio te laike entole na apokatastesoun ten axiopistia tes oikonomias 
 ton logo pere ste sunekheia o kathegetes suntagmatikou dikaiou k giorgos kasimates legontas khreiazetai duname gia na bgoume apo aute ten epiboule 
 mas boethagate na lunoume ta problemata mas 
 akou xekhase to kineto tou 
  logos gia te libue an toulakhiston pistepsoume ten ollandikes katagoges maria graeffwassink koinoniologo eidikeumene se themata meses anatoles pou perase arketa khronia ereunontas tis epiptoseis tes kantaphikes politikes stis gunaikes 
 ede apo khthes ekho prosphugei nomika kai meso tou dikegorou mou k berbesou ekho upobalei agoge kai menuse sten en logo ephemerida eno zeto na mou ginei kai arse tou kinetou mou telephonou gia ton an uparkhei kapoia sunomilia ole te khronia 
  louis ekhei kales anamneseis apo ten kupro aphou ekei eikhe petukhei to  o sainth ten teleutaia tou mekhri stigmes nike 
 einai prophanes oti e diagnose kai axiologese ton duskolion den einai kati aplo kai eukolo 
 to  tou done kai e ekplexe gkereiro  giorgos dones paretaxe ten omada tou me sustema  ton mikhaelide kato apo ta dokaria kai tous nasto melissa mpazinski olibeira sten amuna 
  apolute peripeteia einai edo 
 to amor fati  gia orkhestra graphteke meta apo anathese tes kratikes orkhestras thessalonikes gia ta  khronia apo to thanato tou nikou kazantzake kai einai basismeno se kretikes kontulies 
 parousia ton prothupourgon ton duo khoron oi sunolika  ellenes epikheirematies pou summeteikhan sten ellenike apostole eikhan ten eukairia na suzetesoun kai kapoioi na kleisoun nees sumphonies ste geitonike khora 
 se oti aphora ten xenodokheiake drasterioteta ta esoda apo te leitourgia tou xenodokheiou nana beach diamorphothekan sto proto exameno tou  se  ekat 
  maria stephanake ekhei kanei aitese sto organismo ergatikes katoikias gia na parei spiti os polutekne omos e aitese tes den tha proothethei epeide opos tes eipan apo ton  den ekhei katholou ensema to  
 na einai konta ston polite kai okhi apenanti apo ton polite 
 meta apo kathustereseis menon e  einai pleon etoime na dromologesei to neo tes epibatego  okhematagogo ploio stis grammes ton dodekaneson 
  lista aute gnoste kai os to club  perilambanei thrulous tes rock opos o jimi hendrix o jim morrison e janis joplin o kurt cobain kai o brian jones ton rolling stone 
 idiaitera thetike etan e prote emera diapragmateuses ton metokhon tes etairias   sten parallele agora tou xrematisteriou 
 kaluptei peripou  stremmata sto khamelotero tmema tes lekanes aporroes kai ekteinetai eos ten paralia tou bai 
  sisu phile tes mpetus zetaei apo ton marko na ginei doretes spermatos kai gia keine prospherontas mia upsele amoibe 
 telos tha uparkhei axiokratia isa dikaiomata kai ises eukairies gia ola mas ta mele khoris kamia diakrise 
 ti einai ton rotesa kathos bgeka apo ten porta kai ton anagnorisa 
  katabole prokataboles eisphoron kata ten apographe idiotikou oikodomotekhnikou ergou 
 einai kharakteristiko oti o kato orophos tes oikias mou briskotan prin apo  khronia miso metro pano apo to odostroma kai tora brisketai miso metro kato ap auto 
  purgiou mono sta khartia 
 gia te mia these mekhanikon eidikotetas elektrologon mekhanikon  apaiteitai kai adeia askeses epaggelmatos mekhanikou antistoikhes eidikotetas me ton titlo spoudon 
 as dosoume kai pali rantebou sto gepedo prokeimenou na kanoume to kathekon mas apenanti sten omada pou agapame kai sterizoume 
 na semeiosoume oti to agalma tou rega brisketai exo apo to phrourio anatolika tes boreias pules kai akome mesa sto phrourio uperkhan omorpha stolismenoi kepoi 
 omos e taktike tou na paraponietai sukhna pukna oti apotelei stokho ton agonodikon apephere karpous ki etsi dekhtheke poine dieleuses apo ta pits polu elaphria se skhese me ten epikindunoteta tes kineses tou 
 tha problepontai sumphona me plerophories prim epipleon tetragonikon metron gia palia ktiria pou tha katedaphistoun kai tha anakataskeuastoun me tetoio tropo oste na enopoiountai oi akaluptoi khoroi tous 
 den me endiapherei pros stigme to mellon 
 ekho sumbolaio kai tha ethela na parameino arkei oi sunthekes phetos na einai idanikes 
 polu perissotero pou ede edo kai kairo se alla kanalia uparkhei ethelousia exodos kai s alla semantikotate perikope amoibon mazi me soro apoluseon 
 polloi einai autoi pou ekhoun apeuthunthei sten purosbestike uperesia bolou 
 me makria mallia 
 etan o protos pou epaixe se gepedo to makedonia xakouste kai alla 
 ta sabbatokuriaka apo to mesemeri tou sabbatou kai mekhri to xemeroma tes deuteras to demotiko parkingk etan anoikhto se olous khoris epibarunse 
 te dioikese anelabe e duse kai to prosopiko pou esteile den etan pragmatika protes poiotetas 
  istoria tes neoteres elladas t  ekd 
 eideseographiko magkazino tes kanadikes teleorases eikhe programmatisei na askholethei me to thema kai eikhe malista dromologesei ten paragoge otan aiphnidia kai khoris kamia dikaiologia diatakhtheke e mataiose tes 
 meta to  e deutere egine ton noembrio tou  sto stadio opote kai akousteke o protos olumpiakos ymnos grammenos apo ton poiete kai kathegete tes botanikes theodoro orphanide 
 se sunekheia tou arithm 
 oti e politeia den thelei 
 ta esoda apo tous loipous phorous sunallagon problepetai oti tha meiothoun  
 ton antone samara sterizei o  tasoulas ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous ton antone samara sterizei o  tasoulas ten upopsephioteta tou antone samara apophasise na sterixei telika o bouleutes ioanninon kai proen uphupourgos amunas kostas tasoulas 
 kai einai polloi oi protoi 
 opos episemainoun ta stelexe tes etaireias apo ta kephalaia pou antlethekan apo ten prosphate metoxikou tes kephalaiou  upsous  dis 
 parekhei omos sten agora upseles poiotetas proionta apallagmena apo khemika kai ston paragogo kalutero eisodema kathistontas kato apo proupotheseis biosime ten ekmetalleuse tou 
 apo tous  mono oi okto einai gunaikes eno oi upoloipoi einai antres 
 sugkinese gia to  aphgano sugkinese ekhei prokalesei e periptose tou  aphganou pou ekhase metera kai adelphe sto nauagio tes perasmenes trites ste sukamia eno paramenei agnooumenos kai o exakhronos adelphos tou 
 mekhri ta tele tou perasmenou augoustou e uperesia aute leitourgouse os  kentro ameses boetheias kai upagotan sto nosokomeio khanion kai sto therapeuterio psukhikon patheseon 
 me apla logia autos einai kai o logos pou telika e diaphora anamesa sten time agoras kai poleses ekhei phtasei na einai e diplasia 
  plaka eikhe klapei to  
 oi sebigianoi boleuontai kai me to kh eno den ekhoun khasei stis exi proegoumenes entos edras anametreseis tous me germanikous sullogous  nikes kai  isopalies 
 me noiazei e demiourgia mas koinonias pragmaton pou anoigei dialogo den agoreuei den epizeta nte kai kala ton thaumasmo leei 
 apo tis pio gnostes kai pio palies fazendas tes periokhes 
 ta anarithmeta nesia tes adriatikes se polu mikre apostase to ena apo to allo prospheroun mia monadike empeiria gia osous agapoun to galazio tes thalassas kai tis khruses ammoudies  delade ligopolu oloi oi ellenes

 ekei etan opos panta e kallitekhnike dieuthuntria loukia rikake kai o suntonistes nikos nikolaides gia na parousiasoun to programma alla kai tis paralleles ekdeloseis tou phestibal opos kai autes tou   pou proegeitai khronika 
 oi askeseis koiliakon energopoioun mia 
 epises erotatai to upourgeio pos exegei to idiaitera auxemeno  tourkiko endiapheron gia ton tomea tes ugeionomikes perithalpseos stous treis nomous 
  sullogos mas gia perissotero apo  khronia agonizetai sklera gia ten anadeixe kai epiluse ton problematon tes bibliothekes me mono gnomona te sterixe tes makra apo politikes skopimotetes 
 ta stoikheia pou ekhoun sugkentrothei apodeiknuoun oti o demos ioanniton kai oi demotikes epikheireseis einai antimetopoi me terastia oikonomika problemata 
 ta plunteria katanalonoun eos kai  ligotere energeia otan douleuoun sta programmata khoris propluse kai me gemato ton kado tou plunteriou

 ton dekembrio tou  me ten eukairia tes  suneleuses tou sumbouliou apodemou ellenismou pragmatopoietheke ste thessalonike sten aithousa tes pagkretias adelphotetas makedonias eurutate sunantese kreton

 uiothetontas ena neo montelo anaptuxes tes prasines anaptuxes pou eidika sten epeiro ekhei megales epharmoges kai prooptikes 
 eseis pou ontes anikanoi kai deiloi den tolmate na peite tipota gia ta apla ki anthropina 
 tonizei akome oti ta dikaiomata ton gunaikon ta opoia prostateuontai apo diethneis sunthekes kai sumbaseis den mporoun na katastrategountai me to proskhema threskeutikon ermeneion politismikon paradoseon ethimon e nomothesion 
 to smaragdenio nesi ontas sundiorganotes tes ekdeloses gnostopoiese meso ton ekprosopon tou ta pleonektemata tes rodou proorismou pou enepneuse ton demiourgo pano papadopoulo idioktete tes panos emporium gia ten phetine tou kolexion 
 poion nomizoun oti koroideuoun ena apo ta gnosta proeklogika thaumata suntelesteke kai sta giannina me ten enarxe ton ergasion tes ionias odou 
 giortasthekan ta enniamera tes panagias sta prionia seliou para to ergasimo tes emeras arketoi pistoi alla kai episemoi parakolouthesan ten theia leitourgia sten ekklesia tes panagias sto dasos tou seliou sten periokhe prionia 
 oi times sta estiatoria s auta ta theretra einai skhedon ellenikes 
 kai n arkhiso apo tis phusikes sas omorphies 
 den mporei na sernetai gia polu mia tetoia katastase kai de otan prokeitai gia euaisthetes kai geographika periokhes tes epeirou 
 endeiktika e time ton  omologon kumantheke stis  monades gia tous titlous tes palaioteres ekdoses eno e time ton antistoikhon omologon tes neas ekdoses diamorphotheke stis  monades 
 apo ten pleura tous ta epimeleteria ekhoun ten euthune kai auta na xekatharisoun to poioi dikaiountai to  
 khophenkhaimrathingk santanter  mprosta se  philathlous tes e khophenkhaim nikese  ten ispanike rathingk santanter 
 apo gkantemia omos allo tipota 
 tora teleiosan oi meletes tora parousiazontai 
 dedomena me  lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese    diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai paraskeue  phebrouariou  ekplektiko mnemeio me toikhographies tou  kai katholiko tou  aiona 
 delade kurioi upourgoi einai san na askholoumaste me ena kruomataki ten ora pou apeilei o karkinos 
  k th athanasoules proedros tou omilou tonise oti to  uperxe gia tis etaireies tou omilou mia akome epituxemene xronia kata ten opoia parousiasan semantikous ruthmous anaptuxes 
 epises e olomeleia dekhtheke omophona oti eprepe na eikhe zetethei e gnome tes gia te nomothetike meiose tou apaitoumenou khronou proagoges ton dikaston kai eisaggeleon 
  giorte pou oloi perimenoume plesiazei 
 oi aiguptioi aromatizontan metaxu allon me rodelaio krino irida kanella portokali muro moskholemono santaloxulo kai retine 
 parousiastekan ta basika oikonomika megethe e makrokhronia anodike poreia tous kai diatupotheke e ektimese gia kuklo ergasion tou idiou peripou upsous me ton kuklo ergasion tes proegoumenes khreses  o opoios anelthe sta  ekat 
 omiletria se aute te giorte mnemes opou tha timethei mia koruphaia stigme tes neoteres istorias mas tha einai e k aikaterine kollatou philologos sto mousiko skholeio larisas 
 etsi mia oikogeneia pou eikhe etesio eisodema  euro eprepe na pleronei ston paidiko stathmo peripou    to khrono apo    pou plerone 
 polu konta sten ampeliona  khlm 
 phrintman to ourliakhto os gkei maniphesto sunenteuxe kouentin tarantino plouto ekhei kai e phtenia duo neanika phestibal sto monasteraki  epanastates me te fender ki aphesan xopiso tous mia trupa 
   ephthase sten kupro o kostas semites diabebaionontas oti oi prospatheies sto plaisio ton enomenon ethnon gia ten exeurese luses tou kupriakou tha sunekhistoun ameiotes 
 gia tukhon apories n apeuthuneste sten yperesia mas 
  perierge skhese me ton adelpho tou mia koine agape pou moirazontai apokalupseis dikes apognose 
 oi proupotheseis uparkhoun 
 ena apo auta etan o arithmos ton episkepton o opoios ten persine khronia xeperase ta  atoma s 
 to elleniko problema einai sto epikentro ton ergasion tou sunedriou case study apokaleitai sto programma ton ergasion kai phusika oi problepseis ton summetekhonton den tha meinoun ston akademaiko periguro 
 einai semantike e proetoimasia ekhoume sto mualo mas to proto paikhnidi sto europa league 
 blepete e mousike biomekhania den etan pote oti pio exupno sten agora  kai to elleniko tes meros ekhei kai deka kantaria blakeias parapano 
 polloi dusarestethekan apo to dillema tou prothupourgou e me psephizete e pao se ekloges 
 ste thessalia ten anatolike sterea ten euboia kai ten anatolike peloponneso o kairos tha einai genika aithrios 
 se periptose pou kapoio atomo epibarunetai oikonomika apo ten katastase tes ugeias tou prepei na proskomizei ten antistoikhe gnomateuse eno se periptose epibarunses apo daneio prepei na proskomizontai eggrapha apo trapeza 
 tora logo tes krises epese para polu 
 ste mese brisketai katastrammenos teleios o naos agiou georgiou kai palia ellenika spitia eno oi stoes ton orukheion opos kai to semeio sugkentroses kai epexergasias metalleumatos einai egkataleimmena 
 sumphona me ton k kotsone paromoia programmata tha demiourgethoun se  akome demous 
 sumbouliou oi opoioi opos episemainetai sten anakoinose prepei pia na stamatesoun ta taxidia anapsukhes 
 enokhlemenos einai o arkhiepiskopos k timotheos kai oi ierarkhes tes kretes gia ten epikheirese anameixes tes ekklesias tes kretes stis dienexeis pou uparkhoun metaxu ton ierarkhon tes elladikes ekklesias 
 uparkhei megalo problema ston erasitekhne kai den antimetopizetai amesa 
 antitheta omos se epikoinoniako epipedo ole e demosia suzetese menei kollemene ston pono pou oi allages epipheroun se epipedo atomiko 
 bebaia sten periptose tes  to egkaira einai skhetiko 
  kosmos omos den xekhna kai timorei 
 prokhthes uperxe ektaktos mia mikroallage sto programma alla se ena egkheirema me tosous summetekhontes pou thelei kai tetoio suntonismo auta einai anamenomena 
 anatheoremene ekdose palioteres  demosieuses me amblummenes tis arkhikes diatuposeis skhetika me ton ethnologiko kharaktera tes epimakhes periokhes 
 sto endekhomeno auto den prepei na khathei mia akome eukairia opos egine me tis proegoumenes ekloges eipe kai exephrase ten pepoithese oti khoris sumporeuse me to  to kinema den mporei na ekhei apotelesmatikoteta 
 ta mertika auta pou diaterountai kai semera einai treis lourides madaras apo noto pros borra kai se kathe lourida uparkhoun ta mitatokathismata tou mertikou opou stegazontai ta kalokairia ta mitata 
 eikhan ta idia apotelesuata ue ton proto guro delade okto nikes uia isopalia kai duo ettes 
 kanoume kati analogo me auto pou kanoun kai sta elaiourgeia gia na khorisoun to ladi apo ton polto 
  bebaia to megalo tou problema kai o antipalos esokommatika einai o manoles othonas apo tis kaluteres periptoseis ston khoro tou  
 upaxiomatikoi pou proagontai se anthupaspistes den orkizontai pali 
 tha eprepe ede o khoros tes na ekhei periphrakhthei gia na men mpainei opoios thelei s auton 
 otan etan gerousiastes uperxe enthermos uposteriktes tes anexartesias tou kossobou 
 alloste poio mpasket  sekonei suzetese e protase tes  gia na metatrapei e timoria ton kekleismenon thuron se agona se edra  khiliometra makria ap ten phusika tes omadas pou timoreitai 
 me te rakhel tha sundethei politika alla kai erotika 
 sto los antzeles tes kaliphornia diamenei o elikias  eton alphonso nino o opoios opos kai o el nino epikritheke drimutata san 
 sten ousia oi anarteseis einai oi idies me tou aperkhomenou montelou 
 me te sterixe tou sirak e tourkia xekinese entaxiakes diapragmateuseis me ten  to  
 apo auta ta  den sunodeuontan apo ta apaitoumena nomimopoietika eggrapha 
 kai eidika gia ton kourea einai mia anapantekhe anakalupse kai apokalupse tou bathuterou eautou tou 
 sumphona me ta eggrapha pou katethese skhetika o demarkhos e skhetike apophase partheke stis  
 time  dolaria  euro to atomo e diamone gia mia nukhta 
 exallou perimenoume akome ten apantese tes sten prospatheia tes  gia sunenose tou kentrikou epexergaste  kai tou epexergaste graphikon  se enan  
 oi ellenes ethopoioi tou kairou exon apo liges exaireseis einai autodidaktoi 
 kai monon otan paraterouse kai zographize gnorize pose eukharistese tou edine aute e ikanoteta tes basanismenes phuses tou 
 ste stele  tou pinaka  e  tou pinaka  kodikos metaboles tha anagraphei o kod 
 ston teliko e li tha antimetopisei te niketria tou emitelikou anamesa sten gallida marion mpartoli kai ten italida katokho tou tropaiou phrantseska skiabone 
 opos lene oi oinopoioi e istoria tou xekina kateutheian apo ten arkhaioteta ephoson den uperxe istorike periodos pou na egine diakope sten kalliergeia tou 
 kai ta upoloipa khoria ena ki ena koukla e kaina gematos biokalliergeies o baphes xakoustos gia ten arkhitektonike tou o kephalas kai gia te biotekhnia me eide apo phusiko guali to kokkino khorio 
 ton dikon tou anthropon pou aphese piso tou kai zei me olo kai megalutere agonia ton kinduno tes zoes tou 
 einai grammeno ste laike glossa tou khoriou tou opos apodeiknuoun oi aphegeseis ton aploikon anthropon oi opoioi gnorizan kala ten tekhne tes kalathoplektikes 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai to teleutaio kephalaio enas anthropologos ston are katapianetai diexodika me to thema tou autismou 
 apo auta to  paei sto kratos delade  euro kai ta  lepta pairnoun oi biomekhanies oi antiprosopoi kai oi peripteroukhoi 
 auto etan kati pou paradekhteke kai o boethos tou soumpotits thanases papakhatzes prin apo to tzampol milontas sten kratike teleorase 
 ta  dolaria aphoroun  eisiteria gia ten telete lexes ton agonon kathena apo ta opoia kostize  dolaria  euro 
 apo ten ellada summetekhoun os gnoston oi ekdoseis kedros 
 marina papanastasiou kai ekprosopos tes  sten ellada pou prokhorese sten parousiase ton stoikheion tes ektheses 
  proedros tou erasitekhne skholiase opos etan phusiko arnetika ta osa eginan sten prokhthesinobradine genike suneleuse milese me ta kalutera logia gia ton take lemone alla ston antipoda kataphertheke enantion tou apokhoresantos konstantinou tsakire 
 apo ten pleura tou o k tsipras anteteine oti to kalutero senario gia te phetine khronia einai ton oktobrio na ekhei phtasei to  ton biblion sto  ton skholeion 
 prepei epitelous na empisteuthoun tous ellenes paiktes 
 sto metaxu ena neo onoma proekupse khthes oson aphora te these tou tekhnikou dieuthunte ston panathenaiko 
 mporei to mesoprothesmo na psephisteke alla oi aganaktismenoi giortasan mia nike 
 ta biblia sta raphia stous pagkous ton bibliopoleion metakinountai magika 
 semera tha xeroun an e prote tous epiloge pou akouei sto onoma  eton proen gkolkiper tes bagiadolid tha sumphonesei me ten agglike lints 
 ostoso logo tou ektaktou tes katastases o k khatzedemetriou epikoinonese mazi tes tes exegese to problema kai pros timen tes dekhtheke na analabei to suntomotero dunaton uperesia 
 me to nomarkhe bouleute klp na theloun kainourgio limani kai me to demarkho galazious kai kapoious allous na antidroun 
 parallela tonise oti den tha epiblethoun neoi phoroi ektos auton gia tous opoious e khora ekhei ede desmeutei meso tou mnemoniou opos mia mikre auxese sto phpa 
 anaplerotria tou k pharmake exelege e antidemarkhos maria tsimetre 
 den tithetai thema na kanoume upokhorese se kanena semeio 
 an oi agorastes katapheroun na othesoun to euro se auto to epipedo tote tipote den tous empodizei na thesoun se amphisbetese to makroprothesmo ptotiko senario gia to koino europaiko nomisma pou to thelei se apolute isotimia me to dolario 
 oi kategories pou barunoun tous duo andres einai gia dorodokia kai paranomo stoikhematismo kat exakolouthese 
 kai phetos e istoria kai e phusike genikes paideias epilegontai apo elakhistous upopsephious pou den xepernoun sunolika to  ton upopsephion 
 parallela o k sallas emphanisteke aisiodoxos gia ten poreia tes oikonomias meta te metastrophe tou europaikou klimatos kai ektima oti oi kineseis endunamoses ton trapezon opos e auxese kephalaiou tes trapezas upsous  ek 
 ma kala otan upegraphan to mnemonio de gnorizan ten prooptike tes adunamias apopleromes auton ton daneion idiaitera ten krisime periodo    
 ego den xero ti semainei kalokairi me balitsa kai xenodokheio 
 oikonomikon gia ton phmap apo tous sunolika  phorologoumenous phusika prosopa me axia akinetes periousias ano tou  ekat 
 me ena gkol sten arkhe  tsiphoutes kai ena sto telos  hliopoulos o panserraikos kerdise me  ektos edras ton pieriko kai plesiase ston ena bathmo tis omades pou proporeuontai 
 to apogeuma stis  tha sunantethoun me mele tes  kai  ndphk kastorias 
 to mustiko einai na ekhoume thelese 
 malista gia ten tourkia ekphrasteke me ta kalutera logia o tekhnikos tes selesao tonizontas oti ten perimene duskolo antipalo plen omos elpize se mia pio eukole epikratese gia ten omada tou 
 polla apo ta paidia exaitias tou karnabaliou erthan sten ekdelose metamphiesmena 
 sta oloklerotika kathestota den mporei na uparxei e demokratia o eleutheros logos auto as to labei upopsin tou o kathenas 
 opos ekhei xanagrapsei e  prosphores eikhan katathesei kai e etaireia  tou omilou mutelenaiou alla kai e  pou einai mia koinopraxia tes italikes  kai tou omilou kopelouzou 
  tourkos prothupourgos delose oti gia prote phora ustera apo  khronia episkephtheke kubernetikos mas antiproedros ton patriarkhe athenagora 
 bebaia uparkhoun akome arketes emeres mekhri ten kuriake  martiou 
 epipleon prospherei phoul serbis pou dinei pollaples epiloges stous episkeptes tou  koruphaia olon to masaz sto domatio sou 
   episkepse miler sten krete xekinese khthes to proi eno ta metra asphaleias etan kati parapano apo austera 
 mazi bretheke kai to kunegetiko oplo tou atukhou andra 
 alla tha prepei na doun oloi tis sunolikes parametrous 
 kserete poioi einai autoi  rodos kai e anagennese giannitson duo sullogoi pou briskontai upo dialuse 
 to ekho anagke gia mena 
 to  epathe sok otan eide na kaigontai mprosta sta matia tou oi kopoi mias zoes to estiatorio tou sten alaska 
  proetoimasia oloklerotheke khthes semera uparkhei repo kai aurio sto gepedo ekhoun klethei oloi oi paiktes 
 ntragkan kokotobits sugkhareteria ston ergotele gia ten kathare nike pou petukhe 
 polla khronia sustematikon prospatheion laikismou kai apaxioses tes ennoias tou energou polite kai ton thesmon genikotera apedosan ta anamenomena 
 gia na antimetopisoume ten epithetike tase ten opoia terei e tourkia apenanti mas eimaste anagkasmenoi na teroume ogko enoplon dunameon dusanaloga megalo se sugkrise me kathe khora sten europaike epeiro kai me to klima upheses pou uparkhei 
 protimese sta anoiktokhroma kai elaphra roukha me anoikto laimo kalupse kephales  khresimopoiese kapelou omprelas k l p 
 ekrektike e katastase se  kai kubernese ekrektike einai e katastase sto kubernetiko stratopedo opou ta teleutaia eikositetraora entone einai e phemologia oti o  papandreou tha epispeusei tis exelixeis upo ten asphuktike piese tes troikas 
 kai to leo auto okhi mono giati te sumpatho alla kai giati gnorizo kala oti sten politike zoe tes italias ta molubenia khronia theorountai oti anekoun sto parelthon 
 se genikes grammes to prophil ton paralion einai ligopolu to idio  prokeitai gia khamelon tonon paralies opou den ekhoume kamia pithanoteta na sunantesoume kosmikous 
  exagora pragmatopoietheke meso pleiodotikou diagonismou me katathese kleiston prosphoron pou egine apo ten agrotike trapeza 
 sumphona me ten k soterkhelle malista ekhoun perasei memonomena atoma pou pairnoun parapano aiteseis prokeimenou na grapsoun ki alla mele 
 sunethos to khroma tou einai akhno kitrino ektos apo auta pou sunterountai sto elaiolado 
 prosexte ta tragoudia pleromena philia alle mia phora augoustiatiko pheggari 
 meta ta prota apotelesmata o  einai to phabori gia ten katalepse tes protes theses eno o  diaterei elpides gia ten katalepse tes deuteres pou epises odegei sten telike phase tou protathlematos  augoustou 
 den ekmetalleutekame tis eukairies 
 se oti aphora sten trele koursa anodou ton diethnon timon ton kausimon o k roblias exephrase ten aisiodoxia tou oti tha uparxei apoklimakose ton timon 
 phetos e ekthese perilambanei eidiko aphieroma ste mese anatole me titlo otan oi idees exegeirontai 
 to kanei omos emmesa arnoumene psepho ston proedro tes demokratias 
  eite braduazei eite pheggei eimai o na nautes tou aigaiou krebati ekho ta bathia neraaa 
 ksekineste apo to kruoneri ena apo ta pio oraia khoria tes periokhes 
 trite  augoustou   tis nikes thumetheke o orpheas kerameion epikratontas sto ex anaboles paikhnidi tou pallesbiakou me skor  kai anapteronontas me auton ton tropo tis elpides tes gia paramone sten  kategoria 
 ta threptika stoikheia pou uparkhoun sta phusika lipasmata delade stis kopries stis kompostes ste stakhte klp prepei na metatrapoun se khemika stoikheia omoia me auta ton tekhneton lipasmaton gia na aporrophethoun apo ta phuta 
  polonia sto timoni tes europaikes enoses poloniko 
  siman zeta suggnome apo ten agglia einai o titlos tes daily telegraph eno e independent tonizei egine o apodiopompaios tragos se mia sunolike apotukhia 
 ten emera pou trabekhteke aute e photographia kai pou protodemosieuse e ephemerida nteili meil den uperkhe ikhnos kakhupopsias den pernouse apo kanenos to mualo oti o diplanos tous mporei na ekhei kakes protheseis 
  kai sten trite o theodoses kaldes epises tou olumpiakou se  
  epi tes timsistem mpolonia kai katapheran na diaskedasoun tis entuposeis apo ten suntribe me  apo te zalgkiris kaounas ston emiteliko 
  sumphonia egine tote me ten egguese tou demosiou 
 auto tha perasei khronos gia na epiteukhthei 
 auto phainetai kathara ste deutere upothese phonou te mone apo tis duo pou o mpelaskoaran saun anelabe gia logous epaggelmatikous 
 ginetai polle koubenta metaxu ton opadon tou olumpiakou gia to an o marinakes tha kanei phetos metagraphe aerodromiou opos perusi me ton riera 
 kerdismenos tes  agonistikes kai enas allos olumpiakos tou bolou pou me to diplo sten kabala apektese probadisma gia ten eisodo sta plei oph 
 semera ta klosteria fanco dunamikotetas  adraxtion paragoun etesios  kila nematon kai sugkatalegontai sta pio sugxrona tes europes axiopoiontas me ton kalutero tropo ethnikous kai koinotikous porous 
 opheilei na kinetopoiethei amesa na akousei kai na dekhthei tis protaseis tes neas demokratias gia ten anaptuxe kai ten oikonomike anakampse na stamatesei epitelous na skotonei ten oikonomia ta oneira kai tis elpides mias olokleres genias sumplerose 
 emeis tha kanoume oti pernaei apo to kheri mas na exegesoume giati gia emas uparkhei prooptike uparkhei allos dromos kai kurios autos einai o dromos pou einai pros to sumpheron okhi mono ton politon tes koinonias kai tes khoras mas genikotera 
 suggrou  sto odeon starcity  kosmos megale alusida gia aples kathemerines geuseis arketa prosegmenes khalarotiko kaphe e poto se neaniko phonto 
   oktobriou sumpleronontai  khronia apo te dolophonia tes pio epanastatikes morphes pou gnorise pote o planetes mas tou tse gkebara 
 se aute ten prooptike den mas perisseuei kaneis 
 to kuklophoriko tou sustema tou epitrepei na diaterei mekhri kai to  tes thermotetas pou paragoun oi mues tou gegonos pou tou dinei megale anexartesia stis kineseis kai sto metanasteutiko taxidi tou 
 ean ekhete diathese anakalupses pegainete ste lukhnaphtia konta ston triantaro ste santa margarita sta anatolika tou nesiou kai sto mali pou einai apanemos ormos me duskole prosbase kai paraxenous skhematismous brakhon 
 sta tele maiou anamenetai na leitourgesei o xenonas pou etoimazei o thanases kostopoulos idioktetes tou comfuzio 
 ena apo ta pio palia tsipouradika sto kentro gia osous antekhoun ten tsipouroposia 
 uper tes khoras mas mporei na leitourgesei kai e statheropoiese ton sunallagmatikon isotimion ektos tou tourismou tha ophelethoun kai oi kheimazomenes semera exagoges 
 mia apo tis kharakteristikoteres idees tou etan oti sten exelixe den uparkhei proodos iskhuro khtupema ste skhetike ideologia pou omos den breke egkairos edaphos sten koinonia 
    tes  
   apo polle iose kai oi goneis uou ue steilane ston pappou uou kai ste giagia uou gia na uen kolleso ton adelpho uou 
 ta semadia koposes apo ten uperprospatheia pou katebalan oi paiktes tou mikhale petrake sta duo prota mats etan kati parapano apo emphane sto khthesino agona me sunepeia e omada tes kalamatas na kanei ousiastika peripato 
 ena khamogelo me pampolles ermeneies kai menumata pou spanios den apotelei monimo kharakteristiko tou prosopou tous 
 me neo tekhniko ston pagko ton gianne papakosta e omada tes larisas den kataphere na apospasei kapoio thetiko apotelesma kai pleon krinetai epitaktike e anagke gia nike sta duo sunekhomena paikhnidia pou akolouthoun sto alkazar 
 me base ta parapano einai prophanes oti demiourgeitai ekrektiko problema pou mporei na parei anexelegktes diastaseis se baros khiliadon matheton kai ton oikogeneion tous kai malista se mia periodo pou plesiazoun oi exetaseis 
 mou ephere ki ena poteri mauro krasi pere ki o idios kai katsame antikrista se duo kharakia 
  khoros tes aules tou mouseiou teriant kato ap to megalo dentro kai dipla sto ekklesaki tes agias paraskeues prospheretai gia poikiles ekdeloseis 
 to megalo paikhnidi tha dieuthunoun oi kk karouses skhoinas 
 sullepse gia narkotika sto limani tes kerkuras deutera  phebrouarios    
 mekhri to telos tes dekaetias tou  autes oi oreines diadromes apotelousan ton kurio tropo epikoinonias anamesa stis periokhes tou nesiou 
  epiloge tou onomatos antiprosopeuei te diarkeia to dienekes opos alloste kai to idio to krasi 
 to panel ton  intson diathetei khrono apokrises  ms gegonos pou to kathista katallelo gia paikhnidia video kai epharmoges me gregores enallages eikonas 
 tis sunnephiasmenes meres tou khronou otan o elektrikos thermosiphonas einai e mone luse ruthmiste ton thermostate tou stous    bathmous oste na men spatalate askopa energeia

 otan arkhizoun oi dikes gia to makedoniko e kommounistike diethnes ekhei ede anagnorisei to arkhiko tes lathos kai ekhei anatheoresei tis anedaphikes apophaseis peri anexartetes makedonias kai thrakes 
 oi gonies omos pou theorountan kati to idiaitero mias kai etan mono duo eikhan axiomatika apodothei ston pater phamilia 
 ston demo nestou metaxu duo upopsephion niketes me mikre diaphora anadeiknuetai o sabbas mikhaelides enanti tou baggele tsompanopoulou

  sugkritike methodos oso ki an ekhei endiapheron entelei apodeiknuetai o kaluteros odostroteras aphou oloi brazoume sto idio kazani kai oloi ekhoun kapoio epos sto parelthon tous den khreiazetai na paskizoume gia na briskoume kai na krinoume tis ierarkhies 
 na bgo sten paranomia

 tha boethethei sigoura 
 oi kk giannes rasoglou kai soteres kioseloglou upeballan tis paraiteseis tous apo ten dioikese tes  kai suntoma tha akolouthesoun oi kk petros palmas takes georgoules kai thanases kouimtzes 
 den einai sumpheron kanenos na ginetai spatale agorastikes energeias gia ena mikro khroniko diastema kai ustera na uparkhei auto pou leme apnoia 
 enteka khronia meta ten tragodia e upothese exelikhtheke kai poinika se nauagio 
 emeis loipon diokomaste kai katadikastekame giati perame os dedomeno tis bebaioseis ton demosion uperesion pou uperkhan ston phakelo 
 an meinoume enomenoi tha ekhoume apotelesmata

 ean omos o mekhanismos autos den leitourgei sosta tote aisthanomaste skotodine kai zale

  oikonomike katastase tes khoras den einai allothi gia ten apempolese zetematon pou aptontai tes exoterikes politikes semeiose o kostas gkioulekas 
 den einai delade mia akoma istoria apo ta perasmena kai xekhasmena alla ena apo ta polu monterna phainomena ton kairon 
 ti einai semera e epikheirese pou ependuei  malthakas tes pareas opoios to kanei guriste deite guro sas to kanei apo meraki e trela 
 sten boule ten these tou koinobouleutikou ekprosopou analambanei o k nikos dendias 
 sten epanalepse omos e khile mpeke polu dunata kai paroti emeine opos kai to perou me deka paiktes sto  kataphere na piesei arketa ten antipale estia 
 semera  bouleutes kathos kai  apo tous  gerousiastes briskontai antimetopoi me te dikaiosune 
 kaigetai e gouna mas autes tis meres apo tis upseles thermokrasies

  sai touompli uperxe arketa semantikos kai to ergo tou den periorizetai ste sunekhise mias paradoses 
 den prokeitai mono gia ten kakopoiese ton gunaikon apo tous suzugous tous mia sumperiphora pou moiazei endemike sten anthropine istoria

 na einai sigouros oti e omada pou agapese den tha ton xekhasei pote

  kosmos prepei na allaxei rizika gia na uparxei pithanoteta na epibiosei to anthropino eidos kai e pragmatike elpida gia allage anaduetai semera emprakta ste latinike amerike 
 monadike exairese to eidiko skholeio kallitheas opou mporei na egine o agiasmos parousia kai tou proistamenou tou grapheiou protobathmias ekpaideuses lemnou panagiote moutzoure ekpaideutikoi omos eidikes agoges den ekhoun akome topothetethei

 to sabbato stis  mm osoi apo ten omada theloun mporoun na summetaskhoun me te phanela tes phlogas ston nukhterino emimarathonio sto laurio 
   mm eisit   meiomeno   dorean gia neous eos  eton  phoitetes 
  agnostos apostoleas tou episemaine oti e dike einai stemene kai oti o proedros tes epitropes epheseon athanasios themeles einai stemenos 
  arithmos ton anthropon pou ekhoun ektopistei sto esoteriko tes khoras tous exaitias surraxeon auxetheke kata tesseris posostiaies monades phtanontas ta  ekatommuria sta tele tou  
 kai phusika opos einai epomeno oti den paei kala einai auto pou prepei na kauteriastei gia na men ekhoume epanalepse ton idion phainomenon 
 to sugkhrono omos oikonomiko telma kai oi atasthalies stis opoies ekhei emplakei e khora mas spilonoun en merei ten axia tou na eisai semera ellenas 
 ontos kairo eikha na geuto mia mpira toso isorropemene stathere kai mazi phinetsate 
 enas akoma galantomos politeutes pou skorpouse diaphora muria eite se athletika megalogegonota e se diaphores politistikes ekdeloseis 
 khthes egine mikre anaphora kai sto megalo thema tes sunenoses ton enoseon 
 antitheta oloi eikhan ena esto kai mikro thetiko pleonasma 
 paei o theristes paei o alonares se ligo tha baloune trugokai ego 
 emoun mallon tukheros giati emoun gumnasmenos eikha te gnose tou problematos os giatros kai me boethesan ten katallele stigme oi dikoi mou anthropoi kai oi giatroi 
 sugkekrimena oi proslephthentes tha klethoun na upograpsoun sumbaseis ergasias idiotikou dikaiou orismenou khronou diarkeias apo tesseris eos okto menes gia ten kalupse ton epokhikon anagkon ton kataskenoseon tou upourgeiou 
  auta perilambanontai e entopioteta e oikogeneiake katastase e ergasiake katastase e oikonomike kai periousiake katastase oi sunthekes stegases e katastase tes ugeias 
 okhi mono giati den ekhoun tipota na poun stous polites alla kai giati kaneis pleon den tous pisteuei semeiose o ekprosopos tupou tes  
 sumphona me egkures plerophories dapanethekan gia to parti pano apo  euro 
 kati edeikhne na ton kalouse prokletika 
 en toutois eskhatos sten ellada uposteriktes tou akratou kapitalismou prosepathesan kai epetukhan ena kathestos asudotou eleutherias anatimeseos ton agathon uposterizontes oti o antagonismos tha katasteilei to phainomeno auto 
 molis auten ten ebdomada xekinoun duotreis kainourgies seires gia ten arkhitektonike kai te logotekhnia 
 semantike auxese semeiosan kai oi poleseis tes etairias 
 se auto to semeio einai polu duskolo na demiourgethei iskhuros arkhikos purenas anaphlexes me to sumbatiko mpouzi 
 theoroume akros epeigon to na elegkhthei o rolos tou stratou kai na perioristei o teleutaios sta suntagmatika tou kathekonta apopheugontas kathe anamixe ste zoe ton koinoteton kai kathe summetokhe sten katastole koinonikon kinetopoieseon 
 sabbatokuriako sta giannina o k papandreou ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous sabbatokuriako sta giannina o k papandreou me ten omilia tou giorgou papandreou to sabbato olokleronetai o kuklos ton upopsephion proedron tou  sta giannina 
 to brisko anoeto kai alazoniko 
 sto  o kebler eide epithetiko phaoul tou maierkhopher ston tzorba sten palikarisia kephaliagkol tou austriakou eno sto epomeno lepto o idios paiktes eikhe ena kalo sout aout 
 sphragisan ten prokrise oi paides to epomeno thuma gia ta paidia tou andrea moskhonesiote etan e khios ten opoia nikesan sto relanti me skor  pistopoiontas me ton tropo auto oti einai e kalutere omada tou omilou 
  istoria tes glukias summorias einai to emerologio tes zoes kai tou thanatou mias omadas anethikon atomon mias omadas pou ekhei phtasei sto semeio khoris epistrophe kai zetaei kati gia na pistepsei polu kai na pethanei gi auto 
 mpekan apo mia piso baria xuline porta ten opoia kai parabiasan pithanotata me losto 
 kai opos sunethizo na leo otan grapheis gia anthropous prepei na akous tous anthropous kai kurios tis siopes tous 
 empeire e elpida katalabainei kai apo khioumor alla kai apo epikoinonia aphou se telike analuse e opoia probole kurios e khioumoristike einai kalodekhoumene 
 prophulassei ta zoa apo tis enterikes patheseis meionei te thnesimoteta ton neon zoon boethaei sten anaptuxe tous kai sta poulerika boethaei ten auxese tes ootokias tous 
 anapheromenos sten tourkokupriake koinoteta o prothupourgos tonise oti me te luse tou kupriakou kai ten entaxe sten europaike enose oi tourkokuprioi tha exelthoun apo ten upanaptuxe kai tha apegklobistoun apo ena autarkhiko kathestos 
  plerome egine me tesseris epitages apo tis parapano trapezes 
 an e agape mou gia ten patrida mou kai e diaterese ton arkhon kai ton axion ton progonon mou einai atopema eukharistos tha to diapraxo 
 oi israelinoi aganaktismenoi xekinesan apo merikes dekades phoitetes pou eikhan stesei skenes kai ephthasan tous ekatontades khiliades anthropous kurios mele tes mesaias taxes 
 ego khairomai pou pere e dioikese aute ten apophase kai sosta ekane tora gia na xekatharisei to thema kai na stamatesoun ta kouskous kai oi amphiboliess eipe mono kleinontas to thema 
 alla tha mas peite ti kalligraphies gureuoume tora ante na men poume apo poia 
  omada tou draste exere oti ten protokhronia den uperkhan sten krete oute anarkhikoi oute phoitetes ki etsi brekan ten eukairia na drasoun 
  pou petukhe prokritheke stous olumpiakous agones tou londinou  iouliou  augoustou  pou etan kai e proteraioteta tou pegainontas stous agones 
 antistoikha o khoros ton aposkeuon arkhizei apo ta  litra eno kato apo to patoma tou uparkhei kai enas kruphos khoros pou mporei na kalupsei alla  litra 
 einai gegonos oti e genike eikona tou enneamenou pistopoiei ten apotelesmatikoteta ton prospatheion tes neas dioikeses kai se epipedo metrikes etaireias kai se epipedo omilou kai eniskhuei ten aisiodoxia gia ten parapera beltiose ton apotelesmaton 
  prote pou moiazei na ektulissetai se enan eikoniko kosmo aphora trisekatommuria dolaria eikonikou khrematos pou exatmistekan 
 plenoume kai stegnonoume kai psilokoboume to duosmo 
 ekei opou leitourgei e enose os sumpoliteia o kathe laos sten kratike tou ekphrase den metrietai me ten plethusmiake tou duname alla os istoriko upokeimeno 
 gia ten prokrise sten telike phase tou europaikou protathlematos anakhorei e ethnike neon ekhontas exi paiktes tou olumpiakou sten apostole tes 
 skhetika sumphona me plerophories oi trapezes tha kinethoun sumphona me ten arkhike protase tou gallikou skhediou gia ekdose  omologon me epitokio peripou  
 stis  noembriou e ethnike kai tupika tha parei ten egkrise ton metokhon tes gia na apallagei apo ton kratiko epitropo epistrephontas tis pronomioukhes metokhes  ekat 
 gia plere diaphaneia pantou 
 kerde tes taxes tou  semeiose o deiktes tes diakheirises akinetes periousias kata  eniskhutheke autos ton ekdoseon kai ektuposeon kata  tes paralleles agoras kata  tes plerophorikes kai kata  tou khondrikou emporiou 
 sugkekrimena enas xulourgos enas sideras duo elektrologoi duo elektrotekhnikes kai treis ergates 
 tora e gallike etaireia prokhorei sten apokalupse perissoteron stoikheion guro apo te sugkekrimene seira ton montelon tes pou tha pheroun ta kharakteristika  
 dietelese demarkhos geras kai nomarkhes lesbou gia duo tetraeties 
  giorgos dramountanes uperxe o protos proponetes tes stellas pilatou alla me ton giorgo kokkino sunedese to onoma tes 
 omoios pareterethe eis polla leprokomeia oti ugieis nosokomoi en autois diamenontes kai epi polla ete therapeuontes tous leprous e plunontes ta endumata auton diemeinon ugieis 
   gia ton olumpiako 
 gia sobara lathe pou uperkhan ste dome tou proupologismou epikheireseon kopeke to epikheirematika skhedia mikron kai polu mikron epikheireseon 
 plerophories anapheroun oti to ketos etheathe gia prote phora sten periokhe prin apo mia ebdomada 
  proponetes tes beroias k gaitanos pere mazi tou  paiktes kai mesa se autous einai kai o brazilianos tzounior souarez aphou apo khthes anekei sten omada tes beroias 
 sunepos krinetai oso pote allote epitaktike e anagke gia noikokurema tou demosiou tomea kai ousiastike apokentrose tou kratous me prophane stokho ten surriknose tes grapheiokratias tes spatales kai tes diaphthoras 
  merous tes plateias meston sto mesaioniko kastro  gia ten pragmatopoiese ekdeloseon 
 ki e upourgos anti na ekhei phrontisei na antimetopisei auta ta problemata pou ta gnorize apo noris kompaze oti te duskolotere khronia kaname to kalutero xekinema 
 epi pleon kathe paraskeue bradu to  plemmurizei apo tous ekhous ton monternon mousikon epilogon gnoston djs tes athenas pou sas kaloun na tous akousete kai giati okhi na khorepsete mazi tous 
    to melanoma mas apaskholei idiaitera tous therinous menes pou e ekthese mas ston elio einai megalutere kai ara oi kindunoi anaptuxes tou auxanontai aistheta 
 tha pethano ki akoma den tha ekhei ekdikasthei e upothese mou 
 me megethos skhedon oso e kerkura  tkhlm to pouket brekhetai apo ta kataprasina nera tou arkhipelagous andaman ston indiko okeano kai sundeetai me ten epeirotike khora khare ste gephura serasin 
 gia to an einai ephikte e metagraphe tou giobanobits ston panathenaiko sten phase pou briskomaste aute ten stigme einai anephikto 
 nauagese tou gkanso ste milan se anagkastike anaprosarmoge ton planon tes gia te stelekhose tes mesaias grammes prokhora e milan meta to oristiko nauagio sten apoktese tou gkanso 
 gia na doume tha luthei auto to problema prin teleiosei e ekthese kale epitukhia 
 kata ta loipa mia sobare politeia tha eikhe apo khronia merimnesei na elegkhei austera tis uparktes authairesies kai parekbaseis ton taxitzedon 
  tous agones mporousan na parakolouthoun kai douloi kai barbaroi osoi delade den etan ellenes alla okhi gunaikes 
 etsi omos metakuluetai to kostos olon auton ton exetaseon eite sta asphalistika tameia eite sten tsepe ton asthenon pou einai kai to pithanotero exaitias tes dedomenes adunamias ton tameion 
   mikhaloliakos sugkekrimena anephere oti mesa sto  o deiktes gennetikotetas anelthe se  te stigme pou o anagkaios gia ten ananeose ton geneon einai  kai tonise oti oi problepseis gia to mellon einai dramatikes 
 sten ousia einai mia agonistike replika me ton  kinetera ton  moiron pou edo tha apodidei  ippous 
 elpizo na ginei to idio kai sten ellada 
 olo to kalokairi trogotan kai masiotan 
 pos akribos empleketai se olo auto to senario loipon to playstation move paizontas to rolo tou phakou tes peges delade tou photos pou prospiptei pano sta antikeimena tou khorou kai sto upobathro

 sumphona me ten astunomike dieuthunse anatolikes makedonias kai thrakes den ekhoun anapherthei zemies 
 gennetheke to  
 me ton tropo auto mporei kapoios na ekhei pantou kai panta mazi tou te photographike tou mekhane kathos kai na allazei phakous analoga me to eidos lepseon pou thelei na kanei 
 poso oikeia akougetai s emas tous ellenes aute e apostrophe kai apo poso baros tha eikhe glitosei e dike mas logotekhnia an eikhe katapherei na xephugei egkairos apo ten pikria tou emphuliou kai tes khountas ligo argotera 
  thalamos tou odegou kai tou sunodegou paramorphonetai se toso megalo bathmo oste na kinduneuoun me sobarous traumatismous ta kato akra tou odegou eno exairetika upsele apodeiknuetai kai e pithanoteta traumatismou ston thoraka 
  kkamas tonise oti euelpistei pos tha prokupsei mia nomarkhiake e opoia tha ekphrazei oles tis dunameis kai tha suspeironei to sunolo ton melon tes edo ginetai mia kinese uperbases 
 otan malakosoun adeiazete ten psikha tous kai ten psilokobete 
 kai xaphnika emphanizetai telos panton den thelo eilikrina pistepste me parolo oti etan os bioma etan pragmatika polu askhemo 
 ste khio kommatiasta sunantas kai khairesai ole ten ellada 
 opos etan anamenomeno xespase skandalo ten ora tes sunaulias 
 axizei n anapheroume oti e aporrophese tou lukopeniou einai upselotere otan e ntomata einai mageiremene 
 mesa s auto to skeniko kai me te bitrina ton mageireuton phatsakarta ta laika apo dionusiou arbanitake mutilenaio zampeta nikolaou kaite gkreu zestainoun akoma pio polu ten atmosphaira

 demiourgetheke deutera  martios   arthrographos paola kharalampidou idiaitero endiapheron parousiazei e ektakte genike suneleuse pou sugkalei gia tous metokhous tou ten paraskeue  martiou to  kilkis

 etoimazete te sokolata gkanas brazete ten krema galaktos me to xusma portokaliou 
 endeiktike tou klimatos einai e delose oikonomologou oti aute einai e pio prosphate okhi e teleutaia upobathmise sto mplok ton  megaluteron biomekhanikon dunameon 
 eukhesthai loipon pantes opos ekhomen tele eirenika kai kalen apologian 
 delade ekhei psephistei san aristourgema 
 ten ekdelose tha plaisiosei e khorodia tes demotikes enotetas petaloudon 
 legetai oti o papas pegaine sukhna sta giophurakia kai zetouse na tou dosoun to daktulidi gia na to poulesei ston ebans tha tous edine  kai ean to poulouse perissotera tha tous edine te diaphora 
 mia apo ta idia to senario ephuge apo ta kheria ton suggrapheon kai to anelaban oi skenothetes 
 ekeinous tous eparkeis apothekeutikous khorous pou tha kaluptoun tis anagkes phulaxes gia ola ta eide kausimon pou diakinountai kai zeta to nesi 
 prothese tes demotikes arkhes einai e katopin diagonismou parakhorese tou se idiote pou tha analabei ten anakainise kai leitourgia tou 
 koinos theloume na anadeixoume tis tainies ta phestibal tous anthropous pou gia emas axizei na anadeikhthoun 
 ena olokleromeno sustema diakheirises tha auxesei to kataskeuastiko kostos nai an kai se skhetika mikro bathmo 
 metaxu allon tha problethei e tainia athena  kike demoula tou gianne smaragde alla kai oi tainies karolos koun tou lake papastathe kai manos khatzidakis   kathrephtes kai to makhairi tou demetre bernikou 
 kai auto kaname 
  prosorine meiose tou skor me triponto tou gkrant  sto  den ptoese to erakleio pou me  boles tou tomas katharise ten upothese nike 
 mprosta mas einai ola ta problemata kai e anergia 
 kapoies trapezes epises thetoun elakhisto poso gia te metaphora 
 na parakolouthesoume enan agona apo duo omades pou paizoun kalo podosphairo khoris na ekhoume paratragouda pou diokhnoun ton kosmo apo ta gepeda 
 na araxoume sten koula tou gregore tou philou mou tou gregore gia ekhinious me psomi lemoni kai armura thalassine 
  isopedotike epektase ton kinetron tes thrakes ektos autes einai prophanos adike 
  ap ten alle omos opos sunekhize to palio kommatiko stelekhos tes  tha etan aparadekto na apophasistei gia paradeigma na parameinoun os ex officio sunedroi oi bouleutes kai oi nomarkhes na men einai 
 meta katalabe to lathos tou kai prospathese na to summazepsei alla e zemia eikhe ginei 
    ten anagke prootheses tou ellenikou emporiou sten periokhe tes mesogeiou episemainei e  e opoia desmeutheke na summetaskhei energa sto sunedrio tes euromed   to opoio programmatizetai ton ioulio e to septembrio sten italia 
 mepos tora metaniose o panionios den xero leei o athletes ton opoio tha thumountai gia arketo kairo oi philathloi kai okhi mono tou panioniou 
 etoimoi bieirinia photakes perimenei ton ibits o mpoloni poker

 mporeite na proseggisete ten periokhe kai me pheri mpoout apo ten arkitsa  aidepso 
 den einai apithano na parameinei ste luon 
 epises o sioutes etan melos tes ethnikes omadas paidon pou katelabe ten  these sto europaiko protathlema tou  ste boudapeste kai tes ethnikes ephebon e opoia katektese to asemenio ste balkaniada  prousa

 etan isos to pleon panegurismeno gkol tes teleutaias dekaetias gia ton

 ap den einai katholou duskolo 
 te deutera lkh tha ginei suzetese me thema kritike kritikoi kai biblio me omiletes ton kosta boulgare ton paulo matesi ten ekdotria ioanna khatzenikole kai suntoniste ton demosiographo basile kalamara 
 omos erthan kai kapoioi apo ton panathenaiko epeide eprepe tote na erthoun ki alloi apo to exoteriko ki etsi den pera eukairies ostoso o kasmerides kanei upomone kai elpizei oti kapoia stigme tha tou dothei e eukairia 
 sunekhizoun oi anoetoi ten probokatsia apo to diadiktuo mono ekei tous pairnei giati ola einai khuma ki oti thelei o kathenas graphei gia ten dethen anexartesia tes kretes 
 kai to kako einai oti stous perissoterous sumpiptoun kai oi ores me oti auto sunepagetai 
  teleutaios tenedios einai enas o  konstantinos 
 opos anaphertheke eidika sto nomo hrakleiou ten proegoumene khronia semeiothekan  ergatika atukhemata ap ta opoia ta  etan se oikodomes kai ta  se koines epikheireseis 
  teleiosan duo apo te beroia mporei to mualo tes beroias na einai perissotero strammeno sten oristike apophase gia ten telese e me ton agonon pleioph auto omos den semainei pos den trekhei parallela o programmatismos tes neas khronias 
 epises problepetai pos e ektakte eisphora koinonikes euthunes sta kerde ton epikheireseon tha epiblethei ephoson uperbainoun tis  euro 
 to oikonomiko epiteleio elpizei na ekhei katalexei mekhri ton phebrouario se sugkekrimena metra phorologiko kai asphalistiko ta opoia tha stathmistoun apo ten komision kai to  gia tis telikes apophaseis gia to khrono periorismou tou elleimmatos 
 sumphona me ten anakoinose ton ioulio e etaireia tha xekinesei kai te diathese exi neon akoma teleoraseon 
 perasa duo omorpha khronia sten europe kai leo apla oti oi paiktes prepei na exetazoun ola ta dedomena delose o amerikanos phorgouornt 
 anamesa stous katoikous tes etan o aglaos enan tapeinos georgos pou apolambane te zoe se auton ton panemorpho topo kai ton opoio to manteio ton delphon kharakterise eutukhestero tou pamploutou kroisou 
  pros ton upotithemeno monodromo tou mnemoniou pou odegei me mathematike akribeia te khora sten katastrophe kai ton lao se bathia dustukhia 
 alloste opos mas exegese to theatro kai e demosiographia sundeontai amesa 
 athenon sto hrakleio tes k andriane ypeuthunes prosopikou tou benizeleiou nosokomeiou kai tes sunodou mas tes k theodorake 
  nikos kougias thumise entona tis klasikes epokhes ton megalon souter tou philippou kai pera apo duname didaxe tekhnike me takhuteta 
 malista den eikhe duo menes pou eikhe exelthei apo ten phulake gia ten upothese pou proanapherame 
  kentrikos khoros etan prosbasimos apo mia thura ston dutiko khoro pou eikhe phragei sten arkhaioteta 
 metaxu allon paraleipomenon tes epokhes o suggrapheas anapheretai sto epeisodio koukide kai sta stoikheia pou kata te gnome tou to tekmerionoun 
 tha epistrepsei metaniomene ste suzugike kline te stigme pou mia alle exegerse mousoulmanike auten te phora tha akoumpesei to idio tes to spitiko 
  hepworth aisthantheke te philoxenia kai te gennaiodoria ton katoikon tou st ives apo ten prote kiolas stigme kai emeine ekei mekhri to thanato tes to  
  gios tou k giannes agorastides milontas sto bema leei oti o pateras tou einai 
 sunethos de zetoun khremata gia auten te metaphora aphou stokhos tous einai na exasphalisoun pelates gia ta domatia tous 
  emerida diorganotheke epeita apo protoboulia tou genikou grammatea tes apokentromenes dioikeses thumiou sokou 
 emeis os ellada agnooume tis basikes kateuthunseis tes exoterikes tes politikes tonise kai upogrammise oti to biblio ton giallourideaphentoule prospherei mia polu kale eukairia na gnorisoume te geitona khora 
 to oikonomiko den mas aphora phantazomai oti tha kanei to kalutero e dioikese tes enoses 
 akome gia prote phora ekhoume dei dieuthunte pou na ekhei ten porta tou panta anoikhte kai na dekhetai kathe asphalismeno kai suntaxioukho prothumos na dosei exegeseis kai na lusei problematas 
 pantos o k apostolakes dieukrinise oti apo ten krete oi  tha leitourgoun gia tis anagkes tou dogmatos pou tha uperetoun to idio kala kai apotelesmatika 
 an epibebaiothoun oi plerophories pou tous theloun na ekhoun ede doulepsei pano sten upothese ekmetalleuomenoi te demosiopoiese tou porismatos tes k papandreou tote den apokleietai ta mantata na erthoun suntomotera 
 tes mises zoes tes 
 emeis apla tha ekhoume to problema me te rupanse kai to thorubo 
 oi endiapheromenoi kalountai na upobaloun aitese 
 aphou ten perasmene bdomada xesekosan ta kerde apo to khrematisterio tora epistrephoun 
 suneleuse kai me  parontes  proedros tou sundesmou milontas stous  
 epiballetai e anathese ston phorea diakheirises ektelestikes exousias kai parakhorese olon ton armodioteton tou ellenikou demosiou kathos kai exasphalise oikonomikon dunatoteton oste aproskoptos na epitelesei ten apostole tou kai na ektelesei erga 
  sunantese tou k muriokephalitake me ton kosta staurakake tou opoiou to sumbolaio legei to dekembrio tha ginei argotera

  euro alla para tis dapanes petukhe oikonomiko pleonasma  euro kai ekhei lambanein epipleon  euro 
 emperiekhei kai to tragiko kai to komiko demiourgontas mia idiotupe atmosphaira pou den ten ekhoun ta alla duo eide 
 kanete khrese epikheirematon ta opoia endiapheroun ena mikro arithmo ekpaideutikon oi opoioi den antimetopizoun ta problemata tes ekpaideuses me thetiko tropo 
 auto sumphona me ton k samara apotelouse protase tes  apo ton dekembrio tou  
  demopratese ton ergasion auton tha ginei to suntomotero kai parallela me ten exelixe tou allou diagonismou oste mesa sto kalokairi na uparkhoun anadokhoi gia to sunolo tou ergou 
  arkhiepiskopos athenon ieronumos anapheretai idiaitera sta deina pou perna o topos legontas oti oses phores to genos mas ephthase sta oria tes exouthenoses e elpida tes anastaseos to anedeixe pali romaleo kai anastemeno 
 oti pragmati orismena apo auta ta sumbolaia den ta eikhe metagrapsei 
  poiese einai diakhute sten ellada ten aisthanomai pantou  enas emphutos romantismos kai e patroparadote tragikoteta mas sta laika tragoudia ste mousike sten poiese ten idia kai ston tropo antimetopises tes zoes 
 kerukos kai epistrophe 
 me ubridiko stolo taxi tha eikhame epises polu ligotere ekhorrupanse kathos ta okhemata auta leitourgoun sto kentro me ton elektrokinetera khoris thorubo 
 thelo apla na ekmetalleuto tis eukairies mou 
 otan eisai khoregos e ekheis exousia tote ola genikeuontai 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai to proto aeroplano me udrogono to aeroplano antares  trokhodromei sto aerodromio tou ambourgou opou apotelei kai te semantikotere atraxion sugkentronontas ta phota tes demosiotetas pano tou 
 tetarte  augoustou   mm diamakhe regaapostolou me te metropole ksanthes gia ta koritsia me ta maura ksanthe se antiparathese briskontai e metropole ksanthes kai peritheoriou me tous theatrikous suggrapheis tou ergou ta koritsia me ta maura 
  paiktes ekhei aporripsei epises ten protase tou  thessalonikes 
  stase pleromon ekhei epereasei kai tis prooptikes kathos oi mises skhedon epikheireseis  ektimoun oti tha meiosoun tis paraggelies pros tous prometheutes tous kata to epomeno exameno eno to  ektima oti tha meinoun statheres 
  kai alla autonoeta episemainei sten ekthese tou kai stis protaseis tou o dioiketes tes trapezas tes ellados 
  prote etan ste melbourne to  otan oi philipo manini kai mprent khanten kolumpesan se  ta  
  aitia ekhei na kanei me to idio to paketo ton euroeklogon kai ton protagoniston tous 
 epises e ergasia apotelese erethisma gia ten euaisthetopoiese ton paidion apenanti sto periballon 
  neon metokhon me katabole metreton apophasise metaxu allon e ektakte genike suneleuse tes katseles pou pragmatopoietheke khthes 
 okhi mono den emoun mprosta otan skototheke e lina alla den ten exothesa ego s aute ten praxe tonise 
 auta ta paratsouklia antikatoptrizoun ten apostrophe kai ten aedia pou etrephan gia tous maurous kai tous irlandous oi anoteres leukes koinonikes taxeis 
   pragmatopoiethekan ta egkainia tou ktiriou tou armenikou demotikou skholeiou  lemesou 
 proerkhetai apo to maroko kai to onoma tou semainei to kalutero tou magaziou 
 eimaste sten arkhe mias megales ethnikes nikes e patrida mas perna apo theseis ntropes se theseis uperephaneias oson aphora sto kapnisma 
 anekei sten idia to  kai agorasteke to  
 to teliko skhedio ton xenon trapezon gia ten ellada 
 katagetai apo tis zestes periokhes tes indias opou kalliergeitai edo kai  khronia

 einai endeiktika auta pou sas leo 
 epises khresimopoieitai se trophima me khamele thermidike axia kathos epises kai os sumpuknotes 
 aphorme e katsika ton kapouleton pou ephage ta skoinia tes barkas ton montegon 
 metamorphose  tzitzikas ekhei parei ten telike tou morphe an kai akoma einai san phantasma oloaspros diaphanos se liges ores teleio entomo tha mporesei na petaxei na zeugarosei na gennesei abga 
 psemata pou ekporeuontai apo mekhanismous propagandas sto esoteriko kai sto exoteriko mekhanismoi oi opoioi me proskhema ten oikonomike krise sten patrida mas orgiazoun kathe deuterolepto 
 exairetika piata anamesa tous polles ntopies spesialite 
  trite psephophoria gia te suntheke programmatisteke gia tis  ianouariou ste douma opou to komma tes enomenes rosias ekhei ten apolute pleiopsephia 
  khara mou den perigraphetai 
 den mporoume na miloume gia gkrizes zones se mia toso anoikhte diadikasia 
 oti ta krate nomimopoioun to diakratiko sustema kai den nomimopoiountai apo auto 
 alatizoume kai psenoume se metrio phourno xeskepasto mekhri na rodokokkinisei 
 apo khthes to apogeuma e apostole brisketai sto mpormio opou arkhise ede proponeseis eno tha dosei kai pente philika paikhnidia 
 bazoume ten krema se ena mpol diametrou  ek 
  sergey einai katokhos ptukhiou me diakrise sta mathematika kai ten episteme upologiston apo to panepistemio tou merilant sto college park 
  demosiographos tes  aigaiou  kolozes autoptes kai enas ek ton pneumatikon idiokteton tou optikou ulikou pou diakinetheke panellenios exegei oti den parenebe sebomenos te deontologia 
 kata te diarkeia tes paramones tou tha tou dothei e eukairia na episkephthei ton gio tou manole pou kanei to metaptukhiako tou sten biokhemeia os upotrophos sto panepistemio tou arbor tou michigan 
 opoios boleuetai apo tis exelixeis sto talaiporemeno elleniko podosphairo speudei na tis ekmetalleutei 
  ethnike danias tha antimetopisei ten antistoikhe tes skotias kai me ten prote omada tha agonistei kai o ntenis romental tou olumpiakou o opoios omos den brisketai sta agonistika plana ton eruthroleukon 
  katabase diarkei  ores kai perilambanei stase gia xekourase sta libera 
 autou ton opoio uperetei na phantasteite o kurios tsokles 
  ekdelose oloklerotheke me ten apaggelia enos poiematos apo te dieuthuntria tou stathmou ka galuphianake 
 autos einai kai o logos pou diakheirizetai polu prosekhtika ta khremata tes den eimai katholou spatale alla oute kai tsigkouna

 ekei loipon e anekdiegete mpagern kataphere na khasei kai pali apo ten mpornto kai e mone mas paregoria einai oti pleon me ten etta tes aute ekhase kathe elpida gia prokrise kai paei spiti tes 
 oi ekdeloseis khthes xekinesan stis  to proi me episeme doxologia sto metropolitiko nao tou agiou mena khorostatountos tou sebasmiotatou arkhiepiskopou kretes k timotheou

   enose gunaikon elladas  
 oi phemes pou kuklophoresan sten agora gia proore entaxe tes khoras mas ste zone tou euro anathermanan to endiapheron ton ependuton me apotelesma oi times na anakampsoun 
 ogdonta treis sunolika lathrometanastes sunelephthesan ten  se ole ten epeiro kai epanaproothethekan ste khora tous 
 einai mageiremeno apla me ten authentike paradosiake suntage 
 para tis prospatheies pou katebale e dioikese gia to kleisimo kapoiou philikou paikhnidiou auto den kateste dunato ki etsi oi paiktes tha perioristoun sto proponetiko programma 
  kentrikos stauros sto dapedo me molubi idiaitera photismenos prokalei deos prin akoma phtasei o episkeptes 
  ispanos tekhnikos enemerose ton proedro tou olumpiakou baggele marinake oti einai kalummenos me tous markano kai kholempas gia te these tou aristerou mpak 
 poia etan e stigme pou edose othese stous athletes oste na paroun tous titlous etan  stigmes kai idiaitera to proto paikhnidi pou kerdisame ton  mesa ste gluphada 
  sumballoun ste diamorphose tes eklogikes bouleses 
 ean eniskhuthoun kata  to  pou leipei tha apotelesei ena terastio problema 
 ostoso opos episemainei o demarkhos mesa stis epomenes emeres anamenetai na xekinesei e demopratese mias seiras ergon pou kharakterizontai idiaiteres semasias gia to demo agiou nikolaou
