 ekdothekan  antitupa apo ta opoia  uparkhoun akoma semera ste diakheirise tou demou 
 apophasisteke na diorganothei kampania enemeroses ton paragogon pou tha perilambanei emerides se staphulokhoria 
 tria apo ta exi mele sumplerosan ede duo khronia theteias pou apoteloun kai to anotato orio sunekhomenes paramones stis sugkekrimenes theseis 
 theloun na ekphrasoun m auto ton tropo ten antithese tous stis perikopes kondulion kai proslepseon sto  
 epises ekhei ede katartistei kai demosieuthei to neo diathematiko eniaio plaisio programmatos spoudon  
 telos tes ebdomadas tha milesei me ton proedro tou sullogou k papakaliate eno ston agona me ton are ste thessalonike tha agonistei o  mpanon 
 to mono pou leipei apo to nesi mas einai to  kai oi ephemerides mou leei o xanthos galanomates kurios piso apo to tameio sto souper market sto bathu kai den mporo para na sumphoneso mazi tou 
 edo mesa kapoioi einai apsogoi ki exo metatrepontai se terata 
 glitose apo phulake glitose apo basanistikes anakriseis kai apo demosies diapompeuseis 
 eidikotera kathe soste apantese pairnei enan bathmo kai ste sunekheia e telike bathmologia sas sto test pollaplasiazetai me ton sunteleste   ekhei diarkeia 
 ephta gious kai ephta koritsia apektese loipon e medeia kai thelontas kata ten uposkhese tes eras na ta kanei athanata ta pere sto nao opou ta upebale se orismenes dokimasies 
  ourimpari ebgale ten kathete mpalia kai o kroates senter phor den duskoleuteke na nikesei gia deutere phora ton gkolkiper tou  
 to kathestos prepei na paradosei ten exousia gia na apopheukhthei peraitero aimatokhusia delose o mparak ompama kalontas tous antikathestotikous na sebastoun tous amakhous 
 ligo prin kai oi tesseris mazi me philous tous diaskedazan sten plateia tou prophete hlia sto paneguri pou ginotan ekei 
 sarosan oi mathetes tes lesbou ste b phase tou panelleniou skholikou protathlematos kopelasias orpheas enantion olumpou kai akhilleas enantion ethnikou gia mia these sten  topike 
 para ta oikonomika problemata pou kata kairous parousiazontai 
 oi agogoi phusikou aeriou kostizoun pio phtena apo ten metaphora tou me tanker kai etsi e epektase tous anamenetai na apotelesei te monime kai stathere luse 
 me arketa endiapheronta paikhnidia sunekhizontai semera ta topika protathlemata se oles tis kategories 
 auto tha ekhei os apotelesma to diktuo ton aerodiadromon sto  athenon na katarreusei kai e ellada na khasei ta  ekat 
 sostos polites einai o enemeromenos polites 
  empeirognomonas tou nauagiou tou samina kathegetes  papanikolaou mila sten  ta ellenika ploia einai asphale mekhri apodeixeos tou antithetou 
 opote auta den uparkhoun pouthena diadiktuaka den uparkhei pouthena e plerophoria mazemene sussoreumene 
  oraia pasa tou skoko ston tzimpour pou mpeke sten periokhe apo aristera gurise ten mpala sto upsos tou penalti alla to plase tou gkereiro ephuge pano apo ta dokaria tou sephake 
  polloi katoikoi tes poles antidroun kai dikaiologemena sten eikona ton paratemenon autokineton tonizontas oti empodizoun ten kuklophoria kai apoteloun estia molunses kai kindunou kurios gia ta mikra paidia 
 dedomene theoreitai os gnosto kai e kataskeue tou sphageiou sto arkalokhori 
 prosarmosmene kathara ste mesogeiake nootropia kalobalmene me aphthono kai abiasto khioumor 
 kai to aroma tous e antamoibe mas 
 me koutalaki tou glukou diamorphonoume sphikhtes koutalies soupias  gr 
 ekhete khresimopoiesei te zone tou karate nai to ekho kanei kai mporeite na rotesete ton suzugo mou 
 krataei konta duo ores kai einai empeiria monadike 
  odikos axonas pou ekhei meletethei gia na enosei to neo limani me ten pathe einai mekous peripou  metron me duo lorides kuklophorias ana kateuthunse diakhoristiko diazoma se olo to mekos tou kai pezodromia  metron ana pleura tes odou 
 oi plerophories anapheroun pos ekhoun ede pragmatopoiethei arketes epaphes me omilous pou pithanos endiapherontai na apoktesoun to pososto peri to  pou katekhoun oi minoikes sten etairia telepikoinonion 
  oson aphora to plethos ton parastaseon ekhei parelthei pia e epokhe ton paidion me tis medamines  proslambanouses 
 sugkekrimena sto  lepto o eleutheriades me sout apo konta ekane to  kai sto  lepto o bakouphares me atomike prospatheia kai plase to  pou emelle na einai to teliko 
 arthrographoi enemerose philenewscom tetarte  iouliou   pm aristos mikhaelides mia egesia pou xerei tis euthunes tes   pou graphoume auto to keimeno den xeroume pos exelikhtheke e nukhta me tis duo ekdeloseis mesa kai exo apo to proedriko 
 to brabeio omos egine aphorme gia kati akome pio semantiko 
 ta agiou giorgiou oi suggeneis ton phreskon apethamenon ekamnane tis pites me ladi kai zakhare isame  okades kai to moiratzan stous anthropous 
 kai pisteuo oti o antagonismos kai e amilla mporei na boethesoun pleon 
 parti gia te nea sulloge tes neas sezon swarovski me ta phtera tes phantasias sabbato  iouliou   steilte apo to kineto sas to menuma  sto  gia na labete dorean dokimastiko kodiko diarkeias duo emeron 
   mone elpida autes tes katastases einai na mathe o laos autos na papsei na elpizei se kommata kai na parei is euunes tou kai te zoe tou sta kheria tou 
  suskepse gia to paremporio argese na ginei 
  sumbolike katalepse sto mouseio kai ton arkhaiologiko khoro tes akropoles pragmatopoiesan to proi tes kuriakes oi idioktetes taxi oi opoioi moirasan phulladia stous touristes kai epetrepan ten eleuthere eisodo 
 ola deikhnoun oti e  ekhei khasei to treno kai o khronos ergazetai se baros tes 
 eureia nike moskholiou sto neo demo agriniou deutera  noembrios    
 stoma plousio me entone aisthese bareliou glukuteta kai tonismene oxuteta pou isorropei to sunolo 
 sto hrakleio stis  maiou e makhe sunekhizetai eos to bradu 
 ki auto giati me ten isunepeia tou are den mporei pote na eisai sigouros 
 opos sten prokhtesine omilia tou stous mathetes 
  ellada opos tha eprepe na te blepoun oi xenoi khoris problemata kai politika enokhletikes leptomereies se mia paragoge tou  gurismene apo to demiourgo tou koritsia ston elio 
  prote organomene makhetike diadelose tes neolaias egine ste leukosia stis  maiou  
    para ta petrodolara o traianos dellas sumphonese arga to bradu tes deuteras na sunekhisei ten kariera tou sten  dinontas oristiko telos stis ligostes elpides ton arabon 
  erakles apo ten alle theorei oti eprepe na timorethei me base to arthro  gia plastographia pou problepei apla prostimo kai okhi me base to arthro  gia dusphemese tou athlematos pou problepei upobibasmo 
 me ten tainia tou aute o phentortsenko ephtiaxe ena diaphoretiko elegeiako roountmoubi ena omorpho luriko poiema ston erota sto nero ste zoe kai sto thanato 
 anaptussei uperesiake takhuteta  kombon pou apotelei pagkosmio rekor sten kategoria tou kai tou dinei te dunatoteta na pragmatopoiei to dromologio erakleiopeiraias se  molis ores 
 paizei me te drakhme o roumpini 
 kai upenthumizan khthes oti e arkhike aitese tou kphoume aphorouse ten upopsephioteta tou gia aplo melos tes  e opoia meta te lexe tes prothesmias metetrape se upopsephioteta gia ten proedria kai khoris upographes 
 auto einai to elakhisto eidika meta ten katastrophike perusine khronia me ta  lepta to kilo 
 basikos tomeas e aigoprobatotrophia epileximes tha einai oi aigoprobatotrophikes monades me megethos toulakhiston ta  aigoprobata opos e dunamikoteta tous ekhei delothei sten teleutaia oristikopoiemene eniaia delose ekmetalleuses  
 meta tis proboles laib me tous zombina  skeletons apopse in the nursery aurio kai dirty granny tales ten kuriake 
 ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous sto kokkino exakolouthei na brisketai e entase guro apo ten upothese tou khuta pou epikentronetai to teleutaio diastema ste sustase tou phorea diakheirises 
 sostoi  ki an einai eidese 
 sten koruphe se these kentrike anamesa ste selene kai ton hlio o oktaktinos eothinos asteras 
 me aphorme tous olumpiakous agones eginan terasties idiotikes ependuseis 
  auton ton agona olo to organomeno  oloi oi suntrophoi mas einai dipla  dipla kai ekhoume ten apolute bebaioteta oti tha ekhoume ten dike mas sumbole sten megale aute prospatheia 
 sto plaisio tou programmatos ethnike politike eniskhuses uphistamenon kataskeuon to  prokhorese ston statistiko elegkho  
 tip meta ten anthophoria tou kladepste apo khamela tous palaious xulodeis blastous 
  browser pou ensomatonei e suskeue den einai allos apo ton gnosto ston khoro tou mac safari 
 oi khrestes tes epharmoges tha mporoun na diorthonoun ta onomata ton dromon ten kateuthunse kai ta empodia se autous apeutheias stous khartes tous kai na moirazontai tis allages me ten koinoteta khreston tes tomtom 
 me polle douleia kai kaka mathematika dunata skhemata tes ellenikes skenes oi warkaholics kai oi bad mathematics paizoun live rokenrol phank mplouz kai okhi mono sto rlanet ardettou  mets tel  
 pos to tlege o polukhroniou sten ekpompe tou kai 
  ino etan trophos tou dionusou giou tou dia kai tes adelphes tes semeles 
 ki as ekhei ede katatethei me akatanoete spoude to skhedio nomou ste boule 
 anoigoume to stethos tou kotopoulou ste mese kai to marinaroume me alati piperi kai moskhokarudo gia  lepta 
  tekhnologia aute einai sugkekrimene kai prepei na ekhei ta parakato kharakterisitka 
 anamesa se osous ekhoun protathei ston thrulo briskontai kai paiktes tou ouggrikou protathlematos 
 stous upopsephious tha dothei pleros o problepomenos gia ten exetase khronos ton  oron anexarteta apo ten ora pou tha dianemethoun ta themata 
 ede mia geuse pere o bouleutes giannes pittas me aphorme te sunenteuxe tou ste demokratike 
 oi demoskopeseis deikhnoun oti to  kleidonei ten autodunamia 
   termatophulakas o opoios upegrapse pentaetes sumbolaio sunergasias pragmatopoiese to ntempouto tou ste naimegken ton augousto tou  kai uperxe melos tes apostoles tes ollandias sta philika me brazilia kai ourougouae ton iounio 
  na agorasei duo nees metokhes gia kathe mia palia pou ede ekhei sten time ton  drakhmon ten kathe mia 
 exo apo to khorio dadia brisketai o oikotouristikos ksenonas pou diathetei  domatia kai apotelei apheteria gia peripatous se semademena monopatia alla kai gia boltes me podelato 
 ores leitourgias  pm eos  mm kai  
 kharakteristiko paradeigma diabroses apoteloun oi aktes tou nomou akhaias 
 para ta osa mporei na pisteueis oi times ste hollywood boulevard einai skete apolause 
 einai duskolo na pistepseis blepontas ten na perpata toso koul mesa sto natatorioum tes sangkaes oti aute e kopela epaskhe apo ten astheneia tou panikou kai etan mekhri kai anorexike 
 to senario auto proxenei phrike stis topikes periballontikes organoseis pou upologizoun oti e petrelaiokelida tha gigantothei 
 epises uparkhoun atoma pou endiapherontai na mathoun gia periousiaka stoikheia 
 sigoura o sunaisthematikos kai mono patriotismos den arkei gia na khtisei kati stereo kai thetiko 
 osoi gernoun uper ton eklogon tora biazontai na xekinesei e meta  karamanlike epokhe 
 oi kuries tou politistikou sundesmou zagorision kathos kai khoreutes tou philotekhnesan diaphora demiourgemata opos kentemata kosmemata emerologia keria kai gluka me stokho na sugkentrothoun khremata ta opoia tha diatethoun gia tous skopous tou kethea 
 meta te sunantese o proedros tes demokratias exephrase te khara tou gia te sunantese me ton arkhiepiskopo demetrio ton opoio opos eipe enemerose gia to kupriako pou polu apaskholei ten koinoteta opos kai ton idio 
 antitheta o meliaras meta apo epta khronia apotelei parelthon aphou de dekhtheke te meiomene prosphora pou tou egine eno akome den ekhoun apantesei oi soutzes ntaousianes 
 de ginetai eipe na ekho demotes sto grapheio mou kai na anoigei diarkos e porta apo upallelous pou mia phernoun ena eggrapho mia theloun kati na mou poun diakoptontas te suzetese 
 mutheumata tes mnemes ei de toi eniokhon te kai asteres eniokhoio skeptesthai dokei kai toi phatis eluthen aigos autes ed eriphon oit ein ali porphureouse pollakis eskepsanto kedaiomenous anthropous 
 ta leitourgika apotelesmata se epipedo omilou  diamorphothekan kerdophora sta  ekat 
  panagiotes etan ena apo ta paidia pou katalaba oti tairiazane ta 
  stibos einai athlema pou perilambanei ena euros somatikon drasterioteton pou basizontai stis kineseis tou treximatos sump 
 kai gia na ginei prepei na dosei poioteta sten politike tou 
 oi elegkhoi apo to demo ioanniton den stamatoun alla te nukhtas pou ginontai oi 
  opote xanabrexa ten koutra mou ki os skoupizomoun akouo ten kura apo dipla 
 aphou kathe ligo kai ligaki olo kai kapoios koumparos ebgaine ste demosioteta os  kubernese koumparon meiomenes apodoses 
 apanta se erotemata pou apaskholoun tous koinonikous epistemones skhetika me to rolo tes biomekhanias sten periphereiake anaptuxe eno parallela sunomilei me mia basike sunistosa autes tes anaptuxes ten anaduse tes koinonias ton politon 
 to sunolo ton katatheseon tou sugkrotematos anelthe stis  martiou tou  se  dis 
 epises basiko axiotheato tou gutheiou einai to romaiko theatro tou opoiou diasozontai ta themelia tes skenes alla kai ta kathismata ta opoia einai marmarina 
  k poppes o papaioannou o eugeniou kai o orphanides 
 to site xronosgr prosphata ananeotheke kai endekhetai na allaxan oi dieuthunseis orismenon selidon tou 
 antidemarkhos sunelabe upallelo tou demou ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous antidemarkhos sunelabe upallelo tou demou 
 ligotero entuposiake einai e eikona tou esoterikou opou arketa apo ta epiuerous tueuata pheroun ten upographe tes  kai uporei na ta sunantesei kapoios se arketes protaseis tou auerikanikou kolossou 
 ekeinoi einai etoimoi na ton upodekhtoun anamesa tous 
 ekhoume ten armodioteta apo ten epibole epiplexes kai prostimou mekhri kai parapompe ste dikaiosune 
 ekhoume sugkekrimeno programma gia ten krete 
 sten katasbese tes purkagias summeteikhan treis purosbestikoi upalleloi me ena okhema apo ten  egoumenitsas 
 ena thelo na patsiso 
 omos oi germanoi den epapsan na antidroun 
  kata erodotou loipon semera me to 
 anaphorika tora me ten ekprosopese tes kretes ste nea  o kkegkeroglou anapherei oti einai upotheke gia to mellon alla dekhetai oti ta poiotika kharakteristika autes tes ekprosopeses tha phanoun sten poreia tha apodeikhthoun ek tou apotelesmatos 
 kategoroume ten oikonomia kai tis politikes dunameis gia ten askheme katastase mas kai apaitoume ten aparaitete allage poreias 
 molis teleiosei to psesimo tou kaponiou bazoume to pouli se piatela kai to aphenoume pano sten anoikhte porta anabontas to phourno se thermokrasia khliare 
  periokhe ekhei omorphes geitonies kai kathos anebainete pros te minoike pole sunantate enan mikro misogkremismeno purgo pou einai se amese optike epaphe me ten kazarma 
  katartise tou proupologismou etan e base gia na antidrasei e ergatike taxe alla prostetheke e prospatheia gia katapatese ton asphalistikon katakteseon semeiose o k panagopoulos legontas pos to asphalistiko sustema paskhei apo apotelesmatikoteta 
 oi aionia deuteroi kataktontas ten prote these se aute ten diadikasia den mpainoun stous omilous tes koruphaias diasullogikes diorganoses 
 phusika mia pio luxury epiloge me mezonetes kai parokhes einai to santa marina arachova resort  spa pou eidika gia ta khristougenna ekhei etoimasei diaphora events gia paidia kai mia kainourgia paidike khara alla kai to elatos resort  health club 
 philika gia treis eruthroleukes ta prota tous philika me ten ethnike omada tha dosoun oi eruthroleukes eua khantaba eue kuriakidou kai anna kabbatha 
  argia kai e epokhe metetrepse to proskunema 
 liges emeres de meta tis ekloges tou oktobriou  oi bouleutes tou  sunagonizontan poios tha piesei perissotero gia ten plerome ton odoiporikon pou eikhan kopei 
 opos phainetai ston paratithemeno pinaka e eniskhuse ton timon tou kaphe xeperase kathe proegoumeno 
   matias kai patu mazi ep 
 kai ti san khasame ton emphulio opos theloun na ton kharakterisoun merikoi 
 parallela me ten aponome egkainiasteke kai e ekthese ton ergon pou philoxeneitai sten katallela diamorphomene aithousa apollo tou xenodokheiou creta maris opou tha parameinei epi ena mena 
 arkhike maios  panaigialeios pagonei epaoriston to elleniko podosphairo 
 sten terastia mesaionike plateia rynek glowny me ta entuposiaka ktismata kathomaste gia ligo se ena apo ta  mpistro kaphe upseles aisthetikes 
 bebaios e politeia ekhei ten kuria euthune meso ton elegktikon mekhanismon na antimetopisei to problema ste riza 
 kai pos tha mporouse alloste aphou den etan kan sten  
 ki opos kai na to kanoume philoi den eimaste 
  germanos protathletes kosmou exi phores niketes se ennea agones phetos termatise  kai ephuge apo te bretania me to sakouli gemato koukia

 einai to megalo stoikhema 
  uparkhei oute sto hrakleio uperesia pou oi upalleloi na men parakolouthoun ta proina ten poreia tou xrematisteriou 
 ektos kai an aphairouse apo ten parastase te skene mias gumnes gunaikas pou emphanizotan sten arkhe 
 kletheis na skholiasei ten exelixe ton gegonoton kai ten apotelesmatikoteta ton arkhon o k geroulanos apantese oti auto einai apotelesma tes sobares douleias pou ekhei ginei apo ten astunomia kai to upourgeio dikaiosunes 
  athletike ellada etan ede mia koinonia se parakme outos e allos e mono athletike epitukhia pou aphese ergo etan e kataktese tou eurompasket tou  
 ta genethlia tou ekhei semera  o proedros tes  olumpiakos baggeles marinakes 
 poioi einai autoi 
 to sumbolaio lexes iouniou ekleise stis  monades tou iouliou stis  kai tou augoustou stis  monades 
 krousmata apo ton io tou  neilou trite  augoustou   trite  augoustou   stadiaka auxanetai o arithmos ton anthropon pou molunontai me ton io tou dutikou neilou meta apo tsimpema kounoupion ste khora mas 
  ophe loipon kratese to meden sto proto  eno an etan pio tukheros mporouse na paei sta apoduteria ekhontas petukhei ena gkol aphou eikhe duo polu kales stigmes me tous nioplia kai digkoze 
 as kanoume kai ten ellada amerike 
  ellada einai mia khora monadikes phusikes omorphias 
 kai gia na men uparkhoun dikaiologies tou tupou auta den ginontai na tria skhetika paradeigmata apo ten europe opou e meiose ton skoupidion einai ontos proteraioteta 
 me apolute epitukhia pragmatopoietheke to sabbato  to tournoua junior to opoio organose o erasitekhnes   kai e etaireia proagoges psukhikes ugeias epeirou stis egkatastaseis tou staurakiou 
 autes oi megales pneumatikes morphes alla kai alles mikroterou belenekous idiaitera semantikes boethesan kai to kuriotero ethesan ta themelia gia na ekphrasoun kai oi neoteroi dianooumenoi e suggrapheis tis anesukhies mesa apo ta erga tous

 to demosio den ekhei katoikous 
 alla emeis tora balame anthropous na phulane 
 ten euthune anelaban oi talimpan me menuma tous sto galliko praktoreio eideseon 
 giati mporei os gnesioi ellenes na me theloume na paradekhthoume demosia oti pesame exo sten axiologese kai kata sunepeia sten epiloge tou autokinetou mas bathia mesa mas omos gnorizoume ten aletheia kai problematizomaste an ten ekhoume patesei 
 den uparkhoun epises ektheseis gia ten akribe phora tou blematos 
 gia prote pali phora kai dustukhos kai teleutaia eos semera demiourgeitai eidikos sullogos philon tes tzaz delade episemo somateio me titlo puthmike leskhe tes ellados pou exedide kai periodiko deltio me kritike ton diskon tzaz

 psemata gia ta apotelesmata ton thusion tou mnemoniou 
 sto plaisio auto o k anastasopoulos ektima oti to demosio mporei na ophelethei  dis 
  me email aphou tis skanarete sto  opos semeionei kharakteristika o k khiotes oso pio polles photographies mazeutoun toso pio antiprosopeutika tha einai ta almpoum 
 psilokobete ta phreska kremmudakia te glistrida ten piperia kai ton anetho 
 mporeite omos na egkataleipsete ten al kainta kai na summetaskhete se mia eirenike politike  
 sumphona me plerophories o amerikanikos kolossos  den prokeitai na summetaskhei sto trito diagonismo poleses ton  ta enopoiemena kerde khreses pro phoron tes mailles diamorphothekan se  dis 
 ekhoume demiourgesei polu kale omada 
 ston ekthesiako khoro tou pneumatikou kentrou o proedros tes demokratias tha egkainiasei ten ekthese thesauroi tes demotikes pinakothekes ioanninon 
 to tmema istorias tou ioniou panepistemiou organonei epistemonike sunantese me thema  didaskalia tes istorias sten ekpaideuse pou tha pragmatopoiethei ten trite  ora  mm sto amphitheatro  tmematos istoriasi 
 sumphona me ton mprukner ta krate einai axia tes tukhes tous opos kai oi anthropoi 
 ta problemata uperprosphoras alla kai koresmou proteinetai na antimetopisthoun sto plaisio tou neou eidikou khorotaxikou gia ton tourismo me aposurse ton gerasmenon katalumaton 
 uposterixe oti o prothupourgos upourgopoiese olous tous omadarkhes tou esoterikou tou antartikou kai exephrase ten apopse oti prophanos kati phobatai kai tous aphoplise me khartophulakia 
 sto metaxu sumboules dinei to institouto katanaloton epeirou 
 eunoethekame se duo paikhnidia ek ton opoion to ena to khasame alla eikhame to tharros na to delosoume 
 sto trekhon megethos tou to  den tha mporouse na sundramei ste diasose tautokhrona tes italias kai tes ispanias 
 oute ta uparkhonta tous oute ten time tous ma oute kai ten zoe tous mporesan na sosoun 
 ste sunekheia tha ginei moirasma prokeruxeon sten agora tes mutilenes 
  poluthruletos enallaktikos e thematikos tourismos ekhei meinei sta khartia 
 tha boethesoun tous iapones axiomatoukhous me tis gnoseis tous ste radiologia kai an khreiastei kai tis iaponikes enoples dunameis ston tomea tes iatrikes tes epimeleteias kai ton epikindunon ulikon dieukrinise amerikanos stratiotikos 
 oi polites mporoun kai prepei na steiloun menuma anupakoes kai apeitharkhias menuma sugkrouses me aute ten politike uperpsephizontas to agonistiko psephodeltio tou  
 sto deutero emikhrono e ksanthe etan kalutere alla oi epithetikes prospatheies ton paikton tes stamatousan se enan kataplektiko mario gkalinobits 
  ekei kai pera kai se atomiko epipedo nomizo oloi oi paiktes einai khresimoi kai o kathenas dinei kati sten omada 
 me to pou tha pesei to khruso oinopneuma sto poteri gualizoun ta matia tous san n astraphtei olokhruso cartier khresime paraterese 
 sumphona kai me to athenaiko praktoreio eideseon anakoinotheke tis protes proines ores to neo kubernetiko skhema me ton kerkuraio politiko telemakho khutere na epistrephei sten kubernese ste these tou anaplerote upourgou politismou 
 sto erotema gia to ti khreiazetai e sunetairistike trapeza semeiose oti e sunetairistike trapeza eimaste emeis oi idioi 
 resital pianou dinei e elene tsoutsou sto megaro mousike athenon apopse stis  
  k abrantines anapherei oti mekhri semera den ekhei brethei limani gia na anakhoroun ta ploia 
 sugkekrimena sto londino tou  anaptusetai ena krupho eidullio anamesa ston  agglo romantiko poiete tzon kits kai se mia  te phani mprooun kore tes spitonoikokuras tou pou ta domatia tous khorize enas toikhos 
 apo ten alle ta oikonomika dedomena tes upotheses opos tha ekhete diabasei kai tis proegoumenes emeres einai tetoia pou epitrepoun ten pragmatopoiese mias sumphonias anamesa stis duo pleures oste o paiktes na piasei limani 
  k mandalenakes upogrammizei oti ta ptukhia pou didontai apo ta bretanika panepistemia anagnorizontai apo to  
 sigoura odeuei pros adiexodo delose o nauarkhos maik malen milontas se amerikanous stratiotes ste bagdate anapheromenos sto thema ton makhon ste libue 
 sta apotelesmata tou a examenou  sumphona me te skhetike anakoinose tou omilou epikheireseon attikes perilambanontai anorgana esoda upsous  ekat 
 emeis tonise  xekinesame ten prospatheia mas apo ta mesa tou kalokairiou monoi mas 
 apo ekei kai pera thelo e sunekheia na einai analoge 
 stis dodeka to mesemeri dinontai mathemata tangko gia protaredes  pieite kaphe mpira e kante mathema 
 epises semera trite apergoun oi ekpaideutikoi tes protobathmias kai deuterobathmias ekpaideuses ste lesbo 
 ton teleutaio khrono auto ekhei mpei met epitaseos se oles tis sunanteseis pou eginan me to epiteleio tou upourgeiou oikonomikon kai mas diabebaiosan oti tha broun tropo oste auto na teleiosei 
 to kuriotero apotelesma bebaios tha proelthei apo te drase tou diplou peleku 
 se mia khora lousmene sto phos opou paramenei anthropine e klimaka mporoume na kratesoume tis metaxu mas skheseis se anthropino epipedo 
  idia omada mazi me ta tmemata upodomes ta tmemata enelikon kai arkharion antapokrinomenoi sten prosklese tou  tha episkephthoun ta gepeda tenis tes  agathoupoles to sabbatokuriako   iouniou  
 theoro pos o ares den ekhei probadisma isaisa oi kitrinoi den ekhoun kammia skhese me ten omada pou parousiasan ston proto guro kai tha duskoleutoun polu apo ton  
  kairos sto metaxu phthinoporiazei kai ede arketoi therinoi etoimazontai na kleisoun 
 telika oi limenikoi ton entopisan guro stis  to apogeuma okhi omos konta ste ntia 
  aristere oikologike sunergasia gia ten periphereia anatolikes makedonias kai thrakes einai mia apantese apo ta aristera sto mnemonio tes khreokopias anephere o alexes tsipras euriskomenos sto eklogiko kentro tou sunduasmou ste nikolaou zoide 
 ston proto proemiteliko pou arkhizei stis  e ollandia tha antimetopisei ten brazilia eno sto bradino mats pou tha xekinesei stis  e gkana me ten ourougouae tha diekdikesoun mia these sten tetrada 
 otan e lorena enemerose te geitonissa pegan konta tes oloi oi katoikoi 
 meta to  lepto e ntinamo pege to paikhnidi ekei pou to ethele dinontas katokhe sten  kai kleinontas tous diadromous pros ten estia tes 
 tora prepei na doume pos tha bgoume apo auten ten katastase neo rantebou ton duo pleuron tha pragmatopoiethei te deutera se mia prospatheia na phtasoun se sumphonia 
 to programma auto apotelei tmema tou skhediasmou ton  dis 
 apophasistheke e auxese tou metokhikou kephalaiou ton min 
 benizelos kata ten enarxe tou skhetikou dialogou sto upourgeio oikonomikon 
 sto teleutaio dekalepto oi gepedoukhoi meiosan stous treis  sto  
 gia to an problepei upobibasmo megalon omadon den to nomizo 
 se genikes grammes kalo einai na koimountai toulakhiston okto ores ten emera 
 peritrane apodeixe to stokhastiko muthistorema tou karlos phouentes to enstikto tes ines ekdoseis kedros 
  bretanos pilotos tes mclaren mercedes einai o niketes tou ouggrikou gkan pri 
  kentrike ekdelose pragmatopoietheke to bradu tes deuteras ste mutilene sto demotiko theatro tes poles me omilete to biographo tou mutileniou poiete demetre nikoretzo 
 apeuthune de kalesma enotetas kai summetokhes stous demotes gia na themeliosoun apo koinou to demo paionias se geres baseis 
  tha ginei sto pethumno e prote meta epheteiou sunantese ton nomarkhiakon epitropon kretes tou  upo ten proedria tou mikhale neonake 
    eos kai aurio anamenetai na diarkesei to kuma kausona me ton udrarguro na problepetai oti tha anebei stous  bathmous kelsiou se periokhes tes thessalias anatolikes stereas kai anatolikes peloponnesou 
 omos eikhe teleutaia eutukhos san epikephales tes stelekhos tes parataxes ampatze tes epokhes pou phuteuotan to phoinikodasos 
 kathe oikogeneia mia agele kurio kharakteristiko ton lukon einai o upselos bathmos koinonikes organoses pou basizetai sten austere koinonike ierarkhia 
 to reportaz tes istoselidas fansfccom anapherei to stori me ten apodesmeuse tou riokoker apo te bila eno tonizei kharakteristika oti o  mesos ekhei endiapherouses protaseis apo diaphora europaika klamp metaxu ton opoion einai phusika o thrulos 
 oi anthropoi pou apartizoun ta psephodeltia apotelountai skhedon sto sunolo tous apo anthropous pou tha etheles na ekheis philous 
 okhi gia tous dunatous oute tous ponerous alla gia tous pollous tous aplous autous pou pane me ton stauro sto kheri elpizontas oti oi ptokhoi to pneumati tha doun kapote to prosopo tou theou 
 mou apantese me thrasos ti na ten kaneis 
  stephan naskoph pou menei sto astritsi anebaine sten skepe tou katastematos aphairouse ta keramidia pou kaluptan to photagogo kai katebaine sto katastema apo opou eklebe ta khremata apo to tameio 
 dustukhos kai to prosopiko den einai eparkes eidika tis teleutaies meres pou polloi upalleloi apousiazoun kai me adeia 
 an to dekhontai na to kanoume 
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese theriakles pappous elikias  eton bretheke na katekhei dendrullio kannabes kai posoteta khasis sten kalumno kai sunelephthe 
 sto deutero emikhrono oi roumanoi piesan perissotero kai gia kapoia lepta eikhan egkatastathei sten periokhe tou kapinou o opoios omos se treis periptoseis antedrase sosta kai kratese to meden 
 zetese epises na me apoxenothei o bouleutes apo to epaggelma tou dioti auto tha stoikhisei ston koinobouleutiko bio 
 kai tora xanazetaei te psepho tou ellena 
 trite  augoustou   to perasmeno sabbato o demarkhos lesbou k bounatsos kalese ston papado tous ekprosopous ton topikon sumboulion ton exi khorion tes geras se koine sundiabouleuse 
 den prolabe na stegnosei kala kala to melani kai oi souedoi teresan tis 
 pempte  septembrios   arse tou plaphon apo khthes sta kausima alla 
  epikephales parataxes tes elassonos antipoliteuses kostas katsikes estiase ten kritike tou se tria semeia 
  empeiria to poluphotographemeno nauagio me karabaki apo ton agio nikolao kai to porto bromi 
 ta duo  erga sunolikou proupologismou  
 se diaphoretike periptose uparkhei o kindunos timorias tou sullogou 
 sumphona me osa uposterizei e etaireia sustatheke stis arkhes apriliou kai o idios anelabe merikes tekhnikes douleies opos na stesei tous pagkous kai to elektriko psalidi 
    aphierono te nike stous paiktes pou ekho ston pagko kai den epaixan ap ten arkhe tes saizon 
 epises e nomothesia pollon ethnon ta oikonomika sumpheronta kai alloi logoi den boethoun panta sten soste diakheirise tous 
 an antilambanomai sosta to pneuma tou eklektou sunadelphou to zetoumeno mallon einai e metabase apo ena proantiprosopeutiko politiko sustema despotikes kommatokratias se ena pleros antiprosopeutiko politiko sustema khoris kommata 
 protagonistes e topike autodioikese to proto kai kathoristiko bema gia te dioiketike metarruthmise pou odegei se enan neo kai protagonistiko rolo ten topike autodioikese einai kata tous eidikous e meiose tou arithmou ton demon 
 tha prepei gregora na bebaiothoume oti o kindunos metadoses se olo to oikonomiko sustema kai se oles tis khores mele tes eurozones einai upo elegkho semeiose 
 phetos ekhoume mprosta mas mia megale proklese pou einai e eisodos stous omilous tou champions league 
 tha ta khasoume ki auta kai malista oristika kai ametakleta 
  ekat pou semeiotheke kata to tetarto trimeno tou  
  epinoese tou etan to apotelesma mias arges exelixes tou antipragmatismou

 ston antipoda peripou  anthropoi sto israel ekhasan te zoe tous apo purkagia pou ekdelotheke khthes se dasos konta ste khaipha 
 sto agonistiko kouuati se exi agones seueiothekan teruata delade gkol ana agona arithuos skhetika ikanopoietikos analogika ue alles agonistikes 
 ten perasmene deutera ta  den eikhan ostoso kanena problema na ektoxeusoun mazika tetoia blemata enantion ton xesekomenon katoikon tes leukimmes 
  delose an sumbei se megale pole tes apoleias mporei na ginei se opoiodepote astunomiko tmema 
 na anadeixei ten dioikese tes kai na delosei phusika summetokhe sten dethnike pleon 
  sumbase metaxu tou demou pambotidos kai tou anadokhou upegraphe prin apo pente emeres stis  apriliou kai apomenei na oristoun oi epiblepontes tou ergou apo ten tekhnike uperesia demon kai koinoteton  
  upourgos georgias giorgos anomerites delose oti edose entole ste nomike uperesia na antimetopisei te nomike adunamia pou uperxe kai eikhe os apotelesma na akurothei apo to sumboulio tes epikrateias e skhetike upourgike apophase

 touto den einai philologiko mia kai o logos tou rapha mpeniteth emphanizetai parallaktikos sten tainia the  minutes that shook the world 
 phusika den tha mporousan na apousiazoun kai ta themata pou aphoroun sten gunaikeia omorphia 
 sunekhizetai e katephora tes liberpoul pou ekhase epeita apo  khronia apo te stoouk siti

 khortastike geuse me thaumasia isorropia kharakteristikon 
 giati gia otidepote kanei kapoios panta uparkhei ena kinetro 
 toso gia te rigane oso kai gia to siderite den epitrepetai e ekrizose tou phutou kai e aphairese olou tou blastou apo kathe phuto prokeimenou na diasphalistei o pollaplasiasmos tou 
 akolouthos orismenoi apo tous idioktetes ton polutelon katoikion prosephugan ek neou sto ste kai zetousan ten tritanakope ton se baros tous apophaseon tes olomeleias

  monakhikos anthropos o kur mikhales  suntaxioukhos thuroros  kathismenos sten kouniste tou poluthrona eikhe monadikes apolauseis to phageto kai ton upno

 idiaiteres pienes gnorisan khtes olaskhedon ta khoria mas alla tis megaluteres opos kathe khrono tis ezese to purgi 
 ekho panta ena makhairi mazi mou 
  kilkisiotes ebrize meso facebook kai to plerose akriba den ton khoneue ki apophasise na ton brisei kai na ton apeilesei 
 olos o protos orophos einai diamorphomenos se eniaio kathistiko me kouzina kai ena mikro  
 auton pou den exisonei ten pole me ton idio pou den ekhei epikentro ton eauto tou kai ton egoismo tou kata to meta apo mena to khaos 
 me ton miralas se megale bradia gia akoma ena paikhnidi kai ton riera se kephia sten kontra me ten omada tou aderphou tou o olumpiakos etan idiaitera apotelesmatikos kai epikratese aneta tou panioniou

  kathos kai tis upo idruse monades gia ton alkoolismo klp

 prospherei plerophories opos einai oi upsometrikes apostaseis stis diadromes sas e ora anatoles kai duses tou eliou e emphanise tes selenes kai einai kataskeuasmeno apo polu anthektiko plastiko 
 etsi skephtheke na askholethei sobara me ten emmetre diaskeue tou omerikou epous na to eikonographesei kai na to paradosei me agape ste nea genia 
 eikhane mazi tous xula lostous phtuaria tsougkranes soubles kai brizane aneleos 
 noritera apo tis problepomenes emeromenies prepei na oloklerothoun ta pagkretia protathlemata bolei gunaikon paidon kai korasidon 
 idiaitero xenodokheio diakosmemeno me palia ulika apo tous idioktetes niko kai marina 
 proporeuontai se pompe e philarmonike me maestro ton mousiko demetre kludoniare kai agema tes   ko kai akolouthei e eikona tes panagias tou kharou me ta anthismena krinakia o kathegoumenos arkhim 
 to trithuro  concept entuposiazei aisthetika tautizetai se megalo bathmo me to montelo paragoges kai khresimopoiei ena neo patoma to opoio tha apotelesei te base gia mia oloklere oikogeneia autokineton

 zekiou gia katokhe oplon 
 kai apotelei pepoithese tou neou tekhnikou pos e omada tha mporesei toso suntoma na brei ten agonistike tautoteta oste na prolabei na xanampei sto kolpo tou titlou 
 olumpiakosaoan phinokaliotes athenas theodoropoulos  detses gennaios athenas koutes thessalonikes 
 sten perigraphe tou agona o tasos kollintzas stis  o iakobos philipouses tha einai kai pali konta mas gia na skholiasei tous agones mazi me tous kalesmenous tou 
 eide enduses kai upodeses gia ole ten oikogeneia kai plethora elektrikon elektronikon suskeuon kai eidon oikiakou exoplismou prospherontai stis khameloteres times tes agoras 
  episkepse aute etan epithumia tou patera tes 
 upenthumizetai oti o italos prothupourgos eikhe kathusteresei na dosei prasino phos ste summetokhe tes italias stis diethneis epikheireseis ste libue 
  asphalos den ekhei sta kheria tou auta ta entupa o k kammenos 
 sunolika anodika kinethekan  metokhes  ptotika kai  paremeinan statheres 
 ole mera ston elio gia na maurisoun kai to mono khroma pou kataphernoun einai tou kotopoulou soublas 
 omos enas apo tous suntrophous tou odussea periergos otan autos apokoimietai apokamomenos kai esukhos giati plesiazoun ten ithake anoigei to aski kai tote xepedoun apo mesa tous oloi oi anemoi ormoun sto pelagos kai sekonoun phourtouna phobere 
 oi armodioi erthan se epaphe me tis paraskeuastries etaireies gia antikatastase tou exoplismou pou aphora kurios monades entatikes therapeias 
 ego troo diaphores blakeies giati ekho pakhunei epikinduna kai prepei na kano diaita kai esu geuesai diaphores likhoudies ephoson ole mera trekheis kai den ekheis problema barous 
 prosthetoume to khumo kai zumonoume se metria zume pou na men kollaei prosthetoume an khreiastei ligo aleuri e nero 
 protoemphanizetai sta grammata to  me te sulloge thalassines phones 
 alla oi ellenes aristeroi ekpaideutikoi eno ekhoun orkisthei piste ste demokratia prospathoun na metadosoun stous mathetes tous ideologia pou ten epibouleuetai kai proothei ton oloklerotismo tes diktatorias tou proletariatou 
   methodos ton mikrodoruphorikon alleloukhion tou purenikou kai khloroplastikou   delade e sugkrise me base te seira ton baseon sto noukleiko oxu epitrepei te genetike tautopoiese ton poikilion tou ampeliou me anuparkte pithanoteta sphalmatos 
 milesame gia tous daskalous kai tis daskales pou uperetousan sto protupo ton khaniotake ton dieuthunte ton kapetanake ten kuria marika ten kuria kornelia te despoinida pope tis alles daskales 
 opos diapistosa oi aimateres makhes kai ta teratomorpha ork gia kapoious einai ena anoduno theama

 georgiou  logiades st 
  eipe o k mpelles dinontas ten entupose oti oi allages stis ergasiakes skheseis eginan epeide tis ethelan oi ergazomenoi 
 ena apo ta threskeutika dromena etane kai to ek gunaikos pegazei ta kreitto me proexarkhousa ten koruphaia protagonistria eirene papa pou sten ermeneia tes sunodeuotan apo treis poluphonikes kai poluprosopes gunaikeies khorodies 
 den einai tukhaio oti e tourkia proballetai os protupo stis mousoulmanikes khores alla kai os gephura me to dutiko kosmo 
 kai malista einai to megalutero aktinologiko pou ginetai sten europe kai to deutero megalutero pagkosmios meta to amerikaniko 
  epibole poines khoris na anapheretai poio organo ten epebale apo poious sugkrotetheke pote kai pou sunedriase kathista ten apophase aute nomika asterikte kai gia tupikous kai ousiastikous logous aparadekte 
 to logo pere ekprosopontas to  kai o strategos dioiketes tes  merarkhias upostrategos k karagiannopoulos metapherontas ten these oti uparkhei kale diathese gia na epiluthei to zetema me to stratopedo belissariou 
 de mporei na pei oti phrontizei kai para polu oste na troei ugieina e olga mpotse tes opoias to diaitologio perilambanei oles tis trophes khoris kamia idiaitere protimese 
 kanonika ostoso dienergeitai apo te miamise to mesemeri e kuklophoria ton okhematon epi ton ethnikon odon stis treis kentrikes exodous tes poles tes thessalonikes kathos elexe o dioros apokleismos tous apo idioktetes taxi 
 dedomenou omos tou bathous tes krises einai saphes oti den tha krithei se dromo takhutetas alla se dromo emiantokhes 
 monon pou ola auta sumbainoun mekhri tis  strophes giati apo ekei kai pano e duname einai tose pou aphenos tromazei kai apheterou sekonei paneukola ton empros trokho ston aera 
 to epikentro prosdiorizetai sta  peripou notioanatolika notia tes karpathou kai to estiako bathos se  peripou khiliometra 
 sto iatreio tes erkhetai kathemerina se epaphe me mikra paidia e idia einai metera tessaron aggeloudion opote e empneuse einai kati pou semera de stereitai 
  omilia me thema  ellada apo te melouna ston ebro kai sten krete 
 apo auten ten kategoria exairountai a osoi eikhan sumplerosei mekhri ten  
  eleuse sto nesi tou nikou lurake tha epipherei exelixeis sto kuaneruthro stratopedo 
 apo ekei kai pera roma kai latsio ekanan to kathekon tous kai exasphalisan mia these sto europa league 
 ta ekkhionistika mekhanemata den ephtanan mekhri ekei kai gia to logo auto ephtasan mekhri ton  ioanne mathioudake pezoporoi kai koubalontas ton stous omous tous ton ebgalan apo to skotadi sto phos 
 sto semerino ton antapokrite analambanei na kanei o idios o dioiketes st 
  enallage ton kalliergeion einai to monadiko oplo sten antimetopise arketon astheneion alla kai ekhthron 
 sten gallia ta  kai sten italia ta  khronia 
  pragmata pou prepei na gnorizoume gia na ta apolambanoume khoris tupseis apo ten eirene paskhalere 
 se periptose pou odegethei sten trapezike agora tha ginei prosklese ekdeloses endiapherontos kai tha apophasisoun skhetika me tous orous e ektelestike epitrope kai to demotiko sumboulio 
 kommati tou odostromatos xekollese kai e periokhe metetrape se limne eno plemmurisan kai aules spition 
 eikhame megalutere summetokhe sten apergia omos oi ergazomenoi ekhoun perioristei semantika 
 sten os ano sunedriase parestesan e antiprosopeuthekan  metokhoi ekprosopountes  
 uperkhe mia usteria se olous na bgaloun lephta 
   lukos ekhei mathei 
 sten prote periptose einai semantiko na kalupsoume oso ginetai megalutere apostase kai na kanoume oso to dunaton perissotera karteria 
 editors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia deutera bradu pelates telephonei sto spuros kai basiles kai zetaei trapezi gia enan gia to sabbato 
 einai olon mazi 
 ekleisan oi logariasuoi ue to parelthon elegan kai osoi den antapokrithekan sto kalesua tes ephorias tha upoballontan se austerous elegkhous

  metokhes delade tis ede uparkhouses

 na bgazoume mia kalutere poioteta douleias exegoun 
 an nioseis ten parousia ki allon na kathontai dipla sou eno den uparkhei kaneis einai giati ta pagkakia einai aphieromena se anthropous pou perasan ateleiotes ores tes zoes tous rouphontas ten idia thea 
 oi neoi semera einai authormetoi 
 gia ten kainouria ekpompe tou giorgou papadake tis phemes gia ta prosopa pou tha plaisiosoun ton gnosto demosiographo milese sten kamera tou star o giannes latsios 
 malista pegaina sto idio semeio 
 akoma kai oi nomimes den mporoun na elegkhthoun 
  asphalos kai den mporoun abasanista na uiothetethoun 
 dustukhos e seira ekhei mono  epeisodia 
 oi khorodoi tou agiou demetriou kai e mantolinata edosan ton kalutero eauto tous sten teleutaia tous emphanise epi australianou edaphous 
 mia phora ton khrono stis arkhes ianouariou e tekhnologia sunuparkhei aruonika ue ton tzogo uias kai sto las begkas praguatopoieitai e uegalutere ekthese katanalotikes tekhnologias ston kosuo 
 diaphonoun me papandreou sumphonoun me samara    kolapho gia ten kubernese kai ton prothupourgo apotelese demoskopese pou demosieutheke khthes 
 ston  briskontai se anazetese enos gkarnt gia na eniskhusei ten omada gia ten sunekheia tou protathlematos kai oi anthropoi tou dikephalou ekanan protase ston ntionte kristmas 
 se duo menes apo tora ostoso ta pragmata tha einai polu pio duskola 
 kai auto tha to deixoun me ten summetokhe tous stis panelladikes kinetopoieseis 
 mporeite apo ton molo tes kato basilikes na metabeite me te boetheia barkaredon tes periokhes kai epeita apo mikro dromologio sto spelaio tou agiou nikolaou notias barasobas ustera apo suntomo anephoriko perpatema 
 to problema sumphona me to demarkho einai pos oi prokeruxeis pou eginan to proegoumena khronia gia monimes theseis apo te demotike arkhe etan medenikes plen tes demotikes astunomias 
 emas stokhos mas einai e drastike allage ton oron tou mnemoniou delose khthes kata te diarkeia tes enemeroses ton suntakton o ekprosopos tupou tou kommatos giannes mikhelakes kai epanephere gia deutere sunekhe emera to paradeigma tes irlandias 
 uposterixe oti o stokhos einai ephiktos khare sta  upokatastemata pou diathetei e trapeza se ole ten ellada kai ste drasteriopoiese tes se olo to phasma ton sugkhronon trapezikon proionton 
   tha eimaste etoimoi leei e anna diamantopoulou  
 to teleutaio diastema oi dioikountes ten kerkura briskontai se diapragmateuseis me ten  gia ten metagraphe tou demetre konstantopoulou kai opos ola deikhnoun briskoun semeio epaphes 
  nearos epithetikos ekhei aphesei polu kales entuposeis kai ston lazlo mpoloni o opoios deikhnei pos tha ton ekhei metaxu ton proton tou epilogon gia te nea periodo 
 tsatso eisegete olokleres tes antipoliteuses 
 ta duo apu auta briskontai sten upaithro stis moires kai sto arkalokhori kai ta upoloipa sten pole tou hrakleiou 
 sto semeio auto na thumethoume te sumbole tou gia ten axiopoiese pou ekame sta diaphora exokklesia tes periokhes 
 pagkosmia trapeza  ekat 
  epistrophe tou demetre samara kai e apoktese tou kenan mparkan einai ta duo teleutaia apoktemata gia ten omada tes beroias e opoia phusika den ekhei oloklerosei oles tis metagraphes tes akome 
 oute kai tora xekatharistekan opos semeionoun mele tes epitropes alla pleon ekhei ginei saphes kai uparkhei pleres enemerose tes k genikou kai phtanei e ora ton apophaseon 
 sto eurompasket neon tou mpilmpao e ellada katsibeles  gnorise baria etta   apo te germania sten premiera tes b phases kai apopse  
  dioikese anamenei epises thetike epidrase ste leitourgike kerdophoria tou omilou aphou kata to  e ependuse ston omilosaphak suneisephere peripou  ekat 
 kata ten apokatastase tou theatrou ton philippon to  egine ektetamene khrese tsimentou 
 to problema demiourgei to pepalaiomeno udreutiko diktuo sto opoio prokalountai sukhnes blabes me apotelesma na men ginetai omala e udrodotese ton katoikon tes periokhes 
 kai apo oti xero uparkhoun tetoia atoma sten periokhe 
 autodioikese kratos oloi apontes 
 to idio uliko apostelletai kai gia dianome se grapheia tou  sto exoteriko se presbeies kai proxeneia touristika grapheia kai demosiographous 
 epipleon ean eiste eggamos prepei na semeiosete  epano ste lexe  den semeionetai kh apo diazeugmeno e apo opoion brisketai se khereia e se diastase 
  aperioristo kostos suntheseis gia media center   katalleloi gia anaparagoge eikonas kai ekhou me kostos  
 den mporousa omos na men antapokritho sto kalesma tes sustrateuses 
  atukhos neos metaphertheke amesa me stathmo tou  sto geniko nosokomeio tes larisas opou diapistotheke o thanatos tou 
 arnetiko einai to klima sta europaika khrematisteria kathos ta gallogermanika skhedia gia megalutere sunainese ste demosionomike diakubernese tes eurozones den kataphere na peisei tis agores 
 ki erkhetai ena skitso pou alieusa apo ten istoselida mias philes 
 einai to epineio tou trikeriou me to palio karnagio apo tis epokhes pou ta trikeriotika karabia metepheran ta proionta tou peliou se ola ta limania tes anatoles 
 edosa ton agona me autaparnese me kritike dusanaloge gia te dike mou euthune 
 enas allos tropos einai e eniskhuse 
 eikhame kai kamposes brokhes tis eukharistethekame kai bebaia perimenoume kai alles 
 to kupello sten komotene epheran oi paides tes  thrakes gia prote phora nikontas to antistoikho sugkrotema tes  peiraia sta penalti me  
 epanastase pou gia na eimaste dikaioipherame emeis oi idioi oi demosiographoi me ton idrota mas 
 einai ikane alla akonizei kai tis ikanotetes tes den ephesukhazei e douleia den te phobizei psakhnei diarkos kai anazetei kainourgia pedia 
  diaphora metaxu tes times ekdoses kai tes onomastikes axias kathe metokhes tha akhthei meta ten aphairese ton dapanon tes ekdoses sumphona me to nomo kai to katastatiko se pistose tou logariasmou apothematiko apo ekdose metokhon uper to artio 
 tetarte e   pou kerdizei pontous sten oikonomia benzines usterei omos se dunamike aisthese odegeses kai stous khorous gia tous piso epibates

 to psekasma sunekhizetai aute te phora se eutheia bole kai apo mikre apostase  
 den sekonei kephali e gioube video oute sten edra tes tsezena kataphere na kerdisei e gioubentous paroti proegetheke me  sto xekinema tou agona 
 oi sullephthentes einai mia  upekoos boulgarias kai o  pakistanos suntrophos tes odegethekan semera ston eisaggelea me tis kategories tes parabases tou nomou peri uiothesias  epitropeias  apodokhes anelikou 
 auto akribos sematodotese o kharakterismos tou anthimou ek merous tou mpoutare os moutzakhintin dioti opos iskhuristeke xepheugei apo ton thesmiko tou rolo 
 omos o esoterikos kepakos tou kapheestiatorio  pou anekei ste skhediastria modas nicole fahri kathos kai ta trapezia sto pezodromio einai kataplektika

 ta kathara tes kerde pro phoron diamorphothekan sta  ek

 epi pleon einai mia mousike glossa pou eiserkhetai stis kardies kai sta sothika ton anthropon 
  opheile omos einai  dis kai oi tokoi  dis me apotelesma e enose na adunatei na tous exophlesei 
 me tis energeies tous autes apaxionoun akome perissotero to thesmo tes  prokalontas tautokhrona ten koine gnome kathos oi idioi kataggelloun pragmata gia ta opoia pro tetramenou etan oi idioi kataggellomenoi 
 ama einai na ginoume europe na arkhisoume apo kapou 
 ta graphika tou sunepos einai metria ta ekhetika ephe tupika se bareto bathmo eno e mousike akougetai skhedon san 
 sten etaireia aute o omilos fourlis summetekhei me pososto  meso tes thugatrikes tou sten ellada intersport athletics  ekhontas tautokhrona ton dioiketiko elegkho eno to upoloipo  anekei ston mekhri protinos franchisee 
 osoi ekhoun adeies meta tis  iouliou  mporoun na taktopoiesoun tous emiupaithrious alla kai opoiadepote alle poleodomike parabase me te ruthmise gia ta authaireta 
 ki ego thelo o kathenas na skephtetai me ton idio tropo 
 to siopelo blemma tou mikrou protagoniste planatai sto mounto topio tes kathemerinotetas kai plemmurizei me sunaisthema ten othone

  nomarkhiake autodioikese ekhei anakoinosei oti e stremmatike eniskhuse tha katablethei mesa sto martio 
 sto  o kepouros exoudeterose me ekplektiko tropo ten apeutheias ektelese phaoul tou spesialista rouseph eno sto  o boulgaros eide nea ektelese phaoul na stamata sto dokari 
   anuparxia diatheses ton aparaiteton poron prokeimenou tekhnokrates tou tourismou na kateuthunoun kai na sumbouleuoun to politiko prosopiko gia to pou prepei na summetekhei o organismos exoikonomontas kondulia apo askopes summetokhes kai energeies 
  periphereiake suneidese den einai mono sta khartia kai sta logia 
 na kapos san na apodido times ste mneme kapoiou eroa pou xekhasteke 
 epises diapistotheke oti oi proslephthentes emphanizoun omoia kharakteristika opos o topos katagoges kurios nomoi larises kai rodopes ergasiake empeiria sto demosio os sumbasioukhoi e ergazomenoi se grapheia bouleuton kai genikon grammateon 
  katataxe ton xenodkheion se asteria kathusterei 
 phantasou na epanasundeontan oi 
 eidikotera se oti aphora tis khoregikes sumbaseis upenthumizoume oti tropopoiethekan me ten prostheke retron bias kai diaphaneias 
 se kapoia stigme tes sunenteuxes o zagorakes xespase otan kai pali to thema pege sta oikonomika emeis pantos tha leme ten aletheia ston kosmo gia ta oikonomika dedomena 
 koruphaia kai koine mas pepoithese einai e anabathmise tou demou kilkis 
 sullepse leston taxi meta apo katadioxe    sunelephthesan meta apo katadioxe duo albanoi elikias  kai  khronon pou eklepsan taxi tou opoiou ton  odego eikhan apeilesei proegoumenos me oplo gia na katebei apo to okhema 
 peran omos tou kubernetikou oramatos gia mia 
 kai prosthese ta nea einai idiaitera thetika gia tis anaduomenes oikonomies kai tis anaptussomenes khores idios gia ten aphrike opou o tourismos anagnorizetai olo kai perissotero os mokhlos anaptuxes ton exagogon kai tes apaskholeses 
 malista e sklere pteruga ton sundikaliston proteinei kinetopoieseis endekhomenos kai pros to telos autes tes ebdomadas ean den exelikhthoun thetika oi diapragmateuseis 
 ta mazepse kai pege sto nesi ap opou katagetai te naxo 
 te summetokhe tes ste  genike apergia ekhei anakoinosei kai e    e opoia apophasise na prokhoresei se seira kinetopoieseon 
 sta themata tes asphaleias tou polite milontas kai os eidikos anapherei oti tha prepei na ginei pleres anadiarthrose tes demotikes astunomias 
 ephoson to epithumoun mporoun na proetoimastoun gia entaxe se therapeutike koinoteta tou kethea 
 ena megalo eukharisto ste dioikese ston demarkho stous sunergates kai sto prosopiko gia ten uperokhe khronia pou perasame sto marousi

 meta ton epanaleptiko opou e omada tou dikephalou epibletheke me  ste nea philadelpheia den etan ligoi autoi pou thumethekan ton proto agona sto  
  k terezakes na askholethei me to problema tou neou kanonismou diaitesias ekhei iere upokhreose os melos tes  kai na men bgainei ston tupo gia na epideixei ton eauto tou os kalos samareites 
 theoreitai o protos polites tes amerikanikes epeirou pou episkephteke ton elleniko khoro 
 oi skeptomenoi kai statheroi opadoi tes  apaitoun komma me arkhes me orama me elpida 
 polu semantiko einai oti e  prospherei duo khronia egguese me paralabe kai paradose ston khoro tou telikou khreste kati spaniotato ste khora mas gia tous perissoterous kataskeuastes 
 me autous tous orous a o ekpaideutikos epitheoretismos de sundetheke me tis sunolikoteres axiologikes ektheseis  
 aitia ta aderphia mas oi guphtoi gia tous opoious oi katoikoi ekhoun exapolusei pampolles kategories 
 tora uparkhei kai perissoteros khronos kai perissotera khremata 
 einai orismenes phores ephialtes gia mia gunaika na men mporei na perpataei diaphoretika akoma kai tis stigmes tou megalou odurmou 
 peges apo ton omilo pantos theoroun oti uparkhei akoma perithorio gia diapragmateuseis me ten  eno kukloi tou upourgeiou oikonomias parapempoun sto orizontio skhedio pou katartizei e kubernese gia te sterixe tou kladou 
 parallela topikes brokhes kai sporadikes kataigides tha semeiothoun kurios sta anatolika kai notia eno khionia tha pesoun sta oreina 
 dedomena me  lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese    diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai oi kheimoniatikes nukhtes rikhnoun to peplo tous apo to apogeuma sten proteuousa tes souedias 
 khomatodromos mekous peripou  khlm 
 oloi oi kineteres sunduazontai me emiautomato seiriako kibotio  skheseon 
 arketa khiliometra makria apo to hrakleio sto khorio makres tou demou zarou leitourgoun exi xulophournoi apo epikheirese pou diaterei e kuria euphrosune phanourake kai paraskeuazei paradosiako psomi kai ta paximadia beltiston 
 to perissotero semantiko omos einai oti eiserkhomaste se mia epikindune phase stis ellenotourkikes skheseis 
 to pathos kai ton tsampouka pou eikhan ta ebgazan se stigmes ektos paikhnidiou 
 oi proegoumenes epta emeres pou perasan etan anadiamphisbeteta oi pleon endiapherouses apo ten katarreuse tes lehman brothers ton septembrio tou  gia tous psukhraimous ependutes 
 nai den mas boethese e tukhe alla e euthune anekei se mas 
 kata ton kleiston panepistemion pempte  augoustou   pempte  augoustou   kata ton kleiston panepistemion takhtheke o neos prutanes tou panepistemiou kretes euripides stephanou sto perithorio tes sunanteses me tous kretes omogeneis 
 ede uparkhoun oikogeneies oi opoies sten prooptike tou kleisimatos tou skholeiou delonoun oti tha phugoun apo to khorio 
 alloste opos uposterizoun oi kinetopoieseis pou eginan to perasmeno kalokairi se lemno kai athena etan gia na apotrepsoume kai na allaxoume tous orous tou upo exelixe diagonismou 
 sta nosokomeia tou omilou ekhoun gennethei pano apo  khiliades paidia pano apo to  ton sunolikon genneseon sten ellada kai konta sto  ton genneseon sten attike ten teleutaia  
 to  ekhei megale istoria epitukhion sto diagonismo me kataktese   e  theses ta proegoumena khronia 
 to noembrio tou  diethnes epitrope sten opoia summeteikhan  egkritoi epistemones ap olo ton kosmo anakoinone ta apotelesmata  ereunas sumphona me ten opoia e arktike zestainetai me takheis ruthmous 
 aporrophaei ten eliake energeia kai trophodotei enan apotamieutera thermotetas makras diarkeias o opoios exasphalizei te thermanse tou ktiriou to kheimona 
  paidia tragoudoun khoreuoun zographizoun kataskeuazoun kai khamogeloun 
  anazetese me lexeis kleidia e me ton kodiko  tou proiontos 
 gia ten bethnike kseroume oti einai ena protathlema pou krubei polles pagides 
 tis duo apo tis treis autes kategories axiomatikous kai oplites tis ekhoume analusei sta proegoumena mas arthra 
 pros to paron o broules tha egkainiasei to proto kai trito tmema tou periphereiakou dromou 
 to krupho menuma tou pantele kazakou  panteles kazakos ebgaze aphrous apo to stoma skhedon omothume uperxe e antidrase ton diamorphoton tes legomenes koines gnomes sta ratsistika egklemata tou  kazakou 
 sten kalogerike aphosiotheke tous treis teleutaious menes o stamates kraounakes proetoimazomenos ste thessalonike gia to ntempouto tou sto theatro kai malista sten epidauro os dikaiopoles 
 sten epithese tora e apousia tou konstantinou tha einai emphaneis alla kaneis den mporei na problepsei kati perissotero 
 oi pontiakoi aetoi to epraxan kai se mia semantike athletike ekdelose phoresan to antigrapho tes phanelas tes istorikes omadas pontos paizontas podosphairo 
 analogo eggrapho estale apo to nomarkhe kai stis uperesies tes nomarkhiakes autodioikeses prokeimenou na entathoun oi elegkhoi sten agora tou nomou kai idiaitera tes poleos tou erakleiou epiballontas tis problepomenes kuroseis 
 tha ton brei otan apodekhtei poios telika uperxe o antras tes zoes tes 
 metaxu ton nekron einai kai o bombistes o opoios eikhe anameikhthei me tous nearous pou perimenan exo apo ten ntiskotek 
  dienergeia tes eisaggelikes ereunas eikhe zetethei apo ton upourgo dikaiosunes me skhetike paraggelia tou pros ton eisaggelea tou  pan

 malista o mikhales pantoulas zetese suggnome gia ten upanakhorese aitiologontas ten me ten anagke na dothei nai luse en meso oikonomikes krises pou den epitrepei na egkataleiphthei to ergo 
 prokhorame pros ten anaptuxe enos kratous dikaiou enos kratous ousiastika koinonikou sto opoio oloi oi polites tha mporoun na demiourgoun na ergazontai na apolambanoun iatrikes asphalises kai perithalpses na pairnoun meros sta koina 
 den statheke omos ekei 
 idiaitera osoi pairnoun pharmaka na sumbouleutoun ton iatro tous an tha prepei na ta sunekhisoun kai se poia dasologia 
 to onoma kai oi tropoi prootheses tou einai stoikheia pou boethoun alla den kathorizoun to an tha apodeikhthei demophiles e okhi 
 oi kitrinomauroi den ekhoun problema na diapragmateutoun te metagraphe tou  akoma kai me ellenikous sullogous arkei na ikanopoiethoun oikonomika 
 ta parizianakia erkhontai gia na dokimasoun kainourgia phageta na exereunesoun tis dunatotetes tou ouraniskou tous na anakalupsoun tis protimeseis tous na gnorisoun tous anthropous pou ergasthekan gia ten eukharistese tous 
 etan mia programmatismene sunantese e opoia tha ginetai kathe exi menes opos apophasisame 
  xekiname apo ton peiraia gia ten mukono 
 kai o philathlos kosmos ton ioanninon perimenei pos kai pos to mats gia auto kai ekhei ginei skhediasmos gia ten parousia tou sto gepedo 
  tasos mpoulmetes epistrephei sunekhos stis tou mpouenos aires mia pole sten opoia niothei oikeia kathos eno brisketai sten akre tou kosmou moiazei me metallagmene mesogeio 
 prokeitai gia theseis noseleuton paraiatrikou prosopikou odegon kheiriston elektronikon upologiston 
 auto to paradeigma prepei na akolouthesoume kai ste khora mas an theloume na ekhoume ousiastika apotelesmata 
 ste sunekheia e epitrope tha exetasei to aitema tes elladas gia apaleiphe tou prostimou pou ekhei upoblethei ste khora mas gia te leitourgia tes kharadras tou kouroupetou 
   tha summetaskhei sto diethne marathonio tes romes stis  martiou  kai kalei osa apo ta mele tou epithumoun na laboun meros na epikoinonesoun me ton ephoro tou sullogou sto tel 
 sto gialiskari kai ste lagkada kato apo tous theoratous platanous 
    kupria athletria elene artumata perase me khrono  pou apotelei nea pagkuprio rekor sta emitelika ton  
 kapote khairomastan apoluta dikaiologemena me ta cocktails pou ephtiakhne o photes krikzones sto thruliko  sto upogeio tes odou boukourestiou 
 prin apo  khronia xekinesa to diko mou taxidi sto khoro tes politikes 
  apodose diamorphotheke sto  semeioontas auxese kata  se skhese me ten proegoumene demoprasia 
  mia boutia stis cenotes tis limnes me phresko nero diaspartes se ole te khersoneso tou yucatan 
 ego de the na kartero k e ora me spoudazei ekeion pou mou lete eseis den prepei kai de moiazei 
 okhi mono ta paidia kai ta aggonia tha se peirazoun epeide den ekheis perase ste zoe 
 test pou oloklerotheke me nikete ton proto me  
 me to zetema na pairnei sunekhos politikes diastaseis milese o ekprosopos tupou tou leukou oikou tzei karnei 
 dustukhos gia pempte phora sta teleutaia exi khronia semeiotheke apousia skaphous tou polemikou mas nautikou alla e parousia tes mpantas tes   apo ten rodo sunetelese kathoristika sten pragmatopoiese olon ton ekdeloseon tou diemerou 
 me ten anakoinose aute e  zeta e ruthmise aute na iskhusei tautokhrona kai gia tis mikroteres epikheireseis pou apaskholoun akome kai enan ergazomeno 
  termatophulakas tou ophe tha phugei stis  tou mena kai tha epistrepsei ten epomene tou agona 
 ta exairetika pota loipon ektos apo to oti solaroun oraiotata ekhoun tis kaluteres prooptikes gia ena exairetiko kokteil 
  demotike arkhe prepei na apodeixei me kathe leptomereia oti e diadikasia etan apsoge apo ten arkhe mekhri to telos 
 enas nearos sunelephthe sumphona me ton politiko skhematismo tes sou ki ton ethniko sundesmo gia te demokratia 
 me ta khremata auta agorazoun biblia upologistes kai ekdidoun biblia me tis ergasies pou ekhoun pragmatopoiesei kata te diarkeia ton programmaton periballontikes ekpaideuses

 einai ena sugkhrono aeroplano me automato piloto

 parola auta de phobatai 
  kuriakos papadopoulos kataphere sten prote tou summetokhe me ten ethnike andron na panegurisei te nike na ekhei kale apodose kai tautokhrona na skorarei 
 erides polemoi thanatoi kai katastrophes mastizan tis poleiskrate tes elladas 
 sten kariera tou o khilntemprant ekhei agonistei se stoutgkarde balenthia khophenkhaim kai sportigk lisabonas 
 alloste e makra prosektike orimase einai aute pou kanei to parmigiano reggiano toso diaphoretiko 
 aphou brasei kala te souronoume 
 os monadiko proothemeno o phereira tha khresimopoiesei ton totse eno o kante pithanotata tha parei te these tou sariegki dipla ston mpoumsongk 
 iordanes pos ginetai kai autos o topos to nesi mas na brisketai panta ektos tou optikou pediou endiapherontos kai phrontidas tou athenokentrikou kratous einai mega musterio 
  ethnike paidon gennethentes to  kai neotera tha dosei  philikous agones sto plaisio tes proetoimasias tes gia to tsalentz paount tes katerines kai ten telike phase tou europaikou protathlematos ste slobenia 
 kairoskopoi einai autoi pou kratoun sta surtaria tou grapheiou tous anektelestes ametakletes dikastikes apophaseis kai zemionoun me ton tropo auto to elleniko demosio me dekades isos kai ekatontades khiliades euro 
 giati omos anesukhei e   prooptike tou apoplethorismou mporei na demiourgesei phaulo kuklo 
 na timesome te mneme ton palaioteron me te demosieuse ton ntokoumenton tous mia epistole pou staltheke sta peza to  san na grapheke semera 
 einai anthropino na zete kaneis oloen kai pio polla 
 kala tha kanoume bebaia edo pou phtasame kai me autous pou mas ephtasan na apodekhtoume ten katastase mas kai na te sunethisoume giati me aute tha zesoume pollapolla khronia 
 epises tha diexakhthei kai emerida me thema gluptike sto khoro sto sunedriako kentro diaselo tou metsobou to sabbato  septembriou stis  to proi 
 ste suneleuse opou tha ginei o apologismos tes parataxes gia ole te drasterioteta ten opoia ekhei anaptuxei mekhri semera prokeitai na oristikopoiethei kai e eklogike diakeruxe tes agonistikes kineses demoton 
 apo tous phoreis autous tha ginoun oi agones eno meta tha uparkhei eidike bradia gia kathe somateio bolei gia na giortasei otidepote thelei sumplerose o k markoulakes pou palaiotera etan paragontas bolei ston ophe 
  nomos kukladon ekhei megaluteran ektasin kai plethusmon 
 sto  lepto o kuriakos me kephalia meta apo phaoul tou andreadake anebase to deikte tou skor se  
 sumphona me te cisco aute e tase oloena megaluteres epektases kai khreses tou internet auxanei tis pieseis sten upodome tou diadiktuou diethnos 
  omada einai sta emitelika ton play off ekhei proto skorer ton marsal kati pou prosopika de thumamai alle khronia sto parelthon 
 sto tournoua prepei na ekhoume ruthmo 
  ta pneumatika dikaiomata anekoun sto   kai parakhorountai se sundrometes monon gia sugkekrimene khrese 
 uperxe kai e emprestike epithese sto autokineto tou proen uphupourgou pekhode staurou kalogianne ton properasmeno kheimona 
 sta panepistemia den egine pote kamia katalepse

 se auten te phase apomakrunontai me kheirodialoge ta anepithumeta ulika apophagia mpataries roukha klp peripou to  ton eiserkhomenon ulikon einai akatallela gegonos pou deikhnei poso liga gnorizoume gia ton sosto tropo anakukloses

 opos anapherei se anakoinose tou upologizei to kostos auto se  euro phetos enanti  euro perusi 
   antidra sten apophase tou demotikou sumbouliou na men epektathei to diktuo ton demotikon sugkoinonion stis periokhes kallitheas kai khalika meta apo aitema ton odegon taxi 
  sugkinese kai ton duo brabeuthenton etan emphanes gia ten time pou tous egine apo anthropous pou eno briskontai toso makria kratoun tis anamneseis zontanes 
 mprosta sten uparkhousa katastase den arkei e politike taxe na einai oligon upeuthune aphenontas ta pragmata opos einai 
 oi dunatotetes sunergasias einai polu semantikes kai kharakteristikotere olon einai e ependutike protoboulia apo ten etaireia plastika kretes 
 to skaphos mekous  metron eplee  milia  tes seteias konta sto kouphonesi kai sumphona me ton kapetanio eikhan khalasei oi mekhanes tou etan ousiastika akuberneto me kinduno na buthistei 
 gi auto pisteuo pos ki ekeinoi pou me proetrepsan na men prokhoreso to ekanan apo eilikrines endiapheron 
 an kai e krete kai e rodos den briskontai stis protes theseis ton touristikon protimeseon ta nesia tou ioniou sugkratoun akome tous roumanous touristes pou geutekan tis omorphies tous 
 oson aphora ton kallitekhniko diagonismo sten kategoria tes mousikes to epipedo apodeikhteke apogoeteutiko etsi dotheke mono ena khalkino metallio sten kategoria tes mousikes gia orkhestra ston dano sunthete rountolph simonsen gia to ergo tou sumphonia ar 
 oi europaioi polites me ten apatheia tous epelexan na steiloun menuma timorias pros tis kuberneseis tous gia ton tropo diakheirises tes kheiroteres oikonomikes krises ton teleutaion  eton 
 gia mia akoma phora to dikasterio den mas aphese na plexoume 
 ekprosopos ton ependuton o k eugenios kaulakones ap ten energeiake mutilenes  pou epidiokei khronia tora na ependusei ste these laphtse tou demou thermes kateggeile ton periphereiarkhe oti empodizei me ten praktike tou ten ependuse 
 oi gepedoukhoi ta eikhan khamena kanontas to ena lathos piso apo to allo 
 an ton episkephtheite ten emera mporei na sas phanei idiaitera esukhos 
  diple epithese egine peri tis  topike ora  ora elladas meta to iphtar te stigme pou oi mousoulmanoi diakoptoun ten kathemerine nesteia sten diarkeia tou ierou mena tou ramazaniou 
 parallela mesa sto diastema auto organothekan kai alles drasteriotetes opos enemeroseis se ekpaideutikous se strateumenous kathos kai omilies se goneis eno sundiorganose kai enemerotikes emerides 
 emeis e kubernese tes  kai o k alogoskouphes pegame sten  kai tes eipame oti eimaste apateones 
  idiotes pou antelephthesan to peristatiko alla kai oi idioi enemerosan telephonika to kentro tes ameses drases 
 kapoia ap ta paidakia auta miloun sten  elisabet garephalake einai oraia sto kainourgio skholeio 
  semne telete tes katharses tou ellenikou podosphairou odegeitai se prodiagegrammene poreia me katalexe enan odunero kai antitheto me to koino peri dikaiou aisthema sumbibasmo 
 kamia apo tis prospatheies kai tis prosphores tous den tha pane khamenes 
 ekho analabei te dieuthunse tes epikheireses edo kai duo menes 
 periorizoume ton arithmo ton khoregoumenon adeion oste to eidos kai o arithmos tous na antapokrinontai se pragmatikes anagkes tes oikonomias 
  seafarm kalei tous metokhous se ektakte genike suneleuse stis  sten edra tes etairias me thema ten epanegkrise tes auxeses tou metokhikou kephalaiou me metreta 
  kuklos ergasion tes upokhorese perusi sta  dis 
 oi proetoimasmenes epikheireseis ekhoun polu perissoteres pithanotetes na khrematodotethoun apo koinotika programmata eno ta ependutika skhedia pou tous egkrinontai einai polu pio prosarmosmena stis anagkes tous kai epomenos polu apotelesmatika 
 ksekhname auto to paikhnidi kai blepoume mprosta 
 agios demetrios phardia paralia me leuka botsala boreia tes stenes balas 
 stoma plousio me apsoge isorropia kai tautokhrona kompsoteta 
 ki apo ten alle oti para tis polu kales kai euruthmes skenothesies auto pou pragmatika etan ellipobares etan ta keimena theoretikos delade e aphorme gi aute ten parastase 
  galaktobiomekhania arla einai e trite se megethos sunetairistike biomekhania galaktokomikon proionton ston kosmo 
 tetarte  noembriou   to oikogeneiako klima pou uparkhei sta apoduteria tou  giannina anedeixe o elias kotsios os to mustiko gia ten polu kale poreia tes omadas sto protathlema tes  ethnikes 
 ekho paixei me ton olumpiako sten edra tou sten ellada 
  airetoi tha topothetethoun tis epomenes meres me sapheneia epi tou proskhediou aphou oi perissoteroi den prolaban na to kanoun os tora alla me deloseis tous exephrasan epiphulaxeis kai antirreseis sto endekhomeno na demiourgethei o megalos demos sto lekanopedio 
 oi idioi episemainoun oti ta peristatika auta ekhoun auxethei to teleutaio khrono apodeiknuontas etsi to kathoristiko rolo pou diadramatizei to diadiktuo stis skheseis ton anthropon 
  kopelasia opos ekhoume grapsei kat epanalepse einai spor pou tairiazei ston somatotupo tou ellena o opoios ekhei kai to pleonektema na periballetai apo thalassino e limnisio nero 
 opos kai oso mporo

 den kruboume oti polu zelepsame pou den briskomastan mesa sto plethos pou parakolouthouse live tis sunaulies ostoso kharekame pou eikhame ten eukairia na paroume mia geuse apo te thetike energeia ton mousikon kai tou koinou

  k mparnie pantos meta tis episkepseis pou ekane sto  ki enemerotheke gia ta erga eipe pos tha milesei apo stethous thelontas na deixei ten ikanopoiese tou

 kai o diogmos tous apo to galliko kratos to kalokairi tou  anakalese ste mneme epokhes pou theorousame oti eikhan parelthei anepistrepti 
 poio einai to antikeimeno tes standard  etairia mas phemizetai gia ten 
 bolei se eurolitoteta oi aionioi     europaike khronia pou akolouthei se kamia periptose den etan aute pou phantazontan oi duo aionioi antipaloi olumpiakos kai panathenaikos sto bolei

  graphei o philos tou alex 
 ton blepo n anakateuei to katsarolaki eno e sara bon tragoudaei to broken hearted melody 
 telika ta pragmata eremesan otan telika diapistotheke oti e purkagia proerkhotan apo brakhukukloma kalodion se grapheio tou deuterou orophou kai den eikhe skhese me to khoro ton mekhanematon pou briskontai dipla 
 me ten pleiopsephia aute ektimatai oti apopheugetai o prutanes na einai exopanepistemiakos 
    ste sullepse enos allodapou ten ora pou metephere me phortego tesseris lathrometanastes albanous kai duo anelika me teliko proorismo ten athena prokhoresan oi astunomikes arkhes sten egoumenitsa

  sunergasia skhetizetai me ten upo idruse sunetairistike trapeza thessalonikes kai eidikotera aphora sto na epiteukhthei o stokhos mekhri ten anoixe tou  e trapeza na ekhei tethei se leitourgia

 autobiographia enos egetikou stelekhous tes protes genias ton eruthron taxiarkhion 
 semeionetai oti phetos tha prometheutoun kainourgies khemikes toualetes kai tha epanexetasoun ten kataskeue neon tou khronou

 otan ebgalan exo to ptoma kai to akoumpesan se ena prokheiro trapezi mesa sto parapegma pou tous ligotero taragmenous kairous khresimeue gia plustario emoun pia bebaios oti o gkebara etan nekros 
 aurio dikhos aurio 
 diadikasia topotheteite tis duo lames ekaterothen tou phellou kai trabate peristrephontas 
  polupharmakia sunethos aphora elikiomenous anthropous oi opoioi ekhoun ten tase na pairnoun polla pharmaka 
 ton rotao gia ten kinese sto magazi kai an o kosmos einai prothumos na agorasei biologika proionta 
 auta anekoun stis ideologikes khreseis tes istorias tis opoies o istorikos meleta alla kai tis opoies aporriptei os parapoietikes 
 siga  siga omos tha to dekhtei 
 to sumperasma opos se oloklere te khora etsi kai sten krete ta demosia erga einai stasima anapheroun se koine tous delose dinontas malista kai epexegematika stoikheia 
 sto metaxu exakolouthei e ekkremoteta sto  para ten ekklese tes nomarkhiakes eleos anakoinoste sterixe na kleisoume te diarroe 
 den apokleietai mesa stis epomenes emeres na ginei mia epaphe me ton demetre priphte oste na phanei to kata poso uparkhoun oi prooptikes gia na mporesoun na sunergastoun oi duo pleures 
 pernoume to kotopoulo se xulakia kai ta topothetoume se tapsi 
  tessera lepta argotera  o euriskomenos ston bolo mpeos  apanta se klese enos khare  mallon apo ten athena 
  nomarkhia hrakleiou eikhe prokeruxei diagonismo gia ten enoikiase ktiriou 
 an upologisoume oti to diathesimo periekhomeno upseles eukrineias einai elakhisto eno parallela polu ligoi diathetoun ten katallele teleorase gia na to probaloun ena meso home cinema mporei na kanei gia arketa akoma khronia ikanopoietika te douleia tou 
 lupera phainomena mias akome pio luperes philosophias gia ten autodioikese 
 sto hrakleio opou tha brethei gia liges ores mia mera prin tha egkainiasei to radiophoniko stathmo tes arkhiepiskopes 
 me liga logia oti sunekhei tis pollaples metamorphoseis tes graphes tou lagiou einai e epharmoge tes antilepses tou oti o poietes einai enas empneusmenos anagnostes 
  kathegetes amphisbetei eutheos ton antinori o opoios pote den thelese na thesei tis ergasies tou ste diathese tes epistemonikes koinotetas 
 to skhedio tou k zesiade problepei oi kalliergouuenes poikilies na einai kata duo trita leukes kai oi upoloipes kokkines 
 upopsephioi gia to upourgeio oikonomikon pherontai na einai oi kk euaggelos benizelos kai mikhales khrusokhoides 
 sten ekdose aplou omologiakou daneiou pou tha khrematodotesei nees exagores gia te diekdikese duo ptukhion tes neas ektes taxes protithetai na prokhoresei e dioikese tes domike kretes 
 akoma khthes e prokhthes uperkhan sunupopsephioi sas pou aphenan polles aikhmes akoma kai prosopikes 
 an tha mporousa ton kosmo na allaza sigoura tha aphena aneggikhte auten te bradia isos mia apo tis pio omorphes kai semantikes gia to lesbiako kalokairi  
 trite  augoustou   mesa ston ianouario anamenetai na xekinesoun apo to upourgeio ugeias kai koinonikes alleleggues n anakoinonontai ta onomata ton neon dioiketon sta idrumata tes khoras pou upagontai sto upourgeio 
 ta esoda diatethekan gia ten sterixe tou sullogou to khamogelo tou paidiou 
 touto dioti epi seiran eton anekhotan para tis protropes to kapsimo ton dason ten leelasia tou anuperaspistou pleon edaphous ten anegerse authaireton oikodomon to mpazoma ton kheimarron kai alla polla 
  globaphone drasteriopoieitai stis tekhnologies internet sten kinete telephonia stis olokleromenes luseis automatismou grapheiou kai stis asurmates suskeues telephonias 
 oso gia to upourgeio apaskholeses sto opoio apeuthunthekan prokeimenou na exasphalisoun kapoio programma gia tous  ergazomenous pou apaitountai gia na leitourgesei o xenonas de statheke dunato na epikoinonesoun me ton upourgo 
 meiname oloi ekplektoi kai aphonoi mpros sten teleioteta sten piste apodose sten oraia emphanise sto pathos kai ten zontania ton paidion 
 pantos oi ektimeseis ton nosokomeiakon giatron gia tis exelixeis ston khoro tes ugeias einai akros anesukhetikes 
 mikhales petrakes meta apo skhetiko aitema pou eikhe upobalei o periphereiarkhes dutikes elladas apostolos katsipharas 
 ta perithoria ekhoun stenepsei kai phantazei adunato na prolaboun mekhri kai ton iounio na dromologethoun erga apokatastases se megalous khada opos oi treis sto neo demo prebezas o enas sto demo egoumenitsas kai arketoi alloi mikroteroi ana ten epeiro 
 prokeitai gia ton kertuka luan tou mehmet o opoios sunelephthe sten periokhe agiou matthaiou krummenos s enan uponomo opou eikhe topothetesei posoteta klemmenon tsigaron axias  ek 
 apodeiknuei pos e ellada epitelous prokhora me takhuterous ruthmous pros te soste kateuthunse 
 etan ekplektika pou arketos kosmos erthe sten proponese gia na mas entharrunei 
 protimousa tous antres pou prin te thuella aphelos pisteuan pos ste zoe tous basileuei e taxe ki e isorropia 
 ekei edese ten  tania me ta kordonia ton papoutsion tou sto lebie ton takhuteton kai ephuge me ta tria agoria to gianne  to niko  kai to abaptisto adelphaki tous elikias duo eton 
 to periphereiako sumboulio tha einai aireto kai tha apoteleitai apo aireta nomarkhiaka tmemata me proedro 
 einai enas apo tous pio kairious dianoetes tes epokhes mas kai oi pente radiophonikes tou dialexeis pou sugkentronontai s auton ton tomo mporoun na diabastoun os keimena pou organonoun mia stase pneumatikes politikes apenanti sten epokhe mas 
 as mou pei kapoios pos eginan oi proslepseis ton  dimeniton pou prosphata eginan 
 mia mera erkhetai sto skholeio enas neos daskalos pou gemizei ton mathete me aisiodoxia kai enthousiasmo 
 pragmati andres tou tmematos dioxes narkotikon rodou prokhthes stis  to bradu dienergesan elegkho sto spiti tou  opou brekan na katekhei miso autoskhedio tsigariliki kannabes kai mikroposoteta kannabes 
 paraskeue loipon semera kai eimaste sto teleutaio sabbatokuriako prin apo to dekapentaugousto otan tha arkhisei e antistrophe metrese 
 auto einai to basiko epikheirema to opoio tha khresimopoiesoun kai oi xenodokhoi tes periokhes sten katathese ton asphalistikon metron kata tou demou brakhasiou o opoios tous epiballei ten plerome tou telous  opos o nomos orizei os phoro parepidemounton 
 as doume ti kanoun kai pos 
 oute sto thanato tous den esukhazoun oi kolasmenoi tes ges 
 khreiazetai eidike antimetopise kai phusika okhi katastaltike

  dakopagida   me ten kapsoula pheremones pou te sunodeuei topotheteitai ste mese tou phullomatos tes elias se skiero meros khoris na erkhetai se epaphe me ta phulla e ta kladia tou dentrou 
  suggrapheas phusika panikoballetai

 mprosta kai piso mas nosokomeia 
 apo to septembrio pleon ta tmemata pou tha ekhoun anagke gia perissoteres aithouses didaskalias tha katathetoun elektronika to aitema tous kai tha mporoun na kanoun kratese elektronika se aithouses kai amphitheatra pou sumphona me to sustema tha einai eleuthera

 kai ekthetoun te khora mas diethnos

    kai ten kuriake  apriliou  
 telos exephrase ek merous tes souedikes proedrias ten elpida na ginoun sto gketemporgk bemata empros toso gia te dieurunse oso kai gia ten  eno epanelabe te semasia pou ekhei e uiothetese gia prote phora mias strategikes biosimes anaptuxes 
 khresimopoieitai os stathmos autokineton logo askhetou theseos dioti to ruthmistiko allou to thelei energopoiemeno stathmo
