  alkes pairnei to gramma tes katerinas sto opoio tou anakoinonei tis apophaseis tes 
 tora e drakhme mas kleinetai sta mouseia ginetai sullektiko antikeimeno 
 khtupate gia  deuterolepta kai adeiazete se ena poteri tou martini total summer look  mia apisteute aisthese drosias 
 tha anemene kaneis omos oi epaggelmaties pou askholountai me ton tourismo na rixoun tis times ton enoikiazomenon katalumaton kurios sta kheimerina touristika theretra pou sten epeiro einai ta zagorokhoria kai to metsobo alla kai ta tzoumerka 
 to thetiko stoikheio tes sunedriases etan kat arkhen to gegonos oti e egkhoria agora den akolouthese se megalo bathmo tis perissoteres europaikes pou kategraphan apoleies 
 akolouthei mia seira apo praktika mathemata me episkepseis se spelaia oi tropoi parokhes ton proton boetheion alla kai diaphora alla themata skhetika me tous khorous autous 
  me ta exes themata emeresias diataxes  upobole kai egkrise ton oikonomikon katastaseon tes tessarakostes pemptes etairikes khreses pou elexe ten  
 den dianoountai ephoson pleronesai na men kaneis proponese kai na men dineis to  
 gia ten idiaitere aute parastase kai tis empeiries tous milesan oi astegoi 
 merkel kai sarkozi zetoun phreno khreous titlophorei to protoselido demosieuma tes e egkure me te megalutere kuklophoria sto germanophono khoro sueddeutsche zeitung 
  eonda anapherei oti to neo  einai to proto spor ubridiko montelo pou tha arkhisei ten emporike tou kariera kai ste khora mas se liges emeres 
  mone politikos pou an kai den einai armodioteta tes omos endiaphertheke gia ten katastase tes pathousas etan e bouleutes dodekanesou kuria mika iatride ten opoia sugkhairo demosios gia ten euaisthesia kai to anthropino endiapheron tes 
  euro antistoikha 
 ekhoume na ta baloume me mia megale omada alla den tous phobomaste 
  ekprosopos tou  basiles moulopoulos ekane logo gia theamatike strophe stis skheseis mas me ton arabiko kosmo pou ginetai se lathos sugkuriaka kai politika khronike stigme giati opos eipe oi exelixeis pou dromologountai einai reustes 
 stis  to apogeuma einai programmatismene e prote proponese pou os eithistai tha einai anoikhte gia tous philathlous 
 stamatesa mprosta sta kagkela kai oi mnemes arkhisan na zontaneuoun gluka 
 kleisto to tmema attikeano patesia tou     kleisto tha parameinei semera sabbato kai aurio kuriake  apriliou to tmema attikeano patesia tou elektrikou logo ton ergon anakainises ste siderodromike gramme 
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese oi lexeis koralli kai koralliogeneis uphaloi dinoun eikones apo kathares tropikes thalasses nesakiaatoles me aspres ammoudies krustallina galazia nera kai uphalous me polukhromes morphes thalassias zoes 
 alloi lene exaitias ton sagonion tou alloi giati tha katasparaze tous antipalous tou 
 piata tes oras pseta apo ntopia kreata alla kai polloi mezedes perilambanontai se auto 
 den briskontai aplos se aikhmalosia opos stous zoologikous kepous axizei na semeiothei pantos pos ekhei anoixei o dialogos kai gia te khresimoteta ton zoologikon kepon 
 meta te sobietike katarreuse apokaluphtheke gregora to khasma anamesa stis epitages mias pagkosmiopoiemenes oligarkhikes exousias kai sten idea tes exousias tou kathena 
 ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous ten etesia nomarkhiake suneleuse tes pragmatopoiei aurio paraskeue  oktobriou e  ioanninon tes neas demokratias me kuria omiletria os ekprosopo tou kommatos ten upourgo apaskholeses phane pallepetralia 
 bapheiades ta kathara pro phoron kerde upologizontai auxemena kata peripou  se skhese me tis epidoseis tes proegoumenes khreses 
 oi giatroi anamenoun ta apotelesmata apo to paster gia na bgaloun asphale sumperasmata gia to an prokeitai gia te nea gripe 
 ekhoume porous pou mporoun na apopheroun ekatommuria ton politismo te geographike mas these kai den tous ekmetalleuomaste 
 polu kala ta kataphernei kai ste lepse photographion oi opoies apothekeuontai se mneme  eno e uparxe ensomatomenou phlas apotelei semantiko pleonektema 
 ekprosopos tupou tes  delose oti e sumphonia tes  me to  meso tou opoiou eginan oi dieutheteseis gia ten parakhorese elektrikou reumatos legei sto telos augoustou kai ekhoun pragmatopoiethei kapoies diabouleuseis gia sunekhise tes 
  meizon thema ton politikon dikasterion ta theloume e okhi 
 epises theoro uperbole te phase tes kokkines kartas sto diko mas paikte 
  prospatheia ekphobismou dia ton dikastikon dioxeon kai e anektikoteta ton topikon arkhon den prokeitai na ptoesoun autous pou ekhoun taxei eautous sten uperaspise ton laikon sumpheronton 
 nomizo oti den tha ekhoume kanena problema arkei na sunelthoume gregora kai na arkhisoume na pairnoume apotelesmata 
 se kathe periptose o khiotikos paralogismos mporese na epikratesei uposterizontas anapodeikta oti e epektase pros borra odegei to aerodromio sten kardia tes poles auxanontas etsi tous kindunous sobarou atukhematos 
 telika o stathes kousournas egetheke kai ekeinos bretheke dipla tou analambanontas ede semantike organotike these sten parataxe stous tomeis tes dioikeses kai tes oikonomias 
 einai apisteutoi oi anthropoi 
  saphes naulologio prosito gia epibates kai okhemata gia tis me oikonomika sumpherouses grammes 
  apousia tou metsou apotelese extra kinetro gia tous upoloipous paiktes tou triphulliou pou ston pio kathoristiko agona balthekan na apodeixoun pos aute e omada mporei kai khoris ton diamantide 
 de khreiazetai na einai kaneis plousios gia na einai dotikos 
  antismenarkhos stephanos kourelias etan eggamos kai pateras duo paidion 
 argotera eite ston kurio khoro tou magaziou eite sten paralia opou uparkhoun ompreles kai xaplostres oi pelates mporoun na apolausoun ena drosistiko anapsuktiko 
 proi proi oi ounnoi me tis ephemerides tous kai me prokeruxeis mas aneggeilan gematoi kompasmo kai uperephaneia oti katelaban kai ten teleutaia gonia tes den xero ti etan ekeino pou eniotha ma mou phainetai pos etan ena parapono mazi me dunato pureto 
 metaxu auton einai kai o demos ioanniton 
 balane to luko na phulaxei ta probata 
 pos egine dekte aute e protase tou papadopoulou me anamikta sunaisthemata apo tous paroikountes ten ierousalem giati blepete einai akoma kai polu noris 
 malista mesa sto arthro briskoume kai to exes oraio  logos kai to prosopo phile kurie demarkhe etan kai pisteuoume pos exakolouthoun na einai iskhura sumbolaia times sten amane 
 en to metaxu kai sumphona me tis protes ektimeseis empeirognomonon oi zemies mporei kai na xepernoun to  tou  tes iaponias me oti auto sunepagetai gia tis asphalistikes kai antasphalistikes etairies 
 kakos kai pali o kesel 
 kairos athena  pem  aug   eleutherotupia sabbato  iouliou   onoma tou  serbou mesou ntegian milobanobits erthe sto proskenio gia ton panionio kai plerophories anepheran oti e upothese brisketai se kalo dromo 
 kai to telos tes seiras se stul ezesan oloi kala kai ekanan polla paidia moiazei sunteretiko gia ton semerino anagnoste 
 einai duskolo na problepsei kaneis ti tha ginei

 etsi e soros tes metaphertheke sto kentro ugeias purgiou opou kai diapistotheke o thanatos tes 
 analutika mas enemeronoun me to parakato deltio tupou lantza 
 papaspuro stis diapragmateuseis me ten kubernese gia ta oikonomika themata ton demosion upallelon 
 opos exegesan sto sullogo tes pharkainas uparkhei ede dedikasmeno sto europaiko dikasterio 
 prepei na ta apolambanei kaneis khoris kalamaki oste na pairnei te murodia tou louloudiou kathe phora pou pinei mia goulia 
 opos delonei e palaistiniake arkhe den skhetizetai me to kathestos tes gazas pou ousiastika telei upo diaphoretike kubernese ten eklegmene kubernese tes khamas pou amphisbeteitai apo to israel kai ton makhmout ampas 
 sunergasia ton politikon dunameon zetese e ntora mpakogianne    kubernese ethnikes sunergasias khreiazetai e khora sumphona me ten proedro tes demokratikes summakhias 
  epidotese aute anadianemetai stous ktenotrophous ekeinous pou paragoun poiotiko gala sumphona me ta kriteria pou thespizei kathe khrono to upourgeio agrotikes anaptuxes 
 einai praxikopema kai to leo me plere suneidese 
 ten akousa se mia sunenteuxe tes pou mas eukharistouse emas tous ellenes gia to doro pou tous kaname ki ennoouse to giorgo to mpizo pou etan kai dikos tes philos 
 kai epitrepste mou na apeuthuntho sta prosopa tes istorias kai ste dikaiosune 
 pote omos tha dothei sto paidi e eleutheria tes autonomias kat arkhen auto ginetai stadiaka kai me te diadikasia dokimes  sphalmatos kai epanorthoses 
 oi topikoi paragontes tes  anti na trabexoun kanena auti diedidan dexia ki aristera oti phtaiei to kako  
 upenthumizei malista ta exes uperxe periodos pou ta kommata auta eikhan askesei exousia uponoontas ten periodo pou ekhei kharakteristei bromiko  
 markake apo to petrokephali mesaras pou egine pro emeron sto nekrotapheio zographouathenon opou kai o taphos tou proora khamenou poiete 
 prokeitai gia enan olokleromeno taxidiotiko odego pou embathunei sten ousia estiazei stis leptomereies apokaluptei tis agnostes omorphies tou peliou 
 to problema pou eikhame episemanei kai se kalokairino mas arthro exakolouthei na uparkhei kai malista se megalutero bathmo 
 to paskha an thelete na deite ena apo ta pio phantasmagorika anastasima ethima tes elladas o proorismos einai enas to leonidio 
 pos tha ginoun oi apokratikopoieseis    esoda apo  dis 
 se periptose pou e balensien den balei nero sto krasi tes gia ton  kolombiano meso thelei  ekat 
 os upothermia noeitai e ptose tes thermokrasias tou somatos kato apo to phusiologiko orio pou einai oi  bathmoi kelsiou 
 ta alla duo problepoun oti e proeklogike periodos tha arkhisei kai episemos eite amesos meta to paskha eite amesos meta to kalokairi 
 sten omilia tou tha anapherthei se ektetamena paradeigmata ton geophusikon methodologion tou

 ta paidia dinoun ton kalutero tous eauto kai eimai ikanopoiemenos apo ten agonistike sumperiphora tes omadas 
 eno se kalutere moira alla kai pali se arnetike klimaka einai e dikaiosune e astunomia e ekklesia

 as sebastoume toulakhiston tis paradoseis mas 
 epi tapetos tethekan epises e khrematodotese ton pente megalon sumbaseon parakhoreses gia ten anabathmise ton ethnikon odon oi emplokes sta erga pou ekkremoun kai e ekkremoteta tes epistrophes tou phpa stis kataskeuastikes etaireies 
 telika e sugkletos sten sunedriase tes paraskeues apophasise na diathesei to panepistemio ola ta mesa gia ten anadiorganose tou tmematos ten auxese ton gnostikon antikeimenon kai ten proslepse kathegeton me auxemena prosonta

 gia to theama tou podosphairou ste khora mas sten ellada parousiazoume ta pragmata ligo uperbolika pros to askhemo

 khthes protathekan duo akome axiologoi proponetes

 autos einai nomizo o aristos kai eukolotatos tropos na metadothei aplopoiemenos kai saphes o polutimos thesauros tes gnoses pou krubetai sta philosophika auta erga pou diaphoretika tha etan aprositos stous pollous

 nees uposkheseis karamanle gia ta khamela eisodemata te thespise katotatou oriou ethnikes suntaxes anakoinose o prothupourgos kostas karamanles milontas sto prosunedrio tes  sten patra

 ego den mporousa na to riskaro tzogarontas pano ste khreokopia tes khoras 
 ekei diogkonontai omos kai pernoun diastase tromaktike 
 te thlipse tou gia ten apoleia tou nikou anastasopoulou exephrase o proedros tes  kostas karamanles o opoios exere ten prosphora kai to ergo tou

 erotese gia ten anaptuxe kai axiopoiese tou aerodromiou khiou erotese gia ten anaptuxe kai axiopoiese ton periphereiakon aerodromion kai eidikotera tou aerodromiou  tes khiou katethese semera o bouleutes  khiou tes  kostes mousouroules 
 trite  augoustou   se seira proslepseon probainei e nomarkhia lesbou me ten diadikasia tes misthoses ergou delade me deltio parokhes uperesion ta gnosta mplokakia 
 anamesa sta polla khapeningk pou eikhan proetoimasei oi diorganotes etan kai o umnos tou pagkosmiou kupellou se techno ektelese eno uperkhan suntomes xekhoristes enotetes gia kathe mia apo tis  phinalist tou mountial 
 oi anthropoi apophasizan na proskunesoun ena iero meros kai epheugan apo to khorio tous gia duo e tria khronia 
  neos autos thesmos parousiasteke khthes sto hrakleio se ekdelose pou organose o  se sunergasia me ten europaike epitrope genike dieuthunse ekpaideuse kai politismos 
 oi bouleutes semeiose mporoun na ginoun oi kaluteroi presbeutes tes khoras mas kai na sumballoun semantika stis prospatheies pou kataballontai 
 den mporoun kai na theloun 
 ekane anoteres spoudes ste gallia kai anapheretai me nostalgia stous daskalous tou 
 pantos kai edo pherei euthune o demos giati den ekane mia protase sugkekrimene me orama dinontas kapoies kateuthunseis pou tha eprepe na akolouthesoume 
  tha einai e proskeklemene sten ekpompe anthropines diadromes tes aletheia  pou tha metadothei te nea trite  apriliou 
 tetarte  maiou   anabase ste basilitsa  
 ede kathe ebdomada stelnontai perissoteres apo  epistoles egkleiston tou korudallou sto grapheio tou gianne nestoros epistolesaiteseis gia ton oro tes aletheias 
 tsi sunduazetai kai me to automato kibotio  
 oi sunodoi tes apostoles pantos speudoun na kathesukhasoun tous paiktes kai ustera apo lige ora legei o sunagermos 
 analutika ta themata 
 oi theseis tha prokerussontai sto exes me to neo nomothetiko plaisio to opoio upologizetai na epharmostei tele noembriou me arkhes dekembriou 
 leo panta oti se kathe xesekomo e se kathe poreia pou ginetai me aitema ten allage auto pou khreiazetai sten pragmatikoteta einai aplos merikoi anthropoi 
 puretos proetoimasias gia te nea liges meres emeinan mekhri na epistrepsoun oi mathetes kai pali sta thrania tous xekinontas alle mia skholike khronia 
  rem gekht os kathegetesdieuthuntes kurous sta pneusta organa kaleitai na summetekhei se epitropes master class tes posias kai allon khoron 
 oi paraineseis kai oi epitropes den petukhan na kateunasoun to tsounami diamarturias 
 aplos tha mporouse na einai polu kalutero video game an eikhe dothei perissotere semasia se kapoia stoikheia tou gameplay kathos kai an o titlos ekmetalleuotan me perissotere maestria tis dunatotetes ton hidef sustematon elektronikes diaskedases 
 sten ekthese tou genikou logisteriou ginetai epises logos gia auxese esodon kai apo ton epanakathorismo tou upsous ton prostimon anegerses kai diatereses authaireton khoris omos na prosdiorizetai to akribes poso 
 stis bagies sto akroteri th apolausete paradosiakes geuseis sten kataprasine aule tou 
 oi protoklasatoi tes zantar phobethekan na exorgisoun to tromero paidi me katarripse tes epidoses tou 
 telika apophasisteke na kleisei mekhri to mesemeri e leophoros mesogeion sto upsos tou upourgeiou ston kholargo eno tha epanelthoun noris semera 
 parousiazontas duo agonistika prosopa e alexandreia anadeikhtheke epeita apo ena exairetika endiapheron paikhnidi isopale  me antipalo ten omada neon tou  
 einai to mono kleisto epaggelma pou den prokeitai na anoixoun einai oi monoi misthotoi pou ta dorakia tous einai perissotera apo tous misthous tous 
 ekprosopei to  sto politiko grapheio tou europaikou laikou kommatos kai elabe meros se polla proedros tou emporikou kai biomekhanikou epimeleteriou leukosias kai eidikeuetai sta themata diarthrotikon tameion kai periphereiakes politikes 
 alloi  stis kratikopoieseis ki alloi okhi 
 paparega pros ton prothupourgo ste boule anaphorika me tis sunomilies tou sto erzeroum gia ten uphalokrepida tou aigaiou kai gia sunaphe themata den ekhei oute kommatiko oute antipoliteutiko kharaktera 
 oi katharoi dexioi endiapherontai elaphros perissotero apo tous kentrodexious 
 den to ekrupse o ispanos tekhnikos pos eikhe ten agonia tou gia to thema tou belgou epithetikou 
 pexetase protaseon gia kathestota sterixes tes agrotikes paragoges pou endiapheroun idiaitera tis mesogeiakes khores opos einai ta kathestota gia ton kapno te zakhare to elaiolado kai to bambaki 
 nioutontzon kaili minogk tina arena ka kai gigantiaia mpanta duo khiliadon melon pou parousiase megalo meros tes mousikes 
 antithetos khilies phores pio upseles einai oi posotetes  pou ereunes tou periodikou entopisan ton maio se dapeda apo  kai oi opoies diokheteuontai stadiaka ston aera kai apo ekei ston anthropino organismo 
 antistatheite einai e protrope tou  pros tous ellenes meso tou kentrikou sunthematos tou 
  mas leei o upourgos anaptuxes gia ten time ton kausimon oti eimaste apo tis khores pou ekhoun tis khameloteres times 
 oi ekprosopoi ton ekpaideutikon proballontas kai ta kladika aitemata ta opoia ekhoun tethei apo ten  kai te  zetoun apo tous sunadelphous tous na paroun meros kai sten apergiake sugkentrose pou tha ginei stis  to proi tes tetartes sto  
  george hotz gnostos ston kosmo tou internet kai os geohot kai os o anthropos pou espase to proto iphone ergazetai pleon gia logariasmo tou facebook opos anapherei sten episeme istoselida tou ste demophile uperesia 
 thaumatourgo tropo mera me te mera anebainei ki anebainei ki anebainei 
 meta ten parapano ependuse to sunoliko pososto pou katekhei e etairia mas einai  
 alloste dikoi tes anthropoi einai 
 to idio kala omos doulepsan kai ta mplok me koulousiou perre kaite gianakopoulou alla kai oi epitheseis toso ta diagonia karphia oso kai auta exo apo ta tria metra 
 kata te diarkeia tes katalepses ta mele tou dikegorikou sullogou moirazane stous perastikous mia anakoinose me ten opoia tous enemeronan gia ta aitemata tous 
 eskhizes me khare ten kruphe gramme pou kharaze to phtero tou karkharia kai boutexes isa me kuparissenia opse ste laba pou xekhutheke leelatontas tis nukhterines analogies graphontas to ekho kai to eimai paramera dinontas emphase sto esu 
 to beligradi tha prepei na apomakrunei tous parallelous serbikous thesmous apo to kossuphopedio eipe e germanida kagkelarios angkela merkel kata te diarkeia tes episkepses tes sto beligradi 
 sten ellada eimaste uperbolikoi 
 demiourgetheke mia atmosphaira kathara ellenike kai mono oi agries phigoures ton astunomikon kai oi morphes ton albanon episemon thumizan ten albanike kratike parousia 
 an den einai aute etaireia tha einai e alle an den einai aute e parataxe tha einai e alle 
 kai ta emporika katastemata tha ekhoun anadouleies kai o tziros ton loipon katastematon opos ta mpar kai ta estiatoria tha semeiosei katakoruphe ptose 
 me auto to pneuma sas upodekhomaste kai pisteuoume oti einai mia kale arkhe gia na eiste taktikos episkeptes mias omorphes poles kai enos thaumasiou phusikou periballontos 
 khoris idiaitera problemata alla me megales oures kai polu ora anamones pragmatopoiountai apo khthes kai oi sunallages tou koinou me tis trapezes oi opoies ginontai oles apokleistika sto neo nomisma 
 apo aute ten emeromenia tha metra o khronos kai e ellada prepei toulakhiston ana trimeno kai opos ekhei delosei autoboulos e kubernese ana mena na perna apo exetaseis tes epitropes 
 to paidi mas olo kai maurizei 
  europaike enose ekhei kathorisei os orio gia ten oloklerose ton diadikasion metabases to  ena khronodiagramma pou e ellada anamenetai na prolabei isa isa kathos ekhei kathusteresei arketa e ulopoiese ton periplokon bematon pou prepei na ginoun 
 these tou k tsoukala einai oti tha prepei na epelthoun beltioseis sto phoro kati pou o demos protithetai na thesei se diabouleuse me tous phoreis oste na uparxei koine protase pros to upetho gia mia nomothetike ruthmise 
 ostoso ta plethismiaka dedomena allaxan kai telika o plethusmos tou demou einai polu mikroteros me apotelesma ta lumata na men eparkoun gia na tethei se plere leitourgia oloklere e egkatastase 
 kairos athena  pem  aug   eleutherotupia trite  augoustou   ekho mia plerophoria gia ton tade tes kuberneses tha te grapseis  sunomiletes pou sunantesame se ena omorpho oreino khorio etan apolutos 
 ki auto giati to  ton eisodematon den pleronei phoro  einai kato apo to orio to aphorologetou  kai giati uparkhei terastia phorodiaphuge ten opoia e kubernese epikheirei na pataxei me apodeixeis antikeimenika kriteria kai tekmeria diabioses 
 apo ten omada ton anatolikon proasteion xekhorisan oi philoxenides baboulas phournarakes kai apo ton hrodoto oi pantinobits panakas kai papadakes 
  genikos deiktes timon sten enarxe ton sunallagon kinetheke sugkratemena anodika eos tis  monades otan semeione anodo eos kai  eno kategrapse katotere time stis  monades 
 parallela auxese te sunolike tes paragoge kata  
 ten pnoe tes graphidas sou tes poietikotates kai prototupes pou okhi mono mekhri semera se topikes ephemerides kai periodika mas kharises alla kai se entupa ki ephemerides ton athenon demosieueis kai me ten opoia mas sunarpazeis kai mas sugkineis 
 gia tous mathetes e anastase tou khristou einai gegonos adiamphisbeteto 
 etsi pairnoume kai ena istoriko apo to progenetiko istoriko tou paidiou kai mporoume na doume akribos pou mporei na opheiletai e emphanise autou tou phainomenou 
 aute ten apophase epikurose pro emeron kai to anotato dikasterio tes khoras 
 sumptomatika einai e khronia pou kai oi duran duran bgazoun to liberty eleutheria ki auto 
 sundeontai sten pege ekhou me kalodio audio minijack  mekous  metron 
 oi anagnostakes mpelimpasakes sumplerosan ston agona me ton buza exi kitrines kartes kai tha leipsoun apo tous duo epomenous agones ton kitrinomauron eno amphibole einai e summetokhe tou koutsake pou ekhei khtupesei sto podi kai khthes etrexe ligo monos tou 
 upopsephioi  ptukhioukhoi tritobathmias ekpaideuses olon ton eidikoteton kai  olon ton eidikoteton einai oi katekhontes bebaiose  toulakhiston oron epimorphoses sta plaisia tou  gia to ergo kainotomes methodoi didaskalias 
 einai mia akhne elpida aute pou ekphrazo makari na ginei praxe 
 oso perissotero pegaino sten tourkia toso ligotero te gnorizo leei o phatikh akin aute te phora anazetesame ton skenothete gia mia tainia pou erkhetai apo ten arkhe tes karieras tou 
 kata  perissoterous phoitetes auxemenoi kata  tha einai oi phoitetes pou tha upodekhtei ten nea akademaike khronia to demokriteio panepistemio thrakes 
  omada moiazei exantlemene kai psukhologika kai somatika 
 parallela sunekhizontai oi ergasies beltioses kai exoraismou ton gepedikon egkatastaseon apo to demo komotenaion eno tautokhrona ikanopoietike kharakterizetai e diathese ton karton diarkeias kathos ta  ex auton briskontai ede se kheria opadon 
  thanases athanasiades kai oi sunergates tou den theloun na entuposiasoun ton kosmo en opsei eklogon pernontas to menuma oti tha kinethoun gia ten apoktese tou tade e tou deina podosphairiste 
 ano tou  upokhoresan epises oi cocacola  motor oil  ellaktor kai  eno gia tis metokhes ton  kai  oi apoleies diamorphothekan se  kai  
  phulla druos kokkina  idia me ten proegoumene alla se kokkino khroma 
 septembre  ena khtupema pou tha alekos megares  eutukhestere to oneiro egine pragmatikoteta 
  topike autodioikese sten ellada apektese armodiotetes 
 se epipedo kerdophorias ta enopoiemena kerde pro phoron khrematodotikon ependutikon apotelesmaton kai aposbeseon tou omilou diamorphothekan ste khrese  se  ekat 
 otan doume oti e saltsa tou xidiou arkhizei na pezei kai ta kremmudia na karamelonoun prosthetoume ta tsaibs anakateuoume apala kai bgazontas to tegani apo te photia aphenoume na kruosoun se thermokrasia domatiou 
  metagraphe tou anastopoulou ton dekembrio apo ton panionio boethese tous eruthroleukous na ginoun pio dunatoi ston epithetiko tomea 
  kai an den allaxei kati me parembase tes politeias o klados tha surriknothei dramatika 
 to istiophoro tupou katamaran sibur eikhe prosaraxei ligo exo apo te murina kai sugkekrimena ste brakhonesida diabates miso nautiko mili notia tou limaniou tes murinas 
 to eponumo tou sten pragmatikoteta etan kapses e kaphas alla o kathegetes tou sto ellenogalliko lukeio arone tes smurnes to allaxe se staurinides epeide akribos o pateras tou onomazotan stauros 
 na semeiosoume telos pos e pleura tou aiolikou theorei peritte ten parousia tou aiolikou mutilenes sto topiko apo te stigme pou suzeta ste base tes sugkhoneuses kai okhi se aute tes sunergasias me tous kalloniates 
 ksekatharise ostoso pos oi phorologikes protaseis tes  tis opoies aporriptoun kai oi etairoi mas tha odegousan te khora se khreokopia 
 me proto kai semantikotero pos tha prepei e omada okhi aplos na allaxei alla na metamorphothei apo ton neo khrono 
 phortonoun xula kai ta metapheroun stous pelates me megale sukhnoteta ki auto giati tzakia kai xulosompes tha epistrateusoun oi katoikoi ton ioanninon gia to kheimona 
  uperupourgos k mikhales khrusokhoides o opoios diaterese anaptuxe kai antagonistikoteta eno prosethese sto portfolio tou upourgeiou tou kai te nautilia 
 tha prostheta bebaia kai te semerine empeiria me ten ennoia tes takhuteres ulopoieses ton stokhon 
 kharakterise epises ten protase biosime alla kai elpidophora logo tou megalou ophelous apo tis sunergeies pou tha demiourgouse 
 eseis kai oloi osoi tosa khronia san khamerpe troktika masoulagate ton plouto autes tes khoras kai leronate me ta perittomata sas ta oneira olon ton genion pou erthan kai erkhontai 
 nai epi tes arkhes eipe e k papademetriou omos katapsephise ta arthra gia te phorologia 
 auto deikhnoun oi protes krateseis kai milao panta gia ten periokhe tou phalerakiou gia to opoio e germania einai e kuria agora 
 me tis anaplaseis pou tha zetethoun alla kurios tha khreiastei na ginoun to kostos tha xeperasei kata polu to  dis 
 opos to kratos dinei asulia se osous to katasparaxan kai sunekhizoun na kuklophoroun aneta me tis koursares kai tis gkomenares 
 etan toso emphanes e theike epidrase ste morphe tou 
 oi ideologikes antiparatheseis pou xesekonoun tetoia ponemata apagoun ta biblia apo to pedio tes logotekhnias kai me kleista ta matia ta odegoun kateutheian sto pedio ton ideon 
  k khristodoulos eprepe na ikanopoiesei kai autous pou einai ton akron kai de theloun ton pontiphika 
 demena tha parameinoun ta ploia sta limania kathos e  apophasise  panelladike apergia ton pleromaton se oles tis kategories ton ploion 
 gnorizoume te drama e opoia ekhei stis taxeis tes treis proen athletes mas 
 eikosi tria khiliometra notioanatolika tes proteuousas brisketai to kartago e palia proteuousa tes khoras 
  domatia diklina uperupsomena sten plateia tou khoriou kai pano apo ten taberna 
 egkuroi periballontologoi ekhoun tonisei epaneilemmena oti e diakheirise tes phuses 
 stokhos kathe mathete e prosbase tou se mia skhole pou tha tou anoixei ten porta sten agora ergasias ena mellon me anoikhtoun orizontes 
 omos an diapistothoun paratupies to upourgeio tha einai ameilikto 
 trokhaio me  nekrous sten egnatia to nema tes zoes ennea sunanthropon mas metaxu auton kai duo paidion emelle na kopei anapantekha khthes to proi se thanatephoro trokhaio pou semeiotheke ston anatoliko kombo tes egnatias odou sten komotene 
 prokeitai gia ena kai monadiko paketo oikonomikon metron pou tha parousiastei sten europaike epitrope kai sto ecofin sta tele oktobriou e to polu stis arkhes dekembriou kai tha perilambanei amesa kai makroprothesma metra monima kai ektata 
 ara e kataskeue tou ek ton pragmaton sunartatai kai me ten apomakrunse tou stathmou diodion 
 de gnorizoume pos ekhoun ta pragmata sten upoloipe ellada alla sten periptose tes lesbou theoroume pos mia tetoia apophase tha einai adike 
 einai ousiastika e prote tekmeriomene katathese enos dutikou diplomate gia to phrikaleo prosopo tes apoikiokratias 
 apo ta  ekat 
 kathe phora pou ta paidia mazeuontai sten ethnike ta blepo na egklimatizontai olo kai perissotero 
  phase einai duskole ostoso ta riplei deikhnoun oti oloklere e mpala den ekhei perasei te gramme kai mono ena polu mikro kommati tes ephaptetai se aute 
 semasia gia mas ekhei e nike kai apo auten ten apopse eimai polu eukharistemenos 
 mpainontas se ena thermokepio gia na psekaso eniotha oti autoktono 
 einai krakhtes tes apousias sas kai anoikhte prosklese gia episkepterio stous diarrektes 
 dinetai tautokhrona e dunatoteta kai tes prosthetes asphalises gia osous epithumoun auxemene prostasia kai tes proairetikes asphalises gia kindunous pou den perilambanontai stous upokhreotika asphalizomenous kindunous tou  ektos tes upokhreotikes asphalises 
 prosthese omos me noema oti ta pragmata tha pane kala gia ton tourismo an meinoun oi diakoptes tou elektrikou reumatos anebasmenoi kai epikratesei ste khora eremia 
 oi agones tha arkhisoun stis  
 ten trite dioik 
 se epharmoge tes praktikes duo metra kai duo stathma 
 semeionetai oti apo semera  augoustou e india tha antikatastesei te germania sto sumboulio asphaleias 
 mia terastia gourna etan kapote apo ta khalikia pou epairnan gia na strosoun tous dromous ki arkhise na ginetai to  enas oneiremenos topos pou ton baphtisa parko tes agrotissas 
 antithetos e  gia liges molis psephous diaterese ten edra tes aphou eikhe sobares apoleies dunames 
 mou uposkhetheke o  oti ta kerde anerkhontan sto  tou kephalaiou kai tha apodidontan ana tetrameno 
  time kai doxa ston adikokhameno aderpho mas manole pou khatheke se trokhaio dustukhema 
 omos se kapoies periptoseis e sundrome ton geitonon apodeikhtheke apotelesmatike 
  gia  atoma diplasiazetai eukola  gr 
  petros kolettes einai polla khronia sto radiophono 
 akome me te leitourgia  saronete oloklere te mousike sas bibliotheke eno kineiste kanete tzogkingk e odegeite khoris na khresimopoieite kheria 
  nukhta me panseleno apo ten orkhestra nukton egkhordon patras kai te photeine darra 
 alloste e diaphora me te khalkida meiotheke ston ponto opote o stokhos einai ephiktos kathos e omada tes euboias ekhei pio duskolo programma apo tous eruthroleukous 
 to  theoreitai e khronia orosemo gia ten erakleiotike udatosphairise 
 oi polites anesukhoun otan akoun tis sustaseis tes europaikes enoses gia drastikes parembaseis sto asphalistiko sustema kai peristole dapanon ston tomea tes ugeias 
 den mas ikanopoiesan oi apanteseis tou armodiou uphupourgou 
 giati tote tha katalaboun 
 elpizoume omos na epikratesei e psukhraimia kai na parthoun oi sostes apophaseis esto kai tora eipe o  metarakes 
 to metro auto aposkopei sten antimetopise tes phorodiaphuges pou ginetai me ten ekdose kai lepse eikonikon phorologikon stoikheion apo tis epikheireseis 
 ta paidia tes  periodou doulepsan sustematika mazi me tous omadarkhes tous kai katapheran kai exedosan mia polu omorphe ephemeridoula 
 khresimo diagnostika mporei na mas phanei ena koiliako uperekhographema 
 krinetai e ergatike diaphora metaxu ergodosias tou  messoges kai ton ergazomenon pou zetoun epanaproslepse sten trimere sunantese sten epitheorese ergasias 
 ta pros enoikiase stremmata tha prokerukhthoun apo tis periphereies meso internet 
  oikonomike krise kai oi epiloges tou upourgeiou paideias einai to meigma pou phainetai pleon pos tha tinaxei ston aera te phetine skholike kai akademaike khronia 
 me xekhname oti oi pio palioi elegan se paromoies periptoseis oti skaei e petra 
 to triptukho tes anaptuxes kai tes proodou 
 sten tetarte these katatakhtheke o panagiotes basileiades 
 an omos ta apospasoume apo ton topo tous delade te selida me to mikro phormat kai ten epipede disdiastate apeikonise tous kai egkatastesoume tis phigoures ston khoro terasties kai trisdiastates ekhoume allo ena emblema tou kits te ntisneilant 
 me liga logia e ole istoria prokhora kathos eikhame kai parembase tou  pou esteile ste genike grammateia epikoinonion tis duo ekdoseis gia tis analoges kuroseis 
  trugos tou panta uperorimou mauratherou ginetai ton augousto 
  apantese tes  se osa delosan prokhthes oi kk philios kai elisaph einai e akolouthe oi kataggeliomaneis kai menusiomaneis ton parataxeon tes antipoliteuses apektesan kai nea eidikoteta aute tou 
 ara s auto tha mporousame na prosthesoume ta problemata pou uparkhoun sto odiko diktuoeidika sten kreteta opoia einai idiaitera semantika 
 antistoikha to khartophulakio ton ependuseon sumperilambanomenon kai ton khreostikon titlon tou daneiakou khartophulakiou meiotheke kata  sta  ek 
 exallou o proedros edeixe polu ikanopoiemenos apo ten poreia ton ergasion gia ten antikatastase ton skepastron 
 agones dromou sto stadio 
 to brazoume me to nero gia  lepta 
 to sarkodes kentriko meros tou miskhou kaigetai arga kai sten arkhaioteta tous khresimopoiousan os dades 
 oi katastrophes tes katrina den didaxan tipota stis  
 mekhri ten ora pou tha kleisoun oi kalpes dinoume diarke makhe spiti to spiti psepho me psepho 
  emporikos apokleismos pou ekhei thesei to kossuphopedio sta agatha tes serbias ekhei prokalesei elleipseis phagetou kai pharmakeutikon prometheion sto kuriarkhoumeno apo serbous tmema tou kossuphopediou 
 eikha egkataleipsei te douleia mou den mporousa na xanasteso to grapheio 
 arkhike maios arthra adiexoda se panseleno paraskeue  maiou   eikhame anapsei te megalutere photia phetos 
 sumphona me ten ekprosopo tes cathay pacific elin gouongk e apagoreuse epibletheke dioti e metaphora tou zoou me to aeroplano mporei na tou prokalesei sobara anapneustika problemata 
 den einai kati to kainourio auto 
  karmen zeleuei ten phrantseska parolo pou o leantro theorei oti to eidullio tous etan asemanto 
  ekprosopos tou batikanou phenteriko lomparnti delose oti para to gegonos oti enas thanatos de kharopoiei tous khristianous tous upenthumizei ten euthune pou ekhei kathenas enopion tou theou kai ton anthropon 
 osoi perissoteroi toso kalutera oso pio khamogelastoi toso pio zeleutoi 
 oi anaskaphes ste samothrake arkhisan to  apo tous gallous pou anakalupsan to periphemo agalma tes nikes kai to metepheran sto loubro 
 kata ten periegese tous sta periptera tes dodekanesou o proedros tes omospondias dodekanesiakon somateion k giannes phragkoules tous edose anamnestika dora tes idiaiteres patridas tou tes kasou 
 maniokatathliptike usterike kai pantos barete e europaike politike zoe ekhei khasei te sobaroteta tes ean os sobaroteta orizetai e dunatoteta na akoloutheseis me sunepeia mia poreia me oles tis dunates parallages tes pros enan kathorismeno stokho 
 sumphona me ton k santos aute e diadikasia tha dieukolunei kai tis omades 
 eikhan oneira na kataskeuasoun udatodexamenes gia na lusoun to problema tes ardeuses na demiourgesoun antagonistikes kalliergeies gia na rixoun to kostos kai na anabathmisoun ten poioteta ton proionton 
 to    uparkhoun pleonasmata ampelourgikon proionton diethnos kai oi ampelourgoi tes kretes antimetopizoun megalo problema diatheses ton proionton tous 
 parallela omos pisteuoume oti gia ten epiloge enos estiatoriou metrane kai polla alla pragmata pera apo aute 
 to neo prosopiko tha kalupsei epokhikes e parodikes anagkes ton uperesion ton emmisthion upothekophulakeion athenon peiraia thessalonikes erakleiou neapoles lasithiou kai ton ktematologikon grapheion rodou kai ko lerou 
 sugkrouse phortegon ploion logo ton thuellodon anemon trite  martiou   duo phortega ploia pou eikhan brei kataphugio apo ten kakokairia sto agkurobolio tou ormou tes karustou sugkroustekan metaxu tous khoris na anapherthoun traumatismoi 
 sta highlights kai tis paralleles ekdeloseis tes ektheses prokeitai na ginoun ta akoloutha emerides enemeroses me themata phorologika programmata tonoses mikromesaion epikheireseon tou kladou kai epharmoge ton programmaton      
  proen prothupourgos tes kroatias ibo sananter pou egkateleipse te khora oste na apophugei ten poinike tou dioxe gia ten anameixe tou se skandalo diaphthoras sunelephthe ten paraskeue sten austria 
 bogia proedro tes enoses ksenodokhon kai ton k  pantelouka tamia tes idias enoses 
   khristodoulopoulos breke khoro exo apo ten periokhe ekane to sout omos o konstantopoulos apekrouse se korner 
 ki omos epi tes ousias ta pragmata einai exairetika apla 
 sten katokhe tous bretheke to khrematiko poso ton  euro to opoio kai apodotheke ston pathonta 
 prospheugei sto ste o demos ioanniton me tropo pou isos den perimene e periphereia antidra e demotike arkhe ioanninon sten apophase tou demetre panozakhou diamenuontas oti tha ten prosbalei enopion tou sumbouliou tes epikrateias 
 apeudese to  olumpiakos na perimenei to sumbolaio tou  brazilianou paoulo ansieta belozo pinto kai pleon strephei ten prosokhe tou ste diethne agora gia allo xeno akraio 
 gia polla khronia anesukhousa oti oi diataxeis tes praxes prostasias ton zoon gia tis klopes katoikidion den epharmozontan 
  gigantas ton  ekatoston o pio pselos paiktes pou epaixe pote sto  alla kai sten europe epikheirei na epistrepsei sten energo drase epeita apo apokhe  olokleron menon 
  ekpaideuse ton noseleuton einai sunekhes me ten energo summetokhe kai parakolouthese sunedrion entos kai ektos ellados kai te diorganose seminarion kai sunedrion entos tou  
 alles taxeos omos ethiko zetema einai oti e sumperiphora tou pol 
   trugos gia tis gunaikes einai sigoura pio duskolos apu oti gia tous antres 
 sten egoumenitsa neos demarkhos exelege o giorgos katsinos me  enanti  tou basileiou giogiaka 
 den ginontai diagonismoi gia tetoiou eidous prometheies giati egine apeutheias anathese 
 katatassetai de dipla se khores opos e benezouela to mpagklantes e aite e ougkanta ta skopia kai e bosnia 
 apantontas exallou se skhetikes eroteseis o klanqing eipe oti e agora tes kinas aporropha kathe khrono olo kai megaluteres posotetes elaioladou orismenes ek ton opoion proerkhontai kai apo ten krete 
 kabala drama kai boreios ebros deikhnoun periphereiake anagennese an kai e koinonike summakhia brisketai se apostase anapnoes me tis teleutaies plerophories na theloun na kerdizei to khameno edaphos 
 idou loipon ta parapano epharmosmena ston erakle mainomeno 
 mesa sto dasos tha breite kai ten petrine ekklesia tes panagias tes souraulou ston auloguro tes mazeuontai ste giorte tes zoodokhou peges ten prote paraskeue meta to paskha oi katoikoi kai phtiakhnoun souraulia apo ta khlora kladia tes kastanias 
 anamesa sta  krate pou ten ekhoun epikurosei einai kai e khora mas 
 par ola auta ta duo terastia ntamaria sunekhizoun kanonika spazontas rekor parabiaseon nomon 
 protos kai kaluteros o mertzos 
 gia phusika ntopia kreata ste skhara kai te soubla 
  krise pou bathainei deikhnei ta adiexoda tes kapitalistikes diakheirises pou gia na prostateusei ta kerde ton monopolion phernei phtokheia kai exathliose gia to lao 
 prepei na prosexoume gia to pos tha khtisoume oste na bgaloume tous podosphairistes pou tha stelekhosoun ten prote omada 
 briskomaste sto stenotero semeio tou nesiou kai apo kei xekinaei o dromos  khlm 
 gia akoma mia phora diapistonetai akradanta oti oi elegktikoi mekhanismoi autou tou kratous den mporoun na leitourgesoun 
 semera pou oi antres ekhoun khasei ten apokleistikoteta sten askese kai ten antimetopise tes bias polles ntetektib se astunomika muthistoremata gunaikon suggrapheon einai eroides 
 metokhika meridio agoras   esoterikou to energetiko meiotheke kata  phtanontas ta  dis 
 skhetika o nomarkhes ksanthes k giorgos paulides delose me to ergo prosthetoume se mia megale omada ergon enos diktuou kanalion emploutismou  antimetopises tes uphalmuroses sten pediada tou nomou mas mekous dekadon khiliometron 
 khioumor ton mikron gkangk kai tes anatro pes pou upereteitai me sunepeia apo enan maniako tou eidous 
 dustukhos ta latomeia sta tourkobounia gemisan me ta mpaza tes attikes odou me apotelesma na katastraphei akoma ena meros sten athena opou uperkhan pholies poulion 
 aikhme tou nomothetikou plaisiou tha einai e dunatoteta tautopoieses ton diakheiriston ton blogs etsi oste to internet na papsei na philoxenei koukoulophorous opos delose kharakteristika o upourgos dikaiosunes miltiades papaioannou 
  amese katargese tis apophases pou psephisan oi parataxeis tou k tzanakoule kai sapka gia ten misthodosia ton proedron kai antiproedron ton organismon tou demou 
   bio foodtheloume den theloume e phuse ekhei tous ruthmous kai tous nomous tes 
 trite  augoustou   tekhnes  psukhagogia ekdeloseis triemero ekdeloseon ste mutilene mia seira apo ekdeloseis pragmatopoioun apo semera paraskeue  eos kai ten kuriake  iouniou oi rotarianoi omiloi mutilenes kai kallones 
  adeiodotese epiprostheton khoron den einai luse giati tetoioi khoroi den uparkhoun 
 tetarte  aprilios   etoimo to zappeio  tes neas demokratias to zappeio  delade to anatheoremeno  epikairopoiemeno oikonomiko programma tes neas demokratias ekhei ousiastika oloklerothei apo ton ant 
  timoria elthe gia ton braziliano me kathusterese  emeron kathos o philikos agonas me ten ollandike omada eikhe ginei stis  iouliou 
  ki ego nomizo oti to semantiko m aute ten tainia einai oti prospathei n apotuposei poso epodune einai aute e diadikasia kai nomizo oti meta ap aute kaneis den xerei pos tha einai 
 mono pou merika eidika tes poikilias capsicum fastigiatum einai toso basanistika kautera pou sou sekonoun kanteles ste glossa 
 protagonistiko rolo paizei e periphereia kretes sta antagonistika europaika programmata opos diephane kai apo ten prosphate episkepse ekprosopon anaptuxiakon etaireion sten andalousia tes ispanias 
 autes oi antirreseis ekhoun diatupothei kat epanalepse eno oi kathegetes proteinoun esto kai ten teleutaia stigme na lephthoun upopsin oi protaseis tous pou ekhoun katatethei kai ste boule 
  gialtsin serntar upogrammise oti e kubernese tes tourkias dokimase m oles tis phasistikes methodous psemata sphages logokrisia apeilesi na spasei ten antistase 
 tis leme mekhanorraphies epeide etsi tis antimetopisan oi ellenes 
 pou pame rotao ton kapetanio tou istioploikou thasos pou einai demeno sto limani 
  semera o proistamenos deuterobathmias ekpaideuses tha episkephthei to skholeio apo to opoio apomakruntheke e mathetria kai tha sunantethei me to sullogo didaskonton 
  genia tou  aute pou organose tous olumpiakous kai ten etta tou  einai akome thammene 
 sto  o tsezarek breke dikhtua alla to terma tou akurotheke sosta os ophsaint 
 auta pou epikheireite na nomimopoiesete meso tou tekhnikou programmatos kai tou proupologismou gia na apoktesoun kodiko pleromes 
 sto  o loutsiano ektelese ena phaoul enas amuntikos tes epanomes prospathese na parei ten kephalia e opoia ostoso pere trokhia epikinduna pros to terma tou papadopoulou kai katelexe korner 
 apoluta katokhos tou thematos mas milese epi makron gia to gnosto problema pou apo khronia talaiporei tous erakleiotes 
 oi asphalistikes krateseis  kai to pagoma ton onomastikon auxeseon sunistoun epipleon apoleies tes taxes tou  khoris na upologistei poso tha kopsei kai to neo misthologio 
 ypenthumizo oti apo to  khiliades hrakleiotes anamenoun ten ulopoiese tou skhediou poles gia na apozemiothoun oi perissoteroi ton opoion einai misthosunteretoi kai den ekhoun ta oikonomika mesa na diekdikesoun ta khremata pou tous anekoun 
 dedomenes malista kai tes oikonomikes sugkurias theoresame oti kati tetoio etan anagkaio semeiose kharakteristika o k panagiotes koutres 
 samara sto telos tou mena 
 kuklophorese o porphuras me aphieroma ston giorgo khrona paraskeue  iounios    
 edo mporeite na aphesete to nero pou reei pros mia dieuthunse na sas parasurei e na khareite ena anazoogonetiko masaz sta jets pou briskontai stis akres tes pisinas 
    europaike epitrope exedose thetike gnome gia to programma agrotikes anaptuxes tes kuprou gia ten periodo  
 kuklophorei edo kai kairo oti stis kampines ploiou pou ektelei dromologia apo kai pros te lesbo entopisthekan korioi 
 na bgo alla okhi kai na skototho 
 etsi sunethisame kai dustukhos den xesunethizoume para mono an upokhreothoume na baloume to kheri sten tsepe 
 oi times autes omos theorountai khameles 
 me poia tautoteta oi ellenes perierkhontai ston sugkhrono kosmo sukhna me aute tes magkias kathos kharakterizontai ki entos ki ektos ellados apo auten te diathese 
 giati eikones mporoun na apodothoun os tekhnotropia se konstantinoupolites zographous 
 to metro den antiprosopeuei nea e prosthete khrematodotese alla epitrepei ten proore katabole ton kondulion pou ede desmeutekan sto plaisio tes politikon tes  gia te sunokhe ten agrotike anaptuxe kai ten alieia 
 kata te sullepse tou  brethekan sten katokhe tou duo rologia kheiros kai ena gunaikeio brakhioli ta opoia apodothekan ston idioktete tous 
 gia ten epokhe mas mporei na einai kai kalo 
 ti khasame sten poreia  mepos ekeinoi mou elegan malakies ki esu tora ta diorthoneis giati an einai etsi na sou kano mia lista me ta onomata kai tis dieuthunseis ton daskalon mou na pas ki apo ekei mia bolta 
 kai megales parees pou arazoun kato apo ta platania 
 okhi mono khresimopoioume polles ores te mera ton elektroniko upologiste graphontas alla entruphoume takhtika sto diadiktuo kai antallassoume elektronika menumata me plethos philon kai gnoston 
 eukhomai na skoraro se auto to khrono me ten phanela tou  giati akoma den to ekho katorthosei 
 den einai bebaia e prote phora pou sumbainei auto kai opos ola deikhnoun oute e teleutaia 
  nea etaireia edreuei sto boukouresti apaskholei  atoma kai to arkhiko metokhiko kephalaio tes anerkhetai se  dolaria pou proerkhontai apo tous diathesimous khrematikous porous tes etaireias 
 graphei keramidogatos o mantoumantadoros  
  skhediastike upographe anekei ston piter sregier kai se kathe periptose uposterizei to neaniko kai proskharo prophil tou autokinetou 
 kai to kako paei pio pera 
 semera to megalutero pososto ton katoikon tes tulisou einai elikiomenois 
 kat arkhen kholainei e sapheneia kai e authentikoteta tou thelo ton psephophoron 
 to megalutero kentro khionodromias tes makedonias ekhei  anabateres metaxu auton tria baby lift kai  pistes sunolikou mekous ano ton  khlm omos phemizetai gia to sale sto terma tou tetrathesiou anabatera 
 gia tous polites semainei ten ikanoteta ekteleses mias seiras praxeon sto exoteriko opos to anoigma trapezikou logariasmou e agora metokhon me egkhorion etaireion kai e agora akineton 
 epises mou aresei e politike tes mpagern na ekhei diethneis germanous sto roster tes 
  parakatatheke ton mamadon mas einai plousia 
 me liga logia briskomaste os khora pro tou kindunou ethnikes katarreuses 
 analogo etan khthes to klima kai stis ephories pou leitourgesan 
 epises grapste kai ta posa tes aules emporikes axias kata kategoria akinetou pou katablethekan apo to misthote pera apo ta enoikia kata te misthose tou akinetou 
 os ek toutou  kai me dedomeno ton khamelo bathmo duskolias tou kai ten periorismene tou antokhe sto khrono  mono gia enoikiase tou sabbatokuriakou mporei na protathei kai okhi gia agora akome kai sto pisto koino tou wolverine 
 telos e protase tesarchos einai topmp  media tablet to opoio parekhei tis dunatotetes enos laptop kai parallela diathetei othone aphes  intson upseles analuses  pixels 
 kata te diadrome tha ginei stase gia kaphe ste butina 
 ta upoloipa arketa kala 
 rompot ste selene stelnei e iaponia  iaponia se mia prospatheia na antagonistei ta upoloipa krate anakoinose pos mekhri to  tha ekhei pragmatopoiesei mia asunethiste apostole sto pheggari 
 exairetike apokrouse tou andrea maure se korner se sout sentra tou eleutheriou sout tou kelia apokrouei o maures 
 to epomeno diastema tha uparxei saphestere eikona 
 isos e pole mas na ginei pio anthropine kai pio philike pros tous kaotikous tes 
 ligo meta te mia takhumetaphoreas pou metephere dema sten presbeia tes khiles stamatese mprosta sto astunomiko phulakio tou megarou maximou kai eipe sto astunomiko prosopiko asphaleias oti metephere upopto dema 
 palaiotera te khresimopoiouse to idiolekto tes aristeras gia na diakhorisei te semasia tes apo to episemo lexilogio tes dexias 
 dekades entupa biblia kai periodika anaptussoun enan protognoro problematismo kai sugkrotoun ena neo kai dunamiko khoro dialogou 
 sabbato  kai kuriake  iouliou paneguri agias paraskeues sto bapheio 
 proegoumenos to metallo eikhe aggixei ta  dolaria to upselotero epipedo ste diarkeia tes emeras 
 thelo na mas peite poies pisteuete oti einai oi sugkekrimenes lathos politikes pou sunetelesan se aute ten ptose poia mathemata perate ti allaxate kai ti tha allaxete  khoukle thumizo oti briskomaste ston tomea koinonike politike kai ergasia 
 ta khrematisteria phrankphourtes kai parisiou upokhoresan kata  kai  antistoikha eno me ptose  ekleise kai to khrematisterio tou londinou 
 mporei ste khio na elthe o anthos tes poles ostoso ekei to megalutero problema tou ellenismou einai to demographiko kai e geranse tou enapomeinanton ellenon 
 sunolika ta khremata pou problepetai pos tha kopoun mekhri to telos tou sumbolaiou tes nova aggizoun ta  ekatommuria 
 oi episkepseis ton melon tes  sto berolino apodeikhthekan telika panakribe upothese 
 einai saphes oti o eisaggeleas den dikaioutai sten eleuthere diathese tes poinikes dioxes 
  prothupourgos elege proeklogikos e allazoume e bouliazoume 
 tha diarkesei mekhri ten paraskeue  augoustou kai tha einai anoikhte apo tis  to bradu 
 to polu kalo italiko sunolo me to photeino mesogeiako ekho ekhei axiologes epidoseis ston maler sto mousiko sumpan tou opoiou muetheke ousiastika apo ton demetre metropoulo 
 erkhetai emeres prin apo tis koinobouleutikes ekloges tes khoras 
  entekakhronos gios mou me to skholeio tou kai e exakhrone kore mou me to lukeio ellenidon 
 ekei geumatise me mele kai philous tou kommatos kai anapautheke gia liges ores 
  kalampokes tha einai o basikos soutingk gkarnt tou  
 ki auto prosdoka e kubernese me ta teleutaia metra koinonikes politikes pou ulopoiei 
 tha ta phane ki auta giati den ta edines se mia phtokhe oikogeneia kai plousioi mou to eipan auto kai tous eipa ego auto kante to pia eseis ego ekana allo 
 to tmema ekpaideuses tes dnses anthropinou dunamikou diorganonei duo enemerotikes sunanteseis me stokho na ginoume koinonoi ton ameson kindunon pou diatrekhoume kathemerina stous dromous kurios apo agnoia 
 sto plaisio tes sunanteses suzetetheke epises kai to thema tes metaphoras kai kataskeues sugkhronon stratopedon meta to  ektos ton astikon kentron 
 otan erthe e ora na ta mazepsoun diapistosan oti etan polu baria 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai ston agio nikolao mparko tel 
 ephese ekane epises kai o eisaggeleas epheton meta apo grapto aitema merikon goneon ton adikokhamenon matheton kata tes athooses tou odegou tou leophoreiou 
 noritera sto  o stathopoulos den eide pantos ena allo katharo penalti se anatrope tou athanasiade mesa sten periokhe tou panioniou apo ton tsotsalits 
  euro kai  euro sunolikes axias

 ena binteo sto opoio kuriarkhouse e morphe tou andrea papandreou 
  ogkos ton sunallagon anelthe sta  dis 
  euro delade molis to  
 delade den uparkhoun sugkekrimenoi proorismoi sten ellada pou na leitourgoun os base gia tis diakopes tous kai tautokhrona na uparkhei e skhetike upodome kai organose pou tha antapokrinetai stis idiaiteres anagkes tous 
 apo pleuras paragogon to oinorama etan e prote ekdelose pou sugkentrose paragogous kato apo ten idia skepe 
  adiaphoria tes kuberneses sumphona me ton baggele argure   khoregese atokou daneiou stous ede katakhreomenous ktenotrophous kai e apodose me daneio tes exisotikes apozemioses moiazei perissotero me nero tou kamaterou 
 endeiktika anepheran to komikotragiko paradeigma phakelou pou gia ena mena metapherotan stous upallelous tou idiou grapheiou dia mesou allelographias ton  
 to mnemonio tha anaprosarmostei ek neou ligo argotera upo ten proupothese tes sunapses tou neou daneiou to opoio tha pherei kai neous orous  diasphaliseis 
 pempte  iouniou   pempte  iouniou   tis rages apo te siderodromike gramme sta zakhloritika tou aigiou prospathesan na xelosoun duo roma elikias  kai  khronon khresimopoiontas gerano kai phortegaki 
 ostoso e aponome para to euthumo kai eortastiko klima den etan 
 kapoies phaseis kapoies epembaseis 
  euro kai anatolike makedonia kai thrake se exi einai kato apo  euro dutike makedonia kentrike makedonia epeiros me  euro boreiou aigaiou me  euro thessalias me  euro kai dutike ellada me  euro 
  kostophski to gkol tou ophe pou apokhairetese me etta ten superleague 
 to mats tha einai bradino kathos tha arkhisei stis  
 trito proepanastatiko problema einai oti stis duo megales kai epitukhemenes epanastaseis e istoria katagraphei ekatontades alles apotukhemenes 
 oi treis nearoi asoi aphesan tis kaluteres entuposeis ston bolph kai me eisegese tou tha proothethoun sten prote omada kai tha akolouthesoun kanonika ten kalokairine proetoimasia tes ksanthes en opsei tes neas periodou 
 tetoies meres prin apo  khronia ioulios tou  e axekhaste melina merkoure briskotan sten kupro kai etoimaze ena ntokimanter gia to praxikopema kai ten tourkike eisbole pou ena khrono prin eikhe odegesei ste dikhotomese tes marturikes megalonesou 
  apantese sto  etan saphes 
 epises episemainetai oti e apophase tou  proelthe kurios apo ten oikonomike krise sten periokhe kai ten ellada kathos kai apo te strategike meioses tes ektheses tou organismou sto khreos 
 ti apantoun omos sten sugkekrimene kritike ta kubernetika stelekhe ta metra gia tis sugkhoneuseis einai doro  adoron aphou den kaluptei stis sundedemenes epikheireseis meta to  pou einai kai e pleiopsephia 
 apostrateuontai os eudokimos termatisantes te stadiodromia tous oi paulos doukiantzakes andreas stephanou euthumios skouras kai markos poulakakes o opoios uperetei sten epitheorese kretes kai neson 
 etsi demiourgetheke to haccp mia methodologia analuses ton kindunon kai prostasias ton kindunon pou mporoun na epereasoun ta trophima 
 ginontai sustematikes prospatheies me mia nea antegklematike politike me ten anadiataxe ton dunameon kai ton eksugkhronismo tes astunomias 
 sumphonesan na sunekhisoun tis epaphes tous meso ton enomenon ethnon kai na sunantethoun kai pali sten katallele stigme katelexe 
 gia to nomo lesbou prokeitai oi treis sunduasmoi oikologon etoi oikologoi prasinoi  
 philologos se idiotika kai demosia lukeia ste thessalonike antistasiakos kai sundikalistes pou to plerose me khronia sten anergia o atzakas graphei pukna kai psagmena 
 alloi agapoun autes tis skenes alloi 
 ektos ton  dikaioukhon epidomatos koinonikes alleleggues alla  
 einai mia polumere sunergasia ostoso kai e dimeres mas atzenta perilambanei arketa stoikheia 
 kalutera na ekhoume polu kosmo sto aerodromio kai na perimenei para na ekhoume ligo e katholou phainetai oti eipe o prothupourgos prokhtes sten ko otan egine suzetese gia tis megales oures anamones kai ten talaiporia alla kai ta parapona ton episkepton 
  beltiose tes kineses ton aeroskaphon tha mporouse na meiosei tous rupous se megalo pososto 
  euro apo to programma demosion ependuseon  gia ton odiko axona kalpakikonitsa 
 kephisias sto upsos ton ampelokepon e ste leoph 
 oi theseis kai oi khronoi ton thessalonikeon kolumbeton pou brethekan stis treis protes theseis ekhoun os exes petradake ares   
 stamos  ekthese zographikes tes kharas saite 
 kai kataphera na mpo ste dioikese epikheireseon 
 gi auto parakalo ton semerino prothupourgo k  papandreou na kanei ta adunatadunata oste na men xanasumboun paromoies periptoseis kai na katargesei ta pronomia kai tous nomous pou ekhoun phtiaxei sta metra tous oi kuberneseis mekhri semera 
 analoge einai e eikona pou parousiazoun oi perissoteroi emporikoi dromoi tes larisas 
  exo apo ten periokhe o martin ekane ena dunato sout to opoio ephuge aout 
 semera eidame mono ta osta 
 sumphona me tous eidikous e listeria einai sobare pathese pou prokaleitai apo trophes pou ekhoun molunthei me to bakterio listeria monocytogenes 
 kareklopolemos se mousoulmaniko gamo me traumaties oi pheromenoi os protagonistes den apodeikhtheke oti etan autoi pou xekinesan to epeisodio kai athoothekan khthes apo to epheteio thrakes 
 ksekineste me te salata bazontas arkete posoteta sto piato sas gia na meiosete to aisthema tes peinas mekhri na erthei to kurios piato 
 antistropha opos episemainei o giorgos pantagias e orimanse tes koinonias epitrepei ten epiloge politikon pou to komma apodekhetai aplos gia na sunteresei ten kata kanona nosere epaphe tou me ten exousia 
 ten orexe na kunegesoun to oneiro tous 
  pote arkhise e epikoinonia sas me to paidi sas kai me poio tropo  to paidi e noemosune tou etan phusiologike kai mporo na po kai pano apo to kanoniko 
 okhi tipota allo an sumbei to antitheto oi peiraiotes tha brethoun mprosta se deuteres skepseis 
 opos anephere o dieuthuntes tes paidiatrikes klinikes kathegetes stelios smpurakisapo ten perasmene trite e meth leitourgei kai dekhetai astheneis 
 thumamai  kai de tha to xekhaso pote  sta prota khronia tou gumnasiou otan e neare kai glukutate philologos mas didaske ten antigone tou sophokleous to poso ekeino to uperokho eros anikate makhan me kurieuse 
 exallou o apestalmenos tou  ste libue tha suzetesei semera me tous epikephales ton antikathestotikon atupa skhedia gia mia luse sten krise kathos oi dutikes dunameis auxanoun ten piese ston kantaphi na paraitethei 
 ta bgazete apo to nero kai ta aphenete na kruosoun teleios 
  olumpiakos perase san siphounas apo to kharilaou kai diesure ton akhromo are me  kataktontas etsi to ekto sunekhes protathlema pou isodunamei me rekor sten prote ethnike kategoria 
 apomakruname ekatontades egkataleimmena okhemata 
 aute e tainia tou boulgare einai to noema tes zoes 
 alla etsi opos einai e douleia mou ekeine einai pio eleuthere apo emena 
 eutukhos pou sten ellada eikhame toulakhiston ten apodokimasia tes proegoumenes kuberneses 
 epomenos me dedomeno ten exasphalise ton pistoseon den uparkhei kanena problema kai kamia anesukhia sten oloklerose mesa sten problepomene sumbatike prothesmia oloklerou tou ergou 
  apo anabathmologethekan logo diaphoras aa kai ba bathmologete  grapta pososto  
 paramerisma tes istorias kai ton threskeutikon semainei aphellenismos an parameristhei e istoria e endoxe ellenike istoria kai ta threskeutika pou einai mathemata ethoplastika kai phronematistika oi neoi den tha mporoun na galoukhethoun ellenoprepos 
 toulakhiston gia enan apo tous amesa endiapheromenous to demarkho khiou pantele broule psithurizetai oti ola einai upo elegkhon kai malista kukloi pou proskeintai s auton lene oti proporeuetai 
 sto roster tes armani uparkhoun akome paiktes opos o lin gkrir proen tou olumpiakou kai o impraim tzaamper proen tou aigaleo 
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese  dunatoteta exagoras eos pente plasuatikon eton gia te gennese paidion kai ston idiotiko touea phernei nea dedouena sta plasuatika ete pou odegoun se takhutere suntaxiodotese 
 ki auto to ekhoun antilephthei pleon oi polites me apotelesma na niothoun akoma pio anasphaleis 
 ede apo khthes to neo tekhniko didumo se sunergasia me ten pentamele epitrope tes dioikeses arkhise ton programmatismo gia te nea periodo se oti aphora tis metagraphes kai ten proetoimasia e opoia tha arkhisei kata pasa pithanoteta arkhes augoustou 
 upotakhtheke apo tous argeious kai egine epineio kai polemikos naustathmos 
 eno ta okhemata kai ta plasta eggrapha kataskhethekan 
 den noeitai to etos  o demos aphantou na men ekhei katapherei na apoktesei apokheteutiko diktuo 
 delade eos to telos septembriou 
 phoboumenoi sto  apodokimasia tou giorgou papandreou epelexan ta ergasteria anti o prothupourgos n apeuthunthei amesa sto lao 
 iskhures dunameis ton  einai monima paratetagmenes stous kentrikous dromous tes periokhes pou thumizei stratiotike zone eno to astunomiko tmema phroureitai monima 
  natali portman leei eimai khortophagos apo ta ennia mou alla oi logoi pou me odegesan se auten ten apophase allaxan me ta khronia 
  semera ste metabatike tou edra tes khiou to trimeles epheteio aigaiou 
 edo loipon apousiaze 
   santer pou paraitetheke sten arkhe tes ebdomadas apo ten proedria tes europaikes epitropes exaitias tou skandalou apates kai kakodiakheirises skopeuei na katebei stis euroekloges diekdikontas mia these sto eurokoinoboulio 
 georgios khondrogiannes proedros tou emporikou epimeleteriou kerkuras 
 episemainei ostoso oti ginetai khrese khemikon meson e opoia omos einai se epitrepta kai logika plaisia 
 se sunennoeseis einai e despoina tomazane me to dieuthunte tou depethe boreiou aigaiou demo abdeliode gia ten parousiase tes gnostes phaidras tou gianne ritsou 
 boethesan s auto ki oi koutophragkoi pou molis katalaban ti sunebaine apaitesan gia na anoixoun te strophigga ton khrematodoteseon ta erga pou kataskeuazame na einai olokleromena kai leitourgika 
 oi dikaioumenoi kai epithumountes na metaskhoun eis ten genike suneleuse metokhoi opheiloun na desmeusoun eite meso tou kheiriste tou logariasmou tous sto sustema aulon titlon  
 eikhe kai autos antigrapsei ena allo didaktoriko kai to upebale sto panepistemio thessalonikes opou kai anakerukhtheke didaktor 
 an mas erthei tetoio aitema tha prospathesoume na to kanoume apodekto kai na tous boethesoume delose apo pleuras salke o manatzer tes omadas peter peters

 se kathe periptose tonizei oti ton endiapherei na uparkhei klima sunergasias kai asphaleias kai pros aute ten kateuthunse tha ergastei kai me ten nun prutanike arkhe 
 me ten oikonomike krise to  ten troika kai phusika tous politikous na protagonistoun stis karnabalikes parelaseis apotelesan pege empneuses gia ola ta satirika armata skorpontas to gelio stous khiliades theates pou parakolouthousan tis parelaseis 
 opos eipe sten  o genikos dieuthuntes tou organismou giannes staridas oi ergasies prokhoroun me gregorous ruthmous kai tis epomenes emeres anamenetai e telike prosphora norbegikes etaireias gia ta geophusika tou ergou 
 ekhoume ena pragmatiko tzoker sta kheria mas kai den prepei na to khasoume mas eipe kharakteristika ekdelonontas to sebasmo kai ten anagnorise sto giatro gia ten poioteta tes douleias tou 
 den uparkhei diathese na khresimopoiethei bia gia na luthei ena problema ton politon 
 genika pantos den blepoume para polle teleorase aphou oloi mas ekhoume mia agapemene tous suggrapheas einai e maro bambounake eno ektos apo logotekhnia diabazoun kai polla istorika kai politika biblia 
 to sesamelaio kai to elielaio empodizoun tis uperiodes aktines 
 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese  samouel eto deikhnei oti den ekhei metakomisei ste rosia apla gia na auxesei ten prosopike tou periousia alla kai gia na skorpisei ton tromo stous antipalous gkolkiper videos 
 akome kai oi sugkuriakes suspeiroseis meso tes sulloges upographon upodeiknuoun oti o dialogos einai agnostos stous egkhorious uperetes tes enemeroses 
 kai poses phores den to ekho pei na phtiaxoume ena thiaso na ekhoume ena poulman kai ena phortegaki kai na kanoume tourne sten eparkhia me enallassomeno repertorio me kales douleies 
 to mnemonio apeuthunetai s autous olous tous to paralambanoume omos os upotheto oloi oi alloi 
 apo ten mia e  pou trekhei kai den prolabainei eidika me tes palias tekhnologias elektrogennetries pou diathetei

 to zontano an kai peinasmeno den koitaxe kan to phageto ma ormese sto paidaki pou aplose to kheraki tou na khaidepsei ta koutabakia me lakhtara

 sunolika katharistekan aktes mekous  khiliometron kai mesou platous  metron 
 plen tes antidrases ton trapezon alla kai tes diakhuses tou endiapherontos to poiotikotero stoikheio tes khthesines sunedriases etan o skhedon diplasiasmos tou tzirou enanti tes sunedriases tes deuteras kathos dapanethekan  ekat

 pou ta lene sunethos sunetoi geroi me logia eulabe nounekhe kai gemate sophrosunen 
 apo ton dromo  tha kateuthuntheite arkhika pros to kalentzi

 sten pempte these termatise o protoporos tes bathmologias ton odegon o tz 
 apodeixe e poreia ton megalon europaikon trapezon ptose  gia te bretanike lloyds banking group  gia te germanike deutsche bank eno sto idio mekos kumatos kinetheke kai e ispanike santander 
  omada anazetouse epimonos enan termatophulaka kathos se aute te these uperkhan monon oi anastasopoulos sabbato  ioulios   ten kuriake sunedriase me diadikastika themata  
 ena mikro pososto tha kaluphthei mono 
 oi goneis den mas phrontizoun pia emeis tous phrontizoume 
 autos tha plerosei me ton ektopismo tou ten peismatike uposterixe enos akeraiou suntrophou tou pou khalase te sobietike kommatike magioneza 
 perimename diaphoretiko apotelesma ston proto agona ostoso eimaste eukharistemenoi giati paixame analoga me tis dunatotetes mas

 ston antipoda oi duo apopseis

 apo ten alle pleura oi gepedoukhoi ekmetalleuontousan ta kena pou demiourgountan ten ora pou prospathouse na anaptukhthei o thrulos kurios me ton mpriso kai prokalousan regmata 
 ekhete idea poios einai o misthos tou mekhanikou kai tou dikegoroue akoma kheirotera tou neou mekhanikou kai dikegorou 
 peritto na sas po oti kai mesa sto karabi eikhame omorpha akousmata 
 ta pegame polu kala kai deixame pos e omada sigasiga briskei to ruthmo tes

 me ebrisan pou den ebgaina apo to domatio 
 kathisame me tis sumpaiktries mou kai suzetesame ti einai auto pou theloume 
 sten periokhe guro ap to ephaisteio epikratei pantos polu khamele oratoteta ole te semerine emera 
 ta teleutaia khronia protatheke na stegastei to panepistemio tou peiraia pou khresimopoiei gia tis anagkes tou polla ktiria tou limaniou 
 apo tous ephoplistes ta posa pou tha zetethoun tha ekhoun os time ekkineses tis  euro aphou opos tonizetai stis suzeteseis ton supporters ekeinoi einai pou prepei na dosoun to sunthema ston aplo kai merokamatiare philathlo tes omadas 
 uparkhei kapoios skhediasmos gia te stelekhose ton uperesion pou deikhnoun adunamia na exuperetesoun ton polite akoume oti autoi pou perisseuoun kai pou phainetai oti einai polloi tha topothetethoun se prosopopageis theseis

 me nomisei o kosmos oti tha erthei na dei omada me  talantoukha paidia 
 khairetismous apeuthunan o bouleutes ioanninon kai proen uphupourgos pekhode stauros kalogiannes o demarkhos ioanninon nikos gkontas o nomarkhes artas giorgos papabasileiou kai o proedros tou  stathes papakostas 
 panta exeran oti to montelo pou uperetousan etan kai einai grapheiokratiko kai diephtharmeno 
   eikhe phanei epiphulaktike gia te daneiodotese tesalla khthes den etan arnetike opos leei kai o proedros tes enoses hrakleiou kgabalasmeta apo diexodike suzetese pou egine

 semera pou ekhoun brei to dromo tous sta salonia kaluteres teleoraseis proboleis kai ekhosustemata akome kai oi okhi aparaiteta 
 prokeitai gia staphuli me mikres kai polu nostimes roges polles tannines kai idiaitere geuse

 einai o xenodokhos 
    ste sumbolike katalepse tou demarkheiou kozanes prokhoresan semera mele tou somateiou ergazomenon tes  spartakos me kurio aitema ten proslepse prosopikou sten epikheirese 
 exegese de ten epimone tou sten epanadiapragmateuse tou mnemoniou legontas oti prepei na katalaboume oloi oti to skhedio den doulepse giati etan lathos suntage 
 tesseris agonistikes prin apo to telos e tselsi anebeke ste  these  bathmous piso apo te mantsester giounaitent 
 otan auto ginei ephikto oi dasikoi purenes pou tha phuteuthoun apo ten purosbestike tha aphierothoun ste mneme ton adikokhamenon sunadelphon tous

 oles mou tis kineseis 
 auto pou enokhlese einai oti e apophase anakoinotheke khoris na proegethei eilikrines dialogos ton opoio zetousame exarkhes 
 eno loipon ekana to metaptukhiako mou sten organose kai dioikese epikheireseon trophimon kai georgias tou geoponikou panepistemiou epsakhna ton tropo na phugo 
 ostoso to thema parapemphtheke ste  tes  opou tha suzetethei pio diexodika kai mekhri tote den prokeitai na uparxei kamia exelixe 
 sto psephisma tous ta mele tes epitropes agona exapoluoun sphodre epithese kata tou k xalkiadake ton opoio kategoroun eutheos oti prokalei ta phileirenika sunaisthemata ton demoton edo kai tessera khronia

 en pase periptosei to autokineto etan panta ena akribo exartema tes oikogeneias e ena akribo khompi elleniko kairos einai na to apomuthopoiesoume 
 to upsos tes auxeses tha exartethei apo tis epomenes kineseis tes dioikeses kai pantos den tha einai mikrotere ton  dis 
 phusika den kaloeide to satiriko biblio oute e katholike ekklesia 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai to apoluto ergaleio gia tous philous ton exomoioton pteses to joystick eotas cougar einai piste anaparastase tou mokhlou pteseon ton amerikanikon  
 tha katathesoun asphalos prosphuges kai oi sundikalistikes enoseis kai e omospondia suntaxioukhon gia na uperaspisoun ta dikaiomata ton melon tous 
 ston antipoda phusika uparkhei e epistrophe tou pomanake meta apo exi agonistikes 
 oi arnetikes deloseis kai ton duo se sunduasmo me tis tourkikes thriambologies eikhan prokatalabei to apotelesma tou demopsephismatos 
 antzela stamatiadou astamatiadouathinoramagr blender gia na 
  mikre anodos ton poleseon pou den sunodeuteke apo antistoikhe anodo sta meikta kerde se sunduasmo me ta auxemena leitourgika exoda odegesan se meiose tes kathares kerdophorias kata  
    akuroi einai oi oroi sta misthoteria sumbolaia pou periorizoun ta dikaiomata tou enoikiaste kai tou idioktete 
  na xepoulethei kai e  gia na ekho me ta misa lephta reuma kai na men mou to kobei to kathe kommatoskuloergatopaterasaristeristesphasistassundukalistes opote tou goustarei 
 os ek toutou aisthanomai ten anagke na ekphraso os proedros tes  khiou tis olothermes eukhes mou kai phusika tis eukhes olou tou  tes  gia kale epitukhia stis exetaseis pros ola ta paidia 
 saphos kalutere omada e gepedoukhous kai kontra se ena adiaphoro bathmologika somateia anamenetai na parei te nike gia na xemperdeuei me ten kataktese tes deuteres theses 
  reporter tou alter xespa enantia sten akharistia ton demiourgon tes diaboetes diaphemises amerikanikes telekartas pou parousiazei te mukono os topo katoikoumeno apo axestous ithageneis 
   mporei na petukhei ten prokrise se baros tes makampis delose 
  diadikasia tes kataskheses ekhei xekinesei edo kai pollous menes kai stokhos tes trapezas einai na parei piso ta khremata pou eikhe dosei os daneio ston aioliko 
 etsi epitugkhanetai e poioteta tou telikou proiontos 
 ekane anatrope kai malista duo phores 
 monternos krinetai kai o skhediasmos tou pinaka organon me to takhumetro kai to strophometro na ekhoun topothetethei sten kolona tou timoniou kai na metakinountai mazi tes oste na paramenoun panta sto optiko pedio tou odegou 
 ekhoun bgei stous dromous kai diekdikoun apo ten kubernese na men prokhoresei sten ulopoiese ton oson skhediazei eis baros tous 
 autos einai o logos pou tous kharise te mia apo tis duo proponeseis pou etan programmatismenes gia semera 
 einai augoustos tou  e peina therizei o phobos einai diakhutos 
 sten epokhe pou teleionoun oi eukoles politikes luseis to  xetrupose akome mia 
 apo ten purkagia kaekan pente stremmata apoteloumena kurios apo xera khorta kai pournaria 
 kairos athena  tet  aug   eleutherotupia tetarte  iouniou  ekatontades khiliades dakrusmenoi polites kateklusan ten plateia suntagmatos khthes to bradu 
 oi metaphoreis mporoun na epilexoun tis ekdoseis me khoros phortoses apo ta  eos kai ta  kubika metra 
 xalinaria kapistria lorosokka petsinoi sakoi sellopouggia sakidia opou metapherontan liga trophima pedikla kai pternisteres anapherontai sukhna sta keimena tes epokhes 
 teleiose to  gumnasio kupseles 
 telos paromoia einai e katastase kai ston demo trikkaion trikala opou oi  monades diaphoras tou protou gurou antistraphekan uper tou kh lappa 
 ektos omos apo auto to theorei kai adikemeno 
 sumphona me tis episemanseis tou kathegete e metaphora tha stoikhisei perissotera apo  ekatommuria drakhmes aphou tha prepei na ten kanoun eidikoi tekhnikoi pou tha erthoun gia to skopo auto apo ten amerike 
 auto etan kai to skor tou protou  an kai e  tessera lepta prin to phinale aggixe ten isopharise otan o kouzen ekhase ena monadiko tet a tet 
 pou to pleronoun oloi kai auto douleuei gia tous elakhistous 
 eimai polu eukharistemene me auto pou ekhei ginei e europemia europe iskhure kai exupne 
 pros ten porta tes exodou kateuthunetai epises kai o zan alen mpoumsongk ki an poulethei ki autos tote ta asteria tes omadas tha einai o kostas katsouranes kai o sempastian leto 
 kineitai apo ton gnosto aeroelaiopsukto   me  ippous eno diathetei plaisio khorodiktuoma agonistiko monompratso psalidi aktinike dagkana kai terastio diskophreno empros kai anestrammeno pirouni 
  yperesia politikes aeroporias edose ede to prasino phos gia ten kataskeue neou loxou diadromou prosgeioses kai apogeioses 
 koukiadakes tonise ten apophase tes autodioiketikes periphereias na ekhei protagonistiko rolo sto thema 
 korner tou kapetanou apo ta dexia pou ekteleitai sto proto dokari o soltani pedaei pselotera apo olous kai stelnei te mpala sta dikhtua gia na isopharisei to paikhnidi se  
 gi auto apo te thea tes anthropologias mporoume na parateresoume ton thaumasto kosmo tes philosophias tes koinoniologias tes istorias tes psukhologias tes logotekhnikes kritikes tes semeiotikes kai tes ermeneutikes 
 gia ta lakhanika bazoume ligo ladi sten plaka kai psenoume ta diaphora lakhanika aphenontas ta manitaria gia to telos 
 apantese khpapoutse gia ten katastase sten egoumenitsa    den uphistatai anagke gia peraitero eniskhuse tes astunomikes dunames sten egoumenitsa ektima o upourgos prostasias tou polite kh papoutses apantontas se erotese tou bouleute tou  
 alloste de tha einai e prote phora 
 epomenos ek ton pragmaton to atoma einai upokhreomeno na meiosei tis diaprosopikes tou skheseis pros kharin tes elektronikes koinonikopoieses tou 
 edo kakos khatheke o khronos tes proeklogikes periodou 
  eite braduazei eite pheggei an e stele etan lekkas tha ekane duo apla pragmata 
 to politiko sustema sussomo gia prote phora brisketai makria apo ten ellenike koinonia uposterizei o talantoukhos ethopoios episemainontas pos osa ekane mekhri semera ta opheilei ola ston patera tou 
 tis epomenes emeres anamenetai na ginei sunantese me tous ekprosopous ton allon nomon tes kretes 
  ritzakes apedose ten ekpursokrotese tou oplou se atukhema apopse pou dekhtheke telika o anakrites rethumnou 
 uparkhoun apodeixeis oti edose entole na staloun khiliades apelpismenoi aphrikanoi metanastes sto nesi gia na to buthisoun sto khaos tonise 
 sta  ektimatai oti peripou  theseis tha meinoun akaluptes 
 apo ten alle e apokhe den einai luse dioti prepei nakhoume summetokhe kai euthune sto eklogiko apotelesma 
 to ktirio sta tirana pou einai gnosto os puramida brisketai sto epikentro tes demosias suzeteses 
 ki etsi sten epidauro tha khoume mazi mas auta ta agorakia   eton 
 episemainoume oti se autes tis ores panelleniou penthous kai perisulloges oloi mas tha prepei na boethesoume deikhnontas psukhraimia kai upselo aisthema koinonikes euthunes 
 deutera  augoustou   mm semantika kerde katagraphei ten deutera to khrematisterio axion kuprou leukosia semantika kerde parousiazei to khrematisterio sten prote sunedria tes ebdomadas 
 apo aurio e proetoimasia prosarmozetai ston agona me ta giannina o opoios tha diexakhthei upo to phos ton proboleon 
 to  egeitai tes neolaias lamprake kai eklegetai bouleutes tes  
 mekhri tote tha epikheirethei sunantese kai me ten egesia tou upourgeiou agrotikes anaptuxes mepos kai katapheroun kati 
 ekhei paramakrunei e oura tou makaroniou kai ousiastika diapistonoume oti xanabriskomaste ekei pou xekinesame 
 apo khthes to  pragmatopoiei elegkhous oste na diapistosei ten uparxe e me deltion apostoles kai timologion apo ta opoia tha prokupsoun nea semantika stoikheia gia ten upothese 
  phournos tes geitonias den einai aprosope poluethnike 
 gi auto prepei epitelous e egesia mas na exegesei sto lao giati o semerinos ponos einai ependuse gia to aurio 
 sto sunolo tous oi apeutheias anatheseis kata ten teleutaia tetraetia sto demo ano kalama mporei kai na xeperasan tis  sumphona me tis protes ektimeseis tou kosta kapsale 
   mpakagioko epiase ex epaphes kephalia o mprilakes aplose to kheri tou ste megale periokhe pentakatharo penalti to opoio arnetheke o gratsanes 
 khthes kata ten apokhorese ton paikton apo to proponetiko gia to poulman enas apo tous eruthroleukous to skholiase 
 sten odo sokratous episkephtheite to paradosiako kapheneio mevlana tou ali memik 
 tote thumamai o takes lemones eikhe zetesei apo ton sokrate kokkale ten apoktese enos amuntikou khaph pou na ekhei ta kharakteristika tou karempe 
 dedomena me  lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese    diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai to home cinema den apeuthunetai mono se osous mporoun na xodepsoun mia periousia gia na stesoun ena sustema sto saloni tous 
  perimetros tous einai peripou tessera khiliometra me ametretous purgous kai promakhones 
 omos den to blepo se aute te phase na ginei auto 
  laos na balei skopo na kataktesei te dike tou exousia semera o laos ekhei polu perissoterous logous na empisteuthei tis ektimeseis tou  gia to pou trabaei e katastase gia te diexodo apo ten krise pou sumpherei to lao 
 prin ten enarxe tou agona oi diaitetes kai oi paiktes ton duo omadon aphesan louloudia sto semeio opou traumatistheke dustukhos thanasima o atukhos stamates georgoudakes eno kratetheke enos leptou sige ste mneme tou 
  alle pleura kathe khartonomismatos anaparista mia gephura mias sugkekrimenes epokhes sumbolo epikoinonias metaxu ton laon tes europes kai metaxu tes europes kai tou upoloipou kosmou 
 uposkhetai na parei akome pio sklera metra gia ton lao kai tous ergazomenous beltionontas to oikonomiko klima 
 duo kukles gunaikon me ligous antres parea khoreuan 
 ektos ap auto omos den enemeronontai egkaira oste na proetoimastoun kathos ekhoun oikogeneia kai den mporoun na phugoun xaphnika apo ten pole tous 
 to klima ston sullogo einai kalo para to gegonos oti e omada bgeke apo noris ektos stokhon kai o soteres sinanes milese sten  gia te sunekheia 
 oi proskeklemenoi kallitekhnes einai kurios neoi ellenes mousikoi pou parousiazoun tis tzaz melodies tous 
  enas astunomikos apo ten komotene pou eikhe ole ten skhetike epikoinonia tha emphanizotan os o upopsephios agorastes 
 edo ekhoun ena pleonektema oi ethelontes aimodotes 
 konopisopoulos kathos kai o proedros tou sullogou mekhanikon argous than 
 an pali ontos ten psakhnoume gia tous duo proanapherthentes paiktes tote allazei 
 entheta  psarema  phouskoto  psarema to baridi einai ekeino to alieutiko ergaleio pou tha mas epitrepsei na rixoume to doloma mas sto semeio pou theloume ekei pou to kalo psari tha to brei kai tha to katapiei amesos
