 anakaluphtheke oxugono se doruphoro tou kronou    to diastemiko skaphos kasini tes amerikanikes kai tes europaikes diastemikes uperesias anikhneuse oxugono se mikre posoteta sten araie atmosphaira tou pagomenou doruphorou rea tou kronou 
  demotikos sumboulos makes benetas bretheke ston kataulismo tou parkingk kai milese me tous tsigganous 
 to mono meionektema ton mini hifi einai oi periorismenes dunatotetes diasundeses tous me periphereiakes suskeues kathos oi diathesimes thures tous einai liges 
 ekhoume  episkeptes kai  melos sundedemenous   tou sundesmou aporimmaton me   parontes apo  baterlo gia  kai diorismenous 
   tou telous epesan khtes gia ton proen metropolite attikes panteleemona mpezenite o opoios kathairetheke apo to ekklesiastiko dikasterio meta kai apo to telesigrapho tou eisaggelea tou areiou pagou 
 akolouthei e sunenteuxe 
  pos mporoume na paraggeiloume ta cd tou ta cd ta poulaei monos tou malista ta ekhei eponomasei nomous tou solona 
 etan oloi neikoi ki omorpha palekaria 
 to sigouro einai oti tha parakolouthesoume ena polu dunamiko kai sugkhronos paraxena melodiko live 
 kai pros ten kateuthunse aute katholou den apokleiei to endekhomeno strategikon summakhion me alles etaireies tou kladou 
 leukosia bgaineis apo ten exodo tou autokinetodromou sta lumpia briskeis ena roundabout kai pas boreia pros ta lumpia 
 ektos omos apo ten ugeionomike pistopoiese agnotetas ekhoun kai ten 
 estiatorio tha breite kai sto national theatre to national film theatre kai to old vic 
  peripeteia tou koinobouleutismou sten ellada aphegeitai te duskhere kai astathe poreia tou koinobouleutikou biou sten ellada 
 oi dieuthuntes emeinan entuposiasmenoi apo ten megale proodo pou ekhei pragmatopoiesei e tourkia genika alla eidikotera ston tourismo 
 kathe phora pou auto egine e ekklesia me austeroteta antimetopise ekeinon ton opoio epelege ton dromo tes paraiteseos 
 enas allos enoikos tou melrose einai kai e iskhure politike arthrographos ela sims katie cassidy pou eno uperxe polu phile me te sintni e philia tous katastrapheke otan e sintni apeilese na dioxei ten ella kai na katastrepsei te stadiodromia tes 
 telika o idanikos apodektes tes andrikes pornographias einai to monakhiko arseniko kai e idanike morphe sex pros ten opoia teinei einai to monakhiko sex 
 meta arkhisan ta gioukha 
   mas odegoi taxi ta xeroun ola einai ena erotema 
    problema nitrorupanses proerkhomeno apo tis georgikes drasteriotetes katagraphetai ste dutike akhaia me apotelesma ta upogeia udata na einai idiaitera eualota ste khemike rupanse 
 ede kleinoun oi ekkremotetes gia na piasoun douleia  epitukhontes eno me suntomes diadikasies tha proslephthoun  atoma sta nosokomeia tous demous kai ta skholeia 
 to keimeno sunekhizetai me paromoio periekhomeno 
 den einai o elios 
 epodakathese o giannakos ma den eikhe pos to kamei ma de tou rkhotane na parei opiso to logo tou 
 gi auto kai ekplessomai molis akoumpo tis balitses mou ste resepsion tou xenodokheiou kurimai einai mia olokainourgia mikre monada e aphorme gia touto to taxidi sto gerolimena 
 ki oi dikoi uas pou giortazoun ten alose einai uia khouphta phanatikoi uono pou e phone tous akougetai duskola 
 upothetoume oti sten torine apophase tou tha epaixe rolo kai e khronia gkrinia tes elpidas 
 ti kaemos ki autos den prolabainame na tous rotesoume ti koboun kai raboun me tose aphosiose 
 oso gia te  agonistike oi protoporoi stamatesan sta okhto apenanti sto gerani eno o  xepernouse epitukhos to megalo empodio tou ophi sten ierapetra  
 an apodeikhthei oti kapoios ekhei klepsei khremata tou demou ton opoio ego me autaparnese uperetesa na tou kopsete ta kheria 
  anagke tous gia bathmous me kanei na riskaro sto  
 zographise ola tes ta oneira ekei sto paragoni me stakhti khroma kai den elege na sekosei to kephalaki tes les kai etan e mone upeuthune gia osa tes diegetheke o pappous pos tha sumboun ste ge ta epomena khronia 
 diapistosa oti den etan toso diabasmenos oso o k semites 
 alle noseleutria me ta idia akribos tupika prosonta ergazetai sto nosokomeio philiaton 
 kairos athena  tet  aug   eleutherotupia tetarte  iouliou   thodores blakhos einai o neos proponetes tes omadas polo tou olumpiakou 
 tesseris meres tessera kare alla o psaretos erthe kai psarepse 
  zone plemmuras kai  zone asphaleias topothetontas kai skhetikes pinakides 
 gia mia akome phora to kratos apodeikhteke katotero ton peristaseon 
  epitrope epaggelmatikou athletismou apophasise ten apobole tes  olumpiakos bolou kai tes  kabalas apo ta epaggelmatika protathlemata kathos ekrine oti to idioktesiako kathestos ton duo omadon paramenei upo ton entolon ton akhillea mpeou 
 alla opos e adunamia tes skepses tou na tithaseusei ta phainomena kai tous kanones se mia eniaia kai plere ermeneutike methodo etsi kai e zoe tou ton odegese se pio eueliktes kai tautokhrona perissotero periplokes proseggiseis 
 epiprostheta epta athletes  
 gia na phantasteite leei na metatrapei o pharos tou pneumatos se oiko tou mamona 
 ton phebrouario tou  sto periodiko nemesis protokuklophorese mia delose upotithetai tou khenri kisingker 
 den einai ora gia diamakhes alla ora euthunes 
 sumphona me plerophories sto diaitete ksenake alla kai sto boetho anastasiade pou etan ston agona pharkaina  kanares  tha epiblethei siopere timoria ki auto giati sto paikhnidi den uperkhe parateretes diaitesias 
 periodeia tou  droutsa ste mese anatole    periodeia ste mese anatole me antikeimeno to mesanatoliko kai tis dimereis skheseis pragmatopoiei apo tis  oktobriou o upourgos exoterikon dem 
  prote antidrase etan ten ora pou anagignoskontan e epistole kai koruphotheke otan o stauros kalogiannes kai o alexandros kakhrimanes 
  kteniatrike yperesia tes nomarkhiakes autodioikeses lasithiou epharmozei to programma ekrizoses tes broukelloses ton aigoprobaton apo to  
 nomizo oti auto einai pou ektima kai o kosmos upogrammizei kharakteristika 
 logos gia biasune kai kakes epiloges tupou nilsen den suntrekhei 
 oi periodeies tou sunduasmou tha sunekhistoun tis epomenes meres toso sten pole tes kerkuras oso kai stous demous phaiakon esperion kai meliteieon 
 sumphona me tis episemanseis tes kas aggelas karude to orario tha prepei na einai eleuthero 
 gia deipno duo atomon me proto piato kurios kai gluko khoris krasi tha plerosete peripou    av des ternes  
 opos tonise o uphupourgos k sephounakes me to skhedio  demiourgeitai to plaisio tes khoregeses adeias leitourgias kai ekmetalleuses udatodromion kai kathorizontai ta apaitoumena dikaiologetika gia tis adeiodoteseis 
 ean emoun ste these ton armodion leei e idia tha ekana uperanthropes prospatheies gia na dothei mia luse 
  kos papandreou antitheta tha prepei prota na sbesei tis photies pou kathemerina anabei kai epeita na mostrarei os o teleutaios pou bazei to litharaki tes anaptuxes se enan topo dialumeno apo khree kai daneia 
 einai kharakteristiko oti apo tous peripou  ktenotrophous pou ekhoun labei pistopoiese gia ten paragoge tous apo ton idiotiko organismo  mono  apo autous diathetoun kreas sten agora 
  sundesmos episemainei sten anakoinose tou oti o nioplias einai mia xekhoriste idiaitere periptose kai e antimetopise pros to prosopo tou prepei na einai to idio xekhoriste kai idiaitere 
 argentines prosdoka na petukhei e kubernese phernontas me nomo litoteta ston idiotiko tomea  
 etsi prepei na apoktethoun neoi oi opoioi tha plaisiosoun ten omada 
 epises austera epilegmene apo egkura leukomata tou  
  ekrektikoteta e dioratikoteta kai e aisthese tou gkol einai adiamphisbeteta ta basika atou tou 
  idios milese sto clicklife gia to magazi kai to meraki tou to phresko psari 
 kai touto okhi giati den gnorize to telos tou alla giati pisteue pos ligos einai akome o khronos pou tou menei gia na teleiosei to ergo tou tes agapes kai tes prosphoras to megalo ergo 
 oi ispanoi ten apolambanoun toso os proino apogeumatino alla kai after hours bromiko 
  k memet khalet plerose ten poine ton  menon kai apokhorese me tous dekades philous kai sunergates tou apo to dikastiko megaro 
 kathe khrono katagraphontai kata meso oro  nea krousmata 
  poreia tou mpote thalassinou apo to erakleio eos ta diethne kosmika salonia eikhe ten eukairia na gnorisei gnostes prosopikotetes anthropous tou diethnous kallitekhnikou khorou oikonomikous paragontes kai orismenes apo tis pio omorphes gunaikes 
 plerophories anapheroun oti o iskhuros andras tou agiax tes epeirou tha sunantethei semera me ton alenatore khoris ostoso na theoreitai bebaio oti apo to rantebou ton duo pleuron tha prokupsoun nea dedomena 
 epises tha proslephthoun enas klibanistes apolumantes aposteirotes  enas metaphoreas asthenon  enas ergates genikon kathekonton  enas trapezokomos  kai enas lantzieres  
 meta apo aute ten exelixe oi kurioi kakhrimanes kai panzakhos tha mporousan aneta na diekdikesoun protagonistiko rolo sten tainia  o kalos kai o kakos 
 time antzela stamatiadou astamatiadouathinoramagr prosokhe to arthro auto proerkhetai apo to arkheio tou athenoramatos kai oles oi plerophories tou periekhomenou tou ekhoun elegkhthei kai diastaurothei kata ten khronike periodo tes demosieuses tou 
 sto phonto tes e aphisa graphei ksepoulane tis zoes mas den tha tous aphesoume 
 tha eimai sto theatro ebe opos eimai kai tora me tous tromerous goneis se skenothesia kai pali tou petrou philippide 
 oposdepote prokeitai gia mia megale apoleia gia ten omada tou atsaleniou kathos o kalaphates etan enas apo tous pio statherous se apodose paiktes tes omadas kai apo ta kalutera limpero tes  ethnikes 
 apaitountai apophasistikes metarruthmiseis gia demiourgia asphalon kathemerinon sunthekon gia tous aplous polites katapolemontas tautokhrona tis egklematikes energeies 
 apla kai e teleutaia aute ereuna erkhetai na eniskhusei ten apopse pos oi ekastote politikes egesies tou upourgeiou ugeias menoun mono stis theories 
 den prepei na perimenei oti oi alloi apo monoi tous tha prosexoun kai tha semeiosoun tis tourkikes prokleseis 
 otan omos ta mpalakia einai polla kai o thorubos megalos tote kati mporei na ginei 
 sumparastase se sinto epithese se khetapekha te sumparastase tou sto demarkho mpizaniou ekphrazei me grapte tou delose o demarkhos anatoles 
 mou telephonesan loipon apo to  na pao na mou dosoun mia paraggelia 
  piese tes anagkes pou niotheis se kanei kathos megaloneis na prostheteis ki alla mazi se osa ekheis ede sussoreusei ste zoe sou 
  ekdelose entassetai sten kampania enemeroses kai exoikeioses ton ellenon politon me to euro pou diorganonoun ta info point europe elladas stis periphereies tes khoras 
 sto stokhastro briskontai oi anthropines skheseis propantos oi erotikes etsi opos anthoun prosarmozontai kai phtheirontai 
 oi duo paiktes agonistekan sto khthesino philiko me ton ergotele  alla o zntenek skasni thelei na tous dei kai se proponeseis mekhri na diamorphosei ten oristike tou apophase 
 ligo mas aggizoun ta themata pou den mas aphoroun 
 kata sunepeia theloume na eimaste meros tou epikheirematikou gignesthai edona paixoume rolo sten anaptuxe kai na boethesoume ten ntopia agora kai tous kretes epikheirematies na ulopoiesoun ta skhedia tous 
 arkhike selida  enemerose  athletika nea  gepedo tou o ophh ten kuriake to apogeuma sto plaisio tes  agonistikes tou protathlematos  ethnikes 
 analutika to kalentari tou sullogou gia ton epomeno khrono   ianouariou  dromos augenikes 
 dipla tes axizei na deite to petrino kampanario tou  kai piso tes mazi me to terastio dendro ten panoramike thea sto aigaio 
 ypobole deloseos kai katabole tou parakratethentos phorou  epi ton katablethenton e akhthenton se pistose tou dikaioukhou ton parapano tokon kata ton mena martio  
 demosionomia  phorologiko sustema  demosionomike katastase etan apokardiotike 
  deutere protase aphora sten eniskhuse ton astunomikon metron sto legomeno stauro tes poles dioti para to gegonos oti uparkhei apophase gia ten apagoreuse tes kineses ton okhematon aute se kathemerine base parabiazetai kataphora apo asuneidetous odegous 
  agnoia kai e aneparkeia tes torines demotikes arkhes sto skhediasmo kai ten ulopoiese programmaton anakukloses ekhoun katastesei to demo ksanthes ourago stis analoges prospatheies ton politon tou alla kai tes periphereias an 
 ola ta paikhnidia theloun prosokhe omos gia tous stokhous pou ekhoume thesei tetoies anametreseis prepei na tis kerdizoume 
 den arkei na perigraphoume to prophanes 
 anoikhte epistole me auto to thema eikhame apo ton demarkho peramatos  kasse kai oute aute ephere apotelesma 
 perimenoume ten apopse tes topikes koinonias 
 eidikotera ta kerde phetos proseggisan ta  dis 
 aute loipon einai e akribes eikona sto nomo 
 me ton upersiberiko mekhri to bladibostok 
 blepete einai e epokhe tou blastologematos ton ampelon kathos prepei na kopoun ta akhresta kladia tous gia na paroun ta pano tous 
 to phestibal tha sunekhistei  me  iouniou sten athena kai perilambanei proboles tainion mikrou mekous proboles video art ektheseis photographias seminaria photographias kai panellenio diagonismo photographias me titlo street life 
 ta liontaria sunekhizoun se entonous ruthmous ten proetoimasia tous ki etsi sten semerine proponese o uperesiakos tekhnikos tes omadas paulos demetriou edose emphase kurios ste beltiose tes phusikes katastases ton podosphairiston tou 
 analutika to programma ton agonon repheri  ethnikes sphurizei ten  khioubrontadou axiologemenos diaitetes tes  ethnikes tha sphurixei ton agona tes premieras tes  khioubrontadou me ton akharnaiko to sabbato sto gepedo tou menidiou 
  monarkas ekhei xekinesei entuposiaka sto mexiko e inter phernei mono over epi leonarnto e ren einai se phorma oso gia ten mpilmpao deite ti kanei teleutaia kai tha sumphonesete mazi mou  se kaka khalia e magiorka epises 
 etan ena paikhnidi tessaron bathmon treis gia te nike kai enas akoma ponto gia to paikhnidi tou protou gurou tonise o ispanos tekhnikos eno anapheromenos ste rebans tou kupellou sten toumpa upogrammise einai duo diorganoseis teleios diaphoretikes 
 omos sten praxe den prepei na theoreitai dedomene e phusike summakhia metaxu omodoxon 
 oristikes apophaseis anamenetai na lephthoun to maio apo te diakheiristike epitrope 
 den uparkhei kamia desmeuse alla an o kosmos antapokrithei kai sterixei tha einai ekei kai o k pappas kai o k notias 
 na thumaste pos tous periorismous eseis tous balate ston eauto sas kai apla oi alloi tous ulopoioun 
  exagoge ton xenon ulon e leukanse an einai aparaitete kai genika e metatrope ton gkrizon uphasmaton sten epithumete telike tous katastase os pros te leukoteta to khroma kai ta kharakteristika pou dinoun eukolia ston metepeita kheirismo 
 to ntermpi pleon einai istoria kai oloi mazi perimenoume te sunekheia gia na doume an ta duo trena kanoun stase kapou e tha lusoun tis diaphores tous sto deutero guro kai sun ton agona tou  
 oi oikologoi prasinoi me pososto  den kataphernoun na mpoun ste boule 
  pleon aperigrapte ekpompe tou ellenikou radiophonou 
 para ta  stremmata ampelona e leukada einai to pio asemanto apo ta tessera nesia ton eptaneson pou einai axia anaphoras se oti ekhei skhese me to ampeli kai to krasi 
 palia sunetheia pou de khanetai eukola kai kathe phora trekhei molis mathei pos etoimazetai nea parastase 
 to na paizeis piso apo enan anthropo san auton me kanei polu kharoumeno 
 gia tis anagkes autou tou programmatos ekhei ekdothei mia seira ekpaideutikon biblion cd kai ekpaideutikon binteotainion 
 sten photographia tou agalmatos ekhoun epipleon zographistei khrusa skoularikia kathos kai perideraio pou periekhei kai to sema tou euro 
  pleiopsephia ton touriston autes tes periodou einai tes kategorias winter sun ara autoi tha straphoun se alles agores ektos ellados 
  mousike apotelei tekhnike pou se sunduasmo me orismenous polu austerous kanones diabioses boethaei sten katharse tes psukhes 
 prokeitai gia mia apo tis pio semantikes theseis e opoia den ekhei ereunethei me ten leptomereia pou tes tairiazei these  
 to programma tes emeridas ekhei os exes  aeria rupanse ste larisa 
 gia tis de metagraphikes kineseis ola exartontai apo to oikonomiko mpatzet mesa apo to opoio ekhei kharakhtei e poreia tes neas agonistikes periodou 
  phoros khresiktesias kharistike bole stous agrotes 
 sto sphuri to mellon tes khoras kai tou laou  drastikos periorismos tes oikonomikes kai politikes kuriarkhias tes elladas epibletheke se sunduasmo me mia katalesteuse tou koinonikou ploutou tou laou kai mia protophane ekptose tes zoes ton anthropon 
 giati e logotekhnia opos leei ste selida  den graphetai mono me ta dakhtula alla kai me ten psukhe 
 ntrope gia te real madrites kharakterise ton zoze mourinio o otmar khitsphelnt 
 okhi apo phoitetes alla apo alla paidia tes elikias tou 
 perissoteroi apo  anthropoi tha khasoun te douleia tous stis  kathos e alusida bibliopoleion borders e deutere megalutere ste khora tha kleisei ta  upokatastemata tes 
 sto proto teukhos me thema to epos tou  mesa se  selides parousiazetai ektenes photographiko uliko apo to albaniko metopo me spania stigmiotupa apo ten kathemerinoteta ton ellenon stratioton 
 koboun ta epidomata giati theloun na kopsoun eisodemata 
 sto khthesino sumboulio tes  ta mele tes enoses ekanan dekte ten paraitese tou kosta theodosake 
  tou tourkikou genikou epiteleiou strategos xousein kibrikoglou apokleiei kategorematika to endekhomeno parenokhleses apo ten tourkike polemike aeroporia tou aeroskaphous pou metephere ton ellena upourgo sugkoinonion k taso mantele 
 siemens  aporriphtheke kai e nea protase parapompes galazion upourgon paraitese pampouke meta ten kontra me papoutse anadromika oi perikopes ton misthon kourema stous misthous khiliadon demosion upallelon anadromika apo  iouliou 
 oso apisteuto loipon kai an phainetai uparkhoun hrakleiotes pou 
 exi ores ueta ten enarxe tes epikheireses ue ten kodike onouasia top kill anotato stelekhos tes etaireias delose oti apo to upothalassio koitasua petrelaiou ebgaine uono laspe

 sto poimnio sas na ta   skholiazontas ma tora paei ki autos gureuontas   eiste thrasutatos 
 den koitoun omades den exetazoun logous aphou apopoiountai te logike os ennoia tou katestemenou 
  enaskholese tou me to problema tes elaiopurenas prin ligo kairo alla kai me to thema tes poiotetas prosphata apodeiknuei oti arkhizei na endiapheretai genikotera gia ta megala problemata tou elaioladou 
 alla olo to thema einai na ginei to phek 
 eniose ten anagke na anoixei ena alinea ste nea uorke 
 auto dieukrinizei me egkuklio tou to ypourgeio oikonomikon prosthetontas oti oi apodeixeis autes tha phulassontai se kleisto phakelo sten ephoria kai meta apo ton elegkho 
 aitema tes  sten  den uperkhe ekeine ten periodo an auto ekhei kapoia semasia 
 gnorizei oti tha einai para polu duskolo na stethei o neos autos demos 
 kai pali omos tha antidrasei entona mono sten periptose pou eseis den tou ekhete aphesei kamia alle epiloge 
  paragoge petrelaiou tes benezouelas epese kato apo ta  ekatommuria dolaria eno to  etan pano apo tria ekatommuria kurios exaitias ton periorismenon ependuseon kai tes elleipses eidikeumenou prosopikou 
 epises pareggeilan akome ena mekhanema ton asbo pou psekazei mia ousia me anupophore murodia 
 to tetarto sikouel tes seiras komodion den ekhei kanena logo uparxes akoma kai gia tous poromenous opadous tes oritzinal tainias 
 an telika ginei e epembase ton  sto irak ten idia ora akuronontai oi opoies aisiodoxes problepseis gia ten anakampse tes pagkosmias oikonomias kai katu epektase tes touristikes agoras mesa sto  
 ostoso analutes theoroun oti meta apo duo gurous posotikes khalaroses kostous  tris

 aletheia poios o logos uparxes autou tou tameiou aphou den kanei kapoio koinopheles ergo

 apo oles tis anthropines epistemes e episteme tou anthropou einai e pio axia gia ton anthropo kai gia ton planete pou domei o idios

 to mnemonio problepei exoikonomese poron den mas upokhreonei me sugkekrimenes methodous eureses tous

 semera e demotike pinakotheke me erga spoudaion kallitekhnon apotuponei te gluptike te kharaktike te zographike kai ten keramike

  metokhes me euros times apo  eos  euro 
 protos stokhos etan e eisodos sten exada gnorizontas pos o bolos etan phabori apo ten arkhe alla kai ten uparxe omadon me terastia dunamike opos o ophe o panserraikos kai o panaitolikos 
 epomenos basikos stokhos tes epistrophes einai na leitourgesei e omada goneon etsi oste to duskolo egkheirema tes apexarteses na epiteukhthei mesa apo to idio to periballon tou alkoolikou 
 miamise lorida dromou ana kateuthunse pou anelissetai boreia meta sunekhon ekplexeon dexia sou to bouno aristera e thalassa se anempodisto optiko sphikhtagkaliasma 
  israelinos upourgos amunas mpeniamin mpen eliezer pou eikhe proanaggeilei ten apokhorese apo ten toulkarem kai ten kalkilia semeiose oti guro apo tis duo poleis tha eniskhuthoun ta metra asphaleias 
 ekhei grapsei alla tessera biblia  plagia me ta niphastra muthistorema enas peripteras kai takhudromos diegemata periptose molotoph muthistorema to manaphouki muthistorema 
 alla kai s oles tis ekpompes 
 sta anatolika apo boreies dieuthunseis  me  kai topika sto aigaio  mpophor 
 to meteoro bema tou pelargou oi paramethorioi plethusmoi e glossa tous kai ta sunora 
 ta koinonika kai politika dedomena deikhnoun me katharo tropo oti o stauros ton politon tha semanei gia ton karamanle to telos tou onomatos tes epokhes tou kai genika tes megales oikogeneias 
 perimeno tis kanonikes ntomates gia na dokimaso tis sardeles me kolokuthakia plaki alla sto metaxu sas metaphero tous kephtedes me ta klikia tous 
 anephere oti metaxu ton dunameon tes suntereses kai ton dunameon tes proodou uparkhoun diakhoristikes grammes poios einai o tassos papadopoulos gennetheke ste leukosia stis  ianouariou  
 sugkekrimena to senario tous basizetai se ena elakhista gnosto muthistorema tou iouliou bern tous nauagous tou ionathan 
 prepei na dosoume ten eukairia ston tsiole pou apedeixe tis proponetikes tou ikanotetes kai epeita na sterikhtei e omada se  basikous podosphairistes 
 yparkhei ena metabatiko stadio 
 duo nea onomata paikton ekhoun prostethei kai auta ste lista tou thrulou 
 kai meta meneis 
 ta mpania ependedumena me petra toso stous toikhous oso kai to patoma einai kati to pragmatika xekhoristo 
 ti eikhate na khasete anarotetheke 
  niketes tou agona kenuates noakh  ekopse to nema se  
  lardas ugeia o megalos asthenes kai sto nomo mas ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous  lardas ugeia o megalos asthenes kai sto nomo mas opos katarreei e kubernese tes  parasurei ste dine tes kai to periphereiako mas sustema ugeias 
 thelei apo tous paragontes na aphesoun kata meros tis prosopikes philodoxies na stamatesoun oi intrigkes kai na doulepsoun oloi me gnomona ten omada 
 apo te  o alexandros kakhrimanes den leei to nai akome alla mallon einai thema emeron na kanei episeme anakoinose gia ten kathodo tou 
 einai time mou pou briskomai gia prote phora sten kupro 
 ta pragmata omos den eginan akribos etsi 
  kathusterese aute trophodotese kai senaria gia dustokia kai adunamia exeureses tou prosopou pou tha analambane to upourgeio ugeias 
 stis prothesmies pou dinontai einai adunaton na oloklerothei stoikheiodos ena ergo pou upotithetai oti prospathei na balei taxe sto khaos pou epikratei semera 
 sumphona me ten astunomia o  allodapos eikhe sunapsei arkhika aisthematiko desmo me ten anelike 
 gia na ekhei iskhu e apophase metatropes prepei na demosieuthoun oi apophaseis sto phek kai meta na akolouthesei e alle diadikasia kai apophase isos e pio duskole gia ten taktopoiese tou prosopikou poioi tha pane pou kai ti tha ginei me tous orismenou khronou 
  tropos pou elexe e polumetokhikoteta kai e meta apo aute epokhe edeixe xekathara oti to prasino palati eikhe khtistei se sathro edaphos me ta apotelesmata na peithoun gia tou logou to alethes kai ton pio aisiodoxo opado tes omadas 
 ethesa ton problematismo mou apo ten arkhe alla pleon etan arga na gurisei to potami piso 
  sten itea aneta domatia kai zesto lompi diathetei to anakainismeno ek bathron nausika palace  
  omophulophilia gi aute te genia epapse na einai tampou na einai enokhe 
 to mats den tha einai eukolo gia kanenan 
 treo  sunekhizei ten paradose tes oikogeneias treo oi suskeues tes opoias kaluptoun tis anagkes ton epaggelmation prospherontas arketa kainotoma ergaleia pou dieukolunoun ten kathemerine khrese 
 ola ta senaria einai anoikhta opos kai oi ekloges 
 ten idia ora o ephes pilsen thelei na kanei kolpo gkroso me ton sasa bougiatits 
 mas aresei o podosphairistes alla khreiazetai upomone lene sten  gia ten periptose tou serbou 
 seko kai pegaine na kremasteis 
 tugra  mia monadike gastronomike empeiria sto estiatorio tou ciragan palace sto besiktas  mono me episemo enduma 
 mazi sas xana pisto sto kuriakatiko rantebou tou me tous anagnostes tou  to  erkhetai konta sas kai aute ten ebdomada 
  arsenal einai mia omada epithetike pou sunekhos piezei mprosta 
 uparkhei khronos meta to telos tes sezon 
 lupamai pou den mporesa n apheso esto olokleromene te melete autou tou ergou pou thelame n allaxei ten opse tes bitrinas tes poles 
 sumbibasmos e epitukhia anoigei ta khartia tou o markopoulos thema oron einai pleon e anakoinose tes upopsephiotetas tou proedrou tou  thodorou markopoulou gia to demo kabalas 
 na khaneis kai na spatalas ton kairo sou sa na ekheis mprosta sou khilia khronia 
 sto pani kai sto guali tou theatrou mpantminton auten te phora  ten timetike tous ekhoun o giorgos zampetas kai ta apeira tragoudia tou pou agapethekan arkhika meso tou sinema 
 dioti ean to keimeno den einai apolutos desmeutiko kai me metabletomia aple paragraphosduo monon lexeiseisakhthesomenes ek ton usteronektos plaisiou demopsephismatosmporoun na to akurosoun e na to metaballoun rizika kai kathoristika 
  atoma skholiazoun kai krinoun proionta kai uperesies diadiktuaka 
 to epikentro tou seismou entopizetai  khlm notia tes thessalonikes kai  khlm 
 ta pio paradoxa e paraloga pragmata pernane sta psila os kati an okhi phusiologiko toulakhiston anamenomeno 
 oi perissoteroi logo elikias etan pio authormetoi 
 sbenete me to xidi kai molis exatmistei ligo prosthetete zomo kotas mekhri pou na kalupsete to meigma 
  apodose ton entokon diamorphotheke se  enanti  sten proegoumene demoprasia tes  iouliou 
 to tekhniko epimeleterio den mporei na apotelei aplos ton tekhniko sumboulo tes politeias 
  glossa tou kartere einai aple lite alla okhi aploike 
 beltiomena kerde alla kai perithorio kerdous ano ton ektimeseon 
 gia ton nenant krstits eikhame sunekheis epaphes kai otan ekeinos xekinese tis diapragmateuseis me ten  katalaba pou ethela na paixo 
 poia einai e drasterioteta sas ekei askholoumai me ta politistika dromena kai prospathoume gia to kalutero 
 ta  dis euroa einai anexegeta gia ton arthrographou giati den mporei na dei tis energeies e paralepseis ton kuriarkhon elit tes khoras mazi me tis kuberneseis pou epheran to apotelesma tou upselou demosiou khreous 
 gi auto kai e apostole tou neou ford fiesta mono eukole den mporei na kharakteristei aphou skhedon kathe kataskeuastes autokineton ekhei na antiparataxei kai mia protase 
  arkhike eisegese tha ginei apo ton idio kai tha akolouthesoun oi eisegeseis ton upoloipon 
 kai os edo na aphesoume ten istoria einai thaumasia 
 pleros exoplismena domatia me autonome thermanse psugeio kai tzaki 
 expressgr   omilos  perase sten  auxese ton basikon oikonomikon apotelesmaton kategrapse gia to  o omilos  
  parea ton trion tou nikephorou petros philippides tou mime paulos khaikales kai tou paulou sake mpoula megalonei kata ena melos 
 kai oso kai an ten paspalizeis me monternes pinelies den pauei na mas kanei na niothoume oti oloi anapoloume kati pou ephuge anepistrepti 
 mazi tous o tourkos tsikhan okan 
 ektote o baggeles marinakes kai o nikolas pateras etan akhoristoi 
 pros to paron pantos arneitai oti biase to paidi tou 
 sten konitsa o panagiotes gargalas sugkentrose  kai o andreas papaspurou  
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai   ekthese autokinetou tes geneues piste sto rantebou tes san elbetiko roloi  anoigei aurio tis pules tes   martiou me stokho na proselkusei khiliades episkeptes sta dekades entuposiaka periptera tes 
 an kai ekhoume ten tekhnognosia kai tis upodomes pou apaitountai den ekhoume straphei sten paragoge ton mekhanematon auton 
 dikaies luses kai tes 
  protagonistes tou kai aphegetes einai enas khorismenos  ispanos pou proslambanetai apo mia skiode uperesia sto londino gia na diabazei anthropous kai na apokruptographei pos tha sumperipherthoun se diaphores katastaseis 
 oi ellenes opheiloun na antilephthoun oti dia ton apergion kai ton katalepseon kheirotereuei e oikonomia tes khoras kai e oikonomike tous katastase 
 me emphaniseis stis megaluteres aithouses tes europes kai me megale agape ste sugkhrone logia ellenike demiourgia 
 ten tetarte to bradu perpatesa apo ten kentrike plateia os to spiti mou sta seismoplekta 
  philos demarkhos san palaios autodioiketikos asphalos tha xerei oti to ousiodes gia ena ergo einai oi khrematodoteseis 
 ta de upoloipa kommata me antidrontas me dunamikes parembaseis etan san na apodekhontan epi khronia ten uphistamene katastase 
 tha xanakerdisei phetos to keupritz e tha tou parei ta skeptra e oxphorde piaste these stis okhthes tou potauou uetaxu tonperiokhon mortleik mortlake kaipatnei putney kai epeupheueste tous kopelates 
 to ekhoume xanadei to ergo 
 ola auta einai kapos duskolo na khoresoun sto mualo tou k psomiade pou exere te mathetiousa neolaia tou k mikhaloliakou tes khruses auges isos kai tou suneponumou exadelphou tou tes neas demokratias 
 an ekhete duo kai toproto einai agori axizei na kanete trito gia na uperetesei to proto ligotero 
 einai akome epitaktike e anagke na dothei entole enorkes diereuneses tes katastases apo ton ypourgo toulakhiston sto panepistemio kretes gia na termatisthei e phthora kai e spatale pou phainetai na ballei eutheos kata tou thesmou tou panepistemiou 
 mekhri omos paroun ten telike apophase tha prepei na eimaste proetoimasmenoi kai gia nees biaies anataraxeis 
  kurios seralvo prosthese se sunduasmo me ten tekhnologia anepaphon pleromon e sugkekrimene karta phernei epanastase ston tropo me ton opoio ginontai oi pleromes prospherontas takhuteta asphaleia kai pagkosmia apodokhe 
 emeis leme pos ta adunata semeia kathe demou einai duo 
 me gkol tou karanikola sto  kai tou anogiate sto  o panaigialeios nikese sto gepedo tou te beroia me  
 oi epitukhies tou katalanikou sullogou einai paromoies me ten poreia pou ekhei e betfair ta teleutaia khronia 
 sta diethne  ta perissotera kephalaia  dis 
 me base ta stoikheia tes diethnous omospondias gia to diabete   ekatommuria anthropon se olo ton kosmo paskhoun apo diabete ki alla  ekatommuria einai se kinduno na anaptuxoun to nosema 
 mas delonei oti se ena biblio pou ekhei ste bibliotheke tou ten istoria tes maphias oso ki an epsaxe den breke para mono ena onoma ellena egklematia anamesa se apeira onomata phusika kurios italika 
 as exetasoume ek neou te dutikopherte zoe mas sten akte tsamakia sten arkhe tou kalokairiou o kosmos pernaei mesa sten plaz khoris na pleronei eisiterio 
   autokritike ekane o baggeles argures gia to arnetiko apotelesma stis periphereiakes ekloges 
 triton ikanopoiountai oi exothen phoreis oi opoioi me megale piese e kai phortikoteta tha elega othousan te demotike arkhe sten katedaphise dioti eperasan ten gramme pou ethelan kai uperaspizan 
  protos sten alexandroupole maurotopos  o deuteros sto didumoteikho didumoteikho o tritos sto souphli mega rema kai o tetartos sten orestiada ampelia  upsomata 
 meta skoupiste to m ena pani 
 edo xekina kai e peripeteia mas 
 ki ante tora na kheis skhinous me mastikhi apo kato tous pou den to kheis mazepsei akoma olo kai na parakalas na me brexei kai sto parei 
  ekptose dinetai gia to diastema apo  eos  apriliou anexartetos emeromenias ekdoses ton eisiterion 
 alloste gia auto ton skopo xekinese 
  epikheirese diathetei kourmpadoro preses raouliera kai eidikes kolleseis epeide einai lepta ta metalla pou epexergazetai 
 enthousiasmenoi apo to phestibal korinou paraskeue  maiou   apoluta ikanopoiemenoi epestrepsan apo ton korino pierias oi  aigiotes khoreutes  eton pou peran meros sto  paidiko phestibal pou organonei o sullogos neon korinou 
 ena thema pou parousiasteke ton teleutaio kairo kai suzeteitai entona sten panepistemiake koinoteta kai okhi mono aphora ten kathusterese ston diorismo ton eklegmenon melon  
  anaphora tou ste romaike periodo dinei aphorme gia periskepse pano sten pseudepigraphe buzantine autokratoria kai sto politismiko keno sto opoio orthotheke to elleniko ethniko kratos 
 mia teleutaia mou anakalupse proekupse apo ton peiramatismo mou me mia alle mia kai monadike phusika suntage ten opoia edose stous taims tou londinou o upokomes posel apo to farmers club 
 uperkhe exormese pou mono se mia mera episkeptomastan  kai  europaikes proteuouses 
 alloste demokratia kai theatro pane mazi kheraki kheraki 
 me auto to skopo eimaste edo gia na ergastoume kai na eimaste apotelesmatikoi 
 me poia istorike prosopikoteta tautizeste perissotero me ton 
  kuklos ergasion tes etairias diamorphotheke sta  ekat enanti  ekat 
 plenete taktika ta katharistika pania giati otan einai bregmena boethoun ten exaplose bakteridion 
 to ekhoume kanei kai sto parelthon alloste gia ton katharismo ton arkhaiologikon khoron me megale epitukhia 
 tha to xanaodegeso aphou einai ergaleio tes douleias mou skholiazei 
 bionoume tis sunepeies tes krises kai o kosmos ekhei kourastei n akouei logia apaitei apo emas praxeis pou na einai apotelesmatikes pou tha tou dieukolunoun ten kathemerinoteta tou pou tha tou dinoun diexodous sta pases phuseos problemata

 sto  lepto o galakos ektelese to phaoul o orphanos sekotheke pselotera apo olous kai ekane to

 sumphona me osa mas eipe o k ksenakes daneise prin duo menes ton dermitzake  ekatommuria gia na agorasei autokineta 
 opos diapistoneis ki olous ekeinous tous mekhanismous koinonikou elegkhou ton mazon ton antimetopon okhi mono me ten oikonomike exathliose alla kai m ena kratos despotiko bathia diephtharmeno ki etoimo na pataxei kathe phone amphisbeteses

 kakos sundeoun auta ta themata pou einai anexarteta

 oi duskolies arkhisan otan to elleimma tou  den ekleise sto  alla sto  logo tes upseloteres apheterias tou elleimmatos to opoio etan kata polu upselotero tou problepomenou

 ara tha plerosoume sunolika perissoterous tokous 
 ta dase einai elakhista 
 ti eipe otan e ntora kai o souphlias eipan ston karamanle seko kai phuge gia na men grapsei e istoria oti epi ton emeron sou khreokopesameoti tha einai egklema oi ekloges kai oti o karamanles einai politikos megalou belenekous

 to nemporio proteuousa tes khalkes diaterei ten arkhontike omorphia tou me ta graphika sokakia kai ten idiaitere arkhitektonike ton spition tou

 ta matia sou  prepei na ekheis allios den uparkhei kamia soteria

 parallela e  prepei na anaprosarmosei ton epikheiresiako tes skhediasmo prokeimenou na ginei protagonistes tes prasines anaptuxes axiopoiontas tis ananeosimes peges energeias kai tis nees tekhnologies 
 thetike etan kai e parousia tou khrestou spurou sten idia kategoria opou katetage ebdomos 
  sugkekrimene mikrokustine se upseles sugkentroseis ta epipeda tes kathorizei e  egkumonei kindunous akome kai gia te demosia ugeia otan ta nera proorizontai gia udreuse eno demiourgei diatarakhes sten biopoikiloteta kai sto trophiko plegma tes limnes 
 mia bourgia gemate me raki meli moustaleuria kai ena kretiko kentema etan mesa 
 apo to opoio upopherame kai upopheroume adikos ego kai kapoioi sunaderphoi mou endekhomenos 
 ena mono epetukhe e kubernese me tis sobarotates paraleipseis tes na khasei pleon kathe ikhnos empistosunes kai axiopistias sto exoteriko opos mporei na diapistosei opoiosdepote suzetaei me stelekhe tes europaikes epitropes e europaikon organismon 
  epeiros os pros ton ogko ton oikodomon brisketai sten tetarte these sto pososto meioses metaxu ton  periphereion me  
 isopalo  to ntermpi sto aintkhophen poker 
  paragoge tou auxetheke kata  sta  ekat 
  taberna aphese ten teleorase kai strapheke sten ephe 
 siga me zetesei kaneis adeia apo opoiadepote arkhe otan prokeitai gia to sumpheron tou 
 ta grapheia tes etaireias einai misthomena kai einai embadou  tm ston aneto khoro opou stegazetai e etaireia diathetei xekhoristo meetingroom gia rantebou me pelates 
 gdusou kai boutexe khoris phobo ste zophere aletheia tou sumpantos khasou sten aperantosune tou okeanou ekei tha breis ten arkhe sto telos 
 oi buzantinoi tautisan tous tsigganous me tous dikous tous airetikous  kai miarous  athigganous pou etan gnostoi gia ten enaskholese tous me te mageia 
 ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous ta kazania tou tsipourou peran photia se polles geitonies tou nomou mas 
  mlantits diepheuge te sullepse apo to  otan kai tou apaggelthekan kategories gia ta gegonota tes sphages tes sremprenitsa 
 teleutaia enemerose sabbato  iouliou     tanakideto kerdos otan einai e anotere axia sten koinonia epereazei oles tis skheseis kai te drasterioteta ton anthropon o paragogos notheuei ta proionta 
 kathe upopsephios tha labei meros se exetaseis pou tha dienergethoun ste skhole protes protimeses tou 
 to entuposiako stis kataggelies autes einai oti orismenes sunodeuontai apo eggrapha stoikheia opos apo arithmous sumbolaion arithmous pinakidon polutelon autokineton ktl pou aphesan ekplektous tous elegktes 
   mporei na ekhei sten diathese tou ton  serbo alla den tha ekhei ten sumparastase ton philathlon tou kathos o panionios arnetheke na khoregesei eisiteria sten omada tes thessalonikes 
 to problema einai oti sukhna ston dromo ta kriteria ginontai polu epieike 
 ektos apo tis sunethismenes elektrikes eukolies diathetei  kai konsola me kentro plerophorion offroad 
 oso gia ton  dekhtheke to proto gkol sten edra tou kai mazi espase kai to seri ton nikon sto atsalenio

 kata t alla de nomizoume oti diaphonei kaneis pos prokeitai gia a 
 alla kai se alles idioktesia asudosia sten oikonomike drasterioteta upherpon e kai kataphanes ratsismos 
 sumphona me kapoies marturies ena tmema tes elit ton slabophonon pomakon tes rodopes eikhe arkhisei pkh na emphanizei deigmata ethnotikes aphupnises sta tele tou ith ai 
 stis gunaikes e seira ton telikon metaxu philathletikou prebezas kai erakle ioanninon xekinaei apo ten prebeza ten kuriake stis

 apo do mia neare oikogeneia 
 to merokamato egine meniatiko kai to meniatiko periousia 
 omos para ta anamphisbeteta auta gegonota orismenoi politikoi antipaloi tou konstantinou karamanle iskhurizontan oti te luse ten upedeixe o tote amerikanos upourgos exoterikon khenri kisigker 
  sunekhise tes anadiorganoses tes topikes autodioikeses kallikrates e opoia tha suneispherei exoikonomese toulakhiston  ekat 
 oi gepedoukhoi ekhoun to agkhos kai to megalutero kinetro bebaia alla amuntika usteroun polu 
 tha prepei na xanadoume ten istoria mas opos pragmatika prokhorese alla kai mesa apo ta endekhomena an dinotan e alle apantese ti 
 semeionetai oti apo phetos e etaireia leitourgei kentro thalassotherapeias sto xenodokheio grecotel dafnila bay eno sto grecotel corfu imperilal demiourgethekan  uperpoluteleis biles pou entathekan sto kommati famous class tes alusidas 
 to erakleio ten epokhe ekeine exaitias tes plethusmiakes ekrexes pou akolouthese te mikrasiatike katastrophe eikhe anagke apo nea odika erga eksugkhronismo tou limaniou kai tou pananeiou nosokomeiou alla prota ap ola eikhe anagke apo nero 
 otan eisai  ethnike mporeis na deis tis omades se perissotero bathos 
 to programma tes episkepses zemin pou anamenetai na aphikhthei edo stis  to proi tes kuriakes perilambanei xenagese sto arkhaiologiko mouseio ste sunekheia xenagese sten knoso 
 mas aphenoun loipon to edaphos eleuthero 
 sunomilousan omos me allous pou den egraphan ellenika pou egraphan gallika agglika e rosika kai sunomilousan epi isois orois giati milousan ten idia glossa te glossa tes demiourgias 
  katastase tes ugeias tou einai polu kake kai mou zetese na paradoso ena menuma ston maliki me to opoio ton kalei na ton ektelesei to suntomotero dunaton eipe o dikegoros mpanti areph 
 protaseis ton thesmikon ependuton gia ten kephalaiagora desme protaseon gia ten ellenike kephalaiagora parousiase khthes se sunenteuxe tupou o proedros tes enoses thesmikon ependuton ethe alexes pilabios 
 ekei kaname kai te bolta mas me karabaki kai bebaia thumethekame  osoi askholountai me barkes  ten patrida mas te khio 
 diathetei pio sphikhte anartese apo to sumbatiko antistoikho tou e opoia prokuptei apo to epipleon baros ton rezerbouar phusikou aeriou

 emporia anthropon me skopo ten sexoualike tous ekmetalleuse

 otan oi giatroi sto nosokomeio tous diabebaiosan oti prokeitai gia aple iose epetrepsan sto spiti

  periphemos gallos sunthetes klont ntempisi egrapse to  ligo prin apo ton thanato tou mia souita mpaletou me ton titlo jeox paikhnidia alla kai agones sta gallika 
 te deutere emera to khoreutiko tmema tou sullogou parousiase ena programma  lepton me khorous kai tragoudia apo  periokhes tes elladas kai bathmologetheke gia te sunolike tou parousia apo  epitrope kataxiomenon roumanon khorographon egnosmenou kurous 
 to duskolo meros einai to proto plasimo giati to keri prepei na einai polu zesto gia na douleutei kai kaigontai ta kheria sou puroneis leei e kkalliope rodou kai stamata kathe toso gia na murisei to keri me agalliase 
 telika to skaphos entopisteke kai oi epibainontes metapherthekan me elikoptero sten  pteruga makhes kai apo ekei sto nosokomeio khanion opou diapistotheke oti einai kala sten ugeia tous 
 mono oi kuprioi na dikaiountai anergiako oi koinotikoi pou den ekhoun douleia na paroun ta mpogalakia tous kai na tou dinoun 
 se megalo bathmo auto egine me ten psephise tou maastrikht kai tha ginetai giati auto apaitei to sumpheron tes ploutokratias kai ton kommaton tes kai okhi gia logous upoteleias 
 anodo parousiase kai e ethnike omada tes kuprou kathos apo ten  these anebeke sten  these me  bathmous 
 agele skulon lumainetai te gera edo kai ena mena agele adespoton skulon ekhei remaxei ta aigoprobata tes geras 
 prosthese oti uparkhei e boulese olon mas na proothesoume auton ton megalo thesmo tes topikes autodioikeses pou perase mesa apo ton kallikrate 
 uparkhei e pithanoteta epises tou khronou na zetesoume ki auto den einai kalo an sunekhistoun oi perikopes na paroume ligoterous phoitetes

 to skholeio mas   me te nea skholike khronia tha leitourgesei se neo ktirio dipla sten  me orario leitourgias proino 
 kathemerina kathomai kai perimeno exi peripou ores 
 giati sto megalutero diastema e rosia eikhe ton proto logo 
 semera to mesemeri me aphorme kai ten stase ergasias e dioikese tes  suzetaei to thema me phoreis ton goneon kai ton matheton eno stis  to apogeuma kalei se euruteres summetokhes suskepse phoreon sto ergatiko kentro 
 arkhiste me to periphemo leipsiotiko turi malako e muzethra 
 prokeitai gia mia summetokhike prospatheia katapolemeses tes akribeias ston khoro ton kausimon me ta mele tou site na analambanoun na katakhorizoun times na kanoun protaseis kai paratereseis 
 sto semeio auto stamatoun ta panta 
 oi katoikoi tou karterou akousan to dunato thorubo kai osoi etan konta se parathura eidan mia lampse 
  gripe aute xekinese apo mia khora pou den phemizetai gia tis ugieines diatrophikes sunetheies opos kai gia ten atomike ugieine tes pleiopsephias ton katoikon tes delade to mexiko 
 einai epikinduno na men antilambaneste tis thusies tou ellenikou laou kai na ton prosbalete banausa 
 athooi oi tesseris kategoroumenoi gia te dolophonia tes ephes phatourou apo ten prebeza ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous athooi oi tesseris kategoroumenoi gia te dolophonia tes ephes phatourou apo ten prebeza 
 ta apotelesmata tou sunolou ton neon apeikonistikon kai epembatikon tekhnikon pou epharmozontai suzetethekan se stroggule trapeza me suntoniste ton  drebelegka 
 ksekhaste te loutropole opou sas trabologouse e giagia sas

 etsi ekleise me ton kalutero tropo ena polu semantiko kommati ston programmatismo tou panathenaikou 
 oi stokhoi autoi ekhoun na kanoun me ten me kathe tropo dusphemese tou demokratikou stratou kai tou  tes epokhes ekeines

  diethnes beteranos gkolkiper metaxu allon tonise katarkhen sto parelthon kai se

 ki akoma oti einai orate e ptotike tase ton baseon alla den problepetai na einai omoiomorphe kai entone se ola ta tmemata olon ton pedion 
 einai autonoeto oti an stous epomenous menes uparxei allage epitokiou to apotelesma auto tha diaphoropoiethei 
 to mono stoikheio pou auten te stigme den einai gnosto einai to upsos ton adiatheton apothematon elaioladou pou proorizontai pros polese

 ola tha einai ntumena me porphura kai poikilokhroma endumata apo barbariko uphasma megales axias 
 tonise malista oti den ton krataei tipota sto spiti 
 katapodes uperephanos gia tous paiktes tou gia ten apodose tous sto mats me ton olumpiako delose o mpozontar mpantobits meta to paikhnidi tes kuriakes kai ten etta tes kerkuras me

 kurio melema mas einai na kanoume te douleia mas se asphales khorous opos kathe anthropos 
 kata tous kanonismous kai ten prokeruxe tou protathlematos o teleutaios  tha eprepe na upobibastei sten  kategoria athenon kai se auten na agonistei kata ten epomene periodo 
 stoikhematika tora sta dika mas ta semerina paikhnidia theloun polu megale prosokhe aphou pleon e skopimoteta kai to apotelesma einai ta mona pou endiapheroun tis omades 
 oson aphora tora ste diexagoge tou panelleniou protathlematos mikton omadon ton propaidon pou diorganonei kai phetos e  auto anamenetai na xekinesei stis  apriliou sten athena 
 ki aphou den mporoume diaphoretika as ikanopoiethoume me oti ekhoume endunamonontas to me thetike diathese energeia kai skepse giati akolouthei barus ki asekotos kheimonas 
 me phonto ten eikona ton skaphon sto thermaiko kolpo to mpalkoni tes  tha philoxenesei ekprosopous ton  ton  kai ton phoreon pou emplekontai ste diakheirise ten prostasia kai ten anaptuxe tou udatinou metopou tes thessalonikes

 thumamai oti polloi theoresan tote uperbolike auten ten epimone

 latin kai alla ste mone lazariston 
 ekhoun dikio polloi dutikoeuropaioi oti oi ellenes einai perephanoi gia tous arkhaious progonous tous alla den tous diabazoun 
 poia einai ta steretika sumptomata enos alkoolikou se prokhoremeno stadio ethismou  paraistheseis epileptikes kriseis  ephidrose tromodes paralerema to opoio mporei na einai akome kai thanatephoro

  koouts tou are leuteres soumpotits paradekhtheke pos den edosa entole gia phaoul ston marsal sto telos kai exegese gia to teleutaio sout tou slouka pos eikhe kale epiloge kai an empaine tha legame alla 
 prin olokleroso to kuklo ton suzeteseon de prokeitai na bgo na kano anakoinoseis 
 okhi den einai e oikonomike krise e kuria kai sobare 
 emeis kaekame kai xanakaekame sto parelthon me anupologistes sunepeies kai opos apodeikhteke erthe o kairos na kaoun ki alloi 
 sas kakophainetai bebaia giati allios sunethisate tosa khronia ekhontas to monopolio ton panton 
 ola ta perithoria kerdophorias einai epises beltiomena se sugkrise me ta antistoikha epipeda tou protou examenou 
 apo ekei kai meta anoixe o dromos gia ton mpaton o opoios khreiasteke sten kariera tou  agones gia na anebei sto bathro kai  gia na katagrapsei ten prote tou nike

 trite  augoustou   kuklophorese to periodiko ta kalloniatika opou diabazoume mia seira apo endiapheronta themata pou ekhoun na kanoun me ten epikairoteta tou demou kallones alla kai me te drasterioteta tou sullogou kalloniaton sten athena 
 kata t alla ta phabori epikratesan sta perissotera paikhnidia tes  agonistikes 
 diademotika erga demoi anogeion geropotamou kouloukona  agora oikopedou suntaxe meletes kai summetokhe ton  gia demiourgia biomekhanikou sphageiou  
 ena paikhnidi khoris bathmologike semasia kulouse omala kai xaphnika demiourgetheke tetoia entases delonei o k tzamouses 
 ta mele tes genikes suneleuses tou  omophona katadikasoun ten eisbole opadon tes  sta grapheia tou sundesmou kata ten semerine sunedriase tes 
   apo oti phainetai oi tourkoi apophasisan na apokatastesoun ten parokhe uperesion sta strobilia sunepos e katastase einai stathere alla arnetike delose o upourgos exoterikon

  odegese mou phainetai kai einai semera polu pio epikindune apo ten istioploia 
 tha prepei na dothei megalos kai polu duskolos agonas gia ten epharmoge tou kai to sugkekrimeno paradeigma einai ena akome ste seira ton pollon 
 apo kei kai pera e kretike omada kineitai me apolute mustikoteta se ola ta epipeda me stokho na brei tis katalleles luseis gia na kalupsei tis theseis tis opoies ekhei zetesei o giannes samaras

 aplos  sosta ennoeitai pos okhi 
 ekei uperkhe megale paradose airetikou pneumatos 
 opos egine gnosto o kategoroumenos pou peristasiaka ergazetai os ntitzei se gamous kai baphtisia eikhe apaskholesei kata to parelthon tis astunomikes arkhes gia upothese apoplaneses anelikou alla sto dikasterio athootheke 
 sumphona me ton n  tou  apagoreuetai retos e sullepse e diaterese se aikhmalosia e katokhe e metaphora kai e agorapolesia kathe eidous zontanou pterotou theramatos sumperilambanomenon kai ton odikon ptenon 
  demos pallenes zetaei sugnome apo tous parodious katoikous gia ten proskaire talaiporia 
 to thema tes tekhnes uperxe to kentro ton suggraphikon emmonon tou 
 gia tous  demarkhous tou nomou uparkhoun  eidikoi sumbouloi 
 olo kai ligotera einai ta paidia pou mporoun na anagnorizoun ta dentra apo opou paragontai basika proionta diatrophes leei sto  
  daidalos ekthetei ta erga ton paidion tou 
 meta to  e mpartsa me to gnosto tes tikitaka mpol kratese ten katokhe dikhos na apeilethei e na apeilesei idiaitera 
 kai metaxu ton giatron omos tha prokupsoun problemata sumphona me ton idio 
 semasia ekhoun oi titloi pou katakta o panathenaikos 
 makes pera tora giati stenakhoretheka me auta pou ematha khthes kai tetoia kai etsi leo mepos me khreiazesai 
 ste suskepse parabretheke kai e bouleutes khiou tou  elpida tsoure e opoia tonise oti e apophase katedaphises politika thesmika kai koinonika tha ekhei sunepeies kai kalese tous pantes na analaboun tis euthunes tous 
 kharauge metrou  konstantinou  basileiou khr 
 phagane mekhri skasmou to mellon ton paidion mas 
 epises tha prepei na ekhoun ten ugeia kai te phusike katalleloteta pou tous epitrepei ten ektelese ton kathekonton tes eidikotetas pou epilegoun 
  k akhilleas karamanles meta ten praxikopematike eisodo tou ste boule kai ten se sunekheia paraitese tou einai kai pali upopsephios bouleutes 
  arkhiepiskopos khristodoulos ekane apo tou mikrophonou anaphora sten parousia ste laosunaxe tou ekprosopou tes ekklesias tes kretes 
 sten sunekheia probletheke binteo me ten sunoptike istoria tou nomou apo ten pro khristou epokhe eos semera me aphorme to opoio to koino aneptuxe ton problematismo tou 
 arkhizoume loipon na epilegoume to ti tha phame logo ton sunaisthematon mas alla ten idia stigme to ti trome epidra sto pos aisthanomaste toso psukhika oso kai somatika 
 ta sunaisthemata pou prokalountai stous goneis apo ten uparxe enos paidiou me anaperia sten oikogeneia einai sunethos sugkekhumena kai polu entona

 auto tonizetai sten apantese tou uphupourgou pekhode k  tsaklide se skhetike erotese tou bouleute man 
 ieronumake to  grammatea tou pot 
 ap enantias einai khresimopoiesimos dioti prote e metropole eprepe n anoixei tis pules tes kai tis ekklesies kai protos o metropolites na eurisketai metaxu ton prosphugon ean den einai asthenes opos akousame na stelnei tous iereis tou na legoun 
 skephteite ten talaiporia kai to khrono sto endekhomeno metaphoras stis karues tonizei o demarkhos gabriel papanastasiou 
 anaitiologetes epektaseis skhediou  meiose ton khorikon enoteton apo  se  den aitiologeitai oute apanta ston problematismo pou katatetheke se skhese me to orio tou ruthmistikou skhediou kai ta kriteria tes leitourgikes sunapheias ton periokhon 
 se auto to plaisio e ekthese ektos apo ena taxidi sto parelthon leitourgei esto kai athela tes kai san skountia gia na antidrasoume sten kakogouste pharsa pou phainetai na mas ekhei stesei e istoria 
 ta upoloipa lephta pane stis anagkes tou skholeiou sto opoio ekhoun ginei semantika erga opos ebalan reuma kai ena bitio  litron gia na tous parekhei nero 
  euro os exes a me ten kephalaiopoiese posou  euro apo ton logariasmo diaphora apo ten ekdose metokhon uper to artio kai b me ten kephalaiopoiese posou  euro apo ton logariasmo apotelesmata eis neo 
 ta ekhoun sumphonesei krupha prokeimenou na kanoun mia bromodouleia kai na skepasoun mia skandalode upothese 
 oristike sumphonia metaxu ton duo pleuron de phainetai na ekhei epiteukhthei ostoso e sunantese pou eikhan oi duo pleures ten tetarte to apogeuma edeixe oti uparkhei endiapheron gia sunergasia 
 sto demo larisaion apo to sunduasmo tou  sapka gia ten topike koinoteta sto eleutherai enstase katethese o k  papademetriou diekdikontas ten prote these sto sunduasmo 
 khthes plerophories anepheran oti somateia ethelan na uparxei kai tritos polos stis ekloges me upopsephio ton k granitsa kai ton piezan alla den epaletheutekan 
 se poluselido porisma katelexe o elegkhos ton orkoton logiston stous opoious kai anatetheke ap ten periphereia boreiou aigaiou to ergo tes apotimeses tes oikonomikes katastases tes  kai tes lesvos shop 
 prosthetoun oti ste semerine krise kathe phorologikos poros pou didetai sta panepistemia prepei na proagei ten prokope tes khoras 
 etan kale e persine khronia alla men xekhname oti phetos ekhoume kai to champions league opote einai mia khronia semantike kai duskole 
 aute einai e sobaroteta kai e upeuthunoteta tou protou polite autou tou topou 
 eprepe na phtasei egkairos sto akribo spiti pou molis eikhe anakainisei ki o elegktes apo ten politeia tou ekleise me austeroteta kathorismene ora kai mera pou tha pegaine oste an ola etane sosta tha mporouse me asphaleia na to paradosei ston idioktete 
 edo loipon arkhizei na mplekei e istoria kathos o sundesmos demon khrematodoteitai ap to up 
 gia na apolausete ta nostima edesmata tes maures thalassas sustenontai ta estiatoria regata neptun alexander kai kapitanska sreschta 
 alloi kateuthunthekan pros to panthessaliko alloi pros to sundesmo ton austrian boys sten odo agiou demetriou kai alloi pros ta grapheia tou  
 as doume mprosta ti tha kerdisoume alla kai ti tha khasoume 
 oi piperies polethekan stis  drkh 
 aute akribos e epharmoge ekleise ta  khronia poreias sten agora khthes mia poreia pou emperiekhei ouk oliga semeiastathmous sten exelixe tes psephiakes mousikes se auto pou einai semera

 oi promakhones briskontan se tria epipeda 
 autes tis adikies tha kanoume oti mporoume na tis diorthosoume alla prepei gregora na bgoume apo te strougka kai te mizeria

 to omereio asphuktia logo tou phortou ekdeloseon 
 emeina me anoikto to stoma akougontas kapoion pou xerei apo mesa apexo ki anakatota ola osa tektainontai sto nosokomeio tes khiou ta teleutaia khronia kai pou ekhoun skhese okhi me ten iatrike noseleia alla me alles parametrous 
 tetarte  augoustou   demosia ekklese na sterikhthoun oi tour operators kai oi aeroporikes etaireies pou phernoun touristes ste lesbo apeuthunei o proedros ton touristikon praktoron akhilleas sougioltzes 
 pos na uparxei axiopistia otan o proen upourgos mas elege oti eikhe exasphalistei e sumphonia me ten troika kai telika den eikhe ginei tipota pheretai na eipe o odusseas konstantinopoulos 
 ti mporei na bgalei kaneis apo mia toso koinotope istoria polla kai tipota 
  aristere pleura khresimopoieitai se katastaseis ektaktes anagkes e an prepei na parei kamia anasa kata te diarkeia tou paikhnidiou o ntaniel albes 
 antistoikha o ophelimos khoros sten piso seira kathismaton den dikaiologei tis auxemenes exoterikes diastaseis tou amaxomatos kathos to periorismeno platos den eunoei te philoxenia tritou atomou 
 kairos athena  tet  aug   eleutherotupia trite  iouliou  nees apoluseis sten pegasos ekdotike sunekhizontai oi apoluseis ston omilo pegasos ekdotike idioktesias mpompola 
 dioti einai terastia upokrisia na koptontai kapoioi gia ten anergia ton neon kai ten idia stigme na me theloun na antimetopisoun mia apo tis basikes aities tes to xeperasmeno kai aneparkes panepistemiako sustema 
 bebaios mou apantese pao sto episkepterio 
 oi parapano anapheromenes ependuseis tha eniskhusoun peraitero te dunamikoteta exupereteses paraggelion tes etaireias pou pragmatopoiei perissoteres apo  timologeseis ana emera kata tis periodous aikhmes

 trite  augoustou   me kentriko thema problemata sumperiphoras ton matheton sto skholiko plaisio  mia biomatike proseggise tous tha pragmatopoiethei aurio paraskeue to proi stis  emerida sto periphereiako epimorphotiko kentro  mutilenes 
  apophase ekrine oti akoma kai an o daneioleptes upegrapse sumbase daneiou me trapeza pou perilambanei oro o opoios na epitrepei ton anatokismo ton tokon apo ten emera kathustereses ana trimeno o oros autos einai akuros 
 emeis gia paradeigma agorasame agria manitaria apoxeramena apo enan ntopio kalliergete ki ena polu endiapheron  me mousike kapoiou mousoulmanou mousikou apo ten komotene

 den leo oti o pheisa etan khthes toure sta kala tou leo omos oti eblepes ena khaph pou despoze ston khoro pou se ekane na pisteueis oti e mpala thelei den thelei tha perasei apo ta podia tou 
 pou allou sto theatriko ergo tou arka ekhthroi ex aimatos pou xekinese tis parastaseis tou apo to theatro tou neou kosmou periodeuse se thessalonike kai patra alla apo tis  apriliou mekhri kai tis  maiou tha parousiastei kai sto mpantminton 
 ta deka petaflops einai to epomeno megalo stoikhema tes biomekhanias ton uperupologiston kai oi kataskeuastes kanoun agona dromou gia to poios tha katapherei protos na parousiasei ena tetoio sustema 
 mia tetoia sumperiphora apotelei sunethismeno phainomeno tou kathestotos kantaphi anapherei stous setimes 
 ek merous tou sundesmou ginetai prospatheia na anoixei diaulos epikoinonias me ten trapeza millennium pou einai o basikos khrematodotes tes  ostoso mekhri semera e prospatheia aute den ekhei thetika apotelesmata

 etsi apo ton parapano ogko pou katagrapheke sto  peripou ta  dis 
 an exakolouthesoun na einai apenanti mas toso tuphloi oso etan eos semera toso to kallitero gia mas 
 ta eisiteria pou ekhoun apomeinei tha ginoun ki auta kapnos kai to phaleriko stadio tha einai gemato apo akre se akre 
 alle mia bradia me ellenike entekhne kai rok mousike organonei to hott spott sten prokumaia 
 te sumbase upegrapsan oi demetres kai konstantinos spanos ek merous tes tropho kai oi raphael mouses kai konstantinos makhairas apo ten pleura tes  
 tora pou einai polla ta kala semeia pephtei megalutero baros kai se esas kat arkhas na xekathariso oti ta kalutera mou semeia ektos nesiou einai ena aurio kai ena methaurio 
 mano kai  abramopoulo kharakterizontas tis periptoseis tous me sugkrisimes 
 pos sou phaneke konstantine eisai adiorthotos 
   asthenes seismike donese megethous  bathmon sten klimaka rikhter semeiotheke ste lemeso khoris na proklethoun opoiesdepote zemies e na semeiothoun traumatismoi 
 oi megales auxeseis metokhikou kephalaiou kurios sto khoro ton eisegmenon etaireion ekhoun aporrophesei semantika kephalaia apo ten agora 
 einai e prote phora pou summetekho sten klasike diadrome kai okhi mono kataphera na paro te nike alla kai na petukho rekor klasikou marathoniou 
 ten kuriake e aponome ton brabeion gia tous mathetikous agones  telete aponomes ton brabeion ton mathetikon kallitekhnikon agonon zographikes kai theatrou periphereias kretes tha ginei ten kuriake  apriliou stis  to proi ste demotike aithousa androgeo 
 theoreite oti aute e katastase deikhnei oti paue kala nouizete oti uporouue na sunekhisouue etsi ta etoiua kapoia stigue teleionoun oi upokhreoseis ouos den stauatoun

 prokeitai gia te megalutere pleiopsephia pou sugkrotetheke gia na sterixei nomo  plaisio gia ta  apo te metapoliteuse kai meta 
 kai perimenoun na tous kalesoume na mas sosoun 
 gia tis epomenes kineseis tous oi idioktetes taxi anamenetai na laboun nees apophaseis 
 gia na pate ekei protimeste to telepherik me tis aioroumenes kampines kathos etsi tha apolausete mia exairetike eikona tes poles

 katalabaineis oti to biblio tha poreuthei me ton idio tropo os to makrino telos tou aradiazontas epeisodia tes paidikes elikias idomena apo ten idia pantote optike gonia kai sto idio epipedo dieisduses tou blemmatos 
 pososto  tes etaireias ksulemporike enosis demetropoulos  polukhronopoulos  pou drasteriopoieitai me to diakritiko titlo   apektese e ksulemporia  edraionontas te these tes sten egkhoria agora

 den leipei bebaia kai e anoikhte diastreblose pou isos opheiletai sten adunamia tou arkhikou suntakte na katanoesei ena epistemoniko keimeno 
 me auto os kriterio apophasise na aposurei ten upopsephioteta tou kai na metekhei sto periphereiako psephodeltio 
 einai to gnosto phainomeno pou ekhei katagraphei sten ellenike agora kai apo meletes e legomene epikheirematikoteta anagkes 
 an upothesoume pos o nikos gkontas den eikhe diarroes pros to antipalon deos par oti e duname tes anexartetes demotikes protoporias meiotheke kata  psephous te deutere kuriake e megale prokhthesine apokhe etan mallon aute pou ekrine ton teliko nikete 
 telos prospathese na xephugei apo ten armodioteta tou antidemarkhou kathariotetas tou demou khiou k anagnostou kai na perasei to thea sta kheria tou k broule eno den apekleise to endekhomeno na zetethei ektakte sunedriase tou demotikou sumbouliou khiou 
 to apotelesma tha einai oti sten poluthrulete kai anthropobora agora ergasias tha metrane pleon mono ta masters kai ta didaktorika diplomata eno ta ptukhia toso ton  oso kai ton anabathmismenon  de tha ekhoun para elakhiste mekhri medenike axia
