 elpizoume auto na men epanalephthei 
 ole tes e mera skhedon kula me tis phrontides ton paidion 
 ekeinoi pou anoixan etan oi apontes apo te genike suneleuse kai epereazontai kai apo ta polukatastemata pou menoun anoikhta semeiose o proedros tou emporikou sullogou 
 prosphata o demos pouba exedose enemerotiko uliko gia tis draseis sten periokhe me ten phrontida tou demarkhou ph oikonomake 
 dedomena me  lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese    diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai  auphiboliadeleterio demosieutheke trite  iouniou  kapoios na uaslutrosei 
 sto telos o arithmos tous phtanei den phtanei tis ekato 
 sten arkhe tou agona legame pos auto einai to akropolis kai pos theloume na eimaste ston termatismo 
 metaxu omos ton uperbolon den mporei kaneis na amphisbetesei oti uperkhan kai kapoies pou aphorousan to demetre bounatso prosopika kai prokalesan aisthese 
 klados  sta  kila  paidon me  sunolo  
 oudepote uperxe ousiastiko dialogos me ten ekpaideutike koinoteta anapherei e  sten anakoinose tes pou upographoun o proedros panagiotes mpaliatsas kai e grammateas paraskeue papakostopoulou 
  prototupe ekthese tha philoxenethei stous khorous tes kai tha einai anoikte gia to koino apo tis  martiou  kai gia olo ton mena tis ores leitourgias tes bibliothekes 
 isos na nai ki etsi 
  sugkekrimene erotese exorgise ton tekhniko ton kokkinon diabolon o opoios aphou zetese diakritika na mathei poios demosiographos etan ste sunekheia zetese khamelophona ton apokleismo tou demosiographou 
 ante an mporeis ela na summetaskheis sto sakhin ekhinos e sto ketenlik kentauros e se mia sugkentrose e ekdelose tes meionotetas 
 to  ton ellenon theorei oti prepei na akolouthoume tis odegies to  na phorame prostateutika gantia to  na apothekeuoume sosta to proion kai to  na khresimopoioume mono te sunistomene posoteta 
  agia marina aristera 
  khaniotakes apotelei metagraphiko stokho tou olumpiakou kai tou erakle eno o ophe apo ten pleura tou mallon einai pleres opos tonisteke kai ston paikte meta ten ananeose ton sumbolaion ton mpekiai khosada 
 metaxu allon e delose tou proedrou tha prepei na perilambanei anaphora sto khemiko polemo khoris na katonomazetai kapoia sugkekrimene khora del 
 oi times ekhoun auxethei se sugkrise me persi kata  aggizontas ta upselotera epipeda tou  eipe 
 grammateia ka tis antiparatheseis auton dikegoroi kata ergazomenon ste gen 
 oi iaponikes arkhes iskhurizontai oti einai polu noris gia na milane gia makroprothesma metra kathos pros to paron proegeitai e psuxe ton exi antidrasteron tou ergostasiou 
 sto pragmatika gigantio auto ergo parousiazontai oi apodemetikes sunetheies agrion zoon pou dianuoun terasties apostaseis se epikindunes diadromes opos katagraphontai apo kameres eidika kataskeuasmenes gi auten te monadike paragoge 
 to thema einai na epiteukhthei sunainese kai na sunekhistei o dialogos gia tis duskoles metarruthmiseis 
  eggrapho tes  ephoreias proistorikon kai klasikon arkhaioteton kai g ta apaitoumena tekmeria kuriotetas ges 
   katzies edose mprostine mpalia ston mlantenobits pou proothetheke metopika kai apo konta petukhe to  
 basei autou ton iounio tou  sunelephthesan ste thessalonike kai ektopisthekan ste naxo duo egetes tes phenterasion oi mpenarogias kai gionas 
 bebaia ektos apo tous ellenes uparkhoun kai oi kuprioi pou erthan sten ellada me oneira ki ephugan nukta 
 dedomena me  lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese    diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai sta oraiotera mpar tou kosmou e thea einai toso 
 einai prostateumene apo tous boreious anemous eno konta tes brisketai kai o kolpiskos mononautes me ammo kai botsalo 
 nostimeuei exisou tis probegkianes elies e ton pikantiko polto tous tapenade pou sunodeuei ta aperitiph ton gallon tou notou eno kai to pantakhou paron katsikisio turi entuposiazei to blemma kai ton ouranisko otan ntunetai me dentrolibano 
 idrutheke sta mesa tou  aiona apo tous adelphous alexio kai ioanne buzantinous axiomatoukhous 
 me aphorme te khthesine episkepse tou genikou grammatea tou  k  kapelere ste larisa anazopurothekan ta senaria gia ta louketa sto nomo 
 sugkekrimena anapheretai oti sumphona me ten italike epitrope emporiou  e mese time enos diamerismatos  tetragonikon metron ste beruto phthanei ta  dollaria ana tetragoniko metro 
 den xerei oute na nikaei 
  enas apo tous duo andres xepsukhese epitopou eno o allos sto asthenophoro pou ton metephere sto nosokomeio 
 kalo taxidi tous 
  atukhos andras eikhe eisakhthei sto panepistemiako nosokomeio stis  tou menos 
  sunduazei ten kosmopolitike atmosphaira me tis phusikes omorphies phoul tou prasinou kai uperokhes paralies kai proselkuei kathe kalokairi paratheristes kathe tupou oikogeneies skaphatous latreis tou rilax alla kai neous me agries diatheseis 
 pempte  aprilios   ti iskhuei me tis eggueseis katatheseon mathete apo pou tha apozemiotheite kai poso sten periptose pou kapoia trapeza baresei kanoni kai ekhete ekei tis katatheseis sas  ti ginetai sten periptose pou eiste daneioleptes 
 einai to khroma tes zoes mou kai khairomai polu kathos ste nea mou omada ta panta einai katakokkina 
 ikanopoiese ste seteia alla dusareskeia stis alles poleis tou nomou lasithiou meta ten anakoinose tes apophases tou sumbouliou tou  
 mas milesan me polu omorpha logia 
 enas skoteinos kosmos kolases 
 perimeno polu kleisto mats mia mantsester mantromene enan rounei na trekhei san skulos na paizei ton rolo tou pepe tes real genika enan teliko pou den tha ekhei skhese me ekeinon tou  
 alloste ta menou ton delivery briskontai se apostase boles apo ten agapemene mas these ston kanape 
 panmiou minoikeasteras krithinakes   ntanalakes  kelantonakes parateretes  kounalakes 
 sto metaxu o banterson upegrapse khthes trietes epaggelmatiko sumbolaio 
 poios tha ethele na odegesei ten parataxe mas se mia etta ephoson o laos den ton thelei  ennoeite an o laos den ton thelei kai phanei oti einai telika epiloge tou  sarres akribos 
 phainetai omos kathara e prothese tou psephophorou gia to komma kai gia ton upopsephio 
  autokinetobiomekhania toyota anakoinose semera oti anakalei sunolika  ubridika autokineta ston kosmo kurios to teleutaio montelo prius logo problematos sto sustema pedeses 
 poios eipe oti ta blockbusters den einai gia khortase uparkhoun dekades tainies pou den osphrantheke egkaira to koino oi opoies marazosan eispraktika alla brekan eterokhronismena kalt anagnorise 
  kataigida etan en opsei 
 pio sugkekrimena sumphona me ten problepse tes ethnikes meteorologikes uperesias ten paraskeue  ste dutike ellada tha semeiothoun brokhes kai kataigides kurios stis thalassies kai parathalassies periokhes 
 mikre anodo katagraphoun skhedon ola ta europaika khrematisteria me to geniko deikte timon tou khrematisteriou athenon na kleinei sto  eno kata te diarkeia tes semerines sunedriases eikhe xeperasei kai to  
 malista to demosieuma anephere kharakteristika  kostas papanikolaou xekhorizei apo tous  pou ekhoun prooptike na mpoun automata sta ntrapht 
 telos oi kk semites kai pherkhophstat erotethekan gia tis exelixeis stis europaikes aerometaphores 
 stous katoikous tou oklant aresei to protoporiako ntusimo stis  phebrouariou e khora giortazei te sumphonia waitangi tou  pou upographeke metaxu ithagenon kai apoikon 
 bebaioseimaste mia mikre khora sten periphereia tes europes sten opoia epibionoun polla stoikheia enos plousiou parelthontos makrunou kai prosphatou eno apo ten alle pleura eisballoun me ragdaio ruthmo stoikheia tou sugkhronou politismou kai tes tekhnologias 
 pempte  iouliou   pempte  iouliou   mera xekourases e semerine gia tous omeristes pou summetekhoun stis ergasies tes  omerikes akademias 
   adieukriniste epileximoteta ton neon ependutikon skhedion 
 opos tonise o k giannakopoulos apo ten epomene khronia tha xekinesei apo ten krete pilotiko programma gia ten proothese tes diatrophes 
 opos oloi oi khit 
 apo te mia oi parees sten kapheteria pou kanoun aneleeto chitchat ki apo ten alle o nikos monos tou se mia rastone 
 de tha epiballo se kanenan to pos tha me dei e tha me kharakterisei 
 tha etan loipon kalo an ki alles alusides soupermarket alla kai eurostes epikheireseis leitourgousan pros ten idia kateuthunse gia na kaluphthoun geographika oi megaluteres toulakhiston poleis tes khoras 
 gia ton idio kai to ergo tou milese o kathegetes philosophias tou panteiou panepistemiou kai poietes demetres lamprelles o opoios ektos allon ton kharakterise os ena poludiastato talento pou axizei na timethei kai sto nesi tou 
 luse den einai oute oi epop pou kata koine omologia den apedosan oute ta elakhista apo ta anamenomena  o stratos epitelous 
  etairia akolouthei sunteretiko management den ekhei trapeziko daneismo kai den einai ektetheimene se pithanes lexiprothesmes apaiteseis 
 deutere phora pou to phreatio sten odo katsare plemmurise to dromo 
 tipote ousiodes den kineitai 
  purgos noikiazetai olokleros gia kapoia weekends alla mporeite na ton episkephtheite kathemerina ektos sabbatou apo tis  
  kanithares upeste ena bathu skhisimo metaphertheke espeusmena sto nosokomeio kai pleon theoreitai apithano na ekhei epoulothei e plege tou tis epomenes ebdomades 
 me te diadikasia tes psephophorias eklekhthekan gia diete theteia kai ta mele tes oikonomikes epitropes tou demou beroias kai tes epitropes poiotetas zoes 
 giati auto pou metraei panta einai e sunekheia mas 
 sto idio erotema pososto  pisteuei pos kai e nea demokratia den akouei ta problemata tou kosmou eno to  pisteuei oti to megalutero meionektema tes neas demokratias einai to parelthon tes 
 me kardia asso gia ten omada tou pasarela 
 pros to paron arketa megala pistotika idrumata tou exoterikou pherontai etoima na sumphonesoun ste diakratese ton ellenikon omologon 
 me to pou patas to podi sou sten paralia tes triopetras sto noto tou rethumnou kai to brekheis sta skoura mple nera tou libukou pelagous den ginetai na men piaseis ston aera aute ten apisteute energeia pou ekhei 
  baloto einai o dekatos dioiketes tes  sto kossuphopedio 
 oi legomenes diarthrotikes metarruthmiseis ekhoun os skopo na allaxoun arden to ergasiako topio 
 prokeitai apla gia logistiko lathos e uparkhei pragmatika tamiako elleimma ola xekinesan prin merikous menes otan kai oloklerotheke e mekhanorganose tou  mutilenes 
 mekhri telos tou mena sta nea tou grapheia 
 tapazides demetres tou pantele 
 paromoio sema edose kai o stokhastikos talantotes o opoios se epipeda konta sto  apetukhe na diaspasei anodika ton kineto tou meso oro 
 oi anthropoi pantos tou pagkhiakou de khanoun to kouragio tous sumphona me ton kosta pantelara pou semeionei ekhoume  agones akome uparkhei perithorio gia beltiose 
 sten atzenta tes sunanteses den perilambanetai episema to thema tou euroomologou an kai toso e angela merkel oso kai oi sumbouloi tes den ekhoun aporripsei entelos ten idea 
 pou pegan ekeines oi lampres parastaseis pou sugkinousan kai anatrikhiazan to koino e to ekanan na klapsoun apo ta gelia kai na niosoun oti ontos parakolouthesan arkhaio drama e komodia 
 sta  bgainoun oi ergazomenoi kai ste  
  episeme dikaiologia tes sunekhizomenes tautises mias astunomikes uperesias tou limenikou somatos me ena neuralgiko upourgeio  
 euthunetai apokleistika e kubernese giati sto kheri tes etan na parei protoboulies delose realnews 
 pano aristera uparkhei to emblema tou papa etoi trioropho stemma kai duo kleidia khiasti topothetemena 
 emena omos auto de mou leei tipota 
   kathegeton gia to neo tekhnologiko lukeio prosphata dotheke ste demosioteta apo ten politike egesia tou upourgeiou paideias to skhedio gia to neo tekhnologiko lukeio  
 ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous olo kai pio sukhna to teleutaio diastema phthanoun stis elektronikes dieuthunseis pollon etaireion protaseis gia na ginoun pelates 
 oi idioi anthropoi  pithanotata  otan pane sto spiti tous katapinoun ta khapia me tis khouphtes 
 oi psukhes mas ponane gia ton anthropo ton agoniste ton axio suntropho 
 sto  o mparera meiose se  kai o gkouarntanto ephere to mats sta isia 
 kata ton k khaniote me to neo upologismo ton ektaseon  pou ekhei na kanei me ta boskotopia  saphestata kerdizei e ellada xekinontas apo khamelotero ethniko meso oro 
 mekhri tora ekhoume deixei stathere parousia s olous tous agones douleuontas kurios me dikous mas athletes 
  astunomia gia te dieukolunse tes kuklophorias ekleise te mia lorida pros xersoneso ki estelne ta dierkhomena autokineta apo parakampterio dromo eno geranos pou eklethe anesure to leophoreio 
 apophuge poluoron taxidion kata te diarkeia tes upseles zestes 
 opheiloume na antapokrithoume kai na sunekhisoume te baria kleronomia proegoumenon epitukhemenon diethnon diorganoseon pou philoxenese e ellada okhi mono sto khoro tes pales alla se kathe athlema 
  anaphora tou k bogiatze peri kommatikes peitharkhias basizetai se plerophories pou ekhoun phtasei sten proskeimene sto kubernon komma pleiopsephia tes  oti endekhetai na me summetaskhoun sto sunedrio nomarkhes pou proskeintai sto  
  duo  philologon me ta akoloutha prosonta  empeiries skhetika me ten ekpaideuse ton ellenopaidon exoterikou ekai ton palinnostounton kathos kai glossologikes gnoseis 
 apo to periekhomeno tes epikoinonias diakrinetai   anaphora se apagoreumenes ousies kai e agonia na men tous piasoun oi elegkhoi 
  tautoteta tes meteras tou karpou tou erota tes me ton arnolnt sbartsenegker apokaluphtheke einai e  milntrent pati mpouena e opoia ergazotan os oikonomosoikiake boethos sten epaule tou astera tou kholigount sto los antzeles gia mia  
 par ola auta kai me aphorme to sugkekrimeno peristatiko theoroume oti kakos e idiotike teleorase aporriptei opoiadepote xene glossa peran tes agglikes theorontas oti ena diaphoretiko akousma tha apomakrunei to meso theate 
 oi epokhes pou dianuoume einai penikhres se epikheirematologia kai phtokhes se theoretiko upobathro gia dikaiologese ton opoion energeion 
 gia emphulio kai dustukhos to epheurema auto den menei khoris sunepeies 
 as doume loipon ti prepei na prosexoume gia na men mpoume se peripeteies 
 ti na tous kano tora olous autous 
 tha paroume omos metra koinonikes diabioses an apophasisoun na men khoregoun pharmaka tis emeres tou agona tous 
 laika dikasteria sto aerodromio ligo meta ta mesanukhta tes kuriakes peripou  philathloi tou  perimenan ston kombo tes egnatias odou sten pedine ten apostole tes omadas pou gurize apo te libadeia 
 petsalnikos  bouleutes kastorias philippos petsalnikos etan o omiletes tes kentrikes proeklogikes omilias tes   emathias to bradu tes tetartes sten plateia demarkheiou ste beroia 
 aute e plegegia ton omorpho topo mas moiazei me karkinoma agiatreuto 
 ta elaiolada pou parousiazontai sto diagonismo prepei na proerkhontai apo mia omoiogene partida me suskeuasmenou elaiou elakhistou ogkou  litron 
 nomizo oti katatassomai stous sunethismenous anthropous pou prospathoun na kanoun sosta te douleia tous kai na einai sostoi apenanti stous sunadelphous tous kai sten upoloipe koinonia 
 kathe omos nea epitukhia tes epistemes kai tes tekhnologias emperiekhei uparkhoun de pleista osa paradeigmata terastious kindunous gia te zoe kai ten eleutheria tou anthropou 
 nea dioikese sto sullogo goneon meta apo arkhairesies pou pragmatopoiethekan sto sullogo goneon kai kedemonon tou  gumnasiou mutilenes eklekhteke to neo dioiketiko sumboulio 
 oi europaioi egetes katalaban oti to khreos tha pesei na tous plakosei kai prokhoresan se mia meletemene kai elpidophora protase 
 auto prokuptei apo ten autopsia pou dienergesan sto ergasterio e dieuthunse biomekhanias poleodomias kai ugeias 
 anterlekht sten anterlekht katelexe o ntiomersi mpokani o opoios pheretai na apaskholese olumpiako panathenaiko kai  
 kai ti sumptose phusouse ligo kathos stamatesa pio pera sto trapezaki pou eikhe stesei o kalos gerakos n agoraso merika rodia pou ta lakhtaresa 
 brekame te skulitsa tes photographias ste salamina einai  menon ugiestate kai analambanontai ta exoda tes steiroses tes 
 phobountai na men to barethoun na me khasoun ten aisthese pou eikhan ekeine ten prote phora 
 safe bulkers meiomena kerde sto trimeno    auxese esodon alla meiose kerdon anakoinose gia to proto trimeno tou  e safe bulkers 
 palaia taberna apo to  
 kai tha mas suntropheuoun kathe paraskeue tis epomenes tesseris ebdomades 
 kai otan leme epistrophe sto parelthon ennooume oti eidika o k eliopoulos eikhe erthei xana eikhe ekponesei kai paradosei mia plere melete gia to kuklophoriako ten opoia emeis oudepote epharmosame 
 gia ta protathlemata   kai  kategorias tha ginoun epises to sabbatokuriako ta exes parakato paikhnidia  gep 
 photographia tou kathegete nicholas economopouly 
 auto kaleitai phthinoporine isemeria sto boreio emisphairio e earine isemeria sto notio emisphairio 
 me dunatotetes na skhediazei ten anaptuxe 
 gia ton idio skopo ekhei exousiodotethei kai o g grammateas tou upourgeiou ethnikes oikonomias k papaioannou 
   prokeitai na epanelthei to  gia na elegxei kata poso oi sustaseis autes akolouthethekan apo ten khora 
 arthrographia  arthrographoi    en meso mnemoniou anergias tsounami radienergeias purenikou olethrou emphulion polemikon telesigraphon kai anakoinothenton gia te geitonia mas na sou sto phtokhospito mas xephutrosan kai 
 omos o stark den aporriptei entelos ten idea ekdoses euroomologou alla thetei os aparaitete proupothese gia auto ten politike enopoiese tes europes 
 surmatenioi xesurmatenioi oloi   makridakes xanakhtupese me ena neo biblio ton ekdoseon pelinnaio gemato aphegeseis mesanatoliton se prologo tou manole glezou 
 photopoulos zetese suggnome ek merous ton sunadelphon tou gia osa eginan ten tetarte sto suntagma milontas sto radiophoniko stathmo realfm  
  paratase gia ten upobole ton analutikon periodikon deloseon prospatheia apotropes tes sugkhuses kai tes talaiporias ton ergodoton apotelei e apophase tou  na parateinei ten prothesmia gia ten upobole ton analutikon periodikon deloseon  
  kuklos ergasion tes sol 
 me tetoies phones to mpailnti den paizei 
 to programma tou seminariou ekhei os exes  
 to lathos einai tou kosmou tes  pou de sterizei mazika ten omada tou 
 sugkinese mnemes kai deos eniosa otan eida ta erga tes ektheses 
 eukhomai na broune oi omades autes te duname na epanelthoune 
 nai alla kapoia pragmata peirazoun askheta an boa gi auta oloklere e koinonia 
 sta parapano prostheste ten uperokhe beranta gia kaphe e kokteil kai to estiatorio me emphase sta thalassina 
 den ekhei sumbei kanena apo ola auta me apotelesma mekhri semera oute to  oute o  oute o  na ekhoun topothetethei me sapheneia sten ole prospatheia kaitoi ekhoun prosklethei kai mesa apo ten prosklese ekhoun proklethei na to kanoun 
 kai me aute ten ennoia o kalphopoulos ta kataphere periphema 
 sten ekklesia aute opheilei to onoma tes e pole 
 se epipedo metrikes e autohellashertz parousiase auxese kuklou ergasion  phthanontas ta  ek apo  ek 
 eno tora ekhoun kanei parembase sta armodia organa gia te diamorphose enos plaisiou dikaiomaton ton katanaloton analogou me ekeinou pou uparkhei stis aeroporikes sugkoinonies kai gia tis aktoploikes 
 alloi pali pisteuoun oti einai outopia na anamenetai o sumpsephismos ton oikonomikon stokhon me tous periballontikous kai tous koinonikous ex aitias tes dunames pou ekhoun oi oikonomika iskhuroi tou planete 
 gia ten istoria ste diarkeia tes karieras tou khreiasteke na labei  tetoies semantikes apophaseis gia ta epitokia 
 na analabei ten ethnike tes khoras alla mono gia ta epomena duo tes mats sta prokrimatika tou   
 dustukhos k demarkhe auta sumbainoun otan anthropoi adaeis komplexikoi kai anikanoi brethoun se egetikes theseis kai ekmetalleuontai anthropous kai katastaseis 
 sto paron keimenoomilia o tsomski epikheirei na epanexetasei ton rolo kai te leitourgia tou kratous prospathontas na arthrosei mia politike optike e opoia xeperna kai ta empodia tou phileleutherismou kai ta empodia tou sosialismou 
 patris sto nomo ekhete pleiopsephia 
 delade pontaroume se mia kale omada kai okhi se mia kake pou apla thelei na sothei 
 gia to kalo mas 
 an thelete na gelate kathe mesa arkei na ton kanete diko sas 
  euro eniskhuetai to sounio enas apo tous semantikoterous arkhaiologikous khorous tes attikes 
  mone neotere exelixe pou aphora to  kleisto einai e ekdose tes oikodomikes adeias alla gia ten plerome tou anadokhou o opoios zeta  euro gia te melete epharmoges pou sunetaxe den prokuptei eidese 
 apo edo kai pera e kratese theseon tha ginetai upokhreotika me  sumphona me tis odegies pou sas dinoume sten premiera tes tainias goeteutikoi taxidiotes 
 prote gia koutsianikoule khthes sto pagkretio 
 oriake auxese uperxe apo ten ollandia alla meiose apo to belgio 
 to breka sto green farm kai diatithetai apo ten mediterranean farm 
 gia to elleimma tes  skholiase ta noumera deikhnoun na einai auta pou mas ekhei pei o k tsakires 
 katopin toutou to dioiketiko sumboulio apophasise ten auxese tou metokhikou kephalaiou tes etaireias ekdidontas  nees metokhes gia kathe enan apo tous kk 
  ekthese tes mcafee e opoia anekei demosiopoietheke me eukairia to sunedrio asphaleias upologiston black hat pou xekina episema ten tetarte sto las begkas 
 oi epitheoretes zetoun na ginei elegkhos stis pleromes ektelesthenton ergon gia ta ete  
 alla kai o ioulios anoixe me semantike upokhorese ton europaikon kai ton asiatikon agoron kathos e apeile tes moodys gia upobathmise tes khrematopistotikes axiopistias tes ispanias erthe ki edese me endeixeis gia phreno sten upsele anaptuxe tes kinas 
 aristoteles kai lukornio ton monakho gupa 
 to entuposiako kai paradoxo einai oti to idruma auto den ekhei ellenes ste dioikese tou kai den ekhei diathesei pote khremata gia philanthropikous skopous ste khora mas 
 sas enokhlei to gegonos oti phthasame na ginoume phthenos proorismos bebaios kai me enokhlei giati ta xenodokheia pou ekhoume demiourgesei e anakainisei einai panakriba 
 einai saphes oti to kubernetiko  os sunaspismos exousias athroizei autonomes tekhnopolitikes domes pou areskontai sten autarkhike diakheirise tes khoris kamia nomimopoiese 
 to phainomeno tou diamanteniou dakhtulidiou pente lepta prin apo te deutere epaphe e allios enarxe tes olikotetas to phos tou eliou pou phtanei ste ge erkhetai apo mia polu lepte desme 
 to odegei enas pitsirikas guro sta eikosipente 
 me ten anakoinose tes laikes suspeiroses kleinei ousiastika o kuklos ton anakoinoseon ton parataxeon pou emeinan ektos b gurou kai apo tis opoies kamia den ekhei takhthei me tous ekprosopous tou  kai tou mnemoniou ph philio kai eu 
 etsi alloste auxanei kai e ousiastike duname pou ekhoun kai blepoun ta kala tes sunergasias 
 dustukhos uonon to  ton khreston epilegei pros to paron ton sugkekriueno tropo khreoses 
  genikos grammateas tes periphereias dutikes elladas apostolos katsipharas meta to telos tes khthesines suskepse delose den ekhoume ten poluteleia gia pisogurismata oute einai dunaton e olumpia odos na meinei ena nekro ergo 
 to  pernaei me exetaseis sto khemiko tmema tes athenas 
 sumperasma diko mas an kapoia stigme ta broun pleiopsephia kai meiopsephia ston agio mena tha ginoume 
 upothese  dekatetrakhrone ani gnorizei enan neo philo mesa apo to internet kai apophasizei na ton sunantesei 
  idea piso apo autes tis politikes einai e auxese tes paragogikotetas kai tes antagonistikotetas 
 georgias me ta anagkaia eggeiobeltiotika erga gia ten isorrope anaptuxe tes khoras 
 eimaste tukheroi pou ekhoume enan tetoio mikro paradeiso toso konta mas kai khazoi pou ton aphenoume anekmetalleuto 
  epanentaxe loipon einai auto pou tha mporousame na poume to telos enos megalou taxidiou tou taxidiou tes epistrophes 
 alloste se touton edo ton topo ta megalutera gegonota den kratane pano apo treis meres 
 stous neous demous ekhoume demotikes enotetes pou anapherontai stous palious demous pou sunenothekan 
 kentrike omiletria tes bradias e bouleutes tes  thessalonikes kai demotike sumboulos ka elena rapte 
 oloi enomenoi na suzetesoume gia to kalo tes omadas kai theoro oti tha broume ten luse 
 trite  augoustou   eidikes steles mikro skholeio ta paidia den theloun psukhologo goneis theloun empisteutike epistole se goneis pou skephtontai sigoura einai mia tekhne to na eisai kalos gonios

 pianoun douleia oi elegktes komistrou tou     elegkhous sta mesa mazikes metaphoras arkhizoun pilotika apo semera oi  elegktes komistron tou  pou pianoun douleia me stokho ten pataxe tes eisiteriodiaphuges 
 kata ten diarkeia ton antiphoneseon den eleipsan oi aikhmes apo ten nea periphereiarkhe gia ten khamele aporrophese tou  sten epeiro 
 kai mono e parousia tou akratetou sten prote ethnike kategoria einai ena semantiko epiteugma kai apotelei ten spoudaiotere stigme sten istoria ton prasinon 
   paraskeue  septembriou thriler pou ekane patago sten amerike kai mpeke sto top  ton perissoteron kritikon 
 to mauro delade pneumatiko skotadi pou genna e apelpisia mas kai e paranoia mas ki okhi asphalos e sozousa kharopoios piste mas 
 oi pteseis tha ginontai meso tes thugatrikes tes aeroporikes etairias khamelou kostous jetstar 
 sophe kharakterise ten apophase tes europaikes epitropes o dieuthuntes tou tomea proleptikes iatrikes kai diatrophes tou panepistemiou kretes kathegetes antones kaphatos

 sten  sunedriase tou organou  
 eikhame lastikho sten proegoumene alla xekinesame me duo rezerbes

 prote diakladose sto bilnious   lietoubosmpountoutsnost   bilermpangkablin oi niketes  tha paixoun metaxu tous kai tha anametrethoun akolouthos me ton nikete ton allon duo zeugarion gia mia these stous omilous 
  epistemonike katartise to ethos kai e kathoristike prosphora tou k balenake sten exoterike politike tes khoras einai adiamphisbeteta 
 to proto emikhrono etan diaphoretiko apo to deutero kai den thelo na psaxo gia dikaiologies 
 ean loipon uparxoun stoikheia ta opoia sunegoroun sten demiourgia ton duo auton edron ekho ten entupose oti to problema tha to xanabroume mprosta mas

 trite  augoustou    trophike allergia os oros anapheretai sten antidrase tou anosopoietikou sustematos stis trophes 
 sten uperaspise tou sunakhtheke kai o dikegorikos sullogos komotenes pou ekprosopetheke apo ton proedro tou erakle khatzenestoros 
 epipleon oi sterees morphes sumpleromaton diatrophes epibarunoun te leitourgia tou peptikou sustematos en antithesei pros ten ugre posime morphe pou einai eulepte eupepte kai me takheia aporrophese

 antitheta o kunodontas sokare ligo ten omogeneia

 semera prin metakinethei o brakhos tha phername mekhaniko geologo tha sigoureuomastan pou uparkhei nero kai epeita tha kaname mia geotrese se dekades e kai ekatontades metra tha buthizame upobrukhia moter sto udatino apothema 
 oi logoi pou epikaleitai gia te me sunainese tou einai abasimoi kai apoteloun proskhemata kai sophismata 
 to mustiko ton ntopion apokaluphteke pleon khare sten eukole prosbase pou prospherei e egnatia odos

 oi kato khor epimenoun gia ten plere sunergasia tes serbias me to dikasterio tes khages  serbia   ollandos upourgos exoterikon ouri rozenthal epanelabe se sunenteuxe tou ten tetarte  maiou pros ten emeresia tou beligradio 
 etsi demiourgei me aristotekhniko tropo mia mikre koinonia monakhikon anthropon pou ekhoun oloi skoteines pleures o kathenas apo tous opoious mpleketai me ton allon okhi gia na spasei te monaxia pou einai diakhute sto muthistorema alla gia na ten eniskhusei

 sten  pou tha anakoinothei semera to apogeuma tha brisketai kai o pirigia tou opoiou to deltio einai etoimo eno mekhri ten teleutaia stigme tha perimenoun ston ophe gia ton anastasiade an kai einai polu duskolo na prolabei 
  demosia kritike kai logodosia einai diadikasia amphipleure kai apotelei themelio litho tes demokratias 
  upourgos euaggelos benizelos epanelabe semera pos einai anoikhtos sto endekhomeno drastikon meioseon ston phpa thetontas ostoso os proupothese te sumphonia se apla metra apodoses 
 antistoikhes prospatheies se sunergasia me olous tous topikous phoreis tou nomou mas briskontai se plere exelixe gia ola ta topika diamerismata tou demou kameirou 
 an konta s auta prosthesoume kai to video on demand pleromene teleorase me khiliades titlous pou agorazei o pelates tote se ligo e tainia sten aithousa tha moiazei san to diaphemistiko spot sten teleorase 
 se telephonike epikoinonia pou eikhame mazi tou mas eipe eimai polu kharoumenos gia to neo stathmo tes karieras mou kai elpizo oti ston panaigialeio tha mporeso na deixo akoma perissotero to talento mou 
 kai phusika na men to parakano

 eidikotera ta mikta kerde tou omilou diamorphothekan se  ekat

  ekdelose einai anoikte sto koino 
 to antitheto oi anthropoi autoi mas eipe erthan na uposterixoun ten anadiorganose tes trapezas kai kaneis den tous uposkhetheke oti tha meinoun

 to phulladio auto malista anartetheke sten istoselida tou enos skholeiou kai diakinetheke se megalutero kuklo upopsephion kathos theoretheke idiaitera epitukhemeno

 mekhri tote kaneis den milaei gia staphida kai gia staphidiko problema 
 kokkino khtupese e antiparathese sto koinoboulio otan e suzetese metaphertheke sta epeisodia sto suntagma 
 etsi e khthesine proponese eikhe oristei gia tis

 philoxenoi anthropoi panemorphes paralies polu prasino to opoio malista kaluptei skhedon te mise ektase tou alla kai to monasteri tou panormite apoteloun idanike aphorme gia taxidi 
 sta polu gluka piata giati na men pate ena bema parapera kai na men pieite ena samos grand cru e ena moskhoto lemnou kai ta duo kala pagomena malista ean to gluko piato einai kai to teleutaio mporeite na sunekhisete me to idio krasi kai sto gluko

 ena apo ta gnostotera muthistoremata tou einai  time ton kinlokh

 einai gnosto kai me ten onomasia tourkogephuro aphou edo egine mia megale makhe tou oplarkhegou theodorou ziaka me tous tourkous

 otan omos gurizei apo ten pleura tes omorphes gelaei kai khairetai 
 ola ta kommata tes antipoliteuses sumperilambanomenes kai tes  zetesan na iskhusoun oi ruthmiseis amesos molis sumphonethoun kai okhi me ten episeme enarxe tes eklogikes periodou stis  martiou

 sto semeioma anephere oti tha epibibazotan sto krete  me proorismo to erakleio kai sta misa tes diadromes tha epephte ste thalassa 
 pisteuo loipon oti den tha paixei to sabbato opote den ton phobamai os antipalo 
  altes tou upsous tou olumpiakou tha xekinesei te sezon stis  iouniou apo sto diethnes mitingk tou gallikou borra to opoio apotelei kriterio prokrises gia ten omada ton trikolor pou tha katebei sto mprouno tzaouli  iouniou 
 an de sumbei auto proton to  diakoptei te summetokhe tou ste diasose tes elladas kai ginetai arnetiko se opoiadepote alle khora khreiastei boetheia 
 tetarte  augoustou   stis biomekhanies tou plomariou ten periokhe tou plomariou episkephthekan ekpaideutikoi tes protobathmias apo ole te lesbo 
 kai auto phainetai apo ten apodokhe tous kai ektos sunoron lene oi bullets pou etoimazoun europaike periodeia se mia apo tis kaluteres phaseis tous 
 me threnous kai klamata ta blepoun ola auta oi dikoi tou apo ta teikhe 
 eukhomai to pneuma pou epikratese kata tis koines koinobouleutikes sunedriaseis gia ten katartise tou skhediou drases na sunekhisei na uparkhei kai sten ulopoiese tou 
  pobilas mikolaitis letonos ekhei kanei phetos alma sta  
 sugkekrimena e eisagoge tou euro os phusiko khrema mporei na othesei ton plethorismo gia ligo os to  e kai upselotera eno ste sunekheia tha uparxei apoklimakose 
  ten teleutaia demoskopese pou egine gia mia akoma phora arkhisame kai gleiphoume ekei pou phtuname 
 kioukes proedros tes omospondias idiokteton mekhanematon ergon elladas 
 molis arkhisoun na muountai mele tes arkhousas taxes to kratos kai oi mekhanismoi asphaleias arkhizoun na anesukhoun

 to neo dioiketiko sumboulio gia ten periodo  pou proekupse apo tis arkhairesies tes  
 to parmpriz khare sten eidike tou epexergasia prospherei megiste prostasia apo ton elio eno se sunduasmo me tis leptes prosthies kolones prospherei exairetika epipeda oratotetas 
 idanike epiloge gia parees pou den zetoun poluteleies 
 to sunolo ton dendron meta tis proteinomenes ruthmiseis einai  
 epitrepei ten prosbase se dedomena opos kai te metaphora programmaton kai arkheion 
 euelpistoume na pame to idio psela opos kathe alle khronia 
 einai gegonos oti oi agorapolesies akineton meiothekan peripou kata  to  eno kai e nea khronia den xekinaei me tous kaluterous oionous 
 sten periokhe aspropurgou omos kai eno e pompe ton autokineton eikhe stamatesei sto phanari duo agnostoi pou epebainan se autokineto tous plesiasan kai arkhisan na puroboloun kata ton astunomikon eno tous aphairesan ta opla 
 demosieuoume semera merika apo ta menumata sas aisiodoxontas oti aute e gramme epikoinonias tha meinei anoikhte 
 ste sugkekrimene aute endekhomene tropopoiese gia to n lasithiou opos einai gnosto se sas sumphonoun kai e nomarkhiake autodioikese kai o sundesmos ksenodokhon  lasithiou alla kai to sunolo skhedon ton emplekomenon phoreon tou nomou 
 ekei tha brethei antimetope me mia alle ekplexe tes diorganoses ten senegale 
  ethnike einai pano apo prosopa 
 europe meso enos skhematos pou epitrepei stis etairies ten epektase tous sten europaike kai diethne agora 
 epibibasteite sto treno tou phragkiskou ioseph kai apolauste to eortastiko deipno me atmosphairike mousike mekhri ta xemeromata 
 ti kinduneuei na pathei enas lathrometanastes ste kheirotere periptose na sullephthei kai na apelathei 
 kai o noon ennoesato se adiexodo e agrotike anaptuxe tes epeirou  eu

 eimai omos aisiodoxos oti o protathletes tes kategoria tha petukhei sten apostole tou ki etsi tha ophelethoume ki emeiss 
  enarxe tou programmatos tha ginei stis arkhes septembriou apo ten periphereia anatolikes makedonias kai os ta tele oktobriou tha ekhei epektathei se oles tis periphereies tes khoras 
 ena atomo  e  daskalon agoges logou gia to parma  thessalonikes

 sunelephthe te deutera to bradu ste sumbole ton odon anapauseos kai khrusomallousas ste mutilene apo astunomikous tes omadas dikukles astunomeuses  enas  sten katokhe tou opoiou bretheke mikroposoteta khasis 
 mataioponoun oi epikoinoniologoi kai oi epiteleis tes  pou anazetoun ena ergo prokeimenou na to egkainiasei o aperkhomenos prothupourgos 
 sta aphegemata tou o epikedeios e kakia mas to doro tou genitsarou sunantoume analoga epeisodia kai phormoules pou uparkhoun kai ste politistike mas paradose alla kai ste kretike logotekhnia 
 gia ton ekpaideutiko o mesos meniaios misthos tou tha meiothei kata  euro 
 na plerosoun ti plesiasa enan talaiporo kai ton rotesa ti etan ta tele pases phuseos 
 oi periokhes autes einai me  krousmata e anatolike attike kai ta upoloipa krousmata stis periokhes thessalonikes karditsas larisas trikalon serron emathias boiotias kai pellas 
 den einai katholou tukhaio oti ten idia emera pou katatetheke e prosphuge o epimeleteriakos omilos anaptuxes ellenikon nesion  epanephere to thema tes katargeses ton krateseon uper triton pou barunoun ta aktoploika eisiteria

 entheta     psela anamesa sto limani tou peiraia kai ste salamina e mikroskopike psuttaleia philoxenei tis megaluteres sumphona me ektimeseis egkatastaseis biologikou katharismou tes europes

 katapherame kai xeperasame tis diaphores pou mas khorizan 
 sumphona me tis skhetikes diataxeis o upourgos oikonomikon analambanei na demiourgesei ton neo kharte ton oikonomikon uperesion ana ten epikrateia kathos tha katargei e tha anastellei te leitourgia tmematon e grapheion elegkhou analoga me ton ogko sunallagon

 to poimnio sas aisthanetai ethnika uperephano otan salpizete gia ten patrida 
 to tomb raider and the guardian of light ekhei teleios diaphoretiko stul paikhnidiou kharakterizetai men apo aploikoterous mekhanismous alla prospherei aphthone drase kai diaskedase stis  peripou ores pou diarkei 
 nisaphi telika me te sullogistike tes kai tis bromikes methodous mias poluethnikes me pollous porous ste diathese tes se baros tou antagonismou 
 ligo meta ten arkhe tou deuterou  otan arkhise na kourazetai kai o maestros impagasa epese kai e apodose tes omadas 
 anoikhte ste diarkeia tes nukhtas paremeine kai e prosbase ton okhematon sto sunoriako stathmo tes exokhes sto nomo tes dramas

 to gnorizei omos e trokhaia pou ten paraskeue to mesemeri dia organon tes pou stekontan sto telos tou dromou egraphe opoio aprosekto odego ton dieskhize anapoda

 enas idiaitera khrestikos odegos poles theoreitai exantlemenos 
  proen omospondiakos tekhnikos tes germanias briskontan se suzeteseis to teleutaio diastema me ten omospondia ton  ara e aiphnidiastike apoluse tou mprantlei den etan telika toso aiphnidiastike 
 goneis parakhoroun ta autokineta tous sta anelika paidia tous e tous agorazoun motopodelata gia na dieukolunoun tis metakineseis tous 
 theoreitai eukolotere luse apo to gkremisma polukatoikion kai sumphona me plerophories tha sunodeuetai apo kinetra gia to anoigma ton isogeion kai te diakhuse ton koinokhreston khoron mesa sta ktiria 
 etan kai paramenei to sumbolo tes kretikes omorphias kai ekphrases 
  prote episeme sunedriase tou neou dioiketikou sumbouliou tou  os anonumou pleon etaireias egine khthes to proi paronton toso tou neou proedrou kmanole karakonstantake oso kai tou dieuthunontos sumboulou kgiorgou alexake 
 einai e kalutere giati ekhei kubernetike empeiria ekhei eureia gnose ton thematon mia prosopike gennaiodoria pera apo otidepote mporeite na phantasteite kai os ek toutou einai e kalutere gia na antimetopisei ton sarkozi prosthese 
 sto metaxu e taktike episkepse tes troikas tha pragmatopoiethei stis arkhes maiou opote oi ekprosopoi tes  tou  kai tes  tha axiologesoun tis epidoseis tes khoras gia te khoregese tes epomenes doses upsous  dis 
  en logo paratase ton sumbaseon proupothetei aparaiteta oti oi skhetikoi diagonismoi tha ekhoun prokerukhthei mekhri tis  augoustou apo tous demous 
 outos e allos einai akome polu nopes oi phrikiastikes eikones apo diaphora ana ten epikrateia kataphugia sta opoia ta zoa katadikazontai se enan argo kai basanistiko thanato 
 prokeitai gia istoriko gegonos to opoio photizei ena ntokoumento tou  
  ugie lampera kai eukolokhtenista mallia kathe mera me ten euergetike drase tes mastikhas 
 tote e astunomia zetese na milesei me ten metera tou pou stekotan dipla tou kai e opoia delose oti to agori ten apeilouse diarkos pos tha ten kataggeilei 
 eiste omos skleres apenanti stous andres nai mono aute ten emera 
 par ola auta sunekhizoun na apospoun meridio agoras apo ta katastemata stis alles emporikes piatses 
 oson aphora to thema me tous treis paiktes pou briskontai ektos planon tou gianne samara marinakes paulopoulos alexoudes apophase tha lephthei ste semerine sunedriase tou  tes paeophe 
 arkhaio romaiko limani anakalupsan bretanoi arkhaiologoi plai sto romaiko okhuro caerleon sten oualia to opoio apotelei to deutero gnosto romaiko limani tes bretanias kai to monadiko ektos londinou 
 aphorme gia auta pou proaneggeile o anotatos dikastikos leitourgos statheke dikastike dienexe tou demosiou me idiote ekpaideute thalassion spor o opoios eikhe misthosei tmema tes paralias tou kommenou tou demou phaiakon tes kerkuras

 oi protes endeixeis oti perase amesa kai eperease drastika to sunthema tes kuanoleukes genikes epistrateuses einai iskhurotates 
 sto trapezi ekhei pesei kai ena deutero senario psalidismatos prokeimenou to baros na pesei kai se autous pou ekhoun ede parei suntaxe kai pleres ephapax ta proegoumena khronia 
 deutero na prospheroun ena biblio sten ellenike agora to opoio tha mporei na khresimopoiethei amesa apo neous sto khoro ton ependuseon kai diakheirises khartophulakion kai na apotelesei biblio anaphoras sten epaggelmatike tous stadiodromia

 mporei eukola na antexei kai na pollaplasiastei se khameles thermokrasies mekhri  
 eimaste kaluteroi kai to deikhnoume se ole ten khronia 
 ste megale katephora tes katekhake sto upsos tes elioupoles sunelabe o phakos mas enan sumpolite mas pou odegouse kai tautokhrona diabaze ena prophanos endiapheron kai semantiko eggrapho 
 mia nike anazeta o ophe pou ekhei na geutei te khara tes mesa sto erakleio apo tis  ianouariou  ton ioniko kai thelei na ten petukhei aurio 
 giati to olo panel me ton eironiko titlo   o rolos tous ste diakheirise kriseon den diephere apo ena deltio xekinese me epibletike mousike eikhe gkalop skulokabgades aphorismous empatheies 
 me base autes tis ektimeseis theoroume oti ta metra tes kuberneses thigoun asphalistika dikaiomata de dinoun biosimoteta sto sustema antitheta phalkideuoun ta misthologika aitemata 
 otan o solomon brisketai pnigmenos sto kanali thuma ratsistikes epitheses e ntorothi katarreei kai oles ekeines oi kategories pou tes ektoxeuan apo kairo gia aprosarmoste sumperiphora exelissontai se sumptomata mias diataragmenes prosopikotetas

 sugkekrimena tha paixoun   daphne near est panionios 
  ecoelastika sugkentronei kai anakuklonei ola ta elastika tes khoras alla kurios logo adiaphorias tou kratous na ensomatosei odegia pou tha edine luseis den ekhei ti na ta kanei 
  monadike diexodos etan aute an den uparxei psomiades e omada odegeitai sten aphaneia

 doksa   tupike parousia upo to phobo timorias diadikastike phainetai oti tha einai e parousia tes doxas dramas sta pleioph kathos e makedonike omada mekhri khthes briskotan sten anazetese podosphairiston gia na mporesei na sugkrotesei mia endekada 
 epises tha diathetei sugkhrone monada upoboethoumenes anaparagoges kai monada tekhnetou nephrou kathos kai olon ton eidikoteton exoterika iatreia 
 anaptuxes epiphulassetai mono gia tukhon parabaseis tes dasikes nomothesias kai okhi kai tes nomothesias peri idioktesias 
  aletheia einai oti eikha kale apodose se auto to paikhnidi kai gi auto eimai para polu eukharistemenos 
 agonia epikratei stis taxeis tou  en opsei tes apophases pou tha ekdosei pithanotata semera e dikastike epitrope epheseon tes  
 kata to skholiko etos  epharmozetai e euelikte zone diathematikon kai demiourgikon drasterioteton se ekaton penenta demotika skholeia se deka nepiagogeia kai se tesseris skholikes monades eidikes agoges protobathmias ekpaideuses 
 meta te  agonistike tou protathlematos e omada ekhei ede skorarei  phores phthanontas to poso ton  
 kaname lathos pos to aitema mas gia demo brakhasiou sta megethe tou ekhei epharmoge se ole ten ellada to  ton demon ara aitema gia ikanopoiese 
 prokeitai gia to  photographiko diagonismo pou phetos ephtase stis  summetokhes me auxemene te summetokhe apo tous neous kai ta paidia tou demotikou 
 upogrammizei de oti den ginomaste diethnos rezili opos uposterizoun oi touristikoi phoreis apo ten agonistike parousia ton ekprosopon enos topou 
 prosthetoume ta kremmudakia kai tis ntomates 
 bazo to khreos mou se olous tous polites 
 ekhei ollandike upekooteta kai te sezon pou oloklerotheke agonizotan sten ouggrike phenentsbaros  summetokhes kai  gkol 
 ta erga poikilon diastaseon apo akruliko se kamba e se kharti ensomatonoun te monotupia kai to kollaz sten prospatheia tes exereuneses olon ton dunatoteton pou prospherontai sten anaptuxe tou zographikou periekhomenou 
 omos agapetoi kata t alla topikoi arkhontes e aletheia gia ten opoia kopteste den prepei na legetai mise giati tote einai kheirotere apo psema

 etan thauma tou kuriou 
 meta to telos ton teleton to proi tes kuriakes o arkhiepiskopos kai oi loipoi ierarkhes ekprosopoi ton orthodoxon patriarkheion metebekan sto metropolitiko megaro

 trekhoun mesa sten aule trekhoun gia na kalupsoun ten ule les kai kapoios tous kunega

 ano ton  kai oi duo

 alloi eikhan parei mazi kai ta paidia tous

 prota milesan oi protagonistes delade oi idioi oi kratoumenoi

 kairos athena  tet  aug   etiketes  epitrope antagonismou stigmes tou teleutaiou   augoustou  apolithomata pou apodeiknuoun pos uperkhe zoe ste ge prin ten emphanise tou oxugonou entopisan epistemones sten australia

 bebaios otan leme 
 den tolmousan bebaia kai na ta apomakrunoun giati tote tha kinduneuan apo tous idious tous sugkentromenous

 etsi oi idees autes katektesan tous sunteretikous kuklous tes ekklesias mas

 sten prospatheia tou na xephugei apo ton asphuktiko astunomiko kloio o zakharioudakes egkateleipse to autokineto tou kai etrexe na kruphtei sta kalamia tou potamou 
 okhi toso me ton belgo oso me ton germano o opoios paremeine perissotero sto edaphos 
 sta khamelotera endosunedriaka epipeda ekleise ten trite o genikos deiktes tou kha stis  monades katagraphontas apoleies  
 to opoio opos diabasate khtes tha pianei prin erthei ste khio kai suro teno mukono 
 axizei na semeiothei oti to  e ephoreia buzantinon arkhaioteton eikhe suntaxei melete gia ten opoia omos apaiteitai epikairopoiese oste to ergo auto na einai orimo pros entaxe 
 to poso pou prokuptei pollaplasiazetai me  
 delade mia epikheirese e opoia kata te leitourgia tes emperiekhei upselo kinduno emphanises ergatikon atukhematon me egkaumata merimnese oikonomika gia te demiourgia eidikes monadas egkaumaton sto ethniko sustema ugeias 
  ariel impagasa gennetheke stis  oktobriou  sto mpouenos aires kai agonisteke gia prote phora epaggelmatika to  me te lanous omada pou emeine gia tessera khronia 
  ellenike kubernese parakolouthei stena ta tektainomena ste geitona kai paragontes tes upogrammizoun te meiomene drasterioteta tes tourkikes aeroporias sto aigaio meta to erzeroum 
   tekhnikos sumphonese me ten protathletria ispanias kai tha einai katoikos tou kamp nou mekhri to kalokairi tou  
 to petama ton zoon tou allou einai me ten ennoia aute antistoikho me ten prosbole tes ethikes ton thelukon suggenon tou  
 sta  euro thetei ten timestokho gia te metokhe tes ekhae e euroxx se ekthese tes  me sustase equalweight 
 exallou kai argotera to loutro tou magiakobski se auten te skenike logike upakouei 
  morgkan o opoios eikhe apoluthei to  meta te demosieuse plaston photographion me bretanous stratiotes pou upotithetai oti basanizan irakinous aikhmalotous diapseudei oti o idios e oi sunergates tou epididontan se upoklopes 
 sumphona me tis problepseis tes phinlandikes meteorologikes uperesias to nephos tes ephaisteiakes tephras tha phtasei ste notia phinlandia ten tetarte 
 paratase ton pleisteriasmon eos tis  dekembriou  problepei ruthmise pou perilambanetai sta metra epharmoges tou mesoprothesmou 
 apo to ergostasio diarreei radienergeia meta tis zemies pou upeste apo to seismo kai to tsounami pou eikhan os apotelesma na skotothoun  polites eno pano apo  exakolouthoun na agnoountai 
 sto autophoro o mourounas gia tous solenes rolo diamesolabete metaxu deuakh kai arkhaiologikes uperesias pheretai na analambanei o antieisaggeleas prokeimenou na arthei to adiexodo metaxu ton duo uperesion gia to ergo kataskeues diktuou sto mersinidi 
 apo te mia ekeinoi pou dinoun emphase sto design theloun ta mikrotera kai omorphotera kineta kai apo ten alle autoi pou endiapherontai gia oso to dunaton perissoteres leitourgies adiaphorontas gia to megethos tes suskeues 
 briskomoun ektos elegkhou sunekhisa na ton purobolo kathos eikhe tholosei to mualo mou kai den mporousa na sugkratetho akome kai para to oti etan nekros 
 auta kapote etan mikra psaradika khoria 
 aphora ten aphegese tou purza pros ten oikogeneia dragoume molis ephtase sten athena ta khristougenna tou  
   ebert den eklekhteke prothupourgos 
 gi auto kai e allage pleuses einai semera perissotero apo endedeigmene to opoio de kommatiko kostos den prepei aparaitetos na ermeneuetai se aute ten periptose arnetika 
  e opoia ekhei ta apokleistika dikaiomata khreses apo to  
  na katargethei to  stis ktenotrophikes epikheireseis 
 den tha ta lusei pote an khasei ten empistosune tes sto dikaio 
 para to gegonos oti e telike diatupose perilambanei arketes diexodous gia tis ethnikes kuberneseis kai den diasphalizei apolutos ta dikaiomata ton glossikon meionoteton uperxan telika duo khores pou arnethekan ten upographe tous e ellada kai e tourkia 
 xthes bradu egine telika sto spiti tou proedrou tes  to periboeto geuma karamanleabramopoulou 
 alla kai e lindsay den pege piso otan eide se video to  ten paris na gelaei me ton kleronomo tou maurou khrusou brandon davis kai na skholiazoun ten apokruphe periokhe tes 
 telos o aiolos pamphilon tha labei meros me duo pleromata kai sugkekrimena sto skiph paidon me to raphael karakostante kai ste dikopo paidon opou einai to phabori gia metallio me tous alexandro kouphake kai mikhale zerba 
 se  ekatommuria khronia sumphona me tis ektimeseis ton eidikon e krete tha exaphanistei kai mia nea khora tha anaduthei sta notia tou nesiou 
 to proto thema ekane  kai mallon duo 
  giannes samaras prin akoma phugei e apostole apo to erakleio eikhe tonisei oti e omada pou tha einai atolme pou tha deixei phobo kai tha paixei pathetika einai aute pou den tha agonizetai tou khronou sten ethnike kategoria 
 oi ellenotourkikes skheseis prepei na omalopoiethoun kai oi duo laoi na zesoun eirenika apokleismenes tes epiboles apopseon apo te mia pleura sten alle tonise 
 ta melissia anaptussontai mona tous se upsometro  metron kai oi plesiesteres kalliergeies einai biokalliergeies 
   to merokamato anerkhontai oi antistrophos analoges pros te pragmatikoteta apaiteseis ton oikonomikon metanaston pou zoun ste periokhe mas 
  ellada diathetei axiologa periousiaka stoikheia kai kurios e apophase tes kuberneses na ta dosei se idiotes tha ekhei semantika ophele os pros tis ependuseis ten anaptuxe kai to khreos kathos tha meiothei e epibarunse apo tokous 
  arkhe egine kai stelnoume se olous elpidophoro menuma oti stous duskolous kairous pou erkhontai tha protostatesoume gia ten oloklerose ton stokhon olon mas 
  pos mporoume na paroume dioxine oi dioxines uparkhoun sto periballon taxideuoun sten atmosphaira sto nero sto edaphos kai duskola dialuontai 
  apodose tou khartophulakiou tes etairias apo ten arkhe tou etous anerkhetai sto  
 sto metaxu mia plerophoria e opoia elege oti bretheke khrematokibotio pou eikhe kharagmeno to onoma tou demou ioanniton prokalese anastatose sto kentriko demarkheio 
  elia os karpos axeperasto kai diakhroniko prosphagi kai to ladi tes themeliodes eidos diatrophes einai parallela kai teletourgiko uliko apo tis arkhaies spondes mekhri to eukhelaio to baptisma to khrisma tes khristianikes latreias 
 sto idio porisma o k rakintzes anapherei oti meso ton sullogikon sumbaseon parakratountan paranoma eisphores apo tous  upallelous ton  
 oi times pou tha pairnete den tha einai alethines 
 epipleon purkagia ekdelotheke noritera kai sten periokhe lagkada ste thessalonike opou tis epigeies dunameis sundramoun apo aeros kai duo aeroskaphe gia ten takhutere antimetopise tes 
 as elpisoume oti toulakhiston osoi diabasoun to arthro auto tha diaphotistoun kai tha arkhisoun na to khresimopoioun oso to dunatotero kai pio ortha 
  ostoso akoma kai brakhuprothesma prepei na dei ton tropo apokteses tou ptukhiou ton apophoiton ton  opos kai ton tropo prosbases sta  
 tora giati ta epipla auton ton uperesion moirazontai edo ki ekei kai den ekpoiountai kai giati oi upalleloi menoun sta spitia tous pairnontas omos to mistho tous mekhri pou na doun pou tha tous steiloun einai ponemene istoria 
 me ta nea timologia tha pleronei peripou  euro delade  euro epipleon auxese  
 einai kharakteristiko oti se kathe katoiko antistoikhoun duo autokineta me apotelesma e pole kathemerina na apeileitai me kuklophoriako emphragma 
 oi enaskholoumenoi me ta nesiotika problemata phoreis den einai eparkos enemeromenoi gia tis eukairies pou tous prospheroun oi politikes tes  kai e axiopoiese programmaton kai poron p 
  nikos panagiotopoulos me te seira tou se epistole tou sten  graphei ta exes ekplektos plerophoretheka oti kuklophorei to onoma mou anamesa se alla pou antistrateuontai to neo nomoskhedio gia ten kinematographia 
 sunodeuomenos apo ton bouleute demetre tsoumane kai ton proedro tes  k giorgo koutsoglou o bouleutes tes  enemerotheke apo ton k mpaile gia themata pou aphoroun ten periokhe dinontas idiaitere emphase ston ambrakiko kolpo 
 ten epexergasia tou laographematos anelabe o kathegetes laographias sto panepistemio thessalias kai philos tou arakhtheiou theatrou baggeles audikos 
 otan eikha milesei me ten protagonistria ephe logginou mou eikhe pei oti sukhnazate epi menes sto mpournazi gia na mpei sto rolo 
  kinese aute pou den apokleietai na oloklerothei episema stis prosekheis emeres entassetai sto diakerugmeno plaisio strategikes tou omilou gia ten eisodo sto khoro pou diethnos apokaleitai exupna ktiria 
 kanonika alla lita o prothupourgos ste deth  parousia tou prothupourgou giorgou papandreou kai tes kuberneses sta egkainia tes  diethnous ektheses thessalonikes tha einai ousiastike kai lite diabebaionoun kubernetikes peges 
 stis drasteriotetes tes  sumperilambanetai epises to tmema   pou askholeitai me ten parokhe olokleromenon exeidikeumenon luseon gia broadcast montaz animation  kathos kai to tmema diatheses logismikou programa 
  epilektike kai e epia 
 diathetei elkustiko design kai upsele poioteta kataskeues kai apotelei mia axiopiste protase gia sundese tou upologiste tou oikiakou ekhosustematos e ton paikhnidomekhanon kai apodose ekhou surround akome kai apo aples stereophonikes peges ekhou 
 ta parapano stoikheia aposunthetoun ton mutho tou sklera ergazomenou europaiou kai tou 
    ena spoudaio alla ligotero gnosto mnemeio e stoa tou eumenous  prokeitai na anastelothei 
 meta apo diethne diagonismo pou prokeruxe e  anadeikhtheke o anadokhos tou ergou to opoio oloklerotheke to  
  kritikos logotekhnias mariza ntekastro apotima tis taseis sto paidiko biblio gia te khronia pou perase kai o giannes  papadatos parousiazei es teleutaies ekdoseis sten agora tou paidikou bibliou 
 apospasma tes ephemeridas eleutheros logos tes tetartes  ianouariou  
  ellada diekdikei meridio apo ta  dis 
 peripato ekane kai e latsio tou tzimpril sise kontra sten rampotniski me ton gallo epithetiko na briskei duo phores dikhtua 
 aute e ekphrase ekhei meinei kharagmene sto mualo olon ton ellenon meta ten teleutaia epitukhemene prospatheia tou purrou dema stous olumpiakous agones tes atlantas to  e opoia epephere to khruso metallio gia to kamari tes kheimarras 
   anakoinotheke oti e kupriake demokratia ekhei katastei sumballomeno meros tes sumbases tes  gia ten prostasia kai ten proothese tes polumorphias tes politistikes ekphrases 
 to diethnes kai topiko oikonomiko periballon apaitei sunekhe egregorse oste e etairia na prosarmozei egkaira te strategike tes se tukhon metaboles 
 epeide polloi tha speusoun na bgoun kai na poun to  kai ten skhese mou me to  thelo na dieukrineso oti den ten ekkhoro se kanena 
 sto epipedo auto uperxe agorastike parembase kurios sto khoro ton trapezon me apotelesma o deiktes me ten parodo tes sunedriases na anaktesei ena semantiko meros apo tis megales arkhikes apoleies tou 
    mia apo tis pio ripsokindunes kai entuposiakes athletikes diorganoseis tou kosmou eikhan ten tukhe na apolausoun khiliades atoma olon ton elikion pou brethekan khthes ste limne tes bouliagmenes 
  allo ena kharakteristiko paradeigma pou deikhnei oti sto khoro tes ugeias uparkhei sobarotato problema semeiotheke sto khatzekosta se emera ephemerias 
 sarantopoulos me anodo  radio athenai po me anodo  inteal  me anodo  arg 
 amese epharmoge tou nomou gia osa magazia ekpempoun ntesimpel meta ten  proaneggeile o demarkhos  broules 
 uparkhoun bebaios kai polloi perissoteroi logoi pou upagoreuontai apo ton kathe ena khorista 
 sten ellada pantos den ekhei erthei akoma to sugkekrimeno eidos giogka 
 me ena khairetismo de tha khasei kaneis 
 anaballetai logo kakokairias e aphixe tourkikou klimakiou apo ten adrianoupole 
 dikasterio dietaxe te mastigose pente arabon pou sunelephthesan na odegoun methusmenoi 
 autes perilambanoun kallitekhnika dromena kai parembaseis stous dromous tou kilkis ekdeloseis sta mpar tes poles seminaria ergasteria diemerides kai kallitekhnikes ektheseis 
 blepete kamia diaphora me ekouador e argentine sas leo okhi 
 gia pente exi menes ta ulika auta menoun sto khoraphi eno kata kairous potizontai aerizontai kai anakateuontai 
 auto anapherei e  se deltio tupou sto opoio sunekhizontas tonizei ypenthumizoume oti ede apo ton ioulio eikhan egkrithei oi khemikotekhnikes meletes kai eikhan katatethei sto upourgeio anaptuxes gia na dothei e skhetike egkrise 
 kai ueteoros o anthropos uesa s auton ton kosuo to uikro to uega anazeta uia dikaiose kai uia nike 
 exegontas se allo semeio tes idias sunenteuxes ten antithese tou sto skhedio kallikrates o demarkhos mutilenes anephere oti para tis prospatheies pou eginan pote o k ragkouses den dekhtheke na sunantethei me ten  tou nomou lesbou 
 anoigoun oi phakeloi gia ksenia kai upogeio parkingk ekhoume  episkeptes sundedemenous anoigoun oi phakeloi gia ksenia kai upogeio parkingk epitropes sugkrotei e demotike arkhe apo 
 ste barkelone tha pane kales omades 
 ekhei de barunousa semasia gia to elleniko anagnostiko koino kathos apodomei ta eola stereotupa tes neoellenikes koinonias enanti tes arkhaioellenikes kai katadeiknuei ten apostase anamesa ste sugkhrone kai ten arkhaioellenike antilepse gia te phuse 
  nea dioikese tha skhematistei meta apo duo ebdomades kai endekhetai na uparkhoun kai nea mele 
 phantastike anaparastase tes arkhaias athenas ergo tou karl phrintrikh sinkel doxastiko tou klasikou ideodous opos to proslambanei kai to ekphrazei o europaikos romantismos ton arkhon tou  ai 
 epilegoume epises tis analogika mikroteres se baros suskeuasies pou periekhoun te megalutere dunate posoteta proiontos 
 meta te lexe tou agona oi duo ouades uazi ue tous diaitetes sunephagan giortazontas etsi to telos tes agonistikes periodou 
 einai polu oraia 
 den einai katholou tukhaio to gegonos pos se kapoia paidia den aresei to skholeio 
 uperxe mia anaptuxiake istorike exelixe pou semera edose se ereunetika kai se diagnostika ergasteria nea diagnostika ergaleia polutima ki euprosdekta 
 apo edo eukola tha breite ten under der linen ton dromo kato apo tis philures o opoios einai o oraioteros tes poles 
 to stegastiko einai ena apo ta semantikotera problemata gia tous tsigganous tithetai omos me diaphoretikous orous se diaphoretikes omades 
  exartese apo tous goneis kai e anagke gia anexartesia sugkrouontai ste diatrophe 
 ta khiliometra anebainoun khoris na to katalabeis kai mono o aeras kanei enokhletike ten parousia tou pano apo ta  khlm 
 bebaia gia ten apobole mou e mpala bgeke xekathara ston omo mou 
  epimeleia ton keimenon kai tou epoptikou ulikou pragmatopoietheke apo ton proedro tou sullogou kai ten k sbolake th plethos kosmou parabretheke sten katameste aithousa ekdeloseon tou epimeleteriou kilkis 
 gia to tmema mas proteuousa these sto olokleromeno auto sustema siderodromikon sundeseon katekhei e kataskeue tes siderodromikes egnatias del 
  kordelakias omos to khei eipe leei pos thelei polu noris an ginetai ten prote agonistike kiolas to metaxu mas ntermpi 
 liges ores argotera akolouthese e ephodos sto mikro diamerisma tes odou orpheos  sto kholargo 
  stases tes diethnous koinotetas oi upourgoi amunas ton  kai tes bretanias rompert gkeits kai laiam phox kharakterisan themite ten epiloge os stokhou ton grapheion tou kantaphi se koine sunenteuxe tupou 
 mepos ephtase e ora na upsosoume te phone mas ka na brontophonaxoume ena okhi se kapoio apo ta ethnika mas e esoterika mas themata pou mas talanizoun 
 ta kerde meta phoron  emphanisan meiose tes taxeos tou  kai diamorphothekan se  ekat 
 palia elegan ti na kano sto khorio 
 enteinete ten prospatheia sas 
 sten egoumenitsa kurio kharakteristiko tou kairou to epomeno triemero tha einai e brokhe 
 den egine dekte e paraitese kakhrimane ten paraitese tou apo to  tes   giannina ethese kai episema ste diathese tou k khristobasile o nomarkhes ioanninon alekos kakhrimanes kathos theorei oti o kuklos tou ekleise 
 paraskeue  ianouariou   diepseuse ta peri diagraphes tou prostimou upsous  dis 
 arkhika to erakleio adiketheke kai den diathetei megales peges me katharo nero 
 sten periokhe tou agiou demetriou apo opou pernouse o dromos pou enone te mutilene me ton polikhnito kai brisketai kai to omonumo parekklesi leitourgoun apo ton properasmeno aiona duo kapheneia paliotera to semeio stases ton taxidioton 
 entoutois e epikurose tes sumbases exartatai apo ten uiothetese orismenou arithmou nomothetikon idiaitera tropopoieseon me stokho ten enarmonise tes ellenikes nomothesias me tis aporreouses apo te sumbase desmeuseis 
  bouleutes pragmatopoiese episkepse sto ergostasio tes ellenikes biomekhanias zootrophon opou sunomilese me te dioikese kai tous ergazomenous gia ta problemata pou antimetopizoun 
 metaxu allon zetoun ten katargese tou demotikou phorou meiose tou phpa kai paratase tou orariou mousikes 
 diabaste   opos akribos tuponontai gia paidia pou ekhoun mpei sten proephebike elikia ena polu kalo doro pou mporei na tous anoixei neous orizontes einai mia kompakt photographike opos e canon  
 opos kai na khoun ta pragmata pantos e ektase emeine athikte  kai ta dentra ste these tous 
 to piperi einai anarrikhetiko san te banilia e opoia gia na kanei sporo prepei na gonimopoiethei me to anthropino kheri 
 se mia pole pou kunega tis anases me to ntoupheki khiliades phuta gia ten agora kai te phuteuse ton opoion sigoura dothekan arketa khremata na egkataleipontai sten tukhe tous me epideiktike adiaphoria 
 sumphona me ereuna tes etaireias nielsen oi  stous  teletheates gnorizoun ten uparxe tes uperesias kai toulakhiston to  ekhei anatrexei se auten anazetontas plerophories oi misoi ex auton enemeronontai skhedon kathemerina apo tis selides tou 
 opos egine gnosto o eisaggeleas epises epikaleitai tis marturies kai allon upallelon tou demou oi opoioi perigraphoun mia sunantese pou egine parousia tou k lemousia meta ten apokalupse tes upotheses tou elleimmatos 
 se kanena kheirourgeio den einai eleuthere e prosbase stis kheirourgikes aithouses stous sunodous ton asthenon me apotelesma polles phores idios to apogeuma autoi na phthanoun mekhri tous diadromous ton aithouson 
  martina gia na ekdikethei ton antra tes gia to xulo pou troei paraplanei tous duo uperetes bebaionontas tous pos dethen o sgkanarelos einai spoudaios giatros alla den to paradekhetai para mono an ton spasoun sto xulo 
 sumphona me ton idio katarkhen oi eklogikoi katalogoi etan notheumenoi  eno opos mou kateggeilan mele tes  dekhontan telephonemata apo sugkekrimena grapheia 
  egkaire aute apokalupse kai parembase tou aphegete apo ena stadio metathanatio e apo ena stadio komatodous katastases demiourgei ston anagnoste ena sunaisthema aganakteses epeide ena neo atomo den mporese na diaphugei apo te stenokephalia ton megalon 
 meridio apo ten pita tou elektronikou bibliou diekdikei kai e gnoste alusida bibliopoleion barnes  noble e opoia ekhei lansarei te suskeue nook katekhontas pleon to  tes amerikanikes agoras 
  meta ton ektheseon tou   o pinakas diatheses ton katharon kerdon opos protatheke apo to  tes etairias kai oristheke to kata metokhe merisma sto poso emeromenia apokopes tou dikaiomatos gia to merisma oristheke e  
 antitheta o skouteles pou kategorountan gia amese sunergeia sten anthropoktonia arnetheke tis kategories pou tou apodidontai kathos opos iskhuristeke eikhe zetesei apo ton sugkategoroumeno tou na men skotosoun ten  kopela 
 to septembrio tou  oi treis astronautes tou skaphous  pragmatopoiesan ton proto kineziko diastemiko peripato 
 se mia ebdomada peripou to neo dioiketiko sumboulio tha sunedriasei prokeimenou na sunelthei se soma 
 omos to apisteuto egine kubernon komma pleiopsephia tes boules ephuge mesa apo te boule gia na apophugei diereunese skandalou 
  k  agorastos anakoinose te sustase grapheiou periphereiarkhe se oles tis geographikes enotetes stous semerinous nomous 
 kathe bema proodou pou kanoume apenanti stis sunepeies tes oikonomikes krises tha ekhei antikrisma sto epipedo diabioses olon mas kai prota apo ola ton asthenesteron oikonomika sumpoliton mas 
 treis genies adistakton eraston prospathoun na xetulixoun to koubari ton khartinon psukhon tous 
 sto  epeirou sto  uparkhoun  ek 
 pantos kapoies ekklesies ton timesan apo 
   opou oi sikeloi tha kanoun ten episeme parousiase tes kainourgias omadas upo ton bintsentso montela sto koino tous 
 ti tha ginei kurioi meta tauta tha broume ten akre e tha kanoume oloi ta koroida mekhri na skotothei o protos anthropos giati e strabe paramoneuei ana pasa stigme 
 ena upourgeio me ta demosia erga kai tis metaphores kai ena upourgeio me to periballon ton oikismo kai te xorotaxia 
 sten mia einai  monades mprosta o philios kai o argures 
 to emporiko kentro me tesseris megales plateies pou enonontan me anetous metaxu tous dromous kai sugkentromena guro tous metropolitiko nao trapeza ellados xenodokheia zakharoplasteia to eroo kai to agalma tou athanasiou diakou etan skhediasmeno sopha 
 katokhos metaptukhiakou diplomatos sto koinoniko dikaio droit social tou panepistemiou   ton parision 
 den einai tukhaio alloste to gegonos oti o k papandreou euriskomenos stis bruxelles den epeskephtheke ton prosphatos oristhenta proedro tou sumbouliou tes  alla ton epiblethenta apo tous amerikanous proedro tes epitropes autes k mparozo 
 plousio uliko apo ton drasterio sullogo 
  amoibaia agape rodion kai kretikon epaletheuteke gia mia akome phora 
  eroida anazeta aute ten agape akoma kai se perasmenes skheseis opou suneidetopoiei oti e zoe einai mprosta kai okhi upobastazomene apo sumbatikotetes kai upokhoreseis 
 delabekouras  stase kai oi praxeis tous kathenos einai katagegrammenes    ten prote these ste lista ton allodapon pou dianuktereusan se boulgarika theretra to teleutaio trimeno tou  katelaban oi ellenes episkeptes 
 ste sunekheia omos phainetai oti kati strabose kai epomenos den mporei na sterizeis ena pragma pou strabonei 
  xenonas stegazetai s ena petrino ktirio sten kentrike plateia me to megalo platano 
 para tis epitukhies tou sullogou omos oi ores proponeses sto  sunekhizoun na einai  opos kai gia alla somateia pou den briskontai sto idio agonistiko epipedo 
 apokhorei o milososki apo to upourgeio exoterikon tes   upourgos exoterikon tes  antonio milososki de tha einai melos tes neas kuberneses tes khoras e opoia tha prokupsei apo tis bouleutikes ekloges pou diexekhthesan stis  iouniou

 neos khrestes  eggraphesundese sten koruphe ton protimeseon ton anagnoston toso tes ellenikes ekdoses tou periodikou conde nast traveler oso kai tou amerikanikou periodikou travel and leisure bretheke phetos to nesi tes santorines 
 bebaia oi upalleloi ton grapheion ekanan o ti mporousan gia na demiourgesoun mia taxe sto olo khaos kai na omalopoiesoun ten katastase ostoso os phusiko epakoloutho den eleipse o ekneurismos kai oi lektikoi diaplektismoi metaxu ton atomon pou perimenan

 den te gnorizoume akome stis leptomereies tes alla to perigramma tes einai peripou gnosto

 oi paiktes ekhoun eidopoiethei apo ten dioikese oti mekhri aurio tha ekhoun semeiothei exelixeis

 akolouthei to bankouber kai sten trite these katatassetai e nea uorke 
 ki etsi tha xanarthei piso san peripeteiodes skia phernontas ton aera mias nostalgias pou trephei te phantasia oson ton agapesan ki oson upologisan ste stathere axia tes apoleias 
 opos ekhei apodeikhthei polles phores sto parelthon oi katanalotes apoteloume ten koinonike omada me te megalutere exousia 
  ekei akribos ethela na pao 
 pisteuoume oti erthe e ora e telos na gurisei selida 
 diaisthanetai oti to bretaniko goetro katapontizetai oti phthanei sto telos tes e iskhus ton dutikon sten apo anatole 
 ara ara ephodiasteite ta eisiteria diarkeias kai zeste anepanaleptes stigmes 
 mprokolo phasolakia kounoupidi arakas brazontai a l anglaise se brasto alatismeno nero kai ste sunekheia ta rikhnoun se kruo nero gia na stamatesei amesos o brasmos tous 
  melina pou uegalose khoris uetera einai truphere ki athoa ki oneireuetai ten alethine agape 
 ston panathenaiko exantlese ten austeroteta tes e peitharkhike epitrope tes souper ligkas 
 skhedon staipsila tha perasei exaitias tes kautes epikairotetas mia polu semantike sunantese pou ginetai sta xania 
  enas odegos omos molis eide tous astunomikous na plesiazoun egkateleipse ten motosikleta tou kai epibibasteke sten deutere me skopo na diaphugei mazi ton allon 
 sten pleionoteta tous tautizontan 
 ki esteilan ena menuma s olous emas pou me ten prote duskolia ta paratame gkriniazoume to bazoume kato 
  deiktes upseles kephalaiopoieses semeiose ptose se pososto  eno o deiktes tes mesaias kephalaiopoieses upokhorese se pososto  kai o deiktes tes mikres kephalaiopoieses semeiose ptose  
 perephanos gia ten omada tou delose o omospondiakos tekhnikos tes ethnikes korasidon giorgos belissarakos meta te nike me  epi tes rosias kai ten katalepse tes pemptes theses sto europaiko protathlema tou kaliari 
 to  ekhei orama gia ena kalutero mellon gia te khora kai gia ten epiteuxe tou stokhou uparkhoun kai sugkekrimenes protaseis pou sterizontai sten prasine anaptuxe 
 ton demosiographo soto paidake upeuthuno ton athletikon tes  prin bgei ste suntaxe brabeuse e dioikese tes  gia ten prosphora tou kai sta mikra spor ste diarkeia tou therinou protathlematos proagonistikon kategorion pou egine sto linto 
 auta ta paidia pou einai mele se skhemata san tous rotting christ den prokeite na ginoun pote plousioi e diasemoi apo ten mousike 
 gia na ta xekhasoume ola ste sunekheia bebaios kai na prokhoresoume ten epomene khronia se mia apo ta idia 
 etsi iskhuei kai gia allous paiktes protes grammes opos o torosides o opoios apo oti phainetai exakolouthei na brisketai sto epikentro senarion 
 ena ephialtiko senario san apo tainia tromou planietai s oloklero ton planete eno e ennoia tes pagkosmiopoieses apokta tora tromaktikes diastaseis 
 prokeitai gia klinike ergasteriake exetase kata ten opoia me te khrese eidikou mekhanematos katagraphontai oi kumatomorphes pou paragontai ston anthropino egkephalo os apantese se sugkekrimena exoterika erethismata 
 to semantikotero omos einai oti enopoieitai to arkhaio lukeio kai e palaistra tou gumnasiou me to peristulio pou semera briskontai apenanti kai khorista 
 les kai oloi oi nomoi mas ekhoun dothei ex ouranou san deka entoles kai den mporei kaneis na tous allaxei 
 kai den einai mono o gkomez alla kai orismenoi alloi podosphairistes 
 ertha apo ten roumania prota sten thessalonike kai meta ephthasa sten rodope 
 einai khtismene se upsometro  m me panoramike thea sto ionio 
  metarruthmise tes koines alieutikes politikes apotelei thema tes emeresias diataxes dedomenou oti oi kanones pou iskhuoun upo to semerino kathestos ekpneoun sto telos tou etous 
  presbes tes armenias diamarturetheke kai sten egesia tou  upenthumizontas kai tis amuntikes sumphonies diakratese ton metokhon tes folli  follie sustenei se analuse tes e  warburg anaprosarmozontas ten proegoumene ektimese tes gia agora 
  phetine latsio prophanos den moiazei me kamia alle kai proballei os mia exairetika dunate antipalos gia ton are 
 ten kedemonia tes kores tes ekhei analabei e giagia tes 
 ekei omos pou e elleipse sobarotetas ekhei khtupesei kokkino einai sten elassona antipoliteuse 
 auto iskhue kai sten periptose tou algerinou mesoepithetikou pou eikhe men sumbolaio os to kalokairi tou  plen omos to en logo idiotiko sumphonetiko tou edine to dikaioma na apokhoresei amesa 
 trite  iouliou   kathe khrono to teleutaio sabbatokuriako tou iouliou giortazontai ste skoulekaria tes artas geneteira tou giorgou karaiskake ta karaiskakeia 
 xatzebretas me  psephous perissoterous  enanti  kai tha etan  ligoteroi an den uperkhan oi psephoi athltikon suntakton tou hrakleiou 
 mia megale aletheia einai oti osoi peran to khrisma ten teleutaia sten kuriolexia stigme koubaloun mazi tous polla meionektemata aphou den to katalaban kai oi idioi kala  kala pou leei o logos 
 ta teleutaia khronia ostoso proserkhontai gia boetheia atoma olo kai pio mikres elikias akome kai kato ton  eton 
 editors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia den uparkhoun askhemes gunaikes mono dustukhismenes gunaikes e gunaikes pou plettoun ekhoun pei oi adelphes maria kai rosy carita 
 peran auton erotematiko uparkhei gia deka  
 anekei sto kethea kentro therapeias exartemenon atomon kai apeuthunetai se khrestes narkotikon ousion ano ton  eton kai stis oikogeneies tous 
 tis opoies epitukhies ton allon panta den tis blepoume me kalo mati kai sunekheia psakhnoume na broume ti krubetai apo piso 
 ton perasmeno dekembrio ekdotheke se cd meta apo polles ores sto stountio kai bebaia ten enorkhestrose  prosarmoge tou kupourgou 
 kai to erotema einai pos mporei enas upourgos e akoma enas prothupourgos na antilambanetai ta problemata ton politon an oudepote ta biose o idios phtanei pia kai me ta ekatommuria pou tseponoun kharistika ektos apo tis pakhules argomisthies tous 
  auto to semeio den ekhoume alles plerophories gia to ti apeginan autoi meta ten anakhorese apo to parisi 
 se oti aphora tis posotetes ton narkotikon paradekhteke oti tis eikhe agorasei apo ena albano sten athena kai oti tis esteile me dema sto onoma tou patera tou oste na men kinesei upopsies 
 ksaphnika o pasparakes ebgale ena makhairi kai to karphose gregora sto stethos tes duo phores 
 ta reportaz tha dinoun kai tha pairnoun stis agores kai oi eroteseis ton markoutsophoron pros to katanalotiko koino to opoio apanta analoga me tis oikonomikes dunatotetes tou 
 kurios ean xeperasthoun palies sunetheies kai politikes praktikes
